<item>

<vol>3041</vol>
<tib>chos skyong sprul sku rgyal chen sku lnga gis gsol mchod</tib>
<p>1a-9b</p>
<col>@009b (zhes sogs kyis bkra shis brjod 'dir rgyal po sku lnga chos skyong rdor legs gnyis kyi gsol po dam tshig thun don rnams kyis sngon du gong ma'i bla ma rje thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtsho'i zhal snga nas gzhan yang rgyud pa'i bla ma de rnams kyi bka' lung gi brgyud pa la brten nas zung bar rgya mtsho snga cha byis bkra shis pad dkar chos gling gi gnyer gtad la lag na bzhi du rab tu bstan bsrung bgyis pa'o 'di ltar rjes brten pa byed pa'i dam pa skyes bu dge 'dun rnams kyis bsam don yon tan dang 'phrin las rnam bzhi grub par mdzod bkra shis</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3041</vol>
<tib>dmigs brtse ma'i la rten pa'i drag po gsum dril gyi bkru byabs bsrung bya tshul zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-8a</p>
<col>@007b (ces bum pa chog 'di ni @008a * snyigs ma'i dus 'dir rgyal po dang btsan la sogs sde brgyad drang srong 'byung po rnams kyis 'tshe ba'i 'gro ba mang po la phan pa'i ched du 'di lta bu zhig gos zhes mchod dpon shes rab bzang po sogs kyi bskul ba ltar dpal mgon bzhad rdor ming can gyis lcags khyi lo'i dbyar tha zla'i tshes bcu drug la tshe tshig thu nwa gwa zhes pa'i sa char sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dbu mdzad ngag dbang legs bshad gyis bgyis pa'o dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3041</vol>
<tib>dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed dpa' bo gcig pa'i sgo nas gshin po'i sbyang chog zhing mchog sgo 'byed zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-16b</p>
<col>@017a * (ces dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed dpa' bo gcig pa'i sgo nas gshin po rjes su 'dzin pa'i cho ga zhing mchog sgo 'byed zhes pa 'di ni mang thos yon tan gyis mdzes pa'i aer te ni chos rje dang kun rig grwa tshang gi bla ma dbu mdzad chos rje dang slob dpon au lem ci blo bzang rin chen dang tshogs chen dbu mdzad blo bzang shes rab dang pi lig thu blo bzang bstan pa dbu mdzad sogs don gnyer 'ga' zhig gis nan tan chen po yang yang bskul ba'i ngo bsrung ba'i ched ^rje btsun rdo rje 'chang chen po mkhas shing grub pa'i dbang phyug dza ya pandi ta zhes mtshan yongs su grags pa de nyid kyi zhabs kyi rdul spyi bos len pa bka' drin gyis cung zad mnos pa byang phyogs sogs po'i yul grur 'khyams pa'i phyogs med blo zhi ming can gyis sngon gyi mkhas pa'i gsung rgyun la brten nas bgyis pa'i 'dis kyang sems can thams cad 'khor ba dang ngan song gi sdug bsngal las thar te myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig  bkra shis par gyur cig  mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>

<tib>dpal ldan dur khrod bdag po'i gser skyems khrag chang khrag zor dang bcas pa</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3058</vol>
<tib>mthu chen dgra lha chen po dgu'i gsol mchod dgra bas rgyal ba'i ru mtshan zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@016a * (ces dpal gsang ba'i bdag po'i bka' sdod dkar phyogs skyong ba'i bsrung ba mthu rtsal can dgra lha chen po mched dgu'i gsol @016b mchod dga bas rgyal ba'i ru mtshon zhes bya ba 'di ni jing gir gnam gyi rigs chung stobs 'byor mnga' thang gis mngon par mtho shing bla ma dkon mchog ka mi phyed ba'i dad dgu'i dang ldan pa thus lag chi thar hung tha'i ri tshe dbang rdo rje lags nas rgyal blon 'bangs ji ma'i lha gsol gyi don du phan pa'i lhag bsam gyis bskul ma nan cher mdzad pa ltar mkhas grub dam pa du ma'i 'zhabs rdul spyi bo'i rgyan du 'dzin pa'i rgyal khams pa @017a * badzra kirtis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni rnam dpyod yangs pa'i slob bu dge tshul bstan 'dzin bzang po'o  'dis kyang kar phyogs skyor ba'i bsrung mthu stobs can rnams kyis rtag tu 'go zhing sdongs grong mdzad de bstan 'gro yongs la phan rgya cher thogs shing bkra shis dge legs phyogs kun tu khyab par byed nus par gyur cig  lha rgyal lo</col>

<tib>'dul ba rgya mtsho'i dka' gnad mdor bsdus pa nor bu'i phreng ba zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@125b ('di ni btsun pa dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron mes rang lo nyer gsum pa la lha ldan smon lam grwa skor gyi dus gtugs pas rtsas blo 'dzin ngos der mi gsal ba kha 'geng dgos rnams dpe klog gang bgyis dran tho rags pa tsam sug bris su btab pa las phyis dbe rim par 'khyar te chos grwa chen po dpal ldan bkra shis 'khyil gyi dga' ram 'dzin grwa'i chos grwa ba rnams nas rtsod pa la phan skyed che bar 'dug pas par du 'khod dgos zhes par yig btab zin 'dug @126a * kyang spyir dang pho nas rang gi brjed tho tsam du bsam ste tshig sbyor sogs rtsom pa'i lugs su ma byas shing lhag par de skabs rtsod pa cha tshang ma song bas gong 'og ma 'brel pa lta bu re gnyis 'dug pa zhu dag cung zad bgyis yod kyang dngung blo gros can rnams kyis dpyad par mdzad na legs so 'dir 'bad legs byas gangga'i klung rgyun gyis nyes ltung rnyog pa'i dri ma rab sbyangs nas chos 'dul rgya mtsho'i gling du phyin gyur te bslab gsum nor bu'i mdzod la dbang 'byor shog  sarba mangga lam</col>

<col>@010b (zhes rje btsun ma ku ru gu lle'i sgrub thabs dngos grub myur du 'gug pa'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba 'di ni tshangs pa mi'i gzugs can stobs kyi 'khor lo bsgyur ba ching gis rgyal po'i rigs su 'khrungs shing dad pa dang 'byor ba phun sum tshogs pa 'jam dbyangs rdo rje wang gis 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes gsung gis bskul ba'i ngor lha'i btsun pa su ma ti ma ni pra dzny'as sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni rnam dpyod phul du byung ba'i gu shr'i blo bzang stobs ldan no 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa dar zhing rgyas pa yun ring du gnas pa dang 'gro rnams phyag rgya chen po mchog gi dngos grub thob par gyur cig </col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3070</vol>
<tib>'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po mdo</tib>
<p>1a-451a</p>
<col>@449a * bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa rdzogs so (rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh'akya se na dang dzny'a na siddhi dang zhu chen gyi lo tstsha ba ban de dharma t'a sh'i la la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab slad kyi dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag bod kyi dpal lha btsan po bkra shis lha sde btsan gyis bkas rgya gar gyi mkhan po su bh'a shi ta dang sgra bsgyur gyi lo tstsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos 'grel pa dang mthun par bsgyur slad kyi rgya gar gyi mkhan po pandi ta chen po d'i pam ga ra shr'i dzny'a na dang zhu chen gyi lo tstsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos yul dbus kyi 'grel pa dang gtugs nas bcos shing zhus te gtan la phab yang slad kyes kyi smad gnye thang na mo cher panti ta chen po d'i pam ka ra shr'i dzny'a na dang lo tstsha ba 'brom rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas gnyis kyis brgyad stong pa bshad pa'i dus su che long zhig gtan la phab phyis rwa sgreng gi gtsug lag khang du lo tstsha ba 'brom rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas kyis rgya gar gyi mdo gsum dang gtugs nas lan gnyis @449b gtan la phab slad kyis yang lo tstsha ba de nyid kyi bshad pa mdzad cing phran tshegs kyang gtan la phab dus phyis lo tstsha ba chen po sh'akya'i dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis kha che'i dpe dang yul dbus kyi dpe du ma bsags nas gtan la phab slar yang snyigsdus thams cad mkhyen pa chen po zha lu lo tstsha ba dpal rin chen chos skyong bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis rgya bod kyi doe du ma dar bstun nas shin tu rnam par dag par mdzad pa'i ma phyi dang rgya dpe gnyis dang bod doe bar ma rnams la gtugs te sh'akya'i dge slong mnga' ris rab 'byams pa dpal 'byor rgyal mtshan dang skad gnyis smra ba'i btsun pa kun dga' chos bzang gnyis kyis rnam 'gyur lcags pho stag lo'i mchu'i zla ba'i tsandra tshes kyi dkyil 'khor nya yongs su gang ba'i nyin yar ston shambu ste bde 'byung gi gangs ri chen pos mdzes pa'i yul gyi thig le yangs par zhus shing dag par byas pa'o ) * swa sti bgrang yas lus can mig gi bdud rtsi mtshan dpe rnam bkra mdzes pas sku bgrang dka'i 'grol rang rang blor 'tsham zab rgyas chos tshul 'doms pa'i gsung bgrang gis mi lang shes bya ma lus mngon sum gcig car gzigs pa'i thugs bgrang yas yon tan tshogs kyis mngon 'phags sh'akya'i gtso bor phyag 'tshal lo gang des dmigs med brtse bas kun bslangs ste mtha' yas 'gro rnams @450a * srid zhi'i 'jigs pa las skyob slad chos phung brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed gsung ba kun gyi rab dang phul byung zhes rgyal ba nyid kyis bsngags pa'i sher phyin gyi gzhung mchog 'phags pa brgyd stong zhes grags pa zab rgyas lam gyi gnad kun yongs rdzogs par dbang rnon 'dul byar gtso bor bstan pa 'di thub pa'i bstan dar skye dgu bde ba'i slad dpyod ldan gu shr'i shes rab rgya mtsho yis lhag bsam dag pas rgyu tshogs legs sgrub ste bkras lhun li thang rgyal khab chen po sogs yul gru du ma'i dpe dang bstun byas nas brjod byed lan bdun par du legs zhus te 'jam dbyangs gong ma'i rgyal khab be'i cing du par du bsgrubs pa'i bsod nams gang thob pa 'dis mtshon rang gzhan skyes 'phags ma lus pa'i dus gsum dge tshogs ji snyed yod do cog bsngoms pa'i mthu las srid pa'i rgya mtsho ru bying ba'i 'gro kun kun mkhyen gnas thob shog thub bstan spyi dang khyad par tsong kha pa'i dri med lugs bzang phyogs bcur rgyas pa dang bstan pa rin chen @450b gtsug tu rtag mchod pa'i lha mi'i tshogs kyi 'dod dgu 'grub par shog byed po'ang deng nas tshe rabs thams cad du mtshan ldan bshes mjal dam sdom legs bsrung nas theg mchog la zhugs tshogs gnyis myur rdzogs nas bla med sku bzhi'i bdag nyid 'thob gyur cig  chos 'di gang gis nyan zhing sems pa dang bsgoms dang bklag dang mchod pa'i skye bo kun rgyal ba dgyes pa'i lam dang mi 'bral zhing rgyal sras spyod par kun tu 'jug par shog 'jig rten khams su nad rims 'thab rtsod dang mu ge lo nyes sang ser than pa sogs mi 'dod kun zhi lo phyugs dpal 'byor 'phel dge legs dpal la rol pa'i bkra shis shog  (ces shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa @451a * 'di nyid bstan 'grod smin pa'i ched du gsung rab kyi don la rnam dpyod mchog tu yangs pa'i gu shr'i dge slong shes rab rgya mtshos par du bsgrubs pa'i tshe par byang 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba'i ngor rnam ga-yeng dang chos brgyad kyi bran du gyur ba sku skyes ngag dbang chos grags kyis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni rnam dpyod dang ldan pa tshul khrims chos 'phel gyis bgyis pa dge legs su gyur cig  brka shis 'bar 'gyur cig  sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>

<vol>3073</vol>
<tib>no title [@004a * dbang phyogs mah'a tsi na'i dgra lta che rgyal bstan bsrung ba'i lha mchog sgrol gying che bstan dgra snying la rngams pa'i bshams pa che bse yi rigs las 'khrungs pa'i mthu bo che ]"</tib>
<p>4a-4a</p>
<col>@004a * (ces pa 'di ni spyod ldan dbus mdzad dge 'dun gyis bskul ba ltar gong ma chen mo'i gser gyi bka' lung gi ^aer te ni yil kog san hu thog thur 'bod pa ^sh'akya'i btsun pa blo bzang bsam grub gyis sug bris su bgyis pa'o "</col>

<vol>3092</vol>
<tib>` brtan bzhugs gsol 'debs bsam don lhun grub drang srong grub pa'i bden tshig ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-3b</p>
<col>@003a * (ces pa 'di ni byang phyogs hal ha'i yul gru chen por thub bstan spyi dang khyad par du yang 'jam mgon bla ma khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po tsong kha pa chen po blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyi ring lugs ches cher gsal bar mdzad pa po rje btsun dam pa sku phreng brgyad pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos kyi nyi ma bstan 'dzin dbang phyug dpal bzang po gnam gyi lha 'jam dpal dbyangs ^gong ma bdag po chen po'i bka' lung bzhin gser gyi bum bzang las gsal 'thon 'khrul bral nges rnyed thog gangs can 'gro ba'i lha gcig phyag na pad dkar 'chang ba ngur smrig gar gyis rnam par rol ba ^rgyal mchog thams cad mkhyen pa chen po nas dpu phud mtshan gsol bcas legs par grub bstun khu ral chen mo'i mkhan po no min han aer te ni phyag mdzod rgyal khag bzhi bcas tsho ba bdun nas ched du mjags pa'i mi sna t'a bla ma blo @003b bzang ye shes gsol dpon karma dza'i sang tshe ring don grub gzims 'gag chos bkra shis dge slong bstan pa dar rgyas sogs mthun mong nas brtan bzhugs smon tshig 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba'i ngor 'od gsal lta las babs pa'i rgyal rigs kyi bande rig sngags 'chang ba su ma ti shri ma na dharma sya kirti sh'a sa na sye sha rar @004a * 'bod pas pho brang rgyal mtshan mthon po'i gzims chung bka' gdams pho brang du sbyar ba'o mangga lam bkra shis bar gyur cig dge'o</col>

<item>

<tib>rje sku gong ma'i bstan pa rgyas pa'i smon lam 'dod don lhun grub drang srong bden tshig ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-5a inc [*missing page from 3a-3b*]</p>
<col>@004b (ces byang phyogs bstan 'gro'i dpal mgon rje btsun dam pa rin po che'i sku gong ma ^blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas phyogs 'dir gsar tshugs kyi mdo sngags bstan pa'i srol bzang dri ma med pa ring du 'bar zhing rgyas par smon pa @005a * 'dod don lhun grub drang srong bden tshig ces bya ba 'di ni snga sor khu ral chen mo'i grwa rigs pa dka' bcu pa dpal ldan gyis bskul zhing da lan tshul khrims byang chub gling gi tshogs chen dbus mdzad dka' bcu pa rta mgrin skyabs kyis lha dar ser po dngul tam bcas bskul ba'i ngor sngags ram pa blo bzang chos 'dzin gyis gling de nyid du sbyar ba'o dge legs 'phel</col>

<p>113b-138b</p>
<col>@138a * (zhes bla ma'i rnal 'byor dang 'brel bar byang chub lam rim gyi snying po'i don nyams su len tshul legs gsung kun gyi sgo 'byed skal ldan re skong zhes bya ba 'di ni rang gi slob ma don gnyer can 'ga' zhig gis lam rim gyi gnad don tshang ba'i nyams len 'khyer bde ba zhig dgos zhes nan tan du bskul ngor @138b tshul 'di nyid byin rlabs khyad par du 'phags shing 'jug pa bde bar mthong nas bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin kho nas 'tsho ba'i btsun gzugs snyoms las pa dam tshig rdo rjes bla ma'i gsung rgyun las byung ba'i man ngag ji lta ba bzhin bris pa 'dis kyang 'jam mgon rgyal po'i mdo sngags kyi bstan pa rin po che 'di dag nam yang mi nub cing phyogs dus kun du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig dge'o legs so sarba mangga lam</col>

</item>

<col>@003a * (ces pa 'di ni mong gol cing shog nas dad brtson ldan pa chos mdzad dkon mchog bzang pos bskul ngor ^ btsun pa dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron mes bris pa'o</col>

<item>

<tib>no title [@001b rgyal ba ma lus skyed pa'i yab gyur kyang rgyal sras tshul gyis zhing khams rab 'byams su rgyal ba'i chos 'dzin thugs bskyed bden pa'i mthus ]"</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col>@003a * (ces pa 'di ni lhag bsam rnam dpyod yangs pa dka' bcu blo bzang bstan pas bskul zhing spyir deng dus rje bla ma'i bstan pa 'di ni zungs zad kyi nad pa sman pas bor ba bzhin du bdag tu 'dzin pa 'ga' yang mi snang bas cung zad re bsrings thub na'ang cim rung snyam du smon pa'i yid kyis btsun pa dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron mes bris pa'o</col>

<item>

<vol>3132</vol>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3132</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi chos skor las bla blu'i cho ga rin chen srog gi chad mthud zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@013b (bla blu'i cho ga rin chen srog gi chad mthud zhes bya ba 'di bla 'gugs dgos pa 'ga' zhig gi skabs lag tu bza' btung gi rigs zhig thogs te ming nas kyi 'bod pa bzhin byed pa las bya thabs gzhan mi shes pa mang po mthong bas rkyen byas te mdos gto glud kyi cho ga 'di rigs sde snod la spyangs pa'i dge bshes rnams 'gal rkyen med cing lto grangs mnyam pa'i skabs spang bya dang nad gdon sogs kyis gtses dus blang byar mdzad pas spangs blang gang gi phyogs yin pa ma shes kyang rma lar phan na khyi tshil gi dpe bzhin nye bar mkho ba'i skabs kyang srid snyams te @014a * btsun gzugs dharma badzra gyis yid dga' chos 'phel zhes bya ba'i skyed mo'i tshal du bris pa'o sarba mangga lam dge'o ) "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3132</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi chos skor las btsan mdos gtong tshul dregs pa mig bsgyur gyi ltad mo zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@013a * (btsan mdos gtong tshul dregs pa mig bsgyur gyi ltad mo zhes bya ba 'di ni yang dur ped nas dad brtson rnams dpyod yangs pa nang so skal bzang tshul khrims kyis au tshugs mthar skyel gyis bskul ba'i ga-yang ngo ma bzlog par lha 'dre stong gi dra ba las 'byung ba dang sgo bstun te ku s'a li ^dharma badzra gyis nor skyong rab brgal tshul du bris pa'i yi ge pa ni gu shri ngag dbang @013b bstan 'phel gyis bgyis pa ris med yongs la phan thogs par gyur cig  dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3132</vol>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3132</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi chos skor las nad bdag stobs 'joms kyi cho ga 'khyer bde bar bkod pa kun phan bdud rtsi'i zeg ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so  "</tib>
<p>1a-9b</p>
<col>@009b (ces nad bdag stobs 'joms kyi cho ga 'khyer bde bar bkod pa kun phan bdud rtsi'i zeg ma zhes bya ba 'di yang ku s'a li dharma badzra gyis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni 'gu shri ngag dbang bstan 'phel lo mangga lam dge'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3132</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas byis pa'i gdon la glud gtor gtong tshul bdud rtsi'i yol go zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-7a</p>
<col>@007a * (ces pa sbyar gzhan rnams snga ma bzhin byas pas 'grub po byis pa'i gdon la glud gtor gtor tshul 'di sor 'brang gzungs dang chung dpyad man ngag bzhin chos kyi rdo rjes sdebs pa'i dge ba yis 'gro la phan pa rgya chen 'grub par shog  dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3132</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas grib sel bya tshul nor bu ke ta ka zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-5a</p>
<col>@005a * rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas grib sel bya tshul nor bu ke ta ka zhes bya ba 'di ni don nyer ba 'ga' zhig gis lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul bar brten mkha' 'gro sgrub thabs dang 'brel ba'i grib sel gyi gdams pa rnams rta mgrin la mi 'grigs bzhin du nan gyis sbyor bar dgos pa ma mchis shing sngar bkod pa'i gdams pa 'di nyid yi dam gang la'ang sbyar chog pas rta mgrin gyi le lag tu blang bar 'gal ba med par bsam nas btsun gzugs dharma badzra gyis bha ta'i sa'i char sgar thogs tu sbyar ba'o dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3132</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas phyugs glud gtong thabs 'byung po tshim byed zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-6b</p>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3147</vol>
<tib>rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras la mchod gtor 'bul ba'i rim pa dngos grub kyi bang mdzod ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-23b</p>
<col>@023b (ces rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras la mchod gtor 'bul ba'i rim pa la lag tu blang bde bar brjod pa 'di ni gnas brtan sdom brtson dam pa blo gros rgya mtshos bskul ba'i ngor chos smra ba dge 'dun rgya mtsho'i dpal gyis bu ston thams cad mkhyen pa'i yig cha gzhir byas med mi rung rnams kha bkang ste chos 'khor rgyal gyi gtsug lag khang gi bka' gdams pho brang du nye bar sbyar ba 'dis kyang skye 'gro thams cad dbul phongs kyi sdug bsngal las thar par gyur cig  </col>
</item>

<item>

<col>@004a * (ces pa 'di ni ka bcu dge legs kyis bskul ba'i ngor ban rgan snyoms las pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan dpal bzang pos sbyar ba'o</col>

<tib>gnas brtan phyag mchod chos kyi sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@003a * (ces pa 'di ni bdag dang nyi 'khor ba bcas nas bstan 'gro'i bde thabs su gnas brtan bcu drug gi bris sku gsar bskrun @003b skabs smon tshig 'di lta bu zhig dgos khu bo mkhan po dge slong ye shes dge legs nas bskul ngor ^ rje btsun dam pa'i sprul sku'i ming 'dzin pa blo bzang tshul khrims 'jigs med bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis rgyal dbang bskal bzang rgya mtshos mdzad pa'i gnas brtan bcu drug gi phyag mchod la gzhi byas tshig kha bsgyur gyis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni aa khu mkhan po dge slong ye shes dge legs kyis bgyis pa dza yantu</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3155</vol>
<tib>dam pa'i chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi rnam par bshad pa thar lam gsal byed ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-227a</p>
<col>@226a * chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi tshig le'ur byas pa slob dpon sh'akya'i dge slong dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i rnam par bshad pa thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun grub pa dpal bzang po'i gsung rgyun zin bris su bkod pa rdzogs so gsung rab rgya mtsho lta ba'i sgo gcig po chos mngon mdzod kyi rnam par bshad pa 'di rje btsun dam pa thams cad mkhyen pa yis ji ltar gsungs pa'i gsung ngag ji bzhin bkod 'di bris dge bas tshe rabs kun tu bdag mtshungs @226b med blo bzang grags pa'i zhabs drung du sa dang lam gyi yon tan mthar son te 'gro kun sangs rgyas sa la dgod par shog  aom swa sti shes bya kun gzigs ye shes snang ba yis srid pa'i mun pa mtha' dag 'phrog byed pa 'jig rten yongs kyi bla na 'phags pa'i tog thub dbang smra ba'i nyi ma la phyag 'tshal mkha' khyab gser gyi pad+ma bzhad pa las chos kun tshungs pa'i dbyangs su rtag sgrog na mgon khyod dper 'os 'jam dbyangs gzhon nu'i lha byang chub par du yid kyi rgyan du bzhugs gang thugs beet'ura gtsang ma'i me long du gsung rab kun gyi rang gzugs sgeg mo'i gar nyams 'gyur ma 'dres 'char ba'i ngo mtshar la dgyes rtsen mkhas mchog dbyigs gnyen zhabs la 'dud shes bya bzhi lnga'i gnas lugs mtha' dag la drang por 'jug pa'i shes rab yid bzhin nor ma lus 'byung gnas gcig gyur legs bshad mdzod 'di ko 'jig rten gsum gyi phan bde'i gzhi de yi rnam bshad mkhas grub bye ba'i mgon pad dkar 'chang dbang zhal las 'phos pa'i lung thar 'dod rnams la srid dang zhi ba'i phyogs brdzen par mthong ba'i mig 'byed cho ga gzhin ` ris med 'gro la chos sbyin spel ba'i slad gang 'di par du bskrun pa'i dge ba yis thub bstan snying po 'jam mgon tsong kha pa'i lugs bzang mtha' dbus kun tu 'bar gyur cig  rgyal bas legs @227a * gsungs sde snod rgya mtsho cher dad sogs dbang po'i gru rdzings brtan bcas nas lhag pa'i bslab gsum yid bzhin nor bu la dbang po'i dam pas sa steng khyab gyur cig  las dang phra rgyas dam po'i 'ching ba yis srid gnas nyam ngar bcings pa'i lus can tshogs ring min zag med lam gyi bgrod pa la brten nas kun mkhyen go 'phang thob gyur cig  (ces pa 'di ni shing phag lo dam pa'i chos mngon pa mdzod kyi rnam bshad thar lam gsal bar byed pa'i bstan bcos chen po chos sbyin rgya cher spel ba'i slad par du bsgrun pa'i smon tshig tu sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang bskal bzang rgya mtshos sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<col>@226a * chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi tshig le'ur byas pa slob dpon sh'akya'i dge slong dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i rnam par bshad pa thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun grub pa dpal bzang po'i gsung rgyun bzhin nor ma lus 'byung gnas gcig gyur legs bshad mdzod 'di ko 'jig rten gsum gyi phan bde'i gzhi de yi rnam bshad mkhas grub bye ba'i mgon pad dkar 'chang dbang zhal las 'phos pa'i lung thar 'dod <item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3157</vol>
<tib>rgyud 'grel lde mig ces bya ba dang rdzogs rim gyi sdom tshig mdor bsdus bcas</tib>
<p>1a-27a</p>
<col>@026a * (de ltar rgyud 'grel dang rdzogs rim @026b gyi sdoms tshigs 'di gnyis ni rang gi slob ma rgyud stod gung ru dge bshes ngag dbang chos 'phel gyis 'di 'dra zhig dgos zhes bskul ba'i ngor ^ yongs 'dzin dga' ldan khri thog bdun bcu pas sbyar ba'i yi ge pa yag bskul ba po nyid do 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas pa'i rgyur gyur cig  aom swa sti bla  ma rdo rje sems dpar 'dud dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rtsa rgyud kyi le'u dang por tshul bzhi brgyad drang nges bshad pa nyer drug dang dgongs man dgongs bshad re lhag ma phyung dang bzhugs rnams sgra ji bzhin ` gnyis par tshul bzhin drang nges re ji bzhin gnyis so gzhan dgongs min ` le'u gsum par tshul bzhi gcig lhag ma kun la drang nges gsungs ` bzhi par drang nges dgongs min re ji bzhin gnyis su rdzogs par bsdus ` lngar par ji bzhin sgra bzhi dang dgongs min gnyis so drang nges gsum dgongs bshad gcig ste sde tshan bcu ` le'u drug par tshul bzhi gcig  dgongs bshad tshan gnyis drang nges gsum ` sngags kyi spyod mchog le'u ra ni ji bzhin dgongs min dgongs bshad tshan gsum gsum tshul bzhi drang nges re'o ` brgyad par dgongs dang dgongs min re drang nges gnyis dang ji bzhin gsum ` sngags kyi spyod mchog le'ur ni ji bzhin dgongs min dgongs bshad tshan gsum gsum tshul bzhi drang res re'o ` brgyad par dgongs dang dgongs min re drang nges gnyis dang ji bzhin gsum ` dgu bar ji bzhin drang nges dgongs bshad re ` snying po bskul bar dgongs dgongs min ji bzhin tshan pa re res bsdus ` rig pa'i skyes mchog le'u la ji bzhin dgongs bshad tshan gnyis gnyis dgongs min drang nges re rer gsungs ` rgyud 'di'i le'u bcu gnyis par dgongs min gcig dang drang nges gnyis dgongs dang ji bzhin bzhi bzhi'o ` bcu gsum pa @027a * la drang nges gnyis dgongs bzhi min gcig ji bzhin lnga'o ` bcu bzhir ji bzhin dgongs gnyis gnyis ` bco lngar dgongs min gcig dgongs gnyis lhag ma rnams ni sgra ji bzhin ` bcu drug pa la ji bzhin drug ji bzhin min gnyis dgongs bshad gnyis ` bcu bdun pa la tshul bzhi gcig dgongs min ji bzhin gsum gsum mo shu bham ` aom swa sti rgyud dang rdzogs rim blta ba'i lde mig 'di bde gsal bka' bcu blo bzang tshe ring gyis par du bskrun pa'i dge tshogs bdud rtsi'i mthus srid zhi'i rgud pa drung nas 'byin par shog ston pa mchog des phun tshogs 'khor dbus su rgyud 'di bris 'dzin klog sems 'drir bcug sogs byang chub rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa'i bden 'bras ded 'dir mngon 'gyur shog bdag dang 'gro ba rnam mkha' mtha' khyab kun ^rdo rje 'chang dngos bla mas mnyes bzhin du rjes su bzung nas bka' bzhin sgrub pa dang rin chen lta bu'i gdul byar 'gyur bar shog ces pa'i dge bsdo 'di yang khri thog bdun bcu pas sbyar ba'o"</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3157</vol>
<tib>rgyud 'grel lde mig ces bya ba dang rdzogs rim gyi sdom tshig mdor bsdus bcas</tib>
<p>1a-27a</p>
<col>@026a * (de ltar rgyud 'grel dang rdzogs rim @026b gyi sdoms tshigs 'di gnyis ni rang gi slob ma rgyud stod gung ru dge bshes ngag dbang chos 'phel gyis 'di 'dra zhig dgos zhes bskul ba'i ngor ^ yongs 'dzin dga' ldan khri thog bdun bcu pas sbyar ba'i yi ge pa yag bskul ba po nyid do 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas pa'i rgyur gyur cig  aom swa sti bla  ma rdo rje sems dpar 'dud dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rtsa rgyud kyi le'u dang por tshul bzhi brgyad drang nges bshad pa nyer drug dang dgongs man dgongs bshad re lhag ma phyung dang bzhugs rnams sgra ji bzhin ` gnyis par tshul bzhin drang nges re ji bzhin gnyis so gzhan dgongs min ` le'u gsum par tshul bzhi gcig lhag ma kun la drang nges gsungs ` bzhi par drang nges dgongs min re ji bzhin gnyis su rdzogs par bsdus ` lngar par ji bzhin sgra bzhi dang dgongs min gnyis so drang nges gsum dgongs bshad gcig ste sde tshan bcu ` le'u drug par tshul bzhi gcig  dgongs bshad tshan gnyis drang nges gsum ` sngags kyi spyod mchog le'u ra ni ji bzhin dgongs min dgongs bshad tshan gsum gsum tshul bzhi drang nges re'o ` brgyad par dgongs dang dgongs min re drang nges gnyis dang ji bzhin gsum ` sngags kyi spyod mchog le'ur ni ji bzhin dgongs min dgongs bshad tshan gsum gsum tshul bzhi drang res re'o ` brgyad par dgongs dang dgongs min re drang nges gnyis dang ji bzhin gsum ` dgu bar ji bzhin drang nges dgongs bshad re ` snying po bskul bar dgongs dgongs min ji bzhin tshan pa re res bsdus ` rig pa'i skyes mchog le'u la ji bzhin dgongs bshad tshan gnyis gnyis dgongs min drang nges re rer gsungs ` rgyud 'di'i le'u bcu gnyis par dgongs min gcig dang drang nges gnyis dgongs dang ji bzhin bzhi bzhi'o ` bcu gsum pa @027a * la drang nges gnyis dgongs bzhi min gcig ji bzhin lnga'o ` bcu bzhir ji bzhin dgongs gnyis gnyis ` bco lngar dgongs min gcig dgongs gnyis lhag ma rnams ni sgra ji bzhin ` bcu drug pa la ji bzhin drug ji bzhin min gnyis dgongs bshad gnyis ` bcu bdun pa la tshul bzhi gcig dgongs min ji bzhin gsum gsum mo shu bham ` aom swa sti rgyud dang rdzogs rim blta ba'i lde mig 'di bde gsal bka' bcu blo bzang tshe ring gyis par du bskrun pa'i dge tshogs bdud rtsi'i mthus srid zhi'i rgud pa drung nas 'byin par shog ston pa mchog des phun tshogs 'khor dbus su rgyud 'di bris 'dzin klog sems 'drir bcug sogs byang chub rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa'i bden 'bras ded 'dir mngon 'gyur shog bdag dang 'gro ba rnam mkha' mtha' khyab kun ^rdo rje 'chang dngos bla mas mnyes bzhin du rjes su bzung nas bka' bzhin sgrub pa dang rin chen lta bu'i gdul byar 'gyur bar shog ces pa'i dge bsdo 'di yang khri thog bdun bcu pas sbyar ba'o"</col>
</item>

shu bham ` aom swa sti rgyud dang rdzogs rim blta ba'i lde mig 'di bde gsal bka' bcu blo bzang tshe ring gyis par du bskrun pa'i dge tshogs bdud rtsi'i mthus srid zhi'i rgud pa drung nas 'byin par shog ston pa mchog des phun tshogs 'khor dbus su rgyud 'di bris 'dzin klog sems 'drir bcug sogs byang chub rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa'i bden 'bras ded 'dir mngon 'gyur shog bdag dang 'gro ba rnam mkha' mtha' khyab kun ^rdo rje 'chang dngos bla mas mnyes bzhin du rjes su bzung nas bka' bzhin sgrub pa dang rin chen lta bu'i gdul byar 'gyur bar shog ces pa'i dge bsdo 'di yang khri thog bdun bcu pas sbyar ba'o"</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3157</vol>
<tib>rgyud 'grel lde mig ces bya ba dang rdzogs rim gyi sdom tshig mdor bsdus bcas</tib>
<p>1a-27a</p>
<col>@026a * (de ltar rgyud 'grel dang rdzogs rim @026b gyi sdoms tshigs 'di gnyis ni rang gi slob ma rgyud stod gung ru dge bshes ngag dbang chos 'phel gyis 'di 'dra zhig dgos zhes bskul ba'i ngor ^ yongs 'dzin dga' ldan khri thog bdun bcu pas sbyar ba'i yi ge pa yag bskul ba po nyid do 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas pa'i rgyur gyur cig  aom swa sti bla  ma rdo rje sems dpar 'dud dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rtsa rgyud kyi le'u dang por tshul bzhi brgyad drang nges bshad pa nyer drug dang dgongs man dgongs bshad re lhag ma phyung dang bzhugs rnams sgra ji bzhin ` gnyis par tshul bzhin drang nges re ji bzhin gnyis so gzhan dgongs min ` le'u gsum par tshul bzhi gcig lhag ma kun la drang nges gsungs ` bzhi par drang nges dgongs min re ji bzhin gnyis su rdzogs par bsdus ` lngar par ji bzhin sgra bzhi dang dgongs min gnyis so drang nges gsum dgongs bshad gcig ste sde tshan bcu ` le'u drug par tshul bzhi gcig  dgongs bshad tshan gnyis drang nges gsum ` sngags kyi spyod mchog le'u ra ni ji bzhin dgongs min dgongs bshad tshan gsum gsum tshul bzhi drang nges re'o ` brgyad par dgongs dang dgongs min re drang nges gnyis dang ji bzhin gsum ` sngags kyi spyod mchog le'ur ni ji bzhin dgongs min dgongs bshad tshan gsum gsum tshul bzhi drang res re'o ` brgyad par dgongs dang dgongs min re drang nges gnyis dang ji bzhin gsum ` dgu bar ji bzhin drang nges dgongs bshad re ` snying po bskul bar dgongs dgongs min ji bzhin tshan pa re res bsdus ` rig pa'i skyes mchog le'u la ji bzhin dgongs bshad tshan gnyis gnyis dgongs min drang nges re rer gsungs ` rgyud 'di'i le'u bcu gnyis par dgongs min gcig dang drang nges gnyis dgongs dang ji bzhin bzhi bzhi'o ` bcu gsum pa @027a * la drang nges gnyis dgongs bzhi min gcig ji bzhin lnga'o ` bcu bzhir ji bzhin dgongs gnyis gnyis ` bco lngar dgongs min gcig dgongs gnyis lhag ma rnams ni sgra ji bzhin ` bcu drug pa la ji bzhin drug ji bzhin min gnyis dgongs bshad gnyis ` bcu bdun pa la tshul bzhi gcig dgongs min ji bzhin gsum gsum mo shu bham ` aom swa sti rgyud dang rdzogs rim blta ba'i lde mig 'di bde gsal bka' bcu blo bzang tshe ring gyis par du bskrun pa'i dge tshogs bdud rtsi'i mthus srid zhi'i rgud pa drung nas 'byin par shog ston pa mchog des phun tshogs 'khor dbus su rgyud 'di bris 'dzin klog sems 'drir bcug sogs byang chub rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa'i bden 'bras ded 'dir mngon 'gyur shog bdag dang 'gro ba rnam mkha' mtha' khyab kun ^rdo rje 'chang dngos bla mas mnyes bzhin du rjes su bzung nas bka' bzhin sgrub pa dang rin chen lta bu'i gdul byar 'gyur bar shog ces pa'i dge bsdo 'di yang khri thog bdun bcu pas sbyar ba'o"</col>
</item>

<tib>rgyud 'grel lde mig ces bya ba dang rdzogs rim gyi sdom tshig mdor bsdus bcas</tib>
<p>1a-27a</p>
<col>@026a * (de ltar rgyud 'grel dang rdzogs rim @026b gyi sdoms tshigs 'di gnyis ni rang gi slob ma rgyud stod gung ru dge bshes ngag dbang chos 'phel gyis 'di 'dra zhig dgos zhes bskul ba'i ngor ^ dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rtsa rgyud kyi le'u dang por tshul bzhi brgyad drang nges bshad pa nyer drug dang dgongs man dgongs bshad re lhag ma phyung dang bzhugs rnams sgra ji bzhin ` gnyis par tshul bzhin bzhin sgra bzhi dang dgongs min gnyis so drang nges gsum dgongs bshad gcig ste sde tshan bcu ` le'u drug par tshul bzhi gcig  dgongs bshad tshan gnyis drang nges gsum ` sngags kyi spyod mchog le'u ra ni ji bzhin dgongs min dgongs bshad tshan gsum gsum tshul bzhi drang nges re'o ` brgyad par dgongs dang dgongs min re drang nges gnyis dang ji bzhin gsum ` sngags kyi spyod mchog le'ur ni ji bzhin bskul bar dgongs dgongs min ji bzhin tshan pa re res bsdus ` rig pa'i skyes mchog le'u la ji bzhin dgongs bshad tshan gnyis gnyis dgongs min drang nges re rer gsungs ` rgyud 'di'i le'u bcu gnyis par lngar dgongs min gcig dgongs gnyis lhag ma rnams ni sgra ji bzhin ` bcu drug pa la ji bzhin drug ji bzhin min gnyis dgongs bshad gnyis ` bcu bdun pa la tshul bzhi gcig dgongs min ji bzhin gsum gsum mo thog bdun bcu pas sbyar ba'o"</col>

<col>@026a * (de ltar rgyud 'grel dang rdzogs rim @026b gyi sdoms tshigs 'di gnyis ni rang gi slob ma rgyud stod gung ru dge bshes ngag dbang chos 'phel gyis 'di 'dra zhig dgos zhes bskul ba'i ngor ^ yongs 'dzin dga' ldan khri thog bdun bcu pas sbyar ba'i yi ge pa yag bskul ba po nyid do 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas pa'i rgyur gyur cig  aom swa sti bla  ma rdo rje sems dpar 'dud dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rtsa rgyud kyi le'u dang por tshul bzhi brgyad drang nges bshad pa nyer drug dang dgongs man dgongs bshad re lhag ma phyung dang bzhugs rnams sgra ji bzhin ` gnyis par tshul bzhin drang nges re ji bzhin gnyis so gzhan dgongs min ` le'u gsum par tshul bzhi gcig lhag ma kun la drang nges gsungs ` bzhi par drang nges dgongs min re ji bzhin gnyis su rdzogs par bsdus ` lngar par ji bzhin sgra bzhi dang dgongs min gnyis so drang nges gsum dgongs bshad gcig ste sde tshan bcu ` le'u drug par tshul bzhi gcig  dgongs bshad tshan gnyis drang nges gsum ` sngags kyi spyod mchog le'u ra ni ji bzhin dgongs min dgongs bshad tshan gsum gsum tshul bzhi drang nges re'o ` brgyad par dgongs dang dgongs min re drang nges gnyis dang ji bzhin gsum ` sngags kyi spyod mchog le'ur ni ji bzhin dgongs min dgongs bshad tshan gsum gsum tshul bzhi drang res re'o ` brgyad par dgongs dang dgongs min re drang nges gnyis dang ji bzhin gsum ` dgu bar ji bzhin drang nges dgongs bshad re ` snying po bskul bar dgongs dgongs min ji bzhin tshan pa re res bsdus ` rig pa'i skyes mchog le'u la ji bzhin dgongs bshad tshan gnyis gnyis dgongs min drang nges re rer gsungs ` rgyud 'di'i le'u bcu gnyis par dgongs min gcig dang drang nges gnyis dgongs dang ji bzhin bzhi bzhi'o ` bcu gsum pa @027a * la drang nges gnyis dgongs bzhi min gcig ji bzhin lnga'o ` bcu bzhir ji bzhin dgongs gnyis gnyis ` bco lngar dgongs min gcig dgongs gnyis lhag ma rnams ni sgra ji bzhin ` bcu drug pa la ji bzhin drug ji bzhin min gnyis dgongs bshad gnyis ` bcu bdun pa la tshul bzhi gcig dgongs min ji bzhin gsum gsum mo shu bham ` aom swa sti rgyud dang rdzogs rim blta ba'i lde mig 'di bde gsal bka' bcu blo bzang tshe ring gyis par du bskrun pa'i dge tshogs bdud rtsi'i mthus srid zhi'i rgud pa drung nas 'byin par shog ston pa mchog des phun tshogs 'khor dbus su rgyud 'di bris 'dzin klog sems 'drir bcug sogs byang chub rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa'i bden 'bras ded 'dir mngon 'gyur shog bdag dang 'gro ba rnam mkha' mtha' khyab kun ^rdo rje 'chang dngos bla mas mnyes bzhin du rjes su bzung nas bka' bzhin sgrub pa dang rin chen lta bu'i gdul byar 'gyur bar shog ces pa'i dge bsdo 'di yang khri thog bdun bcu pas sbyar ba'o"</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3157</vol>
<tib>rgyud 'grel lde mig ces bya ba dang rdzogs rim gyi sdom tshig mdor bsdus bcas</tib>
<p>1a-27a</p>
<col>@026a * (de ltar rgyud 'grel dang rdzogs rim @026b gyi sdoms tshigs 'di gnyis ni rang gi slob ma rgyud stod gung ru dge bshes ngag dbang chos 'phel gyis 'di 'dra zhig dgos zhes bskul ba'i ngor ^ yongs 'dzin dga' ldan khri thog bdun bcu pas sbyar ba'i yi ge pa yag bskul ba po nyid do 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas pa'i rgyur gyur cig  aom swa sti bla  ma rdo rje sems dpar 'dud dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rtsa rgyud kyi le'u dang por tshul bzhi brgyad drang nges bshad pa nyer drug dang dgongs man dgongs bshad re lhag ma phyung dang bzhugs rnams sgra ji bzhin ` gnyis par tshul bzhin drang nges re ji bzhin gnyis so gzhan dgongs min ` le'u gsum par tshul bzhi gcig lhag ma kun la drang nges gsungs ` bzhi par drang nges dgongs min re ji bzhin gnyis su rdzogs par bsdus ` lngar par ji bzhin sgra bzhi dang dgongs min gnyis so drang nges gsum dgongs bshad gcig ste sde tshan bcu ` le'u drug par tshul bzhi gcig  dgongs bshad tshan gnyis drang nges gsum ` sngags kyi spyod mchog le'u ra ni ji bzhin dgongs min dgongs bshad tshan gsum gsum tshul bzhi drang nges re'o ` brgyad par dgongs dang dgongs min re drang nges gnyis dang ji bzhin gsum ` sngags kyi spyod mchog le'ur ni ji bzhin dgongs min dgongs bshad tshan gsum gsum tshul bzhi drang res re'o ` brgyad par dgongs dang dgongs min re drang nges gnyis dang ji bzhin gsum ` dgu bar ji bzhin drang nges dgongs bshad re ` snying po bskul bar dgongs dgongs min ji bzhin tshan pa re res bsdus ` rig pa'i skyes mchog le'u la ji bzhin dgongs bshad tshan gnyis gnyis dgongs min drang nges re rer gsungs ` rgyud 'di'i le'u bcu gnyis par dgongs min gcig dang drang nges gnyis dgongs dang ji bzhin bzhi bzhi'o ` bcu gsum pa @027a * la drang nges gnyis dgongs bzhi min gcig ji bzhin lnga'o ` bcu bzhir ji bzhin dgongs gnyis gnyis ` bco lngar dgongs min gcig dgongs gnyis lhag ma rnams ni sgra ji bzhin ` bcu drug pa la ji bzhin drug ji bzhin min gnyis dgongs bshad gnyis ` bcu bdun pa la tshul bzhi gcig dgongs min ji bzhin gsum gsum mo shu bham ` aom swa sti rgyud dang rdzogs rim blta ba'i lde mig 'di bde gsal bka' bcu blo bzang tshe ring gyis par du bskrun pa'i dge tshogs bdud rtsi'i mthus srid zhi'i rgud pa drung nas 'byin par shog ston pa mchog des phun tshogs 'khor dbus su rgyud 'di bris 'dzin klog sems 'drir bcug sogs byang chub rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa'i bden 'bras ded 'dir mngon 'gyur shog bdag dang 'gro ba rnam mkha' mtha' khyab kun ^rdo rje 'chang dngos bla mas mnyes bzhin du rjes su bzung nas bka' bzhin sgrub pa dang rin chen lta bu'i gdul byar 'gyur bar shog ces pa'i dge bsdo 'di yang khri thog bdun bcu pas sbyar ba'o"</col>
</item>

bzhin sgra bzhi dang dgongs min gnyis so drang nges gsum dgongs bshad gcig ste sde tshan bcu ` le'u drug par tshul bzhi gcig  dgongs bshad tshan gnyis drang nges gsum ` sngags kyi spyod mchog le'u ra ni ji bzhin dgongs min dgongs bshad tshan gsum gsum tshul bzhi drang nges re'o ` brgyad par dgongs dang dgongs min re drang nges gnyis dang ji bzhin gsum ` sngags kyi spyod mchog le'ur ni ji bzhin dgongs min dgongs bshad tshan gsum gsum tshul bzhi drang res re'o ` brgyad par dgongs dang dgongs min re drang nges gnyis dang ji bzhin gsum ` dgu bar ji bzhin drang nges dgongs bshad re ` snying po bskul bar dgongs dgongs min ji bzhin tshan pa re res bsdus ` rig pa'i skyes mchog le'u la ji bzhin dgongs bshad tshan gnyis gnyis dgongs min drang nges re rer gsungs ` rgyud 'di'i le'u bcu gnyis par dgongs min gcig dang drang nges gnyis dgongs dang ji bzhin bzhi bzhi'o ` bcu gsum pa @027a * la drang nges gnyis dgongs bzhi min gcig ji bzhin lnga'o ` bcu bzhir ji bzhin dgongs gnyis gnyis ` bco lngar dgongs min gcig dgongs gnyis lhag ma rnams ni sgra ji bzhin ` bcu drug pa la ji bzhin drug ji bzhin min gnyis dgongs bshad gnyis ` bcu bdun pa la tshul bzhi gcig dgongs min ji bzhin gsum gsum mo shu bham ` aom swa sti rgyud dang rdzogs rim blta ba'i lde mig 'di bde gsal bka' bcu blo bzang tshe ring gyis par du bskrun pa'i dge tshogs bdud rtsi'i mthus srid zhi'i rgud pa drung nas 'byin par shog ston pa mchog des phun tshogs 'khor dbus su rgyud 'di bris 'dzin klog sems 'drir bcug sogs byang chub rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa'i bden 'bras ded 'dir mngon 'gyur shog bdag dang 'gro ba rnam mkha' mtha' khyab kun ^rdo rje 'chang dngos bla mas mnyes bzhin du rjes su bzung nas bka' bzhin sgrub pa dang rin chen lta bu'i gdul byar 'gyur bar shog ces pa'i dge bsdo 'di yang khri thog bdun bcu pas sbyar ba'o"</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3157</vol>
<tib>rgyud 'grel lde mig ces bya ba dang rdzogs rim gyi sdom tshig mdor bsdus bcas</tib>
<p>1a-27a</p>
<col>@026a * (de ltar rgyud 'grel dang rdzogs rim @026b gyi sdoms tshigs 'di gnyis ni rang gi slob ma rgyud stod gung ru dge bshes ngag dbang chos 'phel gyis 'di 'dra zhig dgos zhes bskul ba'i ngor ^ yongs 'dzin dga' ldan khri thog bdun bcu pas sbyar ba'i yi ge pa yag bskul ba po nyid do 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas pa'i rgyur gyur cig  aom swa sti bla  ma rdo rje sems dpar 'dud dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rtsa rgyud kyi le'u dang por tshul bzhi brgyad drang nges bshad pa nyer drug dang dgongs man dgongs bshad re lhag ma phyung dang bzhugs rnams sgra ji bzhin ` gnyis par tshul bzhin drang nges re ji bzhin gnyis so gzhan dgongs min ` le'u gsum par tshul bzhi gcig lhag ma kun la drang nges gsungs ` bzhi par drang nges dgongs min re ji bzhin gnyis su rdzogs par bsdus ` lngar par ji bzhin sgra bzhi dang dgongs min gnyis so drang nges gsum dgongs bshad gcig ste sde tshan bcu ` le'u drug par tshul bzhi gcig  dgongs bshad tshan gnyis drang nges gsum ` sngags kyi spyod mchog le'u ra ni ji bzhin dgongs min dgongs bshad tshan gsum gsum tshul bzhi drang nges re'o ` brgyad par dgongs dang dgongs min re drang nges gnyis dang ji bzhin gsum ` sngags kyi spyod mchog le'ur ni ji bzhin dgongs min dgongs bshad tshan gsum gsum tshul bzhi drang res re'o ` brgyad par dgongs dang dgongs min re drang nges gnyis dang ji bzhin gsum ` dgu bar ji bzhin drang nges dgongs bshad re ` snying po bskul bar dgongs dgongs min ji bzhin tshan pa re res bsdus ` rig pa'i skyes mchog le'u la ji bzhin dgongs bshad tshan gnyis gnyis dgongs min drang nges re rer gsungs ` rgyud 'di'i le'u bcu gnyis par dgongs min gcig dang drang nges gnyis dgongs dang ji bzhin bzhi bzhi'o ` bcu gsum pa @027a * la drang nges gnyis dgongs bzhi min gcig ji bzhin lnga'o ` bcu bzhir ji bzhin dgongs gnyis gnyis ` bco lngar dgongs min gcig dgongs gnyis lhag ma rnams ni sgra ji bzhin ` bcu drug pa la ji bzhin drug ji bzhin min gnyis dgongs bshad gnyis ` bcu bdun pa la tshul bzhi gcig dgongs min ji bzhin gsum gsum mo shu bham ` aom swa sti rgyud dang rdzogs rim blta ba'i lde mig 'di bde gsal bka' bcu blo bzang tshe ring gyis par du bskrun pa'i dge tshogs bdud rtsi'i mthus srid zhi'i rgud pa drung nas 'byin par shog ston pa mchog des phun tshogs 'khor dbus su rgyud 'di bris 'dzin klog sems 'drir bcug sogs byang chub rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa'i bden 'bras ded 'dir mngon 'gyur shog bdag dang 'gro ba rnam mkha' mtha' khyab kun ^rdo rje 'chang dngos bla mas mnyes bzhin du rjes su bzung nas bka' bzhin sgrub pa dang rin chen lta bu'i gdul byar 'gyur bar shog ces pa'i dge bsdo 'di yang khri thog bdun bcu pas sbyar ba'o"</col>
</item>

dgongs min gcig dang drang nges gnyis dgongs dang ji bzhin bzhi bzhi'o ` bcu gsum pa @027a * la drang nges gnyis dgongs bzhi min gcig ji bzhin lnga'o ` bcu bzhir ji bzhin dgongs gnyis gnyis ` bco lngar dgongs min gcig dgongs gnyis lhag ma rnams ni sgra ji bzhin ` bcu drug pa la ji bzhin drug ji bzhin min gnyis dgongs bshad gnyis ` bcu bdun pa la tshul bzhi gcig dgongs min ji bzhin gsum gsum mo shu bham ` aom swa sti rgyud dang rdzogs rim blta ba'i lde mig 'di bde gsal bka' bcu blo bzang tshe ring gyis par du bskrun pa'i dge tshogs bdud rtsi'i mthus srid zhi'i rgud pa drung nas 'byin par shog ston pa mchog des phun tshogs 'khor dbus su rgyud 'di bris 'dzin klog sems 'drir bcug sogs byang chub rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa'i bden 'bras ded 'dir mngon 'gyur shog bdag dang 'gro ba rnam mkha' mtha' khyab kun ^rdo rje 'chang dngos bla mas mnyes bzhin du rjes su bzung nas bka' bzhin sgrub pa dang rin chen lta bu'i gdul byar 'gyur bar shog ces pa'i dge bsdo 'di yang khri thog bdun bcu pas sbyar ba'o"</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3157</vol>
<tib>rgyud 'grel lde mig ces bya ba dang rdzogs rim gyi sdom tshig mdor bsdus bcas</tib>
<p>1a-27a</p>
<col>@026a * (de ltar rgyud 'grel dang rdzogs rim @026b gyi sdoms tshigs 'di gnyis ni rang gi slob ma rgyud stod gung ru dge bshes ngag dbang chos 'phel gyis 'di 'dra zhig dgos zhes bskul ba'i ngor ^ yongs 'dzin dga' ldan khri thog bdun bcu pas sbyar ba'i yi ge pa yag bskul ba po nyid do 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas pa'i rgyur gyur cig  aom swa sti bla  ma rdo rje sems dpar 'dud dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rtsa rgyud kyi le'u dang por tshul bzhi brgyad drang nges bshad pa nyer drug dang dgongs man dgongs bshad re lhag ma phyung dang bzhugs rnams sgra ji bzhin ` gnyis par tshul bzhin drang nges re ji bzhin gnyis so gzhan dgongs min ` le'u gsum par tshul bzhi gcig lhag ma kun la drang nges gsungs ` bzhi par drang nges dgongs min re ji bzhin gnyis su rdzogs par bsdus ` lngar par ji bzhin sgra bzhi dang dgongs min gnyis so drang nges gsum dgongs bshad gcig ste sde tshan bcu ` le'u drug par tshul bzhi gcig  dgongs bshad tshan gnyis drang nges gsum ` sngags kyi spyod mchog le'u ra ni ji bzhin dgongs min dgongs bshad tshan gsum gsum tshul bzhi drang nges re'o ` brgyad par dgongs dang dgongs min re drang nges gnyis dang ji bzhin gsum ` sngags kyi spyod mchog le'ur ni ji bzhin dgongs min dgongs bshad tshan gsum gsum tshul bzhi drang res re'o ` brgyad par dgongs dang dgongs min re drang nges gnyis dang ji bzhin gsum ` dgu bar ji bzhin drang nges dgongs bshad re ` snying po bskul bar dgongs dgongs min ji bzhin tshan pa re res bsdus ` rig pa'i skyes mchog le'u la ji bzhin dgongs bshad tshan gnyis gnyis dgongs min drang nges re rer gsungs ` rgyud 'di'i le'u bcu gnyis par dgongs min gcig dang drang nges gnyis dgongs dang ji bzhin bzhi bzhi'o ` bcu gsum pa @027a * la drang nges gnyis dgongs bzhi min gcig ji bzhin lnga'o ` bcu bzhir ji bzhin dgongs gnyis gnyis ` bco lngar dgongs min gcig dgongs gnyis lhag ma rnams ni sgra ji bzhin ` bcu drug pa la ji bzhin drug ji bzhin min gnyis dgongs bshad gnyis ` bcu bdun pa la tshul bzhi gcig dgongs min ji bzhin gsum gsum mo shu bham ` aom swa sti rgyud dang rdzogs rim blta ba'i lde mig 'di bde gsal bka' bcu blo bzang tshe ring gyis par du bskrun pa'i dge tshogs bdud rtsi'i mthus srid zhi'i rgud pa drung nas 'byin par shog ston pa mchog des phun tshogs 'khor dbus su rgyud 'di bris 'dzin klog sems 'drir bcug sogs byang chub rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa'i bden 'bras ded 'dir mngon 'gyur shog bdag dang 'gro ba rnam mkha' mtha' khyab kun ^rdo rje 'chang dngos bla mas mnyes bzhin du rjes su bzung nas bka' bzhin sgrub pa dang rin chen lta bu'i gdul byar 'gyur bar shog ces pa'i dge bsdo 'di yang khri thog bdun bcu pas sbyar ba'o"</col>
</item>

<tib>rgyud 'grel lde mig ces bya ba dang rdzogs rim gyi sdom tshig mdor bsdus bcas</tib>

<tib>rgyud 'grel lde mig ces bya ba dang rdzogs rim gyi sdom tshig mdor bsdus bcas</tib>
<p>1a-27a</p>
<col>@026a * (de ltar rgyud 'grel dang rdzogs rim @026b gyi sdoms tshigs 'di gnyis ni rang gi slob ma rgyud stod gung ru dge bshes ngag dbang chos 'phel gyis 'di 'dra zhig dgos zhes bskul ba'i ngor ^ yongs 'dzin dga' ldan khri thog bdun bcu pas sbyar ba'i yi ge pa yag bskul ba po nyid do 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas pa'i rgyur gyur cig  aom swa sti bla  ma rdo rje sems dpar 'dud dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rtsa rgyud kyi le'u dang por tshul bzhi brgyad drang nges bshad pa nyer drug dang dgongs man dgongs bshad re lhag ma phyung dang bzhugs rnams sgra ji bzhin ` gnyis par tshul bzhin drang nges re ji bzhin gnyis so gzhan dgongs min ` le'u gsum par tshul bzhi gcig lhag ma kun la drang nges gsungs ` bzhi par drang nges dgongs min re ji bzhin gnyis su rdzogs par bsdus ` lngar par ji bzhin sgra bzhi dang dgongs min gnyis so drang nges gsum dgongs bshad gcig ste sde tshan bcu ` le'u drug par tshul bzhi gcig  dgongs bshad tshan gnyis drang nges gsum ` sngags kyi spyod mchog le'u ra ni ji bzhin dgongs min dgongs bshad tshan gsum gsum tshul bzhi drang nges re'o ` brgyad par dgongs dang dgongs min re drang nges gnyis dang ji bzhin gsum ` sngags kyi spyod mchog le'ur ni ji bzhin dgongs min dgongs bshad tshan gsum gsum tshul bzhi drang res re'o ` brgyad par dgongs dang dgongs min re drang nges gnyis dang ji bzhin gsum ` dgu bar ji bzhin drang nges dgongs bshad re ` snying po bskul bar dgongs dgongs min ji bzhin tshan pa re res bsdus ` rig pa'i skyes mchog le'u la ji bzhin dgongs bshad tshan gnyis gnyis dgongs min drang nges re rer gsungs ` rgyud 'di'i le'u bcu gnyis par dgongs min gcig dang drang nges gnyis dgongs dang ji bzhin bzhi bzhi'o ` bcu gsum pa @027a * la drang nges gnyis dgongs bzhi min gcig ji bzhin lnga'o ` bcu bzhir ji bzhin dgongs gnyis gnyis ` bco lngar dgongs min gcig dgongs gnyis lhag ma rnams ni sgra ji bzhin ` bcu drug pa la ji bzhin drug ji bzhin min gnyis dgongs bshad gnyis ` bcu bdun pa la tshul bzhi gcig dgongs min ji bzhin gsum gsum mo shu bham ` aom swa sti rgyud dang rdzogs rim blta ba'i lde mig 'di bde gsal bka' bcu blo bzang tshe ring gyis par du bskrun pa'i dge tshogs bdud rtsi'i mthus srid zhi'i rgud pa drung nas 'byin par shog ston pa mchog des phun tshogs 'khor dbus su rgyud 'di bris 'dzin klog sems 'drir bcug sogs byang chub rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa'i bden 'bras ded 'dir mngon 'gyur shog bdag dang 'gro ba rnam mkha' mtha' khyab kun ^rdo rje 'chang dngos bla mas mnyes bzhin du rjes su bzung nas bka' bzhin sgrub pa dang rin chen lta bu'i gdul byar 'gyur bar shog ces pa'i dge bsdo 'di yang khri thog bdun bcu pas sbyar ba'o"</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3157</vol>
<tib>rgyud 'grel lde mig ces bya ba dang rdzogs rim gyi sdom tshig mdor bsdus bcas</tib>
<p>1a-27a</p>
<col>@026a * (de ltar rgyud 'grel dang rdzogs rim @026b gyi sdoms tshigs 'di gnyis ni rang gi slob ma rgyud stod gung ru dge bshes ngag dbang chos 'phel gyis 'di 'dra zhig dgos zhes bskul ba'i ngor ^ yongs 'dzin dga' ldan khri thog bdun bcu pas sbyar ba'i yi ge pa yag bskul ba po nyid do 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas pa'i rgyur gyur cig  aom swa sti bla  ma rdo rje sems dpar 'dud dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rtsa rgyud kyi le'u dang por tshul bzhi brgyad drang nges bshad pa nyer drug dang dgongs man dgongs bshad re lhag ma phyung dang bzhugs rnams sgra ji bzhin ` gnyis par tshul bzhin drang nges re ji bzhin gnyis so gzhan dgongs min ` le'u gsum par tshul bzhi gcig lhag ma kun la drang nges gsungs ` bzhi par drang nges dgongs min re ji bzhin gnyis su rdzogs par bsdus ` lngar par ji bzhin sgra bzhi dang dgongs min gnyis so drang nges gsum dgongs bshad gcig ste sde tshan bcu ` le'u drug par tshul bzhi gcig  dgongs bshad tshan gnyis drang nges gsum ` sngags kyi spyod mchog le'u ra ni ji bzhin dgongs min dgongs bshad tshan gsum gsum tshul bzhi drang nges re'o ` brgyad par dgongs dang dgongs min re drang nges gnyis dang ji bzhin gsum ` sngags kyi spyod mchog le'ur ni ji bzhin dgongs min dgongs bshad tshan gsum gsum tshul bzhi drang res re'o ` brgyad par dgongs dang dgongs min re drang nges gnyis dang ji bzhin gsum ` dgu bar ji bzhin drang nges dgongs bshad re ` snying po bskul bar dgongs dgongs min ji bzhin tshan pa re res bsdus ` rig pa'i skyes mchog le'u la ji bzhin dgongs bshad tshan gnyis gnyis dgongs min drang nges re rer gsungs ` rgyud 'di'i le'u bcu gnyis par dgongs min gcig dang drang nges gnyis dgongs dang ji bzhin bzhi bzhi'o ` bcu gsum pa @027a * la drang nges gnyis dgongs bzhi min gcig ji bzhin lnga'o ` bcu bzhir ji bzhin dgongs gnyis gnyis ` bco lngar dgongs min gcig dgongs gnyis lhag ma rnams ni sgra ji bzhin ` bcu drug pa la ji bzhin drug ji bzhin min gnyis dgongs bshad gnyis ` bcu bdun pa la tshul bzhi gcig dgongs min ji bzhin gsum gsum mo shu bham ` aom swa sti rgyud dang rdzogs rim blta ba'i lde mig 'di bde gsal bka' bcu blo bzang tshe ring gyis par du bskrun pa'i dge tshogs bdud rtsi'i mthus srid zhi'i rgud pa drung nas 'byin par shog ston pa mchog des phun tshogs 'khor dbus su rgyud 'di bris 'dzin klog sems 'drir bcug sogs byang chub rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa'i bden 'bras ded 'dir mngon 'gyur shog bdag dang 'gro ba rnam mkha' mtha' khyab kun ^rdo rje 'chang dngos bla mas mnyes bzhin du rjes su bzung nas bka' bzhin sgrub pa dang rin chen lta bu'i gdul byar 'gyur bar shog ces pa'i dge bsdo 'di yang khri thog bdun bcu pas sbyar ba'o"</col>
</item>

<vol>3158</vol>
<tib>tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi bsdus gzhung shes bya'i sgo 'byed rgol ngan glang po 'joms pa gdon lnga'i gad rgyangs rgyu rig lde mig</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3159</vol>
<tib>bstan bcos chen po dbu ma la 'jug pa'i rnam bshad dgongs pa rab gsal</tib>
<p>1a-303a</p>
<col>@302b ces dbu ma la 'jug pa'i rgya cher bshad pa dgongs pa rab gsal zhes bya ba 'di ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lhu la dka' bcu pa legs pa dpal gyis dngul srang bzhi bcu'i mandal phul te nan cher bskul ba dang gzhan yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos 'di la shin tu mos shing don rtogs pa'i blo'i nus pa mi dman pa mang po zhig gis 'grel @303a * pa'i dka' gnas rnams kyi bshad pa rnams tshang ba tshig don gsal zhing spyi don gyi mtha' gcod pa rgyas pa zhig gyis shig ces nan tan gyis bskul ba'i don du dbu ma chen po'i rnal 'byor pa mang du thos pa'i dge slong shar tsong kha pa blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyis 'brog  ri bo che dge ldan rnam par rgyal ba'i gling du sbyar ba'o aom swa sti theg gsum dam pa'i chos gso mtha' klas pa'i  mang snying theg mchog zab mo'i lam bzang tshal yab rje rgyal ba'i gtsug lag 'od snang gis khong nas 'dzum pa'i rnam thar 'di ko rmad legs spyad dpag yas bskal mang bsags pa'i 'bras legs smon bzang po'i mthu nus drod gsher gyis legs smin phun tshogs snye ma ga-yur za ba'i legs tshogs bsod nams ches 'phags chos kyi rje bskal bzang bsod nams lhag bsam dag pa yis dong tse khyon grangs sum brgya'i mthun pa'i rkyen legs sbyar mtha' bral dbu ma'i lam bzang po gsal mdzad dgongs pa rab gsal par du bsgrubs 'dir 'bad dge ba'i rlung gi shing rta'i shugs rnam dag thabs shis nyi zla'i bgrod pa ru dpag yas theg mchog mkha' la rjes son pas rang gzhan gtan bde'i dpal la mngon spyod shog skyes par thos bsam sgom pa'i bser bu yis rang bzhin brjod bral nges pa'i tsandan dri lhan skyes gnug sems la ya klung mas drang pas gnyis 'dzin tsha gdung bcil bar shog rgyal bstan pad tshal phan bde'i dri bsung can bshad sgrub 'dab rgyas rnam grol sbrang rtsi'i bcud 'gro kun spyod phyir sku 'bum byams pa gling chos sde che nas chos sbyin char 'di spel (zhes pa 'di ni mkhyen rab tu yangs pa sku rten chos rje mchog nas legs bshad 'di par du sgrub skabs par byang smon tshig tu gser tog mkhan zur ye shes thub bstan rgya mtshos bris pa'o sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3160</vol>
<tib>drang ba dang nges pa'i don rnam par phye ba'i bstan bcos legs bshad snying po</tib>
<p>1a-124a</p>
<col>@123b ces mgon po klu sgrub kyis ngo bo nyid med pa'i tshul dang bdag nyid chen po thogs med kyis rnam par rig pa tsam gyi tshul gyi shing rta chen po'i srol gnyis phye nas gsung rab kyi drang  ba dang nges  pa'i don rnam par phye'i gsal bar byed pa @124a * legs par bshad pa'i snying po zhes bya ba 'di ni ^sh'akya'i dge slong mang du thos pa rigs pa smra ba shar tsong kha pa blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge spyod sdom brtson bsod nams blo gros so mangga lam swa sti rgyal bstan pad tshal phan bde'i dri bsung can bshad sgrub 'dab rgyas rnam grol sbrang rtsi'i bcud 'gro kun spyod phyir sku 'bum byams pa gling chos sde che nas chos sbyin char 'di spel "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3161</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag na rdo rje 'byung po 'dul byed dang 'brel ba'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor pha lam rdo rje'i thur ma zhes bya ba bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-8a</p>
<col>@008a * de ltar bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag na rdo rje 'byung po 'dul byed dang 'brel ba'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor pha lam rdo rje'i thur ma zhes pa 'di'ang dza sag thu han gyi lu bo rje drung aerte ni chos rje blo bzang thub bstan gsal byed nas snga mo nas nan gyis bskul rung le los phyi bshol du lus rung da lam ^dpa' mnyam med ri bo dge ldan pa'i 'dul ba lugs kyi lo 'gor grags pa smin drug zla ba'i dmar phyogs tshes ^mkhan chen rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen gzigs chen po'i dus bzang bco brgyad mchod pa'i nyin rdzogs par gang dran thol byung byung rgyal du rig pa 'dzin pa'i tha shal ^aa mo gha siddhi badzras sbyar ba'i yi ge'i 'du byed bikshu ngag dbang tshe ring ngo "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3161</vol>
<tib>dge tshul gyi bslab bya'i sdom tshig</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col>@003a * (ces dge tshul gyi bslab bya'i sdom tshig 'di ni dge tshul brtson 'grus rgya mtshos nan gyis bskul ba la brten nas 'dul ba 'dzin pa ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bkra shis bsam gtan gling du sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3161</vol>
<tib>phar phyin spyi don gsal ba'i sgron me'i skabs lnga pa drug pa bdun pa brgyad pa sogs kyi zur mchan yum don rab gsal sgron me zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-43a inc [* missing page from 28a-32b *]</p>
<col>@042b (ces pan chen bsod nams grags pa'i dpal rnam dpyod mchog gi sdes mdzad pa'i phar phyin spyi don gyi zur mchan yum don rab gsal sgron me zhes bya ba 'di ni khu re chen mo'i mtshan nyid kyi bshad grwa chen po gnyis kyi ya gyal kun dga' chos gling gi gra rigs mang sngags kyi bsha grwa rnams su rgyud dang bka' bod rnam lnga'i grwa skor tshul bzhin byas pa'i bka' bcu pa ngag dbang bsod nams kyis 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba ltar mkhas shing grub pa brnyes pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du ma'i zhabs kyi rdul spyi bos nod pa ^sprang btsun ngag dbang dpal ldan gyis rab byung bcu bzhi pa'i bgrang bya lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa chu mo phag lor bka' dang bstan bcos 'gyur ro cog gi tshal dga' ldan bshad sgrub bstan 'phel gling gi nye 'dab rang gshag nyams dga' bar mjug rdogs par sbyar ba 'dis kyang bstan 'gro la phan thogs par gyur cig  sarba mangga lam dge'o ` aom swa sti bstan pa'i bdag po 'dren mchog sh'akya'i tog rgyal ba gnyis pa rje btsun tsong kha pa yab sras brgyud par bcas pa thams cad la sgo gsum gus pa chen pos phyag 'tshal lo bsod nams zhing @043a * mchog rgyal bstan lha lam du grags pa'i 'od zer 'gro la zla med pa smra ba'i nyi ma rnam dpyod mchog gi sde pan chen gang de'i zhabs la snying nas 'dud mgon de'i legs bshad phar phyin spyi don gyi zur mchan chos rje ngag dbang dpal ldan gyi gsar rtsom khu re kun dga' chos gling du  blo gsal rnams la phan phyir par du bsgrubs dge bas rgyal ba'i bstan pa  dar zhing rgyas bstan 'dzin spyi dang khyad par dam pa'i mgon zhabs pad brtan cing de 'dun thugs mthun pas bshad sgrubs yar ngo'i zla bzhin 'phel gyur cig  (ces pa 'di grwa tshang chen mo de nyid gyi par dpon dge slong blo bzang tshe ring gis dgos zhes bskul ngor ngag gi dbang pos bris ga-yar khral tsam du bris pa dza yantu</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3161</vol>
<tib>rtsa ba'i bla ma dang spyan ras gzigs zung 'brel gyi rnal 'byor</tib>
<p>1a-5a</p>
<col>@004b (ces bla ma dang yi dam thugs rje chen po zung 'brel gyi rnal 'byor nyams su len tshul mdor bsdus pa 'di ci rang gi slob ma dge tshogs pa brtson pa che zhing rnam dpyod kyi rtsal dang ldan pa'i rab 'byams smra ba blo bzang nyi ma dang rang gzhan gyi bsam pa drang zhing dge phyogs la 'dun pa'i gnyer ba dge slong tshul khrims dpal bzang gnyis kyis bskul ba ltar gong ma'i lung gis gwan ting phyogs gnas kwan tshe t'a koo gri lcang skya hu thog thu ming @005a * gzhan ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan dpal bzang po zhes bgyi bas rgyal khab pe cing gi bod chos lha khang du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni yang bskul ba po rab 'byams smra ba blo bzang nyi ma'o dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3161</vol>
<tib>so thar sdom pa 'bogs chog gi lhan thabs legs bshad gser thur zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-22a</p>
<col>@020a * ces so thar sdom pa 'bogs chog gi lhan thabs legs bshad gser thur zhes bya ba 'di ni ^lha ldan smon lam chen mo'i grwa skor ba aa lag sha ngag dbang bstan dar gyis bris pa'o ) aom swa sti nyi ma'i brgyad cha zhes sogs la mkhas rnams ljags dbang bskyod 'tshal zhes kho bos smra bar aor tu su'i bkra shis chos gling mkhan po nas gzhan dag smra zhes skul ci dgos de bas khyod kyis smras shig ces gsung gis bskul ma byung ba ltar ji ltar nus tshod bshad par bya de yang dus go bar byed pa'i skabs 'dir nam mkha'i lam cha brgyad du bgos nas cha re re la brgyad cha dang cha gnyis gnyis sdom pa la bzhi cha'i tha snyad btags shing de lta bu brgyad cha'i dang por nyi ma shar ba'i yun la nyi ma shar ba dang gnyis pa'i yun la brgyad cha shar ba dang gsum pa'i yun la bzhi cha shar ba zhes bya ste mkha' lam ch bzhir bgos pa'i cha gcig yin pa'i phyir dang cha bzhir bgos pa'i cha gnyis pa yang yin pa'i phyir ro bzhi pa'i yun la gung tshigs ma yil ba dang de nas brgyad cha lnga pa dang drug pa gnyis kyi yun la nyi ma bzhi cha lus pa zhes bya'o de yang yin te de'i 'phro na mkha' lam cha bzhir bgos @020b pa'i cha gcig lus pa'i phyir brgyad cha bdun pa'i yun la nyi ma brgyad cha lus pa zhes bya ste de'i 'phro na cha brgyad du bgos pa'i cha gcig lus pa'i phyir de nas brgyad cha brgyad pa'i yun la nyi ma ma nub pa zhes bya'o mdor na nyin mtshan gyi cha nyer gnyis brjod pa'i skabs 'dir nam mkha'i lam cha brgyad du bgos pa'i cha brgyad po thams cad la nyi mas bgrod tshul mi brtsi bar cha lnga pa dang drug pa gnyis la thun mong du nyi ma bzhi cha lus pa'i tha snyad gcig btags pa yin pas cha bdun brtsi bar bya zhing gal te cha brgyad ka brtsis na nyin mtshan gyi cha nyer gsum du yang 'gyur ro des na brgyad cha dang por nyi ma shar ba'i yun la brgyad cha shar ba mi zer bar nyi ma shar ba zhes bya zhing de nas brgyad cha gnyis par nyi ma shar ba'i yun la gzhi nas brgyad cha shar ba'i tha snyad btags pa yin pas rigs pa'i gnad phra mo 'di ma go bar brgyad cha dang po'i yun la brgyad cha shar bar khas blangs na gong 'og bsgrigs dka' bar 'gyur ro tha snyad 'khyog po de ltar mdzad dgos pa ni dper na thur ma sor bzhi pa'i grib ma la skyes bu dang sor gang gi grib ma la rkang pa'i tha snyad mdzad pa bzhin 'dir yang chos 'di pa las phyi rol tu gyur ba dag la gsang gtam du byas par mngon no 'di las kyang go bde ba'i thabs su re'u mig tu bstan na 'di ltar @021a * nyi ma brgyad cha bzhi cha sogs kyi tha snyad 'di nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nam mkha'i lam du shar ba la byed kyi spyir nyin dus tsam la mi bya'o nyin mtshan gyi cha nyer gnyis brjod ces pa 'di la 'dul ba rang skad la grags pa'i nyin dus bcu gsum dang mtshan dus dgu yod cing de'i skya rengs shar ba nyin dus su gtogs te dus 'brel gyi ltung ba'i spang ltung byung ba la skya rengs shar ba yan lag tu smos pa'i rgyu mtshan yod pa'i phyir @021b nyi ma'i dmar thag chod pa mtshan dus su gtogs te thun tshod du rung ba'i sman gnang bkag gis shes nus pa'i phyir 'dir yang smras pa chen po'i blo gros yul las 'gongs gyur ba'i dgongs don rdzogs par ji bzhin mi spobs kyang gzhan gyis bskul tshe cung zad skabs phye 'di bdag 'dra 'ga' la phan par mi gyur ci thos pa'i skya rengs lhun po'i phag tu lus mkhas ming nyi ma shar rir ma tshes par legs bshad pad mo 'byed par rlom pa 'di ma brtags bab col spyi brtol chen 'ang ljon shing sogs las tshes kyi sgra byung ba rgyal ba'i 'phrin las yin par gleng ba bzhin 'dir yang smra byed cung zad ga-yo ba yang bla ma dam pa'i byin mthu kho nar nges de lta na yang thams cad mkhyen min pas 'gal 'khrul nongs rigs bdag blo mthu chung ba'i skyon du mthong nas slar yang mkhas pa dag legs bshad gsar bas 'di yang dbyi bar rigs 'on kyang zab brling gsung rab rgya mtsho'i mtha' thos nor phyug pa'i ded dpon las gzhan pa'i tshig la 'chel ba'i go rgyus bkren pa dag bgrod par chas kyang re zhig ngal ba'i las tshul 'dir sug las bsten pa las byung ba'i rnam dkar tshogs las skye dgu'i yid mun tshogs ye shes snang ba gcig gis khyab byed @022a * pa'i rgyal ba'i go 'phang bde blag thob gyur cig  ces pa 'di ni mkhas btsun bzang po'i rgyan gyis mdzes pa'i aor tu su'i bkra shis chos gling gi mkhan po 'jam dpal rgya mtsho nas tshul 'di la khyod rang gis go tshod kyi bshad pa zhig gyis shig ces gsungs pa dang du blangs te slar yang rab 'byams pa ngag dbang bstan dar gyis smras pa'o 'dis kyang blo bzang rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs kun tu dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  bka shis bde legs shog  zhes pa 'di ni sku 'bum byams pa gling du dpar du bsgrubs pa'o"</col>
</item>

<item>

<vol>3163</vol>
<tib>mkhas grub thams cad mkhyen pa dge legs dpal bzang po'i rnam thar rje btsun chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis bsgrigs pa dad pa'i rol mtsho zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>

<vol>3163</vol>
<tib>rgyal ba byams mgon gyi dang po thugs bskyed pa nas bzung sa lam rim par bgrod de mngon par byang chub pa'i tshul las brtsams shing ma 'ongs pa na sangs rgyas lnga pa'i mdzad pa ji ltar ston tshul gsal bar brjod pa'i sgo nas bstod cing gsol ba 'debs pa'i rab tu byed pa byams mgon zhal bzang lta ba'i dga' ston zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-6a</p>
<col>@006a * (ces pa 'di ni khyu mchog ces pa lcags mo sbrul lor dad rten du rgyal ba byams pa'i zhing 'dir mdzad 'gyur gyi mdzad chen bcu gnyis kyi bris thang bzhengs pa'i skabs su rang gi dad mos kyis nye bar bskul te byams pa 'jug pa'i mdo dang byams pa'i mdo dang 'phags pa dkon brtsegs dang mdo sde bskal bzang 'dul ba lung sogs nas khungs blangs te btsun gzugs wagindra pa tu siddhis bris pa 'gro ba thams cad byams pa mgon pos rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur cig  mangga lam</col>

<item>

<tib>bka' bsrung chen po dam can rnam gsum gyi gtor chog 'phrin las sgrub byed dpa' bo'i nga ro'i zhes bya</tib>

<col>@019a * (ces dam can rnam gsum gyi gtor chog 'phrin las sgrub byed dpa' bo'i nga ro zhes bya ba 'di ni ^gung thang 'jam pa'i dbyangs rje btsun dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron me'i gsung gi bdud rtsis 'tsho ba'i bya btang ba bstan bsrung nyid kyi stong grogs kyis brag phug tu mi tshe skyel ba dge slong blo bzang tshe dpag gi 'dod mos ltar ^mkhan po no mon han gyi ming 'dzin pa wa g'indra su ma ti pa tu siddhis bsgrigs pa yi ge pa ni rnam dpyod yangs pa shra ma na aa mri ta sha sa na'o dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3164</vol>
<tib>gtsug tor gdugs dkar gyi bzlog bsgyur mi mthun ga-yul las rgyal byed ces bya ba bzhugs "</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3164</vol>

<p>1a-4b</p>
<col>@004b (tshul 'di yang khu re khams tshan dar han ai mchi'i dge 'dun pa rnams kyi thugs bzhed bskang ba'i don du bla ma ye shes bstan 'dzin dang rab 'byams pa blo bzang rdo rje gnyis kyi 'dod mos ltar ^ btsun pa wa gindra pa tu siddhis bris pa dge legs 'phel</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3164</vol>
<tib>myur mdzad ye shes kyi mgon po la brten pa'i blo bur las bcol gyi gtor zlog byed tshul mdor bsdus blun po kha 'thams kyi da bhu ra'i tshig bcas bzhugs so  "</tib>
<p>1a-7a</p>
<col>@006b (ces myur mdzad ye shes kyi mgon po la brten pa'i blo bur las bcol gyi gtor bzlog byed tshul 'di yang khal kha ga-yon ru'i mer rgan dbang gi shog nas lugs gnyis kyi mkhyen dpyod mchog tu yangs pa'i tho'i dge slong bsod nams rdo rjes 'di lta bu zhig ces kyang bgyis shig pa'i bskul ngo gyen ldog mi nus par gyi na ba  ^ pa tu siddhis de skor gyi gzhung dang mi 'gal bar dam pa'i man ngag gis brgyan te bris pa lags pas @007a * yid ches pa'i gnas su zungs shig  'dis kyang bstan 'gro mtha' dag mi mthun ga-yul las rnam par rgyal nas dkar po'i ru mtshon srid rtser bsgreng bar gyur cig </col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3164</vol>
<tib>nag po chen po stobs 'brog dbang po'i gtor bsngo dpa' po dgyes bskyed 'khrul snang dbyings su gzhom pa'i ru mtshon zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3164</vol>
<tib>rgyal chen rnam sras kyi gtor bsngo dpyid kyi dpal mo 'gug pa'i khyu byug  dbyangs kyi nga ro zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@005a * (ces rgyal chen rnam sras kyi gtor bsngo dpyid kyi dpal mo 'gug pa'i khyu byug  dbyangs kyi nga ro zhes bya ba 'di ni pa tu siddhis bris pa dge legs 'phel</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3164</vol>
<tib>rgyal chen rnam sras kyi gtor chog dngos grub bang mdzod kyi zur 'debs rgyas pa'i gtor sgrub bya tshul dang bcas pa gsal bar bkod pa rgyal chen dgyes pa'i dga' ston zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-25a</p>
<col>@025a * (ces rgyal chen rnam sras kyi gtor chog dngos grub bang mdzod kyi zur 'debs rgyas pa'i gtor sgrub bya tshul dang bcas pa gsal bar bkod pa rgyal chen dgyes pa'i dga' ston zhes bya ba 'di ni bstan 'dzin dam pa'i skyes mchog ail ku sang hu thog thu no yon no mang han rin chen rdo rje'i gsung gis bskul ba ltar mkhan ming 'dzin pa wa g'indra pa tu siddhis khu re chen mor bsdebs pa dad brtson rnam dpyod yangs pa dge slong ngag dbang 'chi med kyis bris pa'o 'dis kyang rgyal chen dgyes nas bstan pa bstan 'dzin yongs la mthun rkyen 'dod dgu'i char chen rgyun chad med par phabs par gyur cig  sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3164</vol>
<tib>no title [@006a * h'um stong chen bcu drug 'bar ba'i zhabs stabs kyis phyi nang yog 'dzin dregs pa 'joms pa'i mdzad pa gnam sa ltar gdangs rnams pa'i zhal dmar gyis khams gsum za byed 'jam dpal dbang po dang]"</tib>

<tib>dpal mnyam med ri bo dga' ldan pa'i bstan pa zhwa ser cod pan 'chang ba'i ring lugs chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba gsal bar byed pa beed'urya ser po'i me long zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3166</vol>
<tib>bka' drin mtshungs med rdo rje 'chang dngos rje btsun ye shes rgyal mtshan mchog gis mdzad pa'i lho brag grub chen nam mkha' rgyal mtshan la brten pa'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor</tib>
<p>1a-7a</p>
<col>@007a * (ces gsang bdag ngur smrig gar gyi rnam par rol pa lho brag grub chen nam mkha' rgyal mtshan la brten pa'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor mdo sngags gnyis ka'i lam gyi gnad tshang ba tshigs bcad du bsgrigs lho brag grub chen gyis byin gyi brlabs pa'i gnas 'bor rdo chos 'khor gling sogs dgon sde khag gi dge 'dun rnams kyi zhal 'don du btsugs chog pa zhig dgos zhes sgrub pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa dge slong blo bzang shes rab kyis bskul ba la brten nas dge slong ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis rang byung 'phags pa'i gzhal med khang du sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs kun tu 'phel zhing rgyas par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3166</vol>
<tib>byang chub lam gyi rim pa nas 'byung ba'i nyams len gyi sgo rnam par nges pa legs gsungs kun gyi nying khu zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-41a</p>
<col>@040a * (ces byang chub lam gyi rim pa nas 'byung ba'i nyams len gyi sgo rnam par nges pa legs gsungs kun gyi snying khu zhes bya ba 'di ni sgom chen ngag gi dbang po gzhan la phan pa'i sde zhes bya bas ze gdong dkar po nyi shar du sbyar ba 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas la dar zhing rgyas par gyur cig ^ mkhan chen ngag dbang grags pa'i gsung 'bum gras nas byin rlabs nye brgyud la phyag 'tshal ba'i rim pa dang byang chub lam gyi rim pa nas 'byung ba'i nyams len gyi sgo rnam par nges pa legs gsungs kun gyi nying khu dri ba lhag bsam rab dkar gyi dri lan dngos grub phreng ba mkhas pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba 'di gsum rgyal ba 'jam dpal snying po'i bstan dang 'gro ba'i don du dwags grwa zhal snga nas slob dpon rin po che lhun grub rgya mtshos lhag bsam rnam dag gis bstan pa'i sbyin bdag chen po lha rgya ri bar par gyi bskul ma mdzad par mchod yon dam tshig gtsang bar ma zad dpon blon gnyis ka bstan pa'i zhabs 'degs la snying stobs che ba bcas 'phral du zhal bzhes gnang bar brten lam rim tshigs bcad ma 'di la rje thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam rim chung du dang mthun pa'i sa bcad zhig cis kyang bgyis zhes nan gyis bskral bar ma zad blo dman bdag lta bu la'ang phan nam snyam pa'i bsam pas kun nas blangs te zhabs 'degs kyi tshul du lam rim chung ngu'i sa bcad ltar la snod kyi skyon gsum spong ba dang 'du shes drug bsten pa sogs kyis mtshon pa'i go rim cung zad lam rim dang mi mthun pa mkhan chen rang nyid kyi gsung gzhir bzhag ste @040b grangs 'dren gyi aang rtags dang bcas pa gyi na pa don dbang gis sug bris  su btab pa 'dis kyang rgyal bstan spyi dang khyad par rje 'jam dpal snying po'i mdo sngags kyi bstan pa rgyas shing bye brag tu yang lam 'di la thos bsam sgom gsum bgyid pa rnams kyi rgyan du 'gyur ba dang; 'di yi ched du sgo gsum yi 'bad pa bgyis pa'i rang gzhan thams cad kyang lam bzang 'di nyid la sgurb pa snying por byas te ma gyur lus can kun gyi ngan du zung 'jug rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang myur du thob pa'i rgyur gyur cig ) * rgyal gsung mdo sngags lam gyi snying po'i bcud ji bzhin gsal byed legs gsung nying khu 'di dad dang mos pa lhag bsam rnam dag pas skye rgu'i bdag mo dang mtshungs rgyu sbyor ba rje btsun blo bzang sgrol ma zhes bya bas par du legs bskrun rnam dkar phung po'i mthus rgyal ba'i bstan dar bstan 'dzin sku tshe 'phel ma gyur 'gro kun gnas skabs mthar thugs re ba'i 'bras bu myur du 'grub pa dang khyad par rgyu sbyor ltos bcas skye kun tu dal 'byor rten thob dge ba'i bshes dang mjal tshang la ma nor lam bzang 'di nyid la rtse gcig brtson pas 'bad las thams cad mkhyen stobs bcu mnga' ba'i go 'phang myur thob shog (ces dwags po ngag dbang grags pas mdzad pa'i lam rim tshigs bcad ma dang ngos kyi dag rtsom rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bskyed rdzogs sdom gsum bslab bya sogs par gsar @041a * bskrun rje btsun drung nas mdzad skabs smon tshig tu rwa sgreng aa chi thu no mon han du 'bod pas sbyar</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3166</vol>
<tib>dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i sgrub thabs rnal 'byor dag rim ngag 'don du bsgrigs pa blo gsal dga' skyed ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-35a</p>
<col>@034a * ces bdag cag gi dpal ldan bla ma dam pa rigs dang dkyil 'khor kun gyi bdag po khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po shar tsong kha pa blo bzang grags pa'i dpal zhes snyan pa'i grags pa sa gsum na rnam par ga-yo ba de nyid kyis mdzad pa'i dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i sgrub thabs rnal 'byor ngag rim tshogs 'don dang de'i phyag len bya tshul mthar chags su bsgrigs pa 'di ni ngag 'don gyi dpe spar ma dang bis ma ci rigs snang ba'i phun tshogs gling gi spar ma @034b ngag 'don byed tshul legs shing khyab che bar 'dug na'ang phyag len byed tshul mi gsal ba dang rnal 'byor ngag rim dang lhan thabs kyi dpe cha 'dzom zhing rnam dpyod yangs pa rnams la mi dgos na'ang dpe cha 'dzom pa dka' zhing 'dzom kyang sdeb mi shes pa'i blo chung bdag lta bu la nag po 'gro shes 'di lta bu lag tu blang bde ba dang dge 'dun 'ga' zhig tshogs nas rnal 'byor ngag rim ngag 'don byed tshe phyag len 'di bzhin byed dgos pa rje yab sras kyi dgongs pa yin shis lhan thabs su bkod par snang bas de bzhin byas pa pan yon che bar bsam nas rang nyid kyi bag chags 'jog pa dang skal mnyam gzhan la'ang pan 'dod kyi bsam pas rnal 'byor ngag rim gyi lhan thabs 'dul 'dzin dang mkhas grub kyis mdzad pa gnyis ka mthong ba las 'dir rje rang gis gsang sngags kyi bstan pa'i gnad thams cad bum pa gang byo'i tshul du gang la bstsal bar grags pa'i sras kyi thu bo mkhas grub bstan pa'i nyi ma @035a * dge legs dpal bzang pos mdzad pa'i lhan thabs rgyas par snang bas de ji lta ba bzhin du yul byang phyogs kyi mthar skyes pa'i ban chung gyi na ba ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan dpal bzang pos 'jam dbyangs gong ma'i rgyal khab chen po be'i cing gi bod chos lha khang du grags par bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni gzhung lugs du ma la blo gros yangs pa'i rab 'byams smra ba blo bzang nyi ma'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba blo bzang grags pa'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus thams cad dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3166</vol>
<tib>lam khrid brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs dmigs skor man ngag zhal shes kyis brgyan pa bzhugs blo bzang ye shes"</tib>
<p>1a-8b</p>
<col>@008b (zhes lam khrid brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs dmigs skor man ngag zhal shes kyis brgyan pa 'di ni spong ba pa dka' bcu blo bzang rnam rgyal gyis nan cher bskul ba la brten nas sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang ye shes kyis yi ger bkod pa'o</col>
</item>
