<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3166</vol>
<tib>rab gnas dge legs rgya mtsho'i char 'bebs kyi dgongs don rab gsal tshogs gnyis bang mdzod ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-52a</p>
<col>@051b (zhes rab gnas dge @052a * legs rgya mtsho'i char 'bebs kyi dgongs don rab gsal tshogs gnyis bang mdzod ces bya ba 'di ni chos la 'dun pa dbu mdzad chen mo blo bzang tshul khrims kyis lag tu blang bde ba zhig dgos zhes bskul ba'i ngor  pan chen rin po ches mdzad pa'i rab gnas dge legs rgya mtsho'i char 'bebs kyis gzhi byas la thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtshos mdzad pa'i rab gnas bkra shis snye ma dang rgyud chen dkon mchog rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos mdzad pa'i phyag len dang lcang skya rdo rje 'chang gis mdzad pa'i rab gnas dge legs rgya mtsho'i zur 'debs dang mdo rgyud nas phan yon cung zad  btus te mchod ga-yog pa dang dbu mdzad la go bde bar bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' 'bangs tha shal lha'i btsun pa su ma ti ma ni pra dzny'a ming gzhan 'jam dbyangs gong ma'i bka' lung gis ching su tsug thu no mon han du 'bod pas dge ldan bshad sgrub bstan pa 'phel ba'i gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni gsung rab la rnam dpyod yangs pa thung ga lag pi lig thu w'a gindra dharma ta la'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas pa dang 'gro ba kun gyis tshe rabs thams cad du dkon mchog gsum dang mi 'bral bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang myur du 'thob par gyur cig  bkra shis </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3166</vol>
<tib>slob dpon sangs rgyas gnyis pa'i gsol 'debs byin rlabs myur 'jug dang lta bsgom spyod 'bras kyi glu bcas</tib>
<p>1a-2b</p>
<col>@002b (zhes slob dpon sangs rgyas gnyis par gsol 'debs pa'i tshigs bcad 'di ni rang la rtsom 'dun byung ba ltar sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang ye shes bstan pa rab rgyas kyis sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3167</vol>
<tib>'grel pa don gsal gyi rnam bshad rtogs dka' snang ba zhes bya ba mkhas grub thams cad mkhyen pas mdzad pa</tib>
<p>1a-252a</p>
<col>@281b shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi 'grel pa don gsal ba'i rnam bshad rtogs par dga' ba'i snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gsum na 'gran pa'i zla thams cad dang bral ba rgyal ba'i ring lugs @282a * pa thams cad kyi gtsug gi nor bu don gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te rje btsun dam pa ku mar ma ti'i zhal snga nas dang 'gro ba ma lus pa'i mig gcig bu rgyal ba kun gyi dam pa'i chos ma lus pa 'dzin pa la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros chen po dang mi gnyis pa thams cad mkhyen pa blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyi zhal snga nas la sogs pa rje btsun dam pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyi zhabs rdul spyi bos len pa rgyal ba'i gsung rab mtha' dag gi dgongs don 'byed pa la mi 'jigs pa'i spobs pa dge ba can mang du thos pa'i dge slong dge legs dpal bzang po zhes bya bas gtsang nyang stod rig pa'i 'byung gnas kyi sa'i cha dge spyod dang bram ze chos dang don yongs su tshol ba la zhugs pa dag gis bsten par bya ba'i gnas rdo rje'i gdan du sbyar ba'o aom swa sti rgyal bstan pad tshal phan bde'i dri bsung can bshad sgrub 'dab rgyas rnam grol sbrang rtsi'i bcud 'gro kun spyod phyir dga' ldan theg chen gling chos de che nas chos sbyin char 'di spel sarba mangga lam ) "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3168</vol>
<tib>legs par gsungs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dul ba mtha' dag gi snying po'i don legs par bshad pa rin po che'i phreng ba bzhugs so"</tib>
<p>358b-617a </p>
<col>@615a* ces sde snod thams cad kyi rtsa ba bstan pa'i snying po 'dul ba lung sde bzhi'i dgongs don mtha' dag ma tshang bar med par bsdus pa'i bstan bcos chen po pan chen dge 'dun grub kyi thugs bcud 'dul ti ka rin po che'i phreng ba bstan 'gro yongs kyi gsos sman dam par nga du sgrub pa'i dong ma pa gtsang pa rab 'byams pa bstan pa dar rgyas gnyer ba rab 'byams pa bstan pa dar rgyas rab 'byams pa blo bzang 'jigs med zhus dag pa rab 'byams pa ye shes dge legs dge slong 'jigs med dam chos par yig pa dbang rgyal bsod nams dbang bsod nams par rkos pa rab 'byams pa ngag dbang don grub rab 'byams pa blo bzang dam chos rab 'byams pa 'jigs med tshul khrims rab 'byams pa dkon mchog rab rgyas rab 'byams pa dkon mchog rgya mtsho @615b dge slong dkon mchog 'phrin las dge slong 'jam dbyangs bkra shis dge slong blo bzang dkon mchog dge slong ngag dbang nyi ma dge slong ngag dbang shes rab dge slong ye shes grags pa dge slong 'jam dbyangs blo gsal dge slong bsod nams phun tshogs dge tshul blo bzang rgya mtsho dge tshul ngag dbang bsam grub dge tshul ngag dbang grags pa dge tshul blo bzang dar rgyas dge tshul ngag dbang rgya mtsho dge tshul dkon mchog rab rgyas dge tshul kun dga' bstan 'dzin dge tshul ngag dbang grags pa dge tshul blo bzang tshul khrims dge tshul sbyin pa rgya mtsho dge tshul ngag dbang yon tan dge tshul blo bzang chos 'dzin dge tshul blo bzang lhun grub dge tshul 'phrin las dar rgyas rnams nas bgyis shing gtso bor snga phyi'i don skor che phra mtha' dag ^ skyabs mgon thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs pa chen po rje bzhun dkon mchog 'jigs med dbang po'i zhal snga nas nyid kyis ljags bkod bka' drin du stsal pa bzhin las byed rnams @616a* nas kyang lhag bsam rnam par dag pas khur du blang te chos grwa chen po bkra shis 'khyil du legs par sgrub  pa'i par byang du dam pa gang gi slob ma'i tha shal btsun pa dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron mes bris pa'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba gnyis pa'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun rin du gnas par gyur cig @616b aom swa sti phun tshogs rlabs chen tshogs gnyis zla ma las legs 'khrungs sku gsum rin chen ri yi dbang srid na bkra shis dpal gyi gzi 'bar ba thams cad mkhyen pa thub dbang de la 'dud mgon de'i chos 'dul bstan pa'i gdugs dkar po kun la phan dang bde ba'i grib bsil can 'degs pa'i mthu mnga' 'phags bod mkhas kun dang pan chen dge 'dun grub pa phyag gi yul srid pa'i mthun pa'i cha rkyen gang sbyar dang par gyi phyi mo yi ge zhus dag sogs 'brel thogs kun kyang skye ba'i 'phreng bar rnam dag khrims kyis rtag tu 'tsho bar shog tshul khrims rnam dag ri rgyal brtan pa'i spor ting 'dzin sgo phye'i rnam rgyal khang bza' du shes rab mig stong ldan pa'i mthu thob nas srid pa lha min ga-yul las rgyal bar shog ri bo dge rgyas dga' ldan bshad sgrub gling srid mtha'i bar du dar zhing rgyas pa dang blo gsal @617a* mkhas mang rtag tu 'dus pa dang bshad sgrub yar ngo'i zla bzhin 'phel bar shog  ces 'dul ti ka rin chen 'phreng ba bstan pa'i 'byung gnas khu ru chen mo'i mtshan nyid bkra shis chos 'phel grwa tshang du par bsgrubs pa'i tshe rgyu sbyor do dam pa bka' bcu smra ba dge slong phun tshogs bkra shis nas par byang du dgos tshul zer ba ltar dam pa du ma'i zhabs rdul spyi bor bstan pa'i sprang btsun ngag gi dbang bos bris pa dge legs 'phel "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3168</vol>
<tib>legs par gsungs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dul ba mtha' dag gi snying po'i don legs par bshad pa rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-357a</p>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3169</vol>
<tib>bar do 'phrang sgrol gyi tshig 'grel nyung 'dus legs 'dren shing rta zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-11a</p>
<col>@011a * (ces rje btsun tsong kha pa chen po'i mdo sngags kyi bstan pa'i bdag po pan chen thams cad mkhyen gzigs chen pos mdzad pa'i bar do 'phrang sgrol gyi gsol 'debs 'jigs sgrol gyi dpa' bo zhes bya ba'i dngos gzhi'i tshigs bcad rnams kyi don 'grel legs 'dren shing rta zhes pa lung rigs kyi rgyab sgyor sogs dor ba'i shin tu mdor bsdus 'di ni sum pa pandi ta'i ming can gyis rang gi gam du gnas pa'i dad ldan li ky'a nang so phun tshogs bstan 'dzin dang aur tu su'i rab 'byams pa blo bzang bsam gtan dang dbu mdzad rab 'byams pa don grub bstan 'dzin dang thub bstan rab 'byams pa sogs kyis bskul ba'i ngor au bi ka ste na tshod ldan zhes pa shing mo phag gi lo'i dbo zla'i yar ngo la bris pa'i yi ge pa ni dpyod ldan dge tshul ngag dbang blo bzang ngo sarba dza yantu</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3169</vol>
<tib>brgya rtsa'i rnam bshad tshogs gnyis rin chen 'dren pa'i shing rta bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-19b </p>
<col>@019b (ces pa 'di ni shar phyogs hor gyi yul gru che po'i skye 'gro rnams la chos kyi snang bas khyab par mdzad pa bstan 'gro'i dpal mgon nes chi tho yon gyis yang sprul gang des bskul ba'i ngo bor blo bzang bstan pa'i nyi mas mtsho bdun gyi dgon par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni t'a bla ma blo bzang nor bu'o mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3169</vol>
<tib>'dul ba ni"</tib>
<p>2a-51a inc [* missing page from 1a-1b *]</p>
<col>@050b ('di ni btsun pa dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron mes rang lo nyer gsum pa la lha ldan smon lam grwa skor gyi dus gtugs pas rtsas blo 'dzin ngos der mi gsal ba kha 'geng dgos rnams dpe klog gang bgyis dran tho rags pa tsam sug bris su btab pa las phyis dbe rim par 'khyar te chos grwa chen po dpal ldan bkra shis 'khyil gyi dga' ram 'dzin grwa'i chos grwa ba rnams nas rtsod pa la phan skyed che bar 'dug pas par du 'khod dgos zhes par yig btab zin 'dug kyang spyir dang pho nas rang gi brjed tho tsam du bsam ste tshig sbyor sogs rtsom pa'i lugs su ma byas shing lhag par de skabs rtsod pa cha tshang ma song bas gong 'og ma 'brel pa lta bu re gnyis 'dug pa zhu dag cung zad bgyis yod kyang dngung blo gros @051a * can rnams kyis dpyad par mdzad na legs so 'dir 'bad legs byas gangga'i klung rgyun gyis nyes ltung rnyog pa'i dri ma rab sbyangs nas chos 'dul rgya mtsho'i gling du phyin gyur te bslab gsum nor bu'i mdzod la dbang 'byor shog  sarba mangga lam</col>

<vol>3171</vol>
<tib>legs par bshad pa chos mngon rgya mtsho'i snying po bzhugs pa'i dbu'i phyogs lags "</tib>
<p>1a-236a</p>
<col>@235a * dam pa'i chos mngon pa kun las btus pa'i rnam bshad legs par bshad pa chos mngon rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba 'di ni skyegs @235b ston dka' bcu pa blo gros brtan pa la sogs bsgom brtson sde snod 'dzin pa du mas bskul ba la brten nas rgyal ba'i ring lugs pa chen po rje btsun dam pa red mda' pa ku ma ra ma t'i'i zhal snga nas kyis legs par bshad pa'i bka' drin dang snyigs dus kyi thams cad mkhyen pa rje rin po che blo bzang grags pa'i dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyi bka' drin dang mkhas grub don grub rin chen gyi zhal snga nas las kyang thos pa la brten nas rje btsun dam pa yab sras snyis kyi zhabs kyi rdul run ring du spyi bos mnos pa mang du thos pa'i dge slong rigs pa smra ba dar ma rin chen gyis 'brog ri bo che dge ldan rnam par rgyal ba'i gling du sbyar ba'o yi ge pa ni shangs ston dka' bcu pa nam mkha' rgyal mtshan no d'is bstan pa rin po che sgo thams cad nas phyogs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  ` chos 'di yi brgyud pa ni thub pa'i dbang po byams pa mgon po thogs med dbyig gnyen blo brtan gang ba spel dzi na mi tra ska cog zhang gsum dpal gyi rdo rje zla ba'i rdo rje rgyal ba'i ye shes mchog gi ye shes se btsun gzhon nu dbang phyug 'gar mi nyag yon tan ga-yung drung khu ston brtson 'grus ga-yung drung r'a rgya @236a * li gsum brang ti dar ma snying po ko'u ye shes 'byung gnas 'ban dkon mchog rdo rje tho kun dga' rdo rje mdzad pa ston skyabs mdzad pa gzhon byang 'bring mtshams pa zhang spyi dkar ba chen po bo dong pa rin chen rtse mo stag sde pa sengge rgyal mtshan dbang lotstsha ba blo gros brtan pa skad snyis smra ba byang chub rtse mo red mda' pa gzhon nu blo gros rje rin po che blo bzang grags pa yab sras gnyis ka la bdag dar ma rin chen gyis thos so yang reg chos kyi brtson 'grus nas bzung ste don grun rin chen gyis par du brgyud pa yang thos so "</col>
</item>

<item>

</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3174</vol>
<tib>byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i mtha' dpyod gzhung lugs rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i gru gzings zhes bya ba las lhag mthong gi mtha' dpyod</tib>
<p>1a-85a</p>
<col>@083a * (ces rgyal ba'i gsung rab thams cad kyi gnang bsdus pa shing rta chen po klu sgrub dang thogs med gnyis kyi lam srol rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sar bgrod pa'i skyes bu mchog gi chos lugs mnyam med jo bo chen po dang; 'jam mgon bla ma btsong kha pa chen po'i thugs kyi bcud phyung ba'i gdams pa rin po che che ba bzhi dang ldan pa'i byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i gnad la nges pa bde blag tu ster ba mtha' dpyod gzhung lugs rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i gru gzings zhes bya ba 'di ni mnyam med thub pa'i dbang po'i ring lugs yongs rdzogs phyogs brgyar spel ba'i thugs bskyed rlabs po che dus su smin pa dpal ldan mkhas grub bye ba'i zur phud la zhabs sen gyi @083b cod pan rnam par 'god pa rab 'byams dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i mnga' bdag chen po mtshan brjod par dka' pa rje btsun bla ma dam pa dh'i rgh'a yu: sa ma ya badzra k'irti shr'i bha dra'i mtshan can nyid kyi zhal snga nas kyis phyogs 'dir dgon pa grwa pa nyung 'dus rigs la grwa sa chen mo rnams dang 'dra bar bo ti lnga'i 'chad nyan 'dzin grwa mang po so sor bcad de byed lugs stabs mi bde zhing de yang tshe ni yun thung shes bya'i rnam pa mang tshe yi tshad kyang ji tsam mi shes pas ngang bas chu las 'o ma len pa ltar rang gi 'dod pa dang du blang bar bya zhes pa'i tshul ltar du gsung rab kun  gyi snying po'i bcud kun bsdus pa byang chub lam rim gyi 'chad nyan la brtson par byas na phan pa che bar 'dug pas byang phyogs bstan 'gro'i mgon po rje btsun dam pa sku 'phreng lnga pa chen po nas kyang dgon pa 'ga' zhig tu lam rim rtags gsal m tshugs thub na dgos khyad che bar 'dug tshul gsung yod kyang lam rim rtags gsal ma'i yig cha gzhan ma rnyed cing rje blo gros brtan pa'i gsung rgyun dwags po mkhan chen ngag dbang grags pas zin bris su mdzad pa rtsom 'phro can zhig yod kyang gsar bu rnams kyis cung zad go dka' bar 'dug pas mtshan nyid kyi yig cha gzhan dang babs mtshungs par lam rim 'di la lung dang rigs pas mtha' dpyod pa gsar bu rnams kyis go sla ba zhig cis @084a * kyang 'bri dgos zhes bzlog pa dka' ba'i bka' yi me tog spyi bor lhung zhing gzhan yang dpyod ldan mang pos kyang nan tan du bskul ma mdzad pa bzhin rang gis kyang bka' bzhin sgrub pa'i mchod pa'i sprin gyi phung por dmigs te mgo brtsams nas le tshan 'ga' re song mtshams su mdo sngags thub bstan yongs su rdzogs pa'i mnga' bdag ^the bo sprul pa'i sku rin po che lags la gzigs 'bul zhus pas legs so'i bsngags brjod mdzad de 'phro rdzogs dgos pa'i bka' nan tan tu stsal bas kyang spro bar byas te rje bdag nyid chen po'i legs bshad lam rim che chung rtsa 'jug gi rnam bshad legs bshad snying po sogs gzhir bzung 'phags bod kyi mkhas grub chen po rnams kyi gzhung lugs la ran blos dpyod de ci nus su dpog pa dang; bshes gnyen dam pa rnams kyi zhal gyi gdams pas kyang nye bar brgyan te 'jam mgon rgyal ba gnyis pa'i ring lugs pa chen po skyabs mgon mkhan chen rdo rje 'chang rje btsun blo bzang tshe dbang skyabs mchog dpal bzang po dang sa mthar bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba la gzhan dring mi 'jog pa'i nges pa don gyi mkhas grub chen po bka' drin 'khor thabs ma mchis pa'i mgon po @084b rje btsun bskal bzang bkra shis rgya mtsho dpal bzang po dang dus gsum rgyal ba'i spyi gzugs skyabs mgon thugs rje'i mnga' bdag rje btsun bla ma dam tshig rdo rje dpal bzang po dang gzhan yang mkhas grub chen po lha rams pa sangs rgyas rdo rje'i mtshan can la sogs pa dpal ldan bla ma dam pa du ma'i bka' drin gyis nye bar 'tsho ba mkhan po'i ming 'dzin dka' bcu smra ba ^blo bzang rdo rjes ^'jam dbyangs gong ma chen pos tshe 'phel gling du bsngags pa dge ldan bstan pa rgyas pa'i gling du rgyal phur 'dzom pa'i grub sbyor gyi nyin mjug rdzogs par nye bar sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dad brtson rnam dpyod phul du byung ba'i dge bshes dge slong blo bzang 'jam dpal gyis bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang 'jam mgon rgyal ba gnyis pa'i ring lugs dri ma med pa 'di nyid phyogs dus gnas skabs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  ` deng sang gi dus 'dir yul phyogs phal cher du skyir chos 'chad nyan dgon zhing lhag par ^rje bla ma'i thugs kyi dgongs pa'i gtad so mdo sngags kyi lam rim gnyis sogs nyag phra ba'i skabs 'dir gdul bya blo dman rnams kyis kyang rtogs sla zhing lung rigs dang 'brel bas mtha' chod la mang nyung bcu pas 'khyer bde ba @085a * sogs cha mtha' dag bsngags par 'os pa'i legs bshad 'di lta bu mkhyen rab kyi rtsal las thon pa ni ae ma ho: shin tu ngo mtshar snyam nas ^brag ri bla ming ba dang rgyal nas khams phyogs med du 'phyan pa'i ^the bo bla ming pa ste ngos cag gnyis kyang rjes su yi rang bar gyur lags na rjes 'jug chos don du gnyer ba rnams kyis thos bsam sgom gsum la 'bad rtson che bskyed mdzad par rigs so zhes pa'ang brag ri bla mar 'bod pa ^dam tshig rdo rje dang the bo sprul ming ba ^ye shes thub bstan rgya mtsho ste nged cag gnyis kyis sdebs gcig tu smras pa'o dge legs 'phel)"</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3175</vol>
<tib>dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi chos 'byung khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dngos grub kyi gter mdzod</tib>
<p>2a-417a</p>
<col>@416b (dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi chos 'byung khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dngos grub kyi gter mdzod 'di @417a * yang kun mkhyen gong ma de nyid nas ljags zhus 'phro can du lus stabs rje de nyid slar yang sprul pa'i zlos gar bsgyur ba kun mkhyen gnyis pa de nyid kyis zhus dag zhib mo dar han chen ratna siddhi wang gis sbyin bdag byas nas par du bsgrubs kyang da dung yig nor cung zad yod par kun mkhyen gnyis pa rang nyid kyis gsungs pa ltar slar yang kun mkhyen gong ma'i drung yig bsam blo sgom pa rin chen bstan 'dzin pa'i phyag bris mdang gtugs nas dag par bcos te dga' ldan bkra shis 'khyil du par du bsgrubs pa lags so sarba mangga lam</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3176</vol>
<tib>rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rtsa rgyud 'grel pa dang bcas pa'i dgongs 'grel legs bshad gter gyi bang mdzod ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-249a</p>
<col>@247b rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rtsa rgyud le'u bcu gnyis pa yan chad kyi  dgongs 'grel legs bshad gter gyi bang mdzod ces bya ba 'di ni gtsad stod rgyud pa brtson 'grus 'phags kyis rje btsun chos kyi rgyal po tsong kha pa chen po'i thugs kyi sprul pa rje shes rab sengges lung bstan cing sangs rgyas nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis legs par btab pa'i gnas mchog dam pa dga' ldan pho brang gi bla brang rgyal mtshan mthon por sbyar ba'o @248a * smras pa zla med ston pa sh'akya'i sras po des skal ldan gdul bya'i bsam pa dang 'tshams par theg mchog chos kyi bdud rtsi bstsal pa las rab dang phul gyur 'dus pa'i rgyud rgyal gyi mtha' drug tshul bzhis bcings pa'i tshig gi don glu yi zhabs dang dpal ldan zla ba dang blo bzang rgyal ba'i dbang po yab sras sogs 'phags bod mkhas grub rnams kyi bzhed srol bzhin legs par bkral ba'i rgyud 'grel 'di nyid kyi glegs bam par du bskrun pa'i dge ba'i mthus thub bstan spyi dang 'jam dpal snying po yi 'khrul med ring lugs phyogs mthar rgyas pa dang 'brel thog kun kyang deng nas byang chub par dal 'byor rten thob dam pa'i mgon dang mjal rgyu 'bras theg pa'i lam bzang rim bgrod nas ring min rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa thob shog  (ces mdzod dge dgon sar dga' ldan rab rgyas gling du rgyud chen brtson 'grus 'phags kyi rgyud t'i ka par du 'khod skabs par byang du ^ sh'akya'i dge slong dkon mchog bstan pa'i rgya mtshos sbyar ba'o ces rgyud chen brtson @248b 'grus 'phags kyi rgyud t'i ka legs bshad gter gyi bang mdzod 'di ni nges pa don gyi thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs pa chen po ^ rje btsun dkon mchog bstan pa'i rgya mtsho dpal bzang pos dga' ldan rab rgyas gling gi dpon slob don grub bdag la mdo smad na rgyud chen gyi t'i ka 'di nyid kyi dpe shin tu dkon pas rgyud grwa de nyid du 'di nyid kyi par bsgrub zhes bka' gnang bas rje nyid kyi phyag dpe bris pa dang dpal mang rin po che'i phyag dpe dpar ma gnyis kyi steng nas par du bsgrub kyang ma dpe gnyis la bris nor ches pas 'grel pa bsdus don mtha' dpyod sogs kyi steng nas zhu dag cung zad byas kyang da dung rtogs dka' ba yod pa rnams btang snyoms su bzhag gzhan yang 'grel pa 'di'i skabs gong 'og kun tu tshig brjod mi bde ba lta bu 'ga' re snang na yang rtsa rgyud kyi tshig 'ba' zhig tu snang bas de nyid sor bzhag byas te chos 'di la shin tu mos pa'i dge slong tshul khrims dar rgyas kyis mthun rkyen sbyar te dga' ldan @249a * rab rgyas gling du par du bsgrub pa'o aom swa sti mdo smad lho brgyud mdzod dge smad kyi yul kun mkhyen yab sras thugs rje la brten pa'i rgyud grwa chen po dga' ldan rab rgyas gling mi 'dzad chos sbyin spel phyir par du bsgrub sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<tib>bla ma rdo rje 'chang nas 'grel pa bzhi sbrags kyi bshad lung gnang skabs kyi zin bris gsang chen rigs lam gsal byed ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-126a</p>

<col>@029a * (ces dpal ldan dbu ma thal 'gyur ba'i grub mtha'i rnam bzhag thar lam gsal byed ces bya ba 'di ni sngar nas grub mtha' rin po che'i 'phreng ba'i kha skongs lta bu zhig 'bri 'dun yod thog mang thos rab 'byams pa blo bzang sbyin pa rgyal mtshan nas kun mkhyen lcang skya rin po che'i grub mtha' chen mo'i thal 'gyur ba'i grub mtha'i rnam bzhag khil du phyung ste snying por dril ba zhig dgos zhes bskul ba don yod par bya ba'i phyir ban rgan snyoms las pa d'irgh'a yu: badzra girtis gzhung gi rang lugs kyi tshig ris mnyam par btus te  bris pa'i yi ge pa ni dpyod ldan dge tshul lha btsun blo bzang tshe ring gis bgyis pa 'dis kyang bstan pa 'gro ba yongs la phan rgya chen po 'byung bar gyur cig  dge legs 'phel</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3181</vol>
<tib>dpal myur mdzad ye shes kyi mgon po la sogs pa rgyal ba'i bstan bsrung chen po rnams la mchod gtor 'bul zhing 'phrin las bcol ba'i cho ga 'phrin las kun 'grub ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-10b</p>
<col>@009b (ces dpal myur mdzad ye shes kyi mgon po la sogs rgyal ba'i bstan bsrung chen po rnams la mchod gtor 'bul zhing 'phrin las bcol ba'i chog rgyun gyi rnal 'byor du bya tshul 'phrin las kun 'grub ces bya ba 'di ni rang gi rgyun 'khyer dang tshul 'di rjes su gnyer ba gzhan dag la yang phan 'dod kyi bsam pas kun nas blangs te mkhas grub dam pa @010a * khyad par can rnams kyi gsung la skabs thob kyi bsgyur bkod cung zad tsam byas te bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin las bsrung ma 'di dag gi rjes gnang dang man ngag mang du thos pa'i rgyal khams pa ^ dam tshig rdo rjes legs par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni blo ldan tshe ring dar rgyas so 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa'i snying po 'jam mgon chos kyi rgyal po tsong kha pa chen po'i ring lugs dri ma med pa 'di nyid phyogs dus gnas skabs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3182</vol>
<tib>dus tshigs kyi rnam bzhag kun gsal me long zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-156a</p>
<col>@155b ces dus tshigs kyi rnam bzhag kun gsal me long zhes bya ba 'di ni khu re chen mo'i grwa rigs ming btas gnyis ldan gyi bshad sgrub bstan dar zhes bya bas gnam gyi rigs las brgyud pa'i sa skyong chen po aam ban cheng wang gi rigs sras lha yi btsun pa mdo sngags gzhung la sbyangs pa'i 'bras rtags su ming btags gnyis kyis ming zur brgyan pa'i sh'akya'i dge slong bstan pa rgya mtshos snga mo nas bskul ma mdzad par khu re chen mo'i dga' ldan theg chen gling gi nye 'dab rang shong spyil bur mgo rtsom nas bar skabs su rnam ga-yengs sna tshogs kyis brel te lhag mar lus pa la slar mar yang nyid kyis dran bskul byas shing don gnyer can gzhan gyi kyang bskul bar brten rab 'byung bco lnga pa'i nyag ma so gsum pa legs sbyar sam skre ta skad du bi k'a ri stod 'grel las @156a * bod yul gyi skad du sgyur byed mah'a tsi na'i skad du gyi ha'i dbang thang dad bsdun pa'i ming sa mo phag lo'i hor zla dang po'i yar ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi pa cho 'phrul dus chen dad byang phyogs 'gro ba'i mgon po rje btsun dam pa sku phreng dang po'i dgongs rdzogs dus chen gnyis 'dzom pa nam mkha'i nor bu sna tshogs lha ldan gyi dga' mar rtse dags rol zhing mig gsum gtsug nor gdengs can dga' mar 'khyud pa'i bkra shis dge mtshan 'bar ba'i nyin chen wang shog gi dgon sder mjug rdzogs par sbyar ba'i shog gur phebs pa'i byed pa po rtsis rams pa dar rgyas dge bshes dge slong blo bzang bkra shis dge bshes dge slong bstan 'dzin 'od zer gyis pa sarbba d'a shre ya wa rdhe shu bha wantu gzhung lugs pad tshal rgyas pa la blo gsal rkang drug 'du ba'i phyir par gyi 'phrul 'degs dga' tshal 'di chin wang shog gi dgon par bsgrubs</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3183</vol>
<tib>byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i zab khrid byang chub bde lam gyi dmigs rnam snying por dril te nyams su len tshul phan bde'i lam bzang zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-42a</p>
<col>@041a * (ces rgyal ba'i gsung rab 'byams thams cad kyi gnad don yongs su rdzogs pa gcig tu bsdus pa byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i gdams pa zab mo nyams su len tshul gyi man ngag thun mong ma yin pa phan bde'i lam bzang zhes bya ba 'di ni rang gi rgyun gyi nyams len dang blo dman gzhan dag la'ang phan 'dod kyi bsam pas kun nas bslangs te pan chen thams @041b cad mkhyen pa chen po'i rdo rje'i gsung byang chub bde lam nyid gzhir bzung ste de'i don gyi snying po rnams ma tshang ba med par bsdus pa la gal che ba'i dmigs skor 'ga' zhig gis kyang kha bskangs las dang po las tshig gi sgo nas kyang bshad sbyang byed pa la brjod pa bde ched dngos gzhi'i 'khrid dmigs rnams kyang ngag 'don gyi tshul du bsgrigs rang gi bla ma dam pa'i man ngag phyag bzhis kyis kyang legs par brgyan nas 'jug pa shin tuu bde bar bla ma dam pa du ma'i bka' drin gyis nye bar 'tsho ba'i btsun gzugs snyom las pa ^dam tshig rdo rjes gangs can bod kyi rdo rje 'chang chen po lha ldan sprul pa'i gtsug lag khang gi nye 'debs zhig tu nye bar sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni chos mthun snying gi slob bu dge slong blo bzang nam mkha' rdo rjes bgyis pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3183</vol>
<tib>dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sa lam gyi ngos 'dzin rags rim 'phros dang bcas pa mkhas grub smra ba'i nyi ma'i zhal lung zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-36a</p>
<col>@036a * (ces dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sa lam gyi ngos 'dzin rags rim 'phros dang bcas pa mkhas grub smra ba'i nyi ma'i zhal lung zhes bya ba 'di ni gdan sa khu ral chen mo nas sde snod 'dzin pa'i bshes gnyen mang pos dus 'khor bsdus rgyud la go sla'i mchan 'dra re dgos tshul ltar de skor gyi gzhung la lta rtog gi 'go brtsam pa na lugs 'di'i sa lam gyi rnam bzhag gcig dang por gal che bar mthong nas de'i ngos 'dzin rags rim tsam zhig zin thor 'god kyin yod thog lung rigs smra ba'i dbang po dka' bcu blo bzang chos skyong gis 'di nyid kyang mtha' dpyod dang bcas par bris shig ces lha dar dkar ser dang bcas te bskul ba bzhin bgro gleng gi gzhi thar thor tsam snon pa dang bcas ^ sh'akya'i btsun gzugs 'jam dbyangs dgyes pa'i bshes gnyen gyis dpal ri dge rgyas kyi mdun shod chos grwa bkra shis chos 'byor gling gi byang 'dabs dben gnas bka' gdams chos sdings su sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dus 'khor dbu mdzad ngag dbang brtson 'grus kyis bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang yul dang dus kyi mtha' 'dir mdo sngags bstan pa'i sgron me yun ring du 'bar ba'i gsol 'debs byed par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>

<col>@011a * (zhes pa 'di yang rang nyid 'grad bya'i khur gyis non pas lus dang sems kyis mi l cog na lang mdo sngags rig gnas yongs la mkhas pa'i dbang po aa mchog dge bshes sprul pa'i sku rin po che nas grwa tshang gsar tshugs kyi blog sal gzhon pa rnams la 'di 'dra zhig dgos tshul gyi gsung nan zlog ma nus par sems la shar tshod thos byung rags rim tsam gser gyi 'phreng ba'i mdzes rgyan gyi tshul du snyoms las pa ratna dhwa dzas rang lo brgyad bcu pa rab byung bcu bzhi pa'i dbo zla ba'i yang ngo'i tshes bzang por bkod pa'i yi ge pa ni dga' ldan bkra shis chos gling pa dge slong dkon mchog brtson 'grus kyis bgyis pa 'dis kyang dus gsum rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa'i thugs bzhed mtha' dag lhun gyis grub par gyur cig  </col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3185</vol>
<tib>bdud rtsi snying po yan lag brgyad pa gsang ba man ngag yon tan rgyud kyi lhan thabs zug rngu'i tsha gdung sel ba'i katpu ra dus min 'chi zhags gcod pa'i ral gri zhes bya ba'i gsang sman gab tshig zhal shes sbyor tshad sogs ma sbas lhug par bshad pa bdud rtsi'i gter bum mkha' 'gro'i gtad rgya'i rgya mdud bkrol pa'i rin chen gser gyi lde mig ces bya ba bzhugs so"</tib>
<p>1a-55a</p>
<col>@053a * (ces bdud rtsi'i snying po yan lag brgyad pa gsang ba man ngag yon tan rgyud kyi lhan thabs zug rngu'i tsha gdung sel ba'i katp'u ra dus min 'chi zhags gcod pa'i ral gri zhes bya ba'i gsang sman gab tshig zhal shes sbyor tshad sogs ma sbas lhug par bshad pa bdud rtsi'i gter bum mkha' 'gro'i gtad rgya'i rgya mdud @053b bkrol pa'i rin chen gser gyi lde mig ces bya ba 'di ni ring mo nas tshe rig la mkhyen rab kyi snang ba rgyas pa dge slong rin po che nam mkha'i mtshan can gyis ldog tu med pa'i bka' nan dang gya nom pa'i dngos po'i rten dang bcas bskul ba dang nye char gso rig smra ba'i dbang phyug ngag dbang rgya mtshos bskul ba'i ngo mchog par gangs can chos srid yongs kyi mnga' bdag mi rje buddha s'a ra'i dka' 'bangs tha shal wa gindra shri bha tras bris pa 'di la lung dang lag len med par 'chal bar spyod pa rnams zhang blon sogs sman srung rnams kyis de'i snying khrag rol par gnyer du gtad pa'o shong gsal sbyor tshad ma dpe bris ma rgyun 'byams su song nas chad lhag mang po byung ba rnams dang rnying khungs dag nyi shu lhag tsam la gtugs nas zhus dag legs par byas khul yin pas lag tu len skabs sman pa mkhas pa dag sman gyi nus pa dang nad stobs che chung dang bsil drod gang 'phrod dang bstun nas sbyar ba ma gtogs 'di kho na ltar sman gyi tshad mtha' gcig tu byas pa'i nges pa med pa'ang thugs la bstim pa 'tshal) ` 'di rnams kyi lung gi brgyud pa ni mkha' 'gro'i gtso mo dpal ldan phrang ba des nyams dang rmi lam gyi tshul du byin gyis brlabs nas pandi ta chen po mi dbang sangs rgyas rgya mtsho la stsal @054a * de la tshe rig pa wa gindra shr'i bha tras 'di skor gyi zhal shes chig rgyud rnams yongs su rdzogs pa dmar khrid du mnos de la rgyal mchog blo bzang rin chen tshangs dbyangs rgya mtsho'i sku mdun pa bla sman sangs rgyas srid sgrub kyis zhus de nas 'tsho byed 'jam dbyangs rgyal mtshan bla ma blo bzang mi 'gyur rdo rje bla ma blo bzang rnam rgyal blo bzang bskal bzang rab 'byams pa blo bzang dge legs bla ma blo bzang byams pa phun tshogs dga' ldan bstan pa'i gsal byed lcang lung a'arya pandi ta ngag dbang blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpon drung ye shes nyi 'od aor du su ao thog ku shri bka' 'gyur ba grags pa bzang po chos rje blo bzang dkon mchog au ri chos rje dad pa rgya mtsho @054b nom chi slob dpon blo bzang dpal ldan dam pa ai rti ni rab 'byams pa bskal bzang chos 'phel bla ma lha btsun blo bzang sbyin pa bla ma blo bzang shes rab bya bral ba dge slong dkon mchog chos 'dzin lho sprul ngag dbang mkhyen rab bstan pa'i dbang phyug rje bka' drin mtshungs med bka' 'gyur ba chen po brag ri rdo rje 'chang 'phrin las pad+ma kun bzang chos rgyan dpal bzang po des thams cad mkhyen pa phyag na padmo'i bla sman pa ayon bstan 'dzin rgya mtsho la aom swa sti phyag na padmo thub bstan rgya mtsho yi thugs bskyed mtha' bral kun gsal yangs pa'i klong gang 'dul 'phrin las nyin byed 'od snang gis bstan 'gro phan bde'i padmo ci yang 'dzum gsang rgyud @055a * au pa de sha'i lhan thabs kyi gsang smad gab tshig ye shes d'akki mas gsang rgyas btab rnams ma sbas lhug par gsang ba mngon du phyung ba'i bu sta ka gang 'di tshangs pa lha yi me tog gi sprul pa'i zlos gar ngur smrig 'chang ba'i rje gangs ljongs bstan srid cos kyi 'khor los sgyur de mo rgyal bas mi 'dzad mar du bskrun grangs ljongs bstan srid chos kyi 'khor los sgyur de mo rgyal bas mi 'dzad par du bskrun grangs med tshogs pa'i bsod nams chu gter rum spangs rtogs rin chen gdengs ka dbyings su bteg bshad sgrub dgos 'dod nor bu'i 'byung gnas che sku gsum klu yi dbang po thob phyir bsngo (zhes pa 'di yang rab tshes sa byi lor gzhungs mchog nas par gzhi gsar bskrun mdzad skabs par byang smon tshig tu chos kyi sengges so par 'di lcags ri rig byed 'gro phan gling du bzhugs</col>
</item>

<tib>bdud rtsi snying po yan lag brgyad pa gsang ba man ngag yon tan rgyud kyi lhan thabs zug rngu'i tsha gdung sel ba'i katpu ra dus min 'chi zhags gcod pa'i ral gri zhes bya ba'i gsang sman gab tshig zhal shes sbyor tshad sogs ma sbas lhug par bshad pa bdud rtsi'i gter bum mkha' 'gro'i gtad rgya'i rgya mdud bkrol pa'i rin chen gser gyi lde mig ces bya ba bzhugs so"</tib>

<col>@044b ces bdud rtsi'i snying po yan lag brgyad pa gsang ba man ngag yon tan rgyud kyi lhan thabs zug rngu'i tsha gdung sel ba'i katp'u ra dus min 'chi zhags gcod pa'i ral gri zhes bya ba'i gsang sman gab tshig zhal shes sbyor tshad sogs ma sbas lhug par bshad pa bdud rtsi'i gter bum mkha' 'gro'i gtad rgya'i rgya mdud bkrol pa'i rin chen gser gyi lde mig ces bya ba 'di ni ring mo nas tshe rig la mkhyen rab kyi snang ba rgyas pa dge slong rin po che nam mkha'i mtshan can gyis ldog tu med pa'i bka' nan dang gya nom pa'i dngos po'i rten dang bcas bskul ba dang nye char gso rig smra ba'i dbang phyug ngag dbang rgya mtshos bskul ba'i ngo mchog par gangs can chos srid yongs kyi mnga' bdag mi rje buddha s'a ra'i dka' 'bangs tha shal wa gindra shri bha tras bris pa 'di la lung dang lag len med par 'chal bar spyod pa rnams zhang blon sogs sman srung rnams kyis de'i snying khrag rol par gnyer du gtad pa'o</col>

<tib>rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i zab lam rim pa lngar slob tshul mdor bsdus su bkod pa gsang chen lam gyi yang snying zhes bya ba bzhugs so  "</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3186</vol>
<tib>thub dbang gnas brtan bcu drug 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod cing gsol ba btab pa'i phan yon</tib>
<p>1a-9b</p>
<col>@008b ces thub pa'i dbang po 'phags pa gnas brtan bcu drug 'khor dang bcas pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa rgyal bstan rin po che'i mdzes rgyan yul byung gser gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba 'di ni 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir thub pa'i bstan pa rin po che gnas pa dang 'phel zhing rgyas pa thams cad ston pa thugs rje can de nyid kyi thugs rje dang smon lam gyi mthu dang ston pa thub pa'i dbang pos bstan pa mi nub par 'dzin cing skyong bar bka' bsgos shing byin gyis brlabs pa gnas brtan chen po bcu drug po 'di dag gi byin rlabs kyi mthu la bltos par gsungs pas na rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'phel zhing rgyas pa la thub dbang gnas brtan bcu drug dang bcas pa'i @009a * thugs rje bskul te gsal ba gdab pa nyid gal che bar mthong nas phan bde ma lus 'byung gnas rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che 'di nyid dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas na ci ma rung snyam du smon pas dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po dang snying rje pad+ma dkar po dang gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mdo sogs thub pas sngon bdag cag snyigs ma'i 'gro ba rnams kyi don duu thugs bskyed dang bstan pa yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba'i bden tshig gi smon lam ji ltar mdzad pa'i tshul gsungs pa'i mdo sde rnams dang gnas brtan chen po bcu drug po 'di dag yul gang dang gang du 'khrungs pa dang rgyal ba'i bstan pa la zhugs nas 'bras bu brnyes tshul ji ltar bstan pa dang thub pas ji ltar lung bstan pa'i tshul la sogs pa gnas brtan so so'i rtogs brjod zhib par 'dul ba lung sde bzhi mdo sde las brgya ba rtogs brjod brgya ba dran pa nyer bzhag mdzangs blun sogs mdo sde gang dang gang las 'byung ba de rnams la zhib tu brtags nas bkod cing gnas brtan bcu drug so so'i phyag mtshan gyi byung ba dang gnas brtan so so'i bzhugs gnas dang gnyug mar gnas pa'i 'khor gyi grangs dang so so'i smon lam gyi khyad par dang gnas brtan bcu drug po 'di rnams la thugs rje dang thugs dam bskul phyir mchod cing gsol ba btab pa'i tshul rnams ni 'phags pa dga' ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rtogs pa brjod pa dang gnas brtan lung bstan pa'i mdo dang kha che pan chen gyis khro phu lo ts'a bar gnas brtan gyi rtogs pa brjod pa bshad pa dang gnas brtan bcu drug gis dngos su byin gyis brlabs pa'i bdag nyid chen po mche mas nam mkha' grags kyis @009b mdzad pa'i gnas brtan mchod pa'i cho ga la sogs pa rnams la zhib tu brtags nas bkod pa yin la thub pa'i bstan pa sngon chad ji tsam 'das pa'i tshul la 'das lo mang nyung gnyis las rgya bod kyi chos rgyal rim byon gyi rtsis dang bstun nas 'das lo ring ba'i phyogs ldan na lo sum stong dgu brgya bdun cu don bzhi song 'das lo nyung ba'i phyogs rgyal bas dpal ldan 'bras spungs kyi mchod rten chen por rgyal po zla ba bzang po sogs la dpag dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud gsungs shing de nas shambha lar chos rgyal rig ldan rnams ji ltar byon ba rgyud las gsungs pa'i lo grangs dang bstun na rgyal bas dpal ldan 'bras spungs kyi mchod rten chen por dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud gsungs pa nas lo nyis stong bdun brgya bcu bzhi song ba rab byung bcu gsum pa'i mdzes byed ces pa chu mo yos lo'i 'bras ldan zla ba'i yar tshes dge bar sh'akya'i dge slong ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis pho brang chen po po ta la'i gzim chung bde ba can du sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che sgo thams cad nas phyogs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3187</vol>
<tib> * spyir bstan gyi rnam bzhag 'dul gzhung gsal byed ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-89a</p>
<col>@087b (ces spyir bstan gyi rnam bzhag 'dul gzhung gsal byed ces bya ba 'di ni sngar rtsod pa byas skabs rang gi brjed thor bas ma ste dpe cha gang klog sug bris su btab pa las dus phyis skyes sbyangs gnyis ka'i blo gros kyi mig dang ldan pa dge slong blo bzang bkra shis kyis bskul ba ltar slar snon 'bri dang mgo mjug tshang bar byas te sa mthar @088a * skyes pa'i ^ sprang btsun ngag dbang dpal ldan zhes bya bas rab byung bcu bzhi pa'i bgrang bya nyer drug pa dga' ba zhes pa chu pho 'brug gi lor blo gsal mkhas pa'i 'byung gnas khu re chen mor 'khrigs chags su bkod pa 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas par 'gyur cig  aom swa sti dpal ldan rlabs chen tshogs gnyis rgya mtsho las legs 'khrungs sku gsum rin chen rdul brtsegs sbo srid na mngon mtho phan bde'i gzi 'bar ba thub dbang sa 'dzin dbang po de la 'dud mgon de'i chos 'dul bstan pa'i gdugs dkar po kun la phan dang bde ba'i grib bsil can 'degs pa'i mthu mnga' rgya bod hor gsum gyi mkhas btsun rim byon tshogs rnams phyag gi yul srid pa'i nad brgya 'joms pa'i sman gcig po bstan pa'i rtsa ba dam chos 'dul gzhung gi spyir bstan rnam bzhag legs bshad gsar ba 'di dran dbang chos rje bla mas bka' rtsom mdzad legs bshad rin chen mdzod 'di don gnyer can blo gsar blo yi dbul ba sel ba'i slad mkhas dbang mchog sprul blo bzang rin chen gyis mi zad par gyi sgo brgya yongs su phye tshul 'dir mthun pa'i cha rkyen gang sbyar dang @088b par gyi phyi mo yi ge zhus dag sogs 'brel thogs kun gyis gnas skabs thams cad du rnam dag khrims kyis rtag tu 'tsho bar shog ngag gi dbang phyug blo bzang grags pa yi bstan pa rin chen dar zhing rgyas pa dang dpal ldan mkhas btsun mchog rnams zhabs brtan cing dge 'dun khrims gtsang chos spyod gong 'phel shog thub pa mchog gi gces mdzod dam pa'i chos 'dul ba'i sde snod bsam 'phel yid bzhin nor 'bral med spyi bor brten mthus 'gro ba kun mngon mtho nges les 'dod dgus rtag 'byor shog rnam dag tshul khrims ri rgyal brtan pa'i spor ting 'dzin sgo phye'i rnam rgyal khang bzang du shes rab mig stong ldan pa'i mthu thob nas srid pa lha min ga-yul las rgyal bar shog tshul @089a * 'di bsgrub la dgyes gzigs ma lhod pa tshangs dang dbang po dkar phyogs skyong rnams dang khyad par rgyal chen rnam mang thos pa'i sras nam yang ga-yel med rtag tu grogs byed shog (ces byang phyogs bstan 'gro'i dpung gnyer gcig tu mtshungs zla ma mchis pa rje btsun dam pa mchog gi gsung las skyes pa'i sras mchog mkhas pa'i dbang po chos rje bla ma ngag dbang dpal ldan gyis mdzad pa'i 'dul ba spyir bstan gyi rnam bzhag 'dul gzhung gsal byed ces bya ba 'di nyid blo gsar rnams la nyer mkho bar dgongs te gzhung brgya smra ba'i dbang phyug nom chi no mon han bla ma rin po che nas rgyu yon sbyor gnang ste par du bsgrubs pa'i tshe skyabs mgon dam pa du ma'i zhabs rdul spyi bor bsten pa'i btsun gzugs gyi na ba ngag gi dbang pos bris pa dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3188</vol>
<tib>bcud len gyi gdams pa rim pa lnga pa</tib>

<col>@003b bcud len gyi gdams pa rim pa lnga pa zhes bya ba 'di ni bya bral ba dge 'dun rgya mtsho dpal bzang pos gzhan la phan par 'dod pa'i bsam pas yi ger bkod pa'o dge'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3188</vol>
<tib>byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i sngon 'gro sbyor ba'i chos drug skal ldan 'jug ngogs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-16a</p>
<col>@015b (ces pa 'di ni dbang phyogs bstan pa'i sgron me cha has kho bo cha kan dge bshes bla ma'i sprul pa'i sku rin po che bstan 'dzin legs bshad rgya mtsho'i gsung gis bskul @016a * ba'i ngor mkhas grub dam pa du ma'i zhabs rdul spyi bos bsten pa rab 'byams pa smras pa blo bzang don grub kyis sug bris su bgyis pa'o) swa sti  gsung rab kun gyi snying po'i bcud nyams len snying por dril ba 'di skal bzang thar 'dod 'jug ngogs su mthong nas sku la byed mchog sprul gyis chos sbyin rgya cher spel ba'i phyir mthun rkyen sbyar te par du bsgrubs dge bas 'jam mgon bla ma'i bstan phyogs dus kun tu rgyas gyur cig  mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3188</vol>
<tib>dbus dang mtha' rnam 'byed</tib>
<p>1a-10a</p>
<col>@010a * bstan bcos dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa 'phags pa byams pas mdzad pa rdzogs so rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang sh'i len dra bo dhi dang zhu chen gyi lo tstsha ba bandhe ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o mangga lam bha wantu zhus dag "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3188</vol>
<tib>dus tshigs kyi mchan 'grel dka' gnad sgo brgya 'byed pa'i lde mig </tib>
<p>1a-30a</p>
<col>@030a ces dus tshigs kyi mchan 'grel dka' gnad sgo brgya 'byed pa'i lde mig zhes bya ba 'di ni snga sor yig char drangs pa'i gzhung 'ga' la zur mchan btab pa mthong bas rkyen byas te dad brtson rnam dpyod ldan pa dge slong blo bzang dkon mchog dang blo gsal chos la 'dun pa dge slong ngag dbang tshangs pa gnyis kyis 'phro rdzogs par byed dgos zhes bskul ba ltar slar bcos bcug dang mgo mjug tshad par byas te btsun gzugs ngag dbang dpal ldan gyis nyin byed dbang po nang so'i dga' mar dgyes mgur rol pa'i dus su blo gsal mkhas mang 'byung gnas khal kha khu re chen mor 'khrigs chags su bkod pa 'dis kyang rgyal bstan rin po che dar zhing rgyas pa'i rgyur gyur cig  "</col>

<item>

<tib>'jigs byed kyi bsnyen yig 'phrin las lhun grub zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@040b (zhes kun gzhi'i mtha' dpyod lung rigs nor bu'i do shal zhes bya ba 'di ni skyabs mgon rdo rje 'chang chen po'i drung sa nas legs bshad brgyud mar bsgrogs pa'i dga' tshal zhes med 'dogs mdzad pa dang don mthun pa'i grwa tshang rin po che theg bshad sgrub gling gi dreng nges rnam 'byed kyi 'dzin grwa gong 'og gsum gyi thos bsam don du gnyer pa rnams kyis kun gzhi'i dka' 'di ni tshig don shin tu gzab pa'i dka' zhing gzhan ma rang phyogs kyi yig cha yang ma rnyed par 'dug pas dpyod pa'i sgo gtong ba'i bgyis dgos zhes yang yang smra ba la brten wa skyes seng ger brdzu ba 'jam dpal gzhon nus sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge tshul ye shes tshul khrims kyis bgyis pa 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan du gyur cig ) ` aom swa sti rnam grol bshad sgrub bstan pa'i 'byung gnas mchog rnam 'dren rje btsun dam pa'i gdan sa cher rnam mang 'gro la chos sbyin spel slad du rnam dag dpar gyi 'phrul bzang deng 'dir bsgrubs "</col>

<item>

<tib>byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i brgyud pa gsum gyi bla ma rnams la gsol ba 'debs shing nges 'byung byang sems yang dag pa'i lta brgyud la skye ba'i 'dod gsol dang bcas pa chos kyi sgo 'byed ces bya ba</tib>

<item>

<vol>3193</vol>
<tib>shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtha' dpyod nor bu'i phreng mdzes mkhas pa'i mgul rgyan las skabs brgyad pa</tib>
<p>1a-106a</p>
<col>@105b (ces 'khrul sel gangg'a'i chu rgyun ma pham zhal lung zhes bya ba 'di yang dge bshes shes rab kyi tshogs su 'phrin las 'bal gtam cung zad byas par brten nas gzhung lugs rab 'byams smra ba skal ldan blo bzang dang dka' chen bcu sogs smra ba rgya mtshan bkra shis gnyis kyis nan cher bskul ba la brten nas sde snod gsum dang rgyud sde bzhi dang sgra tshang sogs kyi sgo nas rang gzhan gyi grub mtha' rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dge slong mang du thos pa 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i rdo rjes bris 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus kun tu rgyas par gyur cig</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3193</vol>
<tib>shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtha' dpyod nor bu'i phreng mdzes mkhas pa'i mgul rgyan las skabs bzhi pa</tib>
<p>1a-120a</p>
<col>@120a * aom swa sti rgyal gsung snying po sher phyin man ngag gi bzhi pa'i skabs kyi dgongs don dka' gnad kun dri med lung rigs lam nas legs drangs pa'i legs bshad 'od stong 'bar ba'i nyin byed 'di skyabs mgon dam pa rgya yag mkhan po yis mi zad chos sbyin phyogs brgyar spel ba'i slad gang mkho'i mthun rkyen bzang po legs sbyar te sku 'bum byams pa gling du par du bsgrubs 'dis mtshon dge bas skyabs mgon de nyid kyi zhabs pad brtan cing mdzad 'phrin phyogs brgyar rgyas sku dpon phyag mdzod dpon ga-yog 'brel thogs rnams sku bzhi'i go 'phang ring min thob gyur cig  mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3193</vol>
<tib>shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtha' dpyod nor bu'i phreng mdzes mkhas pa'i mgul rgyan las skabs drug pa</tib>
<p>1a-6a</p>
<col>@006a * (aom swa sti tshul 'di rigs rus dpal gyis mngon mtho ba'i aer te ni gung 'jigs byed rdo rje dang bstan la rab gus dpon mo sgrol dkar bsrung thu su lag chi dbang ldan rdo rje dang dad ldan dpon mo bsod nams 'phel rnams kyis lhag bsam dag pas rgyu yon legs sbyar te chos sde chen po sku 'bum byams gling du rab yid sa sprel lo la par bskrun mthus mi rje yum sras nye 'brel ltos bcas kun gnas skabs mi 'dod nyer 'tshe kun zhi zhing tshe bsod stobs 'byor mnga' thang rigs brgyud 'phel 'phral yun bsam don yid bzhin 'grub par  shog  dge legs su gyur cig  "</col>

<vol>3195</vol>
<tib>dbyangs can dgyes glu'i mchan 'grel snyan ngag kun gyi 'jug sgo zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-26a</p>
<col>@026a * (bla ma'i gnas skabs ni bla ma'i bka'i gnas skabs kun gzigs lnga pas mdzad pa'i dbyangs can dgyes glu'i brjod byed tshig gi lung tsam gyi brgyud pa yod kyang brjod bya don gyi rgyud pa rgyun chad pas yid gting nas skyo ste sgo sna tshogs nas thabs gtugs nas dang snyan ngag gis bon tsam tshugs na cim rung snyam du smon pa'i yid kyis bskul te bka' bcu blo bzang bkra shis kyis bris pa'o 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par 'gyur cig  @026b aom swa sti bod yul aa mdo'i mkhas rnams kyang 'grel pa ma brtsoms lus pa yi shin tu rtogs dka'i gnas 'di la 'grel pa brtsoms pa ngo mtshar ro bstan pa rdzogs ldan nyin dus su ma byung mtha' 'khob mtshan mo ru ngo mtshar nyi ma 'di shar pas mkhas kun dga' ba'i me tog rgyas par bskrun rnam dkar dge tshogs mthus bstan 'dzin dam pa zhabs pad brtan bstan pa'i 'gal rkyen kun zhi nas bstan pa yun ring gnas gyur cig  (ces pa 'di ni pandi ta'i btags ming gis sgro 'dogs pa blo bzang thub bstan nyi mas bris pa'o hal kha ching su tsug thu'i khu ri dge ldan bshad sgrub bstan pa rgyas pa'i gling du par du bsgrubs so</col>

<col>@034a * (zhes pa 'di ni mtshan brjod par dkar ba don gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te ^ bka' drin mtshungs med mkhan po blo bzang bsod nams dar rgyas dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas  rab byung bco lnga'i nang gi don grub ces pas mo lug lo'i hor zla bzhi pa'i mar ngo'i tshes brgyad nas mgo rtsams te rang cag slob ma rnams la rgyal ba'i gsung rab mtha' dag gi snying po bsdus pa'i byang chub lam rim che ba'i bshad lung stsal ba'i skabs kyi gsung gi cha shas las brjed pa rnams bla ma la yang zhus pa dang chos grogs dag la dris pa dang dge bshes blo bzang bde legs dge bshes rten 'brel dge bshes blo bzang shes rab sogs kyi yi ger bkod pa las kyang bsdus te dam pa'i chos la gcig tu gzhol ba'i dad brtson dad ldan pa rnam dpyod mchog tu yangs pa'i slob dpon blo bzang rdo rje zhes bya bas rab dkar lha rdzas dar ser po dang bcas bskul ba dang gzhan yang grogs rnams kyis kyang bskul ba'i ngor dka' bcu chos rgyal zhes bya bas bris pa'o 'dis kyang 'jam mgon rgyal ba gnyis pa'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  bkra shis par 'gyur cig  dge'o</col>

<item>

<tib>pan chen bsod nams grags pas mdzad rgyud bla ma'i tikka</tib>

<col>@051b (ces theg pa chen po'i rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos 'grel ba dang bcas pa'i dka' 'grel gnad kyi zla 'od ces bya ba 'di ni yongs 'dzin dam pa don yod dpal ldan pa'i zhal snga nas las ti ka chen gyi steng nas  bshad pa lan gcig thos zhing phyis gzhung 'grel ba bod tik kha yar dang bcas pa la zhib tu bltas nas rgyal tshab rin po che'i rnam bshad kyi dgongs pa bzhin sha'kya'i dge slong spong ba ba bsod nams grags pa'i dpal rnam dpyod mchog gi sdes thub pa'i bstan pa lo nyis stong sum brgya bdun cu rtsa la nye ba le'u bcu'i nang nas ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u'i dus kun ldan zhes pa lcags pho byi ba'i lo la dge ldan brur khad du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dka' bcu 'dzin pa nyi ma bzang po'o 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che sgo thams cad nas phyogs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig 'di'i spar kun dga' chos gling grwa tshang du sgrubs</col>

<item>

<vol>3198</vol>
<tib>rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i bskyed rim dngos grub rgya mtsho</tib>
<p>1a-158a</p>
<col>@158a * (rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i bskyed pa'i rim pa la slob pa'i tshul bsgrub pa'i thabs rnam par bshad pa dngos grub kyi rgya mtsho zhes bya ba 'di ni rgyal ba thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang dang dbyer ma mchis pa'i grub pa'i dbang phyug ^rje btsun thams cad mkhyen pa chos kyi rgyal po tsong kha pa chen po'i zhabs kyi padmo la spyi bos reg pas sde snod gsum dang rgyud sde bzhi'i don mtha' dag dri ma med pa'i rigs pas rnam par phye nas theg pa gsum gyi lam gsal bar byed pa la mkhas pa rnams kyi mdun sar 'jigs pa med pa khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas thob pa phyi dang nang gi grub mtha' rgya mtsho lta bu'i pha rol tu son pa'i btsun pa dge legs dpal bzang pos gtsang nyang stod rigs pa'i 'byung gnas kyis sa'i cha chos grwa chen po legs bshad sgrogs pa'i tshal dpal 'khor sde chen gyi gtsug lag khang chen por legs par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni sde snod dang rgyud sde mtha' dag la sbyangs shing thub pa'i brtul zhugs dri ma med pa la gnas pa'i stan gcig pa blo gros chos skyong gis bgyis so 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che phyogs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  swa sti rgyal bstan pad tshal phan bde'i dri bsung can bshad sgrub 'dab rgyas rnam grol sbrang rtsi'i bcud 'gro kun spyod phyir sku 'bum byams pa gling chos sde che nas chos sbyin char 'di spel sarba dza ga tam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3199</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das mgon po 'od dpag med la mchod cing gsol ba gdab pa'i cho ga dge legs dpal ster zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-32a</p>
<col>@031b (ces bcom ldan 'das mgon po 'od dpag med la mchod cing gsol ba gdab pa'i cho ga dge legs dpal ster zhes bya ba 'di ni phyogs @032a * mthar bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan mi nub par 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen bla ma rab 'byams pa grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis phyogs 'di'i skye dgu'i bsod nams bsog pa'i zhing mchog dam par rgyal ba 'od dpag med kyi sku brnyan che ba gtsug lag khang dang bcas pa zhig bzhengs thog phyag mchod smon lam sogs kyi cho ga'i rgyun 'dzugs rgyur cho ga 'di lta bu zhig cis kyang gsar du bsgrigs dgos zhes 'phrin yig gi lam nas nan cher bskul ba don yod par bya ba'i phyir dam pa gong ma rnams kyis mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas byang sems du ma'i mchod chog gi babs la zhigs nas 'gal med 'khyer bde'i tshul du bla ma dam pa du ma'i zhabs rdul spyi bos len pa'i sgo rmongs rgan bhu su ku pa ^ dam tshig rdo rjes bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni rnam dpyod ldan pa'i rdo rje'i slob bu dge tshul bkra shis rdo rjes bgyis pa 'dis kyang bstan pa dang 'gro ba kun la phan bde rgya chen po 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur cig  dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3199</vol>
<tib>bskal bzang sangs rgyas stong la phyag mchod 'bul tshul mdor bsdus zhig bzhugs "</tib>

<col>@004a * (zhes pa 'di ni rigs dang bsod nams stobs kyis mngon par mtho ba aer te ni da'i chin ho lo che jo non ai thi gel thu mer gen gung no yon tshe ring skyabs mtshan can nas bskal bzang sangs rgyas stong gi sku thang gsar bzhengs mdzad nas dus bzang rnams su mchod chog rgyas pa dang dus rgyun par rang gi nyams bzhes su mchod pa phul te bsags sbyangs stabs bder bya tshul 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes gsung gi bskul ma mdzad pa ltar ban rgan ^ dam tshig rdo rjes dam pa gong ma'i phyag bzhis bzhin bris te phul ba 'dis kyang bstan 'gro yongs la phan pa rgya chen po 'byung bar gyur cig </col>

<col>@004a * (zhes pa 'di ni phyogs mthar rgyal bstan 'dzin skyod spel ba'i bya ba lhur mdzad pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen lha btsun chos rje @004b blo bzang phun tshogs lags nas spyod 'jug gi 'don thabs 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes sa thag ring po nas 'phrin yig gi lam nas bskul ba'i ngor mkhas grub gong ma dag gi gsung la brten nas mkhan po chos rjer 'bod pa'i ban rgan snyom las pa ^ dam tshig rdo rjes sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni blo ldan lha btsun dge tshul blo bzang tshe ring gis bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang bstan 'gro yongs la phan thogs par gyur cig  ) "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3199</vol>
<tib>'phags pa brgyad stong pa sogs sher phyin gyi mdo klog thabs nyung bsdus bde legs kun 'byung zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-3b</p>
<col>@003a * ('phags pa brgyad stong pa @003b sogs sher phyin gyi mdo klog thabs nyung bsdus bde legs kun 'byung zhes bya ba 'di ni tshe yi rig byed 'dzin pa lha btsun blo bzang dpal ldan gyis snga mo nas bskul zhing nye char gus ldan dge slong blo bzang bzang pos bskul ba la brten nas ban rgan ^ dam tshig rdo rjes sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dpyod ldan dge slong byams pa bstan 'dzin gyis bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang skye 'gro yongs la phan rgya cher thogs par gyur cig  dge legs 'phel</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3199</vol>
<tib>'phags pa brgyad stong pa sogs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo sde zab mo klog 'don sogs bgyis pa'i phan yon mdo tsam brjod pa skal bzang dga' bskyed ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-11a</p>
<col>@010b (ces shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa sogs sher phyin gyi mdo sde zab mo klog 'don sogs bgyis pa'i phan yon mdo tsam brjod pa skal bzang dga' bskyed ces bya ba 'di ni dad gus dang dag snang lhag bsam rmad du byung ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa gcod pa bla ma ngag dbang chos ldan gyis rdo rje'i gcod pa'i phan yon go bde ba zhig gyis kyang dgos zhes @011a * nan tan chen pos yang yang bskul ba dang nye char dad gus ldan zhing dge ba la spro ba'i dge slong bzang pos chos sbyin rgya cher spel ba'i lhag bsam rnam par dag pas kun nas bslangs te rgya nag pho brang nas 'phags pa brgyad stong pa'i spar rnying gdan drangs te sgrub sde yhid dga' chos 'dzin 'phel rgyas gling du bzhugs su gsol nas klog thabs dang phan yon 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes nan tan du bskul ba la brten nas sher mdo'i skor spyi khyab tu 'jug pa'i dbang du byas te bhu su gu pa sa ma ya badzra k'irtis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni gsol dpon dge slong bstan 'dzin bzang pos bgyis pa 'dis kyang bstan pa dang sems can la phan pa rgya chen po 'byung bar gyur cig  dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3199</vol>
<tib>sman bla'i mdo chog dang 'brel bar aa ru ra'i stong mchod 'bul tshul kun phan bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-5a</p>
<col>@005a * (ces sman bla bde gshegs brgyad kyi thugs dam bskul ba'i cho ga dang 'brel bar aa ru ra'i stong mchod 'bul tshul kun phan bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba 'di ni bsngags 'os kyi yon tan du mas rgyud phyug pa'i 'cho byed slob dpon dpon blo bzang bstan dar bas 'di lta bu zhig ces kyang dgos zhes rten dang bcas nan tan chen pos bskul bar brten rang gzhan mang po la yang phan par mthong nas drin can rdo rje 'chang blo bzang chos kyi nyi ma dpal bzang pos mdzad pa'i aa ru ra'i stong mchod rkyang pa'i chog nyung du la gzhi byas mdo chog dang sbyar tshul sogs kyi lag len gsal bar bgyis te bla ma dam pa du ma'i gsung gi bdud rtsis 'tsho ba'i btsun gzugs ^ dam tshig rdo rjes sug bris su spel ba 'dis kyang skye 'gro yongs la phan shin tu thogs par gyur cig  aa roksha shu bham</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3199</vol>
<tib>sman bla'i mdo chog gi snying po bsdus pa kha skongs dang bcas tshogs 'don du bsgrigs pa nor bu'i mdzes rgyan zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@014a * (zhes pa 'di ni ^ bka' drin mtshungs med skyabs mgon rje btsun bla ma rdo rje 'chang ye shes don gnyis lhun grub dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis rje nyid kyi gdan sa chos sde chen po dga' ldan bkra shis tshe 'phel gling gi tshogs mang gi zhal 'don du mdo chog bsdus pa'i thog mtha' bar gsum du ngag 'don kha skong 'di ltar gyis shig pa'i zhal bkod mdzad pa zhal slob 'gas zin thor bris 'dug pa phyis su yang rje ram pa de nyid kyi bka' 'bangs tha shal pa mkhan po'i las 'dzin ^ dam tshig rdo rjes zhus dag dang kha skong mtshams sbyor phran bus brgyan te khrigs chags su bkod pa 'dis kyang dpal ldan bla ma dam pa'i thugs kyi bzhed dgongs mtha' dag gegs me lhun gyis grub pa'i rgyur gyur cig  dge legs 'phel)"</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3199</vol>
<tib>ston pa mnyam med bla ma thub pa'i dbang po la mchod cing gsol ba gdab pa'i cho ga'i khrigs rim bde legs kun khyab ces bya ba</tib>

<col>@019a * (ces ston pa mnyam med bla ma thub pa'i dbang po la mchod cing gsol ba gdab pa'i cho ga'i khrigs rim bde legs kun khyab ces bya ba 'di ni sa skyong mi'i dbang po lugs zung mkhyen pa'i spyan ldan aer te ni gur no yon [???] ldan lha [???] podhi su ka bcas nas thub pa'i dbang po la stong mchod 'bul tshul zhig cis kyang dgos zhes gsung gis bskul ma mdzad pa don yod par bya ba'i phyir dang deng dus rang gzhan mang po la'ang phan par bsams nas ban rgan snyoms las pa ^ dam tshig rdo rjes bla ma dam pa rnams kyis mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas byad sems spyi byi thag gi mchod chog sogs lag zhigs te 'gal med 'khyer bde'i lugs su bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni dge bshes chos khrims pa dpyod ldan dge slong blo bzang shes rab kyis bgyis pa'o dge legs 'phel</col>

<item>

<item>

<vol>3200</vol>
<tib>khyab bdag 'khor lo'i mgon po ngag dbang blo bzang rgya mtshos 'khrungs rab gsol 'debs bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col>@003a * (ces pa 'di ni yongs kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po gling smad zhabs drung rin po ches bka' stsal ba dang du blangs te phyogs myul gyi rgyal khams pa blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos dpal ldan 'bras spungs kyi gzims chung nyi 'od kyi 'khyil bar sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge tshul blo bzang phun tshogs so</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3200</vol>
<tib>khyab bdag 'khor lo'i mgon po rje btsun blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po la bstod cing gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshul don gnyis lhun grub zhes bya ba bzhugs s+ho "</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col>@003a * (de ltar rgyal ba thams cad kyi mkhyen brtse nus gsum gyi bdag nyid bcag cag rnams la bka' drin 'khor mtha' ma mchis pa khyab bdag 'khor lo'i mgon po ^rje btsun blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po la bstod cing gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshul 'di yang gang gi rnam thar la mi phyed pa'i dad pas kun nas bslang ste rang nyid skyes sbyangs yon tan gyis dben kyang dam pa'i mtshan gyis byin gyis rlabs pa rgyu mtshan du byas nas mgrin bzang gzig wags gyon pa'i ngang tshul can sh'akya'i rjes 'jug ^blo bzang thub bstan dbang phyug 'jigs med rgya mtshos dus kyi pho nya zhes pa sa pho rta'i lor dang rten du rje btsun bla ma dam pa de nyid kyi sku brnyan bzhengs skabs snron zla ba'i tshes bcu dgu'i nyin sug bris su bgyis pa 'dis kyang 'gro kun theg pa mchog gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis rjes su 'dzin par gyur cig </col>

<tib>gsang sngags kyi tshul khrims kyi rnam bshad dngos grub kyi snye ma zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@067b (ces byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi bslab pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul rnam par bshad pa dngos grub kyi snye ma zhes bya ba 'di ni rdo rje theg pa'i bslab bya la snying nas slob par 'dod pa mang po dang 'jig rten mgon po chos kyi rje 'bri gung pa zhes yongs su grags pa'i gdung rgyud du 'khrungs nas 'gro ba du ma'i 'dren par gyur ba gu shri chen po don grub rgyal po ba dang rig pa 'dzin pa'i sde snod la sbyangs pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po chos sgo ba bkra shis rin chen pa dang mdo sngags kyi bstan pa ma lus pa'i gnad ji bzhin du mkhyen nas gcig tu bstan pa rin po che'i khur chen po 'khyer zhing bslab pa rin po che la ches cher gces spras su mdzad pa'i yongs su rdzogs pa'i bshes gnyen chen po skad gnyis smra ba skyabs mchog dpal bzang po'i gsung gis nye bar bskul ba'i don du sh'akya'i dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyis sngags kyi gzhung rab 'byams las btus nas @068a * byang rwa sgreng rgyal ba'i dben gnas kyi yang dgon brag seng ge'i zhol gyi ri khrod du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni nang rig pa'i sde snod gsum dang gtan tshig rig pa'i tshul la spobs pa dge ba can sdom brtson dar ma rin chen no 'di la brten nas kyang bstan pa rin po che rgyas par gyur cig  chos sbyin rgya cher spel phyir dga' ldan phun tshogs gling du par du bsgrubs sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3243</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub la brten nas ku su lu yi tshogs bsogs sam bdud rtsi dkar 'gyed zhes grags pa rang lus mchod sbyin bya tshul</tib>
<p>1a-3b</p>
<col>@003b ces rta mgrin gsang sgrub la brten nas lus sbyin byed tshul 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes cha har ku lu shar nas dpyod ldan zhabs drung blo bzang don grub kyis lta ngar dri med rin chen gnyis ba srang gang dang bcas nan tan du bskul ngor ku s'a li dharma badzra gyis dam pa gong ma'i man ngag bzhin sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni drung yig ngag dbang bstan 'phel gyis bgyis pa'o swa sti tshul 'di dge slong thabs mkhas rgya mtsho yis chos sde bde chen lhur grub gling mchog tu rgyu rkyen sbyar te nga bar du bzhengs pa'i dges 'gro kun bla med byang chen myur thob shog ces sh'a sa dha ras sug bris su bgyis pa'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3243</vol>
<tib>skyabs 'gro'i khrid yig thub bstan sgo 'byed ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-13b</p>
<col>@013b ces skyabs 'gro'i khrid yig thub bstan sgo 'byed ces bya ba 'di ni rang gi slob bu lung rigs smra ba au cu mu chin dge slong dkon mchog mar 'phel gyis yang yang nan gyis bskul ngor rigs bryga'i khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa pandi ta dkon mchog 'jigs med dbang po'i sde yab sras rnams kyi bka' 'bangs tha shal ba ban chung rigs smra ^dkon mchog rgyal mtshan gyis dge ldan bstan pa 'phel rgyas gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dpyod ldan dge slong 'jigs med grags pas bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang 'gro kun bstan pa'i sgor 'jug par gyur cig  'di yang chos sde chen po bkra shis chos 'khor lhun po gling nas par du bsgrubs pa'o mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3243</vol>
<tib>smon tshig phan bde'i char 'bebs</tib>
<p>1a-2b</p>
<col>@002b (ces cang cung pi li'i shog gi dge slong blo bzang dar rgyas dang rab 'byams dge slong blo bzang mchog grub gnyis nas rgyud sbyar gyis byams khang chen mo'i khyams ra'i nang du byams pa dam bcas pa'i gzungs bye ba phrag lnga gzungs gzhug tu bzhugs pa'i chos 'khor che chung nyes brgyad dang bzhi gsar du bskrun pa'i dge 'bras bsngo tshul 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes rin chen gnyis pa'i mandal sne 'dogs dang bcas bskul ma byung ba'i ngor ^rje btsun dam pa'i ming can sh'akya'i blo bzang tshul khrims 'jigs med bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan nas rtsom pa'i tshig zlos skyon yod med ya shes par rang blo gang shad du sbyar ba'o yi ge pa ni khu bu chos rje mkhan po dge slong ye shes dge legs so</col>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3246</vol>
<tib>'dul ba'i sde snod mtha' dag gi dgongs pa phyin ci ma log par 'grel bar byed pa'i legs bshad skal bzang nor bu'i phreng ba zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-296a</p>
<col>@295b ces 'dul ba'i sde snod mtha' dag gi dgongs pa phyin ci ma log par 'grel bar byed pa'i legs bshad skal bzang nor bu'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ^sh'akya'i dge slong bde legs nyi mas ser theg chen gling du sbyar ba'o aom swa sti sku gsum bdag nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang theg gsum spangs rtogs zhi gyur dam pa'i chos bslab gsum rgyan ldan rig grol dge 'dun te mchog gsum rin chen dam pas shis pa stsol thub dbang thugs kyi chu gter las 'ongs pa'i nyes ltung dri ma dag byed gang g'a'i rgyun lus can phan bde zhing sar legs drangs nas bshad sgrub nyi mas skyong mdzad gang der ? lab gcig mkhyen pa'i gter chen gyis mthon mthing ral ba'i zur phud lnga dor te ngur smrig gar gyis rnam rol shing gi rtse chos sde chen po sku ? @296a * nad don rig pa'i lus stobs yongs rdzogs shing tha snyad rig pa'i mche sder rab ga-yo ba thub bstan gangs ri'i spo la gnas 'cha' ba'i bshes gnyen gdong lnga'i dbang po gang de yis dad pas mthun rkyen rlabs chen sbyar ba las rab 'byams smra ba ngag dbang blo bzang dang dge slong chos 'phel dar rgyas rnam gnyis kyis bkod khyab lhur len bgyis te par bskrun skabs gzhung lugs smra ba shes rab gong 'phel dang smra ba'i khyu mchog bzang po 'phrin las dang dad brtson ldan pha ngag dbang blo gsal te dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyis zhus dag mdzad de yi mthu las mi mjeng zhing gi mgon rnam 'dren bur ma shing pa'i lung rtogs kyi bstan pa spyi dang khyad par tsong kha pa'i zhwa ser ring lugs dar zhing rgyas gyur cig rtag tu nyer zhi zhi dul dran ldan pa'i blang dor la mthun mu shun pa'i grogs bsten nas bzo yig mi 'tshe 'tshe ba rnam dag gis khrims las mi nyams nyams rtogs 'phel bar shog ma btsal tshe 'di'i lto gos rnyed tsan gyis mtshim mngon mtho nges legs thob pa'i rgyu ma smad tshul khrims them skas la 'jogs nas ma nor lam bzang mchog la reg par shog legs sbyang gtsang ma'i gang g'a'i rgyun bzang po gnas skabs mngon mtho rlabs phreng rab ga-yo zhing mi shes rmongs pa'i rnyog chu'i rgyun bcad de mthar thug byang chen rgya mtshor 'jug par shog ces bshes gnyen dam pa rab 'byams pa byams pa 'od ldan gyis par du bsgrubs pa' smon tshig tu dbyangs can bzhad pa'i blo gros kyis bris pa'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3247</vol>
<tib>chos mngon mdzod kyi tshig le'ur byas pa'i 'grel pa mngon pa'i rgyan ces bya ba las dum bu gsum pa</tib>
<p>1a-102a</p>
<col>@101b chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi 'grel pa mngon pa'i rgyan ces bya ba rgyal ba'i bstan pa lnga brgya phrag bdun pa'i mthar nye ba na shes bya rnam par 'byed pa'i blo gros mtshungs pa med pas thub pa'i bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin cing thugs rje dang 'phrin las kyi dpal 'byor bzang pos skye dgu rnams smin cing grol bar mdzad pa bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po rin po che dang shes bya'i nam mkha' la mkhyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rgyas shing snyan grags kyi 'od zer gyis phyogs ma lus pa khyab par gyur bas sdom brtson mkhas pa rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bur gyur cing gangs can gyi rgyud kyi gnas brtan chen po mchims thams cad mkhyen pa la sogs pa'i zhabs kyi rdul rnyog pa med pa spyi bos len pa mang du thos pa sh'akya'i dge slong 'jam pa'i dbyangs @102a * kyis dpal sa skya'i chos grwa chen por dbu brtsams nas sa'i dbang phyug rgyal po chen po'i pho brang tsod tu'i mkhar du legs par sgrub par byas pa'o dge mtshan bcu ldan bkra shis dbyar rnga rgod mdo sngags chos kyi gru char dal gyis babs rnam grol 'bras bu 'phel ba'i gling chen du 'dzad med dbar gyi gangga'i rgyun 'di sgrubs "</col>

<p>1a-10b</p>
<col>@010b (ces ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro seng ge'i gdong pa can gtso 'khor gsum pa'i rjes gnang bya tshul gyi cho ga thun mong ma yin pa mi 'jigs dpa' mo'i zhal lung zhes bya ba 'di ni yongs kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa 'ga' zhig gis bskul ma mdzad pa dang du blangs te rje btsun chos kyi rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos mdzad pa'i yig cha'i dgongs don gzhir bzhag pa la phyag len gyi rim pa shin tu gsal zhig lag tu blang bde bar rig sngags 'chang ba'i btsun pa ^dam tshig rdo rjes sbyar ba 'dis kyang dpal ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro mas rnam kun rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur cig </col>

<tib>yi dam rgyud sde bzhi'i lha rnams kyi bsam gtan sgrub mtshad bya tshul gyi tho yig ras bris kyi nyer bsdus bya tshul bcas pa</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3253</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma dbang chen rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa'i sgrub chen gyi khog dbubs dngos grub rgya mtsho'i dga' ston zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-48a</p>
<col>@047a * (ces lhag pa'i lha mchog bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma dbang chen rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa'i sgrub chen gyi khog dbubs dngos grub rgya mtsho'i dga' ston zhes bya ba 'di ni sngon chad dpal ldan 'dar 'phyar gyi brgyud 'dzin kun mkhyen sus sra da ba yab sras la sogs pa'i sku dus nas re zhig gi bar du yi dam 'di'i sgrub chen gyi phyag srol dar so che bar byung na yang dus kyi @047b dbang las rim gyi lag len gyi rgyun nyag phra bar song gshis deng dus phyogs 'dir yang gsang bsnyen bsgrub tu grags pa'i tshogs sgrub zhag sbrel mang por byed mkhan mang bar 'dug la phal mo ches sgrub rten dang dkyil 'khor sogs dgos mi dgos kyi rtog dpyod dang ba ngag mdun la brten nas sgrub pa sogs kyi rnam dbye ci yang med par las gzhung gyer te sngags bgrang ba tsam la snying por 'dzin pa las sgrub pa'i sbyor dngos mjug gsum gyi rnam pa dod pa cher mi snang zhing sgrub chog tshad ldan don du gnyer ba 'ga' mchis na'ang rtsa ba'i sgrub gzhung bsdus la brling zhing yig rnying rnams 'thor thabs su gnas pas mthong brgyud kyi phyag bzhes la ltos dgos pa dang lugs 'di'i cho ga'i 'gros la cha rgyus zhan pa sogs kyis lag len gyi rdo ma thog par brtan da lta sgrub chen gyi cho ga'i 'dra 'bag rtsam yang nub tu nye ba'i skabs 'dir yi ge 'di lta bu zhig byung na snyigs dus kyi bstan pa spyi sgos la phan pa'i cha rkyen du 'gyur ba'ang srid snyam nas bla ma lha la gsol ba btab ste gnang ba zhus par byas nas slob dpon pad+mas mdzad pa'i gzhung bla na med pa sgrub pa'i byang bu nyid gzhir bzung lo chen bee ro tsa na'i bsnyen sgrub skor gyi zhal khrigs rnams dang kun mkhyen dpal ldan sengges mdzad pa'i dbang chen sgrub pa'i tho yig sngon 'gro'i skor gyi yig rnying kha 'thor ba dang bcas pa rnams gung bsgrigs kha 'gengs dgos rnams bka' gter ci @048a * rigs pa'i rtsod bral gyi gzhung nang mthun kho na dag las gang 'os su blangs bla ma brgyud pa'i phyag bzhes zhal gdams sogs kyis kyang legs par brgyan nas shin tu gsal zhing lag tu blang bde bar dpal ldan bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin kho nas 'tsho zhing yi dam gyi lha 'di nyid la snying nas skyabs su 'dzin pa'i rmongs btsun ^dam tshig rdo rje grags bzang gis dpal lha ldan gyi gnas su sa ga zla ba'i yar tshes bzang po la legs par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni sdom brtson dge slong blo bzang nam mkha' rdo rje'o 'dis kyang 'jam mgon rgyal ba'i mdo sngags bshad sgrub kyi bstan pa dri ma med pa 'di nyid nam yang mi nub cing phyogs dus gnas skabs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par byed nus par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3253</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen rta mgrin bde gshegs 'dus pa'i las byang dregs pa kun 'dul zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-12a</p>
<col>@012a * (ces bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen rta mgrin bde gshegs 'dus pa'i yas byad dregs pa kun 'dul zhes bya ba 'di ni gted gzhung rtsa bar gab 'khrugs 'thor bu'i tshul du las byang gi sa bon tsam lam mi gsal zhing sngon chad gsal byed lhan thabs kyi yi ge'ang ma byung gshis deng sang gter gzhung tsam gyis lag tu len bka' bar mthong nas rang gzhan gyi nyams len pa phan 'dod kyi bsam pas kun nas blangs te bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin las zab rgyas kyi gdams pa mang du thob pa'i rgyal khams myul ba'i btsun gzugs ^dam tshig rdo rjes gter gzhung rtsa ba gzhir bzung zhing gzhal yas khang dang lta'i mngon rtogs rnams ngag 'don du 'dus pa bde phyir tshigs bcad du bsgrigs dgongs par 'gro des kyi lugs bsdebs cung zad dang kha 'gengs par 'o ma brnams rigs mthun gyi gzhung rnams las bskabs su gdab pas blangs ste cha lag tshang zhing 'khyer bde bar bkod pa'o dge legs 'phel lo</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3253</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa'i rnal 'byor la brten nas byad 'grol gyi gdams pa zab mo lag tu blang tshul mdor bsdus su bkod pa 'ching ba kun 'grol zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-12a</p>
<col>@012a * (zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa'i rnal 'byor la brten nas byad 'grol gyi gdams pa zab mo lag tu blang tshul mdor bsdus su bkod pa 'ching ba kun 'grol zhes bya ba 'di ni rang gzhan gyi lag len du nye bar mkho ba'i slad du ^btsun gzugs dam tshig rdo rjes dam pa gong ma'i phyag bzhes man ngag las ji ltar byung ba ltar 'khyer bde bar bkod pa kun la phan pa'i rgyur gyur cig  sarba mangga lam</col>

<item>

<item>

<vol>3253</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen yang gsang khros pa khrag 'thung lha dgu'i sgo nas gtor bzlog bya tshul gyi cho ga sgrigs rdo rje'i thog mda' zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3253</vol>

<item>

<col>@012a * (ces bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa'i gtor ma'i dbang bskur bya tshul gyi cho ga lag tu @012b blang bde bar bkod pa byin rlabs char 'bebs zhes bya ba 'di ni sngon chad dgong ma'i gsung rgyun dang phyag bzhes khon las yig chags la ba zhig ma byung gshis deng sang rang gzhan gyi lag len du 'di lta bu zhig nye bar mkho bar mthong nas rta mgrin 'di nyid kyi sgos gzhung gtor ma'i las tshogs bcu bdun pa'i nang tshan gtor dbang gi tho yig nyid gzhir bzung bla ma brgyud pa'i phyag bzhes kyis gsal bar byas te bla ma dam pa du ma'i bka' drin las lhag pa'i lha mchog 'di nyid kyi smin grol gyi gdams pa mang du thob pa'i btsun gzugs ^dam tshig rdo rjes dben gnas byang chub gling du nye bar sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni bla ma lha la mi gyed pa'i dad pa dang ldan zhing rnam dpyod yangs pa'i dge sbyong nam mkha' rdo rje'o 'dis kyang snyigs dus kyi bstan pa dang 'gro ba la shin tu phan thogs par gyur cig de yang lo chen bee ro'i rnam 'phrul chos kyi rgyal po gter bdag gling pas lhag pa'i lha tshogs rab 'byams kyi sgrub thabs rjes gnang gi cho ga 'dod 'jo'i bum bzang gi nang du gtor dbang 'di nyid dgod dgos par dgongs te de'i brgyud yig gi gras su 'di'i brgyud rim bkod par mdzad byang cho ga dngos kyi gsung rtsom ma grub par bzhag 'dug pa dgongs gzhi dang rten 'brel khyad par can du go zhing de yang deng sang skabs su bab cing ded cag gi bgo skal lta bur mthong nas bgyis pa 'di 'dod 'jo'i bum bzang gi kha 'gengs su 'os pa'ang yin no dge legs 'phel</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3253</vol>
<tib>dpal rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa'i 'phrin las dang 'brel bar skongs bshags bya tshul 'khyer bde rtsa gsum dgyes skong dag byed bdud rtsi zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-18a</p>
<col>@018a * (ces byin rlabs dang thugs rje'i gter chen bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma dbang chen rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa'i 'phrin las dang 'brel bar skongs bshags bya tshul gyi cho ga rtsa gsum dgyes skong dag byed bdud rtsi zhes bya ba 'di ni yongs kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen rdo rje 'dzin pa mkhyen rab mtshan can sogs don gnyer can 'ga' zhig gis cho ga sgrigs 'khyer bde ba zhig cis kyang dgos zhes nan tan chen pos bskul zhing rang gzhan mang po'i lag len du'ang phan par bsam nas skongs bshags kyi gzhung bka' gter tshad ldan du ma dang mkhas shing grub pa'i bla ma dam pa rnams kyi phyag bzhes la brten nas rgyas bsdus 'tsham zhing 'jug pa bde bar ^dge sbyong rig pa 'dzin pa dam tshig rdo rjes lha ldan sbrul pa'i gtsug lag khang gi nye 'dabs zhig tu bla ma lha la tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i mchod pa dang bcas gsol ba btab ste legs par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dad brtson dam tshig dang ldan pa'i rdo rje'i slob bu dge slong blo bzang nam mkha' rdo rje'o 'dis kyang bdag gi tshe 'di'i lus bskyed cing bskyangs pa'i drin can pha ma gnyis kyis gtso byas pa'i nam mkha'i mtha' khyab kyi ma rgan sems can thams cad myur ba nyid du sgrib gnyis byang zhing tshogs gnyis rdzogs te kha sbyor yan lag bdun ldan zu 'jug kun bzang rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang bde blag tu thob pa'i rgyur gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3253</vol>
<tib>dpal rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa'i rab gnas kyi cho ga dge legs kun 'byung gi yon bdag bsgo ba'i mtshams sbyor gyi zur 'debs dge tshogs rab 'phel zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@007b (zhes pa 'di ni rang gi slob ma 'ga' zhig gis 'di lta bu zhig byung na blo dman rnams la phan tshul gyis bskul ba ltar snyoms las pa ^dam tshig rdo rjes sug bris su bgyis pa'o</col>

<col>@006a * (zhes pa 'di ni kho bo dam tshig rdo rjes dpal rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa'i skongs bshags kyi @006b cho ga'i cha lag tu dri med bshags pa'i rgyud las btus te bris pa 'dis kyang rang gzhan thams cad kyi dam tshig nyams chag sags sdig sgrib thams cad myur du byung zhing dag te dngos grub thams cad bde blag tu 'grub pa'i rgyur gyur cig </col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3253</vol>
<tib>khro bo'i rgyal po pad+ma dbang chen rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa'i rnal 'byor la brten nas grib sel bya tshul nyes kun dag byed phan bde'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-7b</p>
<col>@007b (zhes khro bo'i rgyal po pad+ma dbang chen rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa'i rnal 'byor la brten nas grib sel bya tshul nyes kun dag byed phan bde'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba 'di ni rang gzhan gyi lag len tu nyer mkhor mthong nas ^rgyal khams pa dam tshig rdo rjes dam pa gong ma rnams kyi gsung las btus te lag len 'khyer bder bkod pas 'gro ba kun la phan pa'i rgyur gyur cig  mangga lam</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3253</vol>
<tib>mnan gtad rul bshig pa'i gdams pa zab mo sbyor ngan kun 'dzoms zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-8a</p>
<col>@008a * zhes pa 'di ni rigs sngags 'chang ba'i slob bu 'ga'
<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3253</vol>
<tib>nye brgyud lugs kyi bka' brgyad rig 'dzin zhal lung gi nang tshan bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa khrag 'thung lha dgu'i las byang bklags chog tu bkod pa rta mchog zhal lung zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-12a</p>
<col>@012a * (de ltar kun mkhyen ^rgyal ba'i dbang po rdo rje thogs med rtsal gyi gzigs snang nye brgyud kyi chos sde gsang ba rgya can las bka' brgyad rig 'dzin zhal lung gi nang tshan rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa lha dgu'i las byang bklags chog tu bkod pa rta mchog zhal lung zhes bya ba 'di ni btsun gzugs ^dam tshig rdo rjes gzhan phan gyi bsam pas kun nas blangs te rgya can rtsa ba'i gzhung las byung ba rnyid bcos med du khrigs su bsdebs shing kha skong dang mtshams sbyor ci rigs pas brgyan te dben gnas byang chub gling du shing phag sprel zla'i tshes bcu'i dus chen gyi nyin nye bar sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dpyod ldan rgya mtsho legs bshad do dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3253</vol>
<tib>pad+ma dbang chen khrag 'thung rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa'i 'phrin las kyi gzhung dang 'brel bar gdab las kyi rim pa lag tu blang ba'i cho ga bsgrigs rta mchog rngams pa'i bzhad sgra zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-21a</p>
<col>@021a * (ces pad+ma dbang chen khrag 'thung rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa'i 'phrin las kyi gzhung dang 'brel bar gdab las kyi rim pa lag tu blang ba'i cho ga bsgrigs rta mchog rngams pa'i bzhad sgra zhes bya ba 'di ni rang dang gzhan gyi lag len du nyer mkhor mthong nas rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pas las gsung 'jigs med rdo rje'i sgra dbyangs su gsungs pa la gzhi byas zer mi gsal ba 'ga' zhig bee ro'i sbas pa mig 'byed dang mus spang pa yab sras kyi gsung rnams las kha bskangs shing sprom don dang mthun pa'i 'khrug bsdebs zhung brad dang bcas bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin las 'di skor gyi man ngag dmar khrid phyag bzhes dang bcas pa legs par thob pa'i rig sngags 'dzin pa'i gzugs brnyan ^dam tshig rdo rjes rgyas bsdus 'tsham zhar 'khyer bde bar sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dad brtson rnam dpyod dang ldan pa dge slong blo bzang bstan dar gyis bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang bstan 'gror yongs la phan par gyur cig dza yantu</col>

<item>

<vol>3254</vol>
<tib>'dus pa 'phags lugs lha so gnyis pa'i lam rim pa dang po'i khrid dmigs kyi brjed byang mi bskyod mgon po'i zhal lung zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@111a * (ces 'dus pa'i lam rim pa dang po'i brjed byang mi bskyod mgon po zhal lung zhes bya ba 'di yang dus gsum gyi rgyal ba thams cad las kyang nges par thugs rje dang bka' drin mtshungs zla ma mchis pa snyan rgyud rgya mtsho'i mnga' bdag dpal ldan bla ma dam pa mtshan brjod par dka' ba ^rje btsun dkon mchog rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i bka' drin las rim gnyis kyi khrid mnos pa'i skabs brjed tho cung zad bris pa de bzhin yig ger 'khod pa dgos pa'i bskul ma 'debs mkhan mang du byung yang bdag 'dra thun mong pa'i lam gyi sne zin tsam la yang blo sbyangs ma song ba'i gang zag gis snyan rgyud kyi gdams pa 'di 'dra 'god pa la skrags bzhag kyang nye char thugs rje bdag nyid bla ma yab sras rnams kyis bris chog pa'i bka' gnang ba stsal ba mi bskyod mgon po rang gi gsung dang dbyer ma mchis pa'i @111b byin rlabs kho na la brten nas dge slong shes rab rgya mtshos zin tho snga phyi phyogs bsdebs su byas pa la rang nyid sbyangs pa zhan pa'i blo skyon gyis sbags pa dang zhal shes kyi rigs gsal bar bris pa sogs nongs pa mtha' dag bla ma lhag pa'i lha bka' sdod dang bcas pa la snying nas 'chags shing dge bas tshe rabs thams cad du bla ma lhas rjes su bzung ste tshang la ma nor ba'i lam bzang po 'di spyod pa'i snod ldan du gyur nas phyogs bcu'i zhing khams rab 'byams su rgyal ba kun gyi dam chos ma lus pa rgyal ba'i dgongs pa bzhin du 'dzin nus par gyur cig  ) aom swa sti chos srid 'byor ba'i mdzod dang dge bcu ldan dga' ldan rab rgyas zhes bya'i rgyud grwa cher kun mkhyen 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa yab sras kyi thugs rjes chos sbyin 'dzad med rgyun 'di spel mangga lam "</col>
