<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3257</vol>
<tib>rigs dang dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i mnga' bdag khyab bdag rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo bka' drin gsum ldan rje btsun bla ma thams cad mkhyen pa blo bzang chos 'phel dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyi rnam par thar pa dge ldan bstan pa'i nyi 'od ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-209a</p>
<col>@208a * (ces rigs dang dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i mnga' bdag drug pa rdo rje 'chang khyab bdag rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo bka' drin gsum ldan rje btsun bla ma thams cad mkhyen pa blo bzang chos 'phel dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis rnam par thar pa dge ldan bstan pa'i nyi 'od ces bya ba 'di ni skyabs mgon rje btsun bla ma de nyid gser zhal 'tsho bzhugs skabs mdo smad bstan pa'i bdag po btsan po smin grol no mon han hu thog thu chen po dang skyabs rje hor khang gsar sprul pa'i sku rin po che dang las lud bla ma rin po che tshul khrims rgyal ltshan lags bcas nas nan cher gsol 'debs mdzad par brten gong gsal dgu 'grangs zhes bzhi yang la bka' zin zhib rgyas stsal ba dang de rjes sa byi lo ston dus las lung bla ma rin po che 'di phyogs ched yebs thog mchod sdong rin po cher mchod 'bul dang gus pa dang dngos mjal byung skabs kyang gsung rnam kha skong rgyus babs dang bcas byed dgos phebs pa dang de mtshungs ^skyabs mchog khang gsar sprul pa'i sku rgyud smad mkhan bur rdo rje 'chang chen po nas kha skong gsar rtsoms kyis mtshan lam sogs blo nges bkod dgos pa'i bka'i me tog spyi bor lhung ba dang thugs sras @208b lung dkar sprul pa'i sku rin po che sogs skyes chen dam pa du mas nan bskul mdzad cing gzhan yang zhal slob dang sbyin bdag ser skya mang pos yang yang bskul ma mdzad pa'i thog rang nyid kyang dang nas byang chen ma thob kyi bar du bka' drin 'khor mtha' ma mchis pa ^rje btsun rdo rje 'chang de nyid kyi zhabs rdul 'bral med bde chen 'khor lo'i mdzes rgyan du bsten pa'i skal bzang bla med dga' ston du 'gyur phyir ^skyabs mchog thams cad mkhyen pa de nyid kyi sku'i zhng dpon du gyur cing gzhon nu'i dus nas thugs rje dang bka' drin bla na med pas mnyes bzhin rjes su bzungs pa'i sgo gsum bka' 'bangs kyi tha shal pa btsun gzugs snyoms las pa dbyangs can dgyes pa'i rdo rje 'am ming gzhan blo bzang 'jigs med dbang por 'bod pas gong gsal bka' drin rtsal bar rtsa ba'i bzung bsan yig dang bsnyes byang du gsal ba dang gus pa rang gi blo yul du nges pa rnams kyi zur rgyan byas te sgro skur sogs kyi skyon dang bral bar sa glang lo rtsom pa'i dbu btsugs kyang khar skabs su 'du rtsi'i brel ba sna tshogs kyis rim 'byangs su gyur ba las nye char rab byung bco lnga pa'i nang tshan legs sbyar lha'i skad du du rmu kha mah'a tsi nar bing shing bstod 'grel las bod skad du gdong ngan gangs ljongs dbang thang dang bstun pa me pho spre'u lo nor ldan zla ba'i dmar phyogs stong pa gnyis pa lha'i bla ma tshim byed grub pa thogs pa'i 'chi med 'grub pa'i sbyor ba'i 'phrod sbyor phun sum tshogs pa'i nyin bzhang dngul chu'i ro khrod dga' ldan rtse'i ^rje btsun bla ma yab sras kyi gzim phug rdo rje'i pho brang du grub par bgyis pa 'dis kyang ^rje btsun rdo rje 'chang de nyid kyis skye 'pheng @209a * thams cad du da lam ltar dgyes pa chen pos rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur cig ) sarba diksha ya ba pushna ntu "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3258</vol>
<tib>chos dang chos nyid rnam par 'byed pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3258</vol>
<tib>dbus dang mtha' rnam 'byed</tib>
<p>1a-10a</p>
<col>@010a * bstan bcos dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa 'phags pa byams pas mdzad pa rdzogs so rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang sh'i len dra bo dhi dang zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba ban dhe ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o mangga lam bha wantu zhus dag "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3258</vol>
<tib>dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i bla rgyud gsol 'debs byin rlabs char 'bebs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-4a</p>
<col>@004a * (ces dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i bla rgyud gsol 'debs byin rlabs char 'bebs zhes bya ba 'di ni chos sde chen po dgon klung byams pa gling gi rgyud pa'i grwa ba spyi mang gis 'dus pa'i bla rgyud gsol 'debs shu lo ka re rer bla ma gsum re'i mtshan thon pa zhig gyis zhes bskul ba la brten nas ban rgan snyoms las pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan dpal bzang pos deng sang rang cag la dbang rgyun bshad rgyun man ngag gi rgyun gsum ka gang las brgyud pa'i bla ma rnams kyi gsol 'debs smon lam dang bcas pa sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge slong bstan 'dzin chos dar ro bkra shis</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3258</vol>
<tib>dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i ras bris dang bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor sgrub mchod bya tshul gyi chog sgrig dngos grub char 'bebs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-21a</p>
<col>@020b ces dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i ras bris dang bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor sgrub mchod bya tshul gyi chog sgrig dngos grub char 'bebs zhes bya ba 'di ni rje bdag nyid chen po ran gis mdzad pa'i dkyil chog dbang don de nyid rab gsal las rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor sgrub cing mchod pa'i tshul gsal bar bshad kyang ras bris dang bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor sgrub mchod bya tshul mi gsal phun tshogs gling gi sbar ma las kyang de dang 'dra rje 'dul ba 'dzin pas mdzad pa'i bsam gtan sgrub mchod kyi cho ga las kyang ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor sgrub tshul ma bshad ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor sgrub mchod bya tshul gsal bar bshad pa'i yig cha gzhan yang ma mthong zhing deng sang ras bris la brten pa'i dkyil 'khor sgrub mchod dang dbang @021a * bdag 'jug byed mkhan mang bar snang ba dang rang nyid kyis kyang de ltar byed pa la sgrub grogs sogs kyi ngag 'don 'grig pa'i phyir bsgrig ma zhig mkho bar bsam nas dbang don rab gsal dang mkhas grub rin po che'i dkyil chog gi lhan thabs 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i bsam gtan sgrub mchod kyi yig cha sogs gung bsgrigs te rang blos dpog tshod kyis dgongs pa dang mi 'gal zhing lag tu blang bde bar yul byang phyogs kyi mthar 'khyams pa'i ban chung snyoms las pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan gyis 'jam dbyangs gong ma chen po'i rgyal khab be'i cing gi bod chos lha khang du grags par bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni nang don rig pa la legs par sbyangs shing rnam dpyod yangs pa'i rab 'byams smra ba blo bzang nyi ma'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba blo bzang grags pa'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3258</vol>
<tib>dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i sgrub thabs rnal 'byor dag rim ngag 'don du bsgrigs pa blo gsal dga' skyed ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-35a</p>
<col>@034a * ces bdag cag gi dpal ldan bla ma dam pa rigs dang dkyil 'khor kun gyi bdag po khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po shar tsong kha pa blo bzang grags pa'i dpal zhes snyan pa'i grags pa sa gsum na rnam par ga-yo ba de nyid kyis mdzad pa'i dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i sgrub thabs rnal 'byor dag rim tshogs 'don dang de'i phyag len bya tshul mthar chags su bsgrigs pa 'di ni ngag 'don gyi dpe sbar ma dang bris ma ci rigs snang ba'i phun tshogs gling gi sbar ma @034b ngag 'don byed tshul legs shing khyab che bar 'dug na'ang phyag len byed tshul mi gsal ba dang rnal 'byor dag rim dang lhan thabs kyi dpe cha 'dzom zhing rnam dpyod yangs pa rnams la mi dgos na'ang dpe che 'dzom pa dka' zhing 'dzom kyang sdeb mi shes pa'i blo chung bdag lta bu la nag po 'gro shes 'di lta bu lag tu blang bde ba dang dge 'dun 'ga' zhig tshogs nas rnal 'byor dag rim ngag 'don byed tshe phag len 'di bzhin byed dgos pa rje yab sras kyi dgongs pa yin shes lhan thabs bkod par snang bas de bzhin byas pa phan yon che bar bsam nas rang nyid kyi bag chags 'jog pa dang skal mnyam gzhan la'ang phan 'dod kyi bsam pas rnal 'byor dag rim gyi lhan thabs 'dul 'dzin dang mkhas grub kyis mdzad pa gnyis ka mthong ba las 'dir rje rang gis gsang sngags kyi bstan pa'i gnad thams cad bum pa gang byo'i tshul du gang la bstsal bar grags pa'i sras kyi thu bo mkhas grub bstan pa'i nyi ma @035a * dge legs dpal bzang pos mdzad pa'i lhan thabs rgyas par snang bas de ji lta ba bzhin du yul byang phyogs kyi mthar skyes pa'i ban chung gyi na pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan dpal bzang pos 'jam dbyangs gong ma'i rgyal khab chen po be'i cing gi bod chos lha khang du grags par bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni gzhung lugs du ma la blo gros yangs pa'i rab 'byams smra ba blo bzang nyi ma'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba blo bzang grags pa'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  "</col>
</item>

<col>@19b shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan ces bya ba rje btsun byams pa mgon pos mdzad pa rdzogs so rgya gar gyi bandi ta go mi 'chi med dang lo tstsha ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te legs par gtan la phab pa'o rab brjid gser ri'i dbus na rin chen brtsegs bzhin mngon par 'phags pa'i sku byed po dbyangs sgrog las kyang ches snyan gdul bya'i re ba skong ba'i gsung mtha' yas shes bya'i chos rnams ma lus kun tu gzigs pa'i sgrib med thugs rgyal ba'i tog gyur mi mjed snying de lus can kun gyi gtan gyi skyabs skyabs mchog de yi sras kyi thu bo pa sa bcu'i dbang phyug byams chen mgon po zhes grangs med zhing du rmad byung rnam rol gyis @020a * 'gro 'dren de yang go bo'i phyag gi yul gang de'i gsung gi bdud rtsi'i kee la sha yi spor rtse gcig mos pa'i nyin byed dbang po legs shar nas sku gsum nor bus yongs bkad byams chos sde lnga'i chu 'bebs mkhan 'phags pa thogs med de ni drin che lags de nas rim pa bzhin du legs brgyud pa'i theg mchog gsung rab sde lnga'i glags bam 'di gu shri no mon ta la'i zhes bya bas chos sbyin spel phyir dad pas par du sgrubs 'di ltar bsgrubs pa'i dge ba gang thob des rgyal ba'i bstan pa phyogs bcur rgyas pa dang bstan 'dzin rnams kyi zhabs pad rab brtan zhing mkha' mnyam 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal kun sel shog  dge'o bkra shis "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3259</vol>
<tib>bsam gzugs kyi snyoms 'jug rnams kyi rnam par bzhag pa'i bstan bcos thub bstan mdzes rgyan lung dang rigs pa'i rgya mtsho skal bzang dga' byed ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-264a</p>
<col>@263b zhes bsam gtan dang gzugs med kyi snyoms 'jug gi rnam bzhag thub bstan mdzes rgyan lung rigs rgya mtsho skal bzang dga' byed zhes bya ba 'di ni snga mo nas dka' bcu rab 'byams smra ba'i dge bshes lam rim pa mang pos bskul ba dang slad nas ltag phyug no mun han gyi sku'i skye ba dad pa dang shes rab sogs 'phags nor bdun gyis mngon par mtho ba ngag dbang dpal ldan gyis nyin bde dang bcas bkas bskul ba la brten nas don gyi @264a * slad du mtshan nas smos te yongs rdzogs bstan pa'i mnga' bdag sa gsum gyi rin po che gcig bu pa mkhan chen rgyal ba'i dbang po ngag dbang blo bzang rgya mtsho 'jigs med go cha thub bstan lang tsho'i sde'i zhal snga nas kyi zhabs drung nas sdom pa gsum gyi bka' drin sogs chos kyi bdud rtsi'i bsgo skal thob shing khyad par du mdo sngags thams cad kyi bdag po rtsa ba'i bla ma khri rin po che kun mkhyan 'jam dbyangs ngag dbang blo gros rgya mtsho'i zhal snga nas yab sras bzhi dang bstan pa'i gsal byed chen po lam rim pa gsum dang rigs brgya'i khyab bdag sre rdo rje 'chang dang rgyal sras chen po mer gan bla ma sogs yongs 'dzin dam pa rnams kyi zhabs rdul dad pa kho nas spyi bor blangs pas mdo sngags ting 'dzin la rnam dbye tsam go ba'i dge slong mang thos spong ba pa 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i rdo rjes 'dzam gling rgyan drug lta bu'i mkhas mang 'ba' zhig gi 'dus sde gdan sa chen po dpal ldan 'bras spungs kyi nye 'dab bya rgod phung po gnyis pa dpal ri bo dge 'phel gyi rtse mo gar 'dug theg chen gsang ba'i gan mdzod mdo sngags rigs gnas mngon par bkra pa'i lding khang du rnam 'byung gi lo cho 'phrul zla ba'i dkar phyogs rdzogs pa gsum pa'i nyin ga-yar khral du grub par bgyis pa 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus thams cad du dar zhing rgyas par gyur cig  sarba mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3260</vol>
<tib>bstan bcos chen po dbu ma la 'jug pa'i mtha' dpyod lung rigs sgron me zhes bya ba kun mkhyen bla ma 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i rdo rje'i gsung rgyun</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3262</vol>
<tib>phung po gzan sgyur gyi rnam bshad gcod kyi don gsal byed</tib>
<p>1a-200a</p>
<col>@199a * (ces zab mo bdud kyi gcod yul gyi man ngag yum chen mkha' 'gro'i rnam bshad 'di nyid bstan 'gro yongs la sman pa'i slad du gnyan khrod pa dge slong byams pa bsod nams nas lhag bsam gyis kun nas blangs te tam srang nyi shu tham pa dang zho lngas gzhi zung rdo tshe'i chos drung blo bzang nyi ma dang ye shes chos sgron zung nas ^skyabs rje cung sprul rin po che dpal ldan 'chi med tshe dbang grub pa'i dbang po dgongs pa zhi bar gshegs pa'i thugs dgongs zab mo rdzogs zhing 'bral med rjes 'dzin gyi rnam dkar du dmigs tam srang lnga bcu tham pa 'dam spyid khyab pa nas dngul srang gang zho lnga kha bsod gcig 'bras har ga dang chos mdzad rin chen bzang po nas dngul srang lnga @199b rtse zhabs lha khang gnyer rdo rje tshe ring nas kha btags phyi mdzod lnga kha bsod lnga dngul srang gsum bza' zla dman bsod nams nor 'dzom nas phyi mdzod gnyis kha bsod lnga ka phyi bub bzhi ma gnam gang lha mo nas 'bu ras rgya kha'i spang kheb mgo snam gyi mtha' rgyan byas pa gcig rag shar gzim shag nas dngul srang gang zho drug skar lnga dang stag spang yugs gcig gong dkar mkhan zur rje drung lags nad dngul srang gang bcas kyi dngos po gcig bsgril gyi sbar du bskrun pa'i spar byang smon tshig tu 'bras lho pa sprul ming pa ngag dab mkhyen rab bstan pa'i dbang phyug gis sbyar ba'o chos sku yum chen mo'i dgongs pa 'di la brten nas ^rgyal bstan spyi dang bye brag yab rje rgyal ba gnyis pa'i mdo sngags kyi chos tshul ring du gnas shing de 'dzin dam pa rnams sku tshe brtan cing rnam par dkar ba'i 'phrin las yar zlar son par gyur cig 'jig rten kun tu mi dge ba'i rgud pa ring du dor nas chos 'byor bde skyid kyi 'tsho bar gyur cig sems can thams cad kyang tshogs gnyis rdzogs sgrib gnyis byang nas skye ba med pa chos sku yum chen mo'i go 'phang @200a * mngon du byed par gyur cig dge ba 'di yis 'gro ba kun gzhon nu nor bzang ji bzhin du yon tan rgya mtsho lta bu yi bla ma dam pa mnyes byed shog  sarba mangga lam mdor na dpal ldan bla ma'i sku tshe brtan mkhas btsun bstan 'dzin brtan pa'i seng gang bstan pa'i phyir sbyin bdag mnga' thang dar pa yis ma gcig yum chen bstan pa rgyas gyur cig  dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3262</vol>
<tib>zab don snyan brgyud kyi gcod gzhung zab mo gcod kyi man ngag blo gros mig 'byed ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-78a</p>
<col>@077b (ces zab don snyan brgyud kyi gcod gzhung zab mo gcod kyi man ngag blo gros mig 'byed ces bya ba 'di ni chos brgyad ro snyoms kyi spyod pas tshe dang sgrubs pa snyoms par mdzad pa'i gnyan khrod pa dkon mchog rgyal mtshan gyis deng sang du dus kyi gcod par khas 'ches pa phal che ba zhig gis gcod 'di lam rim dang blo slong gi nyams len yin pa mi shes par lha 'dre 'dul ba tsam gyi chos su bzung nas ma cig gi gsung gi 'gal zla kho na byed kyi 'dug pas khyod rang gis gcod gzhung lam rim dang mthun pa zhig rtsom dgos zhes yang yang nan gyis bskul bar rdo rje spun gyi chos ldan gyi bsgo ba bcag par mi nus pas 'bri 'dun yod pa'i thog lam 'di la nus pa phul du phyin pa'i rnal 'byor ba gtsug gi gcod pa ye shes tshul khrims kyis kyang rgyal ba tsong kha pa chen po'i gser sku khyad 'phags mandal lha rdzas @078a * sogs kyi rten du ma dang bcas de bzhin dgos tshul nan tan bskul ba'i ngor sangs rgyas kun 'dus kyi ngo bo kun mkhyen 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa pandi ta dkon mchog 'jigs med dbang po'i sde yab sras nyi zla lta bu rnams kyi bka' drin la brten nas zab mo gcod kyi chos tshul mang du thos pa'i bag chung rigs pa smra ba dkon mchog rgyal mtshan gyis las dang po pa dag la 'jug pa bde ba'i phyir lung 'dren sogs kyi sbros pa ngor te gnad 'gril ba'i tshul du kun mkhyen bla ma yab sras kyis phyag mtshan du bzhes pa'i tshes sde rmad du byung ba dga' ldan rab rgyas gling du bkod pa 'dis 'gro ba thams cad thabs shes gnyis kyi gru gzings la brten nas sku gsum nor bu'i gling du bde blag tu phyir par gyur cig bkra shis par gyur cig dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3263</vol>
<tib>dbu ma la 'jug pa'i bsdus don</tib>
<p>1a-60a</p>
<col>@059a * dbu ma la 'jug pa'i bsdus @059b pa'i don 'di ni mkhyen rab dang thugs rje gzhan dang mtshungs pa med pa sa mtha' yas pa'i 'gro ba la bden pa gnyis kyi de kho na nyid phyin ci ma log pa'i lam du bgrod pa'i dmigs bur gyur zhing khyad par du phyi nang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos rnams snang dus nyid nas mig 'phrul lta bur thugs su chud pa'i bla ma rje btsun chen po skyes mchog red 'da' ba'i zhal snga nas dang sde snod gsum dang rgyud sde bzhi'i dgongs pa'i don mtha' dag rten gyi gang zag gcig 'tshang rgya ba'i lam gyi yan lag tu 'gyur ba la ma rtogs pa dang log par rtog pa dang the tshom gyi dri ma sbangs nas tshad ma'i lam las legs par drangs pa'i sgo nas lam gyi cha yongs su rdzogs pa la rang nyid sgrub pa thugs nyams su bzhes shing de nyid brtse ba'i sgo nas ngag tshig dri ma med pas gdul bya rnams la legs par 'doms pa'i sgo nas rgyal ba rnams kyi dam pa'i chos ma lus pa rgyal ba'i dgongs pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dzin par smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i sems dpa' chen po bla ma rje btsun blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyi zhal snga nas kyi bka' drin las bden pa gnyis kyi rnam par bzhag pa la blo gros kyi snang ba cung zad thob pa rigs pa smra ba'i dge slong dar ma rin chen gyis rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas phyogs thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i sde 'brog ri bo che dge ldan rnam par rgyal ba'i gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dka' bzhi pa kun @060a * dga' legs pa'i dpal lo de yang rgyal tshab thams cad mkhyen pas mdzad pa'i dbu ma la 'jug pa'i sbyor t'i ka 'di nyid bkra shis 'khyil du par du bkod 'dug rung chad lhag gis skyon mang tsam mchis par 'di kar ^skyabs mgon dam pa mi nyag rin po che'i phayg dpe khungs thub zhig yod pa ma phyis byas te par du bsgrubs pa'o ` swa sti rgyal bstan pad tshal phan bde'i dri bsung can bshad sgrub 'dab rgyas rnam grol sbrang rtsi'i bcud 'gro kun spyod phyir sku 'bum byams pa gling chos sde che nas chos sbyin char 'di spel sarba mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3263</vol>
<tib>dus kyi 'khor lo'i nang le'i rnam par dag pa mkhas grub rjes zin bris su btab pa 'phro can</tib>
<p>1a-66a</p>
<col>@066a * swa sti rgyal bstan pad tshal phan bde'i dri bsung can bshad sgrub 'dab rgyas rnam grol sbrang rtsi'i bcud 'gro kun spyod phyir dga' ldan theg chen gling chos sde che nas chos sbyin char 'di spel mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3263</vol>
<tib>mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa nyams su len tshul theg mchog sgo 'byed ces bya ba</tib>

<col>@062a * mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi bshad pa'i srol dum rgyal ba'i ring lugs pa chen po rje btsun dam pa reng mda' ba ku mar @062b ma ti'i zhal snga nas dang dka' bzhi 'dzin pa rin chen rdo rje la thos shing kyad par du mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi lam gyi rim pa chu bo gsum 'dres kyi rim pa jo bo chen po aa ti sha nas brgyud de 'ongs pa 'di snyigs dus kyi thams cad mkhyen pa rin po che blo bzang grags pa'i dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas gsung gi bdud rtsi yun ring po'i bar du myangs nas mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rim pa ji ltar nyams su len pa'i tshul theg mchog sgo 'byed ces bya ba 'di ni mdo sngags kyi gzhung mang du thos pa'i sdom brtson sde snod 'dzin pa du mas bskul nas rigs pa smra ba dge slong dar ma rin chen gyis 'brog ri bo che dge ldan rnam par rgyal ba'i gling du sbyar ba'o yi ge pa ni sdom brtson sde snod 'dzin pa rin chen chos rgyal lo 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa sgo thams cad nas phyogs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  swa sti rgyal bstan pad tshal phan bde'i dri bsung can bshad sgrub 'dab rgyas rnam grol sbrang rtsi'i bcud 'gro kun spyod phyir sku 'bum byams pa gling chos sde che nas chos sbyin char 'di spel mangga lam "</col>

<item>

<tib>dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rdzogs rim rim lnga'i dmar khrid kyi brjed byang mi bskyod zhal gyi bdud rtsi zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-43a</p>
<col>@043a * ces dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rdzogs rim rim lnga'i dmar khrid kyi brjed byang mi bskyod zhal gyi bdud rtsi zhes bya ba 'di yang rim gnyis kyi gdams pa'i bang mdzod 'dzin pa zla bral smra ba'i dbang phyug ^rje btsun thams cad mkhyen pa dkon mchog rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i bka' drin las 'di'i nyams khrid thob pa'i skabs brjed tho cung zad bris pa la phyis su bla ma rdo rje 'chang yab sras rnams kyis de bzhin yi ger bkod chog pa'i bka'i gnang ba spyi bor stsal ba'i byin rlabs kho na la brten nas dge slong shes rab rgya mtshos zin tho snga phyi rnams phyogs bsdebs su byas pa la rang gi blo skyon gyis spags pa dang zhal shes rnams gsal bar bkod pa sogs kyis lam la srib par mi 'gyur zhing tshe rabs thams cad du bla ma lhag pa'i lhas brtse bas rjes su bzung ste dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug bye ba brgya phrag gang nas gshegs pa'i lam bzang 'di dang skad cig tsam yang mi 'bral zhing bstan pa'i snying po dri ma med pa bshad sgrub zung gis sgo nas phyogs dus kun tu rgyas par byed nus par gyur cig  aom swa sti chos srid 'byor ba'i mdzod dang dge bcu ldan dga' ldan rab rgyas zhes ba'i rgyud grwa cher kun mkhyen 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa yab sras kyi thugs rje chos sbyin 'dzad med rgyun 'di spel mangga lam "</col>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3266</vol>
<tib>rgyal chen rnam thos sras kyi gong gnon gyi lha dang la gsal ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje gos sngon can gyi sgrub thabs dngos grub kun 'byung ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-6a</p>
<col>@005b (ces phyag na rdo rje gos sngon can gyis bsgrub thabs dngos grub kun 'byung ces bya ba 'di yang rgyal chen rnam thos sras kyi sgo nas 'phrin las bsgrub pa'i skabs du ma zhig tu nye bar mkho bar mthong nas rang gzhan la phan pa'i sems kyis kun nas blangs te gsang bdag ngur smrig gar rol rje dag gis dbang po 'phrin las dpal bzang po dang kun mkhyen chen po 'jam dbyangs bzhad sprul dkon mchog 'jigs med dbang po'i zhal snga nas sogs dam pa du ma'i zhabs drung nas yi dam 'di nyid kyi rjes gnang legs par thob pa'i ^sh'akya'i dge slong gyi na ba blo bzang chos kyi dbang phyug gis slob dpon 'gro bzang snying pos mdzad pa'i 'di'i sgrub thabs rtsa 'grel dang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan dang mkhas chen ngag dbang chos grags sogs kyi mdzad pa'i rnam thos sras kyi rje gnang gi chog sgrigs dang 'phags sde lo tsa ba'i rnam sras bsgrub thabs dgos 'dod kun 'byung sogs tshad thugs kyi yig cha du mar zhib tu spyad nas sgrub thabs kyi zur sogs so so'i bka' srol ma phyed pa'i gang dran rgyas 'geb lta bu ma yin par 'di nyid kyi srol bka' nyams pa med pa'i lugs su rang gi bsam gtan gyis khang bur mtshams cad dge sbyor gyi thun par zhig @006a * tu sgrigs pa 'dis kyang 'gro kun gsang ba'i bdag pos rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur cig ) phyag na rdo rje'i mngon rtogs 'di 'di phyi'i las kun 'grub byed yin yin kyang las nyon che ldan rnams rnam kun dran shes gsal bar shog badzra tishta:"</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3266</vol>
<tib>rin chen mang sprul rgyal po rnam thos sras kyi bsangs mchod dngos grub char chen 'bebs pa'i sprin gyi rnga bsangs ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-26a</p>
<col>@025b ces rin chen mang sprul rgyal po rnam thos sras kyi bsangs mchod dngos grub char chen 'bebs pa'i sprin gyi rnga bsangs ces bya ba 'di yang bstan bsrungs chen po khyad par 'phags pa 'di nyid la bsangs mchod kyis dgyes pa bskyed cing dngos grub zhu ba'i cho ga rgyas shing cha tshang ba 'di lta bu zhig rang nyid nas 'bri 'dun yod pa'i khar dad brtson lhag bsam dang ldan pa bka' bcu 'phrin las @026a * don yod nas bskul ma byung bas 'tshams sbyar ste gsang bdag ngag gi dbang po dang khyab bdag 'jam dbyangs bzhed sprul sogs yongs 'dzin dam pa du ma'i drin las rgyal po chen po 'di nyid kyi rjes gnang gi rim pa dang lung man ngag sogs 'phran bu 'dzin pa'i ^sh'akya'i dge slong rig pa 'dzin pa'i tha shal pa blo bzang chos kyi dbang phyug gis rab byung bcu gsum pa'i chu phag snon zla'i yar tshes bco lnga'i me tog rnam par bkra ba'i sding khang dge 'phel byang chub gling gi bsam gtan gyi khang bur dge sbyor mtshams bcad kyi thun 'tshams su grub par bgyis pa 'dis kyang rgyal po chen pos 'phrin las ga-yel med du mdzad cing 'gro kun 'phongs pa'i gdung ba zhi nas 'dod dgu'i 'byor ba dbyar mtsho ltar rgyas pa'i rgyur gyur cig mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3266</vol>
<tib>rin chen mang sprul rgyal po rnam thos sras kyi bsangs mchod dngos grub char chen 'bebs pa'i sprin gyi rnga bsangs ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-26a</p>
<col>@025b ces rin chen mang sprul rgyal po rnam thos sras kyi bsangs mchod dngos grub char chen 'bebs pa'i sprin gyi rnga bsangs ces bya ba 'di yang bstan bsrungs chen po khyad par 'phags pa 'di nyid la bsangs mchod kyis dgyes pa bskyed cing dngos grub zhu ba'i cho ga rgyas shing cha tshang ba 'di lta bu zhig rang nyid nas 'bri 'dun yod pa'i khar dad brtson lhag bsam dang ldan pa bka' bcu 'phrin las @026a * don yod nas bskul ma byung bas 'tshams sbyar ste gsang bdag ngag gi dbang po dang khyab bdag 'jam dbyangs bzhed sprul sogs yongs 'dzin dam pa du ma'i drin las rgyal po chen po 'di nyid kyi rjes gnang gi rim pa dang lung man ngag sogs 'phran bu 'dzin pa'i ^sh'akya'i dge slong rig pa 'dzin pa'i tha shal pa blo bzang chos kyi dbang phyug gis rab byung bcu gsum pa'i chu phag snon zla'i yar tshes bco lnga'i me tog rnam par bkra ba'i sding khang dge 'phel byang chub gling gi bsam gtan gyi khang bur dge sbyor mtshams bcad kyi thun 'tshams su grub par bgyis pa 'dis kyang rgyal po chen pos 'phrin las ga-yel med du mdzad cing 'gro kun 'phongs pa'i gdung ba zhi nas 'dod dgu'i 'byor ba dbyar mtsho ltar rgyas pa'i rgyur gyur cig mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3266</vol>
<tib>rje btsun sgrol ma la mandal bzhi mchod kyi sgo nas gsol ba gdab tshul gyi cho ga gsal bar bkod pa 'dod don kun 'grub ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-9b</p>
<col>@009b (ces rje btsun sgrol ma la mandal bzhi mchod kyi sgo nas gsol ba gdab tshul gyi cho ga gsal bar bkod pa 'dod don kun 'grub ces bya ba 'di ni rang gzhan gyi don du sgrol chog yang yang lag tu bstan skabs chog sgrigs 'khyer bde ba zhig dgos tshul byung bar brten mchims kyi rtsa chig gzhir bzhag snar thang pa'i man ngag brgya rtsal ma 'dus pa'i bka' gdams god ma'i yig rnying khungs thub gzhan 'ga' zhig las kyang lag len gyi zhib cha cung zad blangs shing dam pa so sos mdzad pa'i chog sgrigs du ma la yang gzhigs nas 'jug bde bklags chog pa'i tshul du mkhas shing grub pa'i bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin kho nas 'tsho ba'i rgyal khams pa ^dam tshig rdo rjes dpal ri'i dgon gyi nye 'dabs kyi dben gnas su rgyal zla ba'i tshes brgyad kyi nyin sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni rnam dpyod yangs pa'i dge bshes dge slong dh'irh'a yu badzra gyis bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang bstan 'gro yongs la phan thogs par gyur cig bkra shis dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3266</vol>
<tib>rnam sras rta bdag brgyad kyi bkra shis rje tshar chen gyis mdzad pa</tib>
<p>26a-27a</p>
<col>@026b (ces bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa gser gyi ri bo'i spo'i grangs dang ldan pa 'di yang zha lu gser khang gi mkhan po blo gsal gyis sbyar ba dge legs 'phel ka lya na wardhantu ) @027a * na mo gu ru badzra b'a ni bee shra wa na ye rin chen mang sprul rgyal chen ngal bsos po rin chen mchog gsum kun 'dus dpal mgon che rin chen 'dod dgu sde bzhi'i dpal 'byor bdag chos skyong chen po khyod zhabs spyi bos mchod tshul khrims bsrung ba'i skye bo gang dang gang tshul bzhin bsangs mchod chog 'dir 'bad na tshul khrims bslab gsum ldan pa'i sde 'phel zhing tshul mthun chos kyi 'tsho ba 'phel bar 'gyur gnas skabs mthar thug sgrib pa bsangs byed du lhag bsam bzang pos bar 'di 'du bgyis te mchod sbyin bsangs mchod rgya cher spel ba'i mthus chos kyi rgyal po 'gro kun gyis thob shog (ces skyes bu 'bring gi chos skor 'dul ba'i bstan bsrung chos skyong rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras kyi bsang mchod 'di ^dge slong blo bzang thub bstan dbang phyug 'jigs med rgya mtshos par du bzhengs pa'i dge legs kun tu 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>

<vol>3266</vol>
<tib>rnam sras rta bdag brgyad kyi bkra shis rje tshar chen gyis mdzad pa</tib>

<col>@026b (ces bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa gser gyi ri bo'i spo'i grangs dang ldan pa 'di yang zha lu gser khang gi mkhan po blo gsal gyis sbyar ba dge legs 'phel ka lya na wardhantu ) @027a * na mo gu ru badzra b'a ni bee shra wa na ye rin chen mang sprul rgyal chen ngal bsos po rin chen mchog gsum kun 'dus dpal mgon che rin chen 'dod dgu sde bzhi'i dpal 'byor bdag chos skyong chen po khyod zhabs spyi bos mchod tshul khrims bsrung ba'i skye bo gang dang gang tshul bzhin bsangs mchod chog 'dir 'bad na tshul khrims bslab gsum ldan pa'i sde 'phel zhing tshul mthun chos kyi 'tsho ba 'phel bar 'gyur gnas skabs mthar thug sgrib pa bsangs byed du lhag bsam bzang pos bar 'di 'du bgyis te mchod sbyin bsangs mchod rgya cher spel ba'i mthus chos kyi rgyal po 'gro kun gyis thob shog (ces skyes bu 'bring gi chos skor 'dul ba'i bstan bsrung chos skyong rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras kyi bsang mchod 'di ^dge slong blo bzang thub bstan dbang phyug 'jigs med rgya mtshos par du bzhengs pa'i dge legs kun tu 'phel</col>

<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3267</vol>
<tib>byang chub lam gyi rim pa chung ngu'i zin bris blo gsal rgya mtsho'i 'jug ngogs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-276a</p>
<col>@275a * ces skyes bu gsum gyi lam gyi rim pa'i zin bris blo gsal rgya mtsho'i 'jug ngogs skal @0275b ldan yid kyi gdung sel zhes bya ba 'di ni rje bla ma bka' drin mtshungs med blo bzang rdo rje 'chang gi ngo bo mchog gsum kur 'dus kyi rang gzugs grub pa'i dbang phyug blo bzang rnam grol ba dpal bzang po'i bka' cod pan spyi bo'i rgyan du bstsal ba dang rnam kun bla ma'i bka' bzhin sgrub pa'i nye gnas kyi mchog dben sa pa dge slong rnam rgyal bkra shis lags nas kyang bskul zhing rnam kun thugs rje dang bka' drin tshad med pas skyong bar mdzad pa sras bcas rgyal ba thams cad kyi mkhyen brtse nus pa'i gong bu 'gro ba ma lus pa'i skyabs mgon bdag gi drin can rtsa ba'i bla ma don gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te ke'u tshang rdo rje 'chang chen po rje btsun blo bzang 'jam dbyangs smon lam dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas nyid kyi bka'i gnang ba yang legs par 'khrol ba bcas 'od mtshan stong 'bar kun gzigs pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa rje btsun blo bzang dpal ldan bstan pa'i nyi ma phyogs las rnam rgyal dpal bzang po'i bka' drin las rgyal ba'i bstan pa la rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i sdom pa thob pa dang bdag gi shes rgyud chos la bsgyur ba'i phyir bsam bzhin du tha mal ba'i rnam par byon pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen sangs rgyas chos 'phel sogs kyi bka' drin las rgyal ba'i gsung rab la thos bsam gyi bgo skal thob cing rje bla ma bka' drin zla med ke'u tshang @276a * yab sras rnam pa gnyis dang khri chen rdo rje 'chang byang chub chos 'phel khri chen rin po che ngag dbang chos 'phel rje grub pa'i dbang phyug ye shes bstan 'dzin spang dgon rdo rje 'chang ngag dbang chos 'dzin sogs dam pa du mas dgyes nyams kyis rjes su bzung ba'i chos med snyoms las pa dga' ldan the bo sprul skur 'bod pa ye shes thub bstan rgya mtsho zhes bgyi bas rang lo nyer gsum pa kun 'dzin zhes pa sa byi lor dga' ldan rnam par rgyal ba'i gling gi rang shag tu bris pa'o de ltar bris pa la skabs der bris tshar rim gyis rje yab sras zung gi spyan sngar phab ste zhus dag rags rim dang zhib pa slar rje bla ma mchog nyid nas mdzad rtsis kyi jo bo'i rnam thar gyi bar du zhus dag mdzad kyang 'phros rnams rje nyid nas gnang ma thub pa'i tshul gyis phran la bka' gnang bar brten rang lo nyer lnga'i thog tu zhus dag dang bcas slar yang brtson pa'i stobs bskyed nas yig lam du phab pa'o zhal gro "</col>
</item>

<tib>gtor ma brgya rtsa bklags pas don 'grub ces bya ba</tib>

<item>

<vol>3268</vol>
<tib>rdo rje mi 'khrugs pa lha dgu'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ngan song tsha gdung kun sel ga bur gsar pa'i chu rgyun zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-25a</p>
<col>@025a * (ces jo bo chen po dpal mar me mdzad kyi bka' srol la nye bar 'ongs pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mi 'khrugs pa lha dgu'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ngan song tsha gdung kun sel ga bur gsar ba'i chu rgyun zhes bya ba 'di yang nor 'dzin gyi khyon kun la dbang sgyur lugs gnyis la blta ba'i rnam dpyod kyi rtsal dang ldan pa rang gi gam du nye bar bcar ba'i phyag mdzod sa skyod bsod nam rab brtan gyis bskul ba la brten nas dze t'a ra'i rgya gzhung dang 'dzam gling bstan pa'i mnga' bdag khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po tsong kha pa'i gsung rabs rdo rje 'chang chen po'i lam gyi rim pa gnyis dgongs pa gtso bor byas phyogs 'di la tshad mar gyur ba'i mkhas pa rnams kyi legs bshad la brten nas ngag 'don gyi go rim mtha' dag khrigs chags su bsgrigs dmigs pa dang mtshams sbyor gyi rim pa rnams rgyas par bkod ni yi ge mangs pas 'jigs nas khung thub kyi yig cha gzhan dang mthong rgyud kyi phyag len la kha 'phang te rgyal ba rdo rje 'chang 'khon ston chos kyi rgyal po dpal 'byor lhun grub sogs yongs 'dzin chos bzhin spyod pa du ma'i drin las gsang sngags gsar rnying gi rgyud sde'i don ma 'ongs par khong du chud pa'i aa wa dh'u t'i pa za hor gyi btsun pa ngag dbang blo bzang rgya mtsho 'jigs med go cha thub bstan lang tsho'i sdes nyin 'byed dbang po nya khyim du spyod pa'i phyogs phyi ma'i bzang po dang po'i tshes la dga' ldan pho brang mngon par bkra ba'i lding khang du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni suddh'i a'a yu d'irgha'o</col>
</item>

<item>

<col>@025a * (ces gsung rab spyi'i don 'grel rigs gzhung rgya mtsho'i 'jug ngogs bsdus grwa'i rtsa tshig rtog ge'i snying nor zhes bya ba 'di ni rwa sted mkhas mang bsdus grwa la rtsa tshig zhig yod na gsar bu ba tsho la slob gnyer gyi zha ba 'debs su bsdur ram snyam du 'go btsom zhing yod thog chos mthun gus slob dpyod ldan dka' bcu sa blo bzang dpal 'byor gyis rab dkar lha dar dang bcas rtsa tshig 'di nyid cis kyang rdzogs par bris shig ces nan tan du bskul bas kyang mtshams sbyar te ^'dzam gling byad mthar byung ba'i btsun gzugs tog ge ba 'jam dbyangs dgyes pa'i bshes gnyen zhes bya bas dpal ri dge rgyas kyi mdun shod chos grwa chen po bkra shis chos 'byor gling du rab che sa lcags sprel cho 'phrul smon lam gyi skabs su sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge phrug bla ma khus bgyis pa 'di yang ^'jam mgon bla ma'i ring lugs yul dang dus mthar rgyas pa'i rgyud gyur cig  `blo gros 'o mtsho'i 'phre ba kha 'dis tshogs gnyis chu bo char rgyas shing don gnyis lo 'bras smin pa las bla ma mchog rnams mnyes byed shog </col>

<tib>bsdus don zur phud mdzes pa'i pad dkar phreng ba zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@018a * ces bsdus don zur rgyan pad dkar 'phreng ba zhes bya ba 'di ni khri chen nam mkha' bzang po'i yang sprul skal bzang 'jigs med nam mkha' dang gzhan blo gsal ba dag la'ang phan pa'i phyir mtsho byung rol pa'i blo gros kyis rab tshes shing bya mgo zla ba'i dkar phyogs kyi dga' ba dang por mdo sngags chos kyi dga' tshal legs bshad gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen tshogs gnyis rgya mtshos bgyis pa 'di yang thos pa'i sgron me ring du gsal ba'i rgyur gyur cig  * zab rgyas rin chen mdzod la mnga' brnyes phyir aa rig mchod yon dngos po'i rkyen sbyar nas kun gzigs rgyal ba'i zhing mchog sku 'bum du par gyi mchod sbyin mi bzad mdzod du spel shu bham mastu sarba dza ga h'am "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3270</vol>
<tib>byang sems rwa sgreng bas mdzad pa'i tshem bu dmar khrid kyi mchan 'grel dkar bsil mngar ba'i ga bur zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-18a</p>
<col>@017b grub chen tshem bu pa la yi dam gyi lhas gnang ba bla ma dam pa rnams kyi snyan nas snyan du brgyud cing thugs la yon tan khyad par can 'khrungs pa'i zab chos yi dam dmar khrid dam rgyud sde bzhi'i gdams pa zhes bya ba 'di ni bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab rba 'byams la blo gros kyi snang ba rgyas shing bstan pa'i rtsa lag dam par gyur ba mdo stod pa rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos bskul ba'i ngor lung rigs smra ba rwa sgreng bas khro phu'i dgon par sbyar ba'o yi ge pa ni blo ldan dpal gyis bgyis so byang sems rwa sgreng bas mdzad pa'i khrid yig gzhir bzhag bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyi khrid yig nges don snang ba dang 'brong rtse lha btsun rin chen rgya mtsho'i blo gros kyi khrid yig @018a * dag las gong du mthon pa nye bar mkho ba'i legs bshad rnams yig chung gis bar bar du bcug pa'i gdams ngag sum dril dkar bsil mngar ba'i ga bur zhes bya ba 'di yang lha btsun don grub rgyal mtshan gyis spel ba'o bkra shis pa dang dge legs 'phel dge'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3274</vol>
<tib>dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sku gsung thugs yongs rdzogs bsgrub pa'i thabs dngos grub bdud rtsi'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-22b</p>
<col>@022a * (ces dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sku gsung thugs yongs rdzogs sgrubs pa'i thabs dngos grub bdud rtsi'i byung gnas zhes bya 'di ni rigs rus cho 'brang sogs phun sum tshogs pa'i stobs dang dad pa dang gtong ba sogs yon tan gyis phyug pa mtsho sngon @022b jun dbang dkon mchog bkra shis kyis rang nyid rnal 'byor pa dang phyogs de gwa rig la'ang btsugs chog pa'i cho ga mdor bsdus 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba mdzad par brten 'dzam gling mkhas pa'i gtsug rgyan dpal ldan dang po'i sangs rgyas ngur smrig gan gyis rnam par rol pa mkhas grub dge legs dpal bzang pos mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs pad dkar zhal lung dang slar yang mgon de gdul bya'i dpal du 'byon pa pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs bsdus pa sogs dam pa gong ma rnams kyis gsung zhib par brtags dngos gtso bor khams gsum 'gro ba'i bla ma bka' drin gsum ldan rdo rje 'chang chen po dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad kyi spro bsdu'i zhing gyur ba bdag cag kha ba rig pa'i 'dren mchog rje btsun blo bzang skal bzang rgya mtsho'i dpal bzang po'i zhal gyi bum bzang las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das dang pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sgrub thabs sa gzhi byas te khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po shar tsong kha pa'i legs par bshad pa dang mi 'gal ban khyab bdag 'khor lo'i mgon po bka' drin mtshungs med kun mkhyen rgyal dbang mchog gi drung du lugs 'di rtul mtshon gyin dkyil 'khor chen por smin cing grol ba'i bskal bzang thob pa'i ^sh'akya'i dge slong rje btsun blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes sam ming gzhan don yod rdo rje zhes 'bod pas shambha la'i yul du rigs ldan rgyal po rnam gnon chen po sa skyong chen bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi ral ba'i con pan la zhabs kyi sen mo rnam par bkod cing chos bsdad nas khrid bzhugs kyi lkang lo gso lnga pa sprul lo rgyal zla ba'i 'dul tshes nyer gnyis la rdzogs par bgyis pa'i yi ge pa ni dge tshul blo bzang rig grol lo</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3274</vol>
<tib>dpal gyi rdo rje'i sgrub thabs 'khrul spong zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-24a</p>
<col>@23b (bcom ldan 'das dpal kyee rdo rje lha dgu'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgrub pa'i thabs 'khrul ba spong ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mdo sngags kyi yongs su rdzogs pa'i sde snod 'dzin pa chen po bla ma dka' bcu pa byang rgyal ba'i gsung gis nye bar bskul zhing gzhan yang don du gnyer ba du mas yun ring mo'i gong nas bskul ba la brten nas mngon par rtogs pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs mtha' yas ba la mda' 'byor ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug lam 'bras pa chen po ye shes dpal ba'i zhal snga nas dang rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po buddha shr'i'i zhal snga nas la sogs pa'i zhal gyi bdud rtsi myangs pa la brten nas rje btsun sa skya pa'i bskyed rdzogs kyi man ngag rnams legs par khong du chung bar byas shing dpal ldan mkhas pa thams cad kyi gtsug gi nor bu rgyal ba'i ring lugs pa chen po rje btsun ku mar ma ti'i zhal snga nas rtsa rgyud brtag pa gnyis pa rje btsun sa skya pa yab sras rnams kyi rnam bshad mtha' dag dang bcas pa'i bshad pa lan mang du thos pa'i bka' drin dang khyad par gyis kyang rgyal ba do rje 'chang nyid dge ba'i bshes gnyen @024a * gyi rnam par bstan pa dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo rje btsun chos kyi rgyal po tsong kha pa chen po'i zhabs kyi padmo la gus pas gtugs pa'i bka' drin las lod sngags thams cad kyi lam gyi gnad mtha' dag la mi 'jigs pa'i spobs bthob cing kyee rdo rje'i rtsa rgyud brtag pa gnyis pa dang thun mong gi bshad rgyud sibhu ti dang thun mong ma yin pa'i bshad rgyud rdo rje gur dang de dag gi 'grel ba rnams dang yab yum gnyis kyi sgrub thabs dkyil chog sbyin sreg gtor chog tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i chog la sogs pa rgya gzhung phal che ba la'ang zhib tu 'dres par byas pa dang lugs 'di gangs ri'i khrod kyi shing rta chen po rje btsun sa skya pa khud bon rnams kyi mngon bar rtogs pa rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum la nang gses kyi phye ba'i mngon par rtogs pa tshul bcu bzhi'am bcu drug dang rje mar ba'i rgyud 'dzin chen po rdog lugs su grags pa'i las tshogs kyi lha'i rnal 'byor sum cu so bzhi mngon rtogs bskyed rim gyi lha'i rnal 'byor bcu gcig la sogs pa'i tshul rnams legs par khong du chud par byas nas mang du thos pa'i btsun pa rigs pa smra ba dge legs dpal bzang pos chos kyi rgyal po tsong kha pa chen po nyid kyi dgongs pa ji lta ba bzhin du gtsang nyang stod rig pa'i 'byung gnas kyi sa'i char sbyar ba'o aom swasti rgyal bstan bad tshal phan bde'i dri bsud can bshad sgrub 'dab rgyas rnam grol sbrang rtsi'i bcud 'gro kun spyod phyir sku 'bum byams pa gling chos sde che nas chos sbyin char 'di spel sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>

<col>@011a * ces rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi bsnyen pa bya tshul 'di ni theg pa rim dgu'i lugs srol la 'dis cha shin tu chung bas mun nag lag myong du song shis mkhas pa lugs 'di la sbyang pa rnams khrel ba'i rgyu las ma mchis kyang rgyal dbang mchog gis bstsal ba'i reg gzigs @011b dang rig 'dzin 'jam dbyangs grags pas mdzad pa'i zin bris gnyis su gab dkrug 'thor ba'i tshul dus bon tsam snang ba de la gzhi byas nas klag chog cig gyis zhes don gnyer can 'ga' zhig gis bskul ba ltar sbrang btsun snyoms las pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan gyis rang dang skal mnyam 'ga' zhig la phan 'dod kyi bsam pas bkod pa 'di la 'gal 'khrul nongs pa'i tshogs ci mchis pa thams cad bla ma yi dam gur gnas mkhas pa rnams la 'chag pas sgrib par mi 'gyur bar mdzad du gsol yi ge pa ni sdom brtson rnam dpyod yangs pa'i rab 'byams smra ba blo bzang nyi ma'o 'dis kyang rang gzhan thams ad nyer 'tshe'i 'jigs pa las grol te dpal rta mchog rol ba'i 'phang bde blag tu thob par gyur cig "</col>

<vol>3276</vol>
<tib>` chos srung rnams dang yul lha gzhi bdag la bsangs mchod 'bul zhing rlung rta dar ba'i las bcol tshul</tib>
<p>11b-12b</p>
<col>@012b (ces pa 'di ni rang dang skal mnyam dgga'i don du sh'akya'i dge slong su ma ti aadhya sh'a sa na sya dhwa dzas bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni thung kwa lag pi lig thu slob dpon blo bzang gtsug tor ro 'dis kyang 'gro ba mang po la phan thogs par gyur cig </col>

<tib>gnod sbyin chen po rdo rje bdud 'dul gyi bskang gso'i rim pa bar chad kun sel zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-6b</p>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3278</vol>
<tib>yid dang kun gzhi'i dka' gnas rgya cher 'grel pa legs par bshad pa'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i rtsa ba dang de'i 'bru 'grel snying po'i gnad don gsal ba'i sgron me zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-51a</p>
<col>@050a * ces yid dang kun gzhi'i dka' gnas rgya cher 'grel ba legs par bshad pa'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i rtsa ba'i 'bru 'grel snying po'i gnad don gsal ba'i sgron me zhes bya ba 'di ni ser smad thos bsam nor bu'i gling gi dbu ma'i 'dzin grwa ba gzhung ba bla ma dge legs rgya mtsho sbom 'bor rab 'byams pa chos grags rgya mtsho rong bo dge slong blo bzang rin chen ta 'on dge slong 'jam dbyangs phun tshogs` spom 'por dge slong blo bzang rab brtan sbom 'por dge slong bskal bzang bkra shis ta 'on dge slong thub bstan rgya mtsho mi nyag ye shes chos 'phel sogs thos bsam don gnyer can mangs nas rje rin po ches mdzad pa'i 'di'i dka' 'grel gyi gzhung tshig don rling zhing god ka' pas de'i don 'grel mtha' gcod dang bcas pa go bde ba zhig bgyis dgos tshul bskul ba dang slar yang lung rtogs rgya mtsho'i bdag nyid ser smad khri bzhugs dpon slob grags pa mkhas grub pa'i zhal mnga' nas kyis kyang don gnyer ba rnams kyi ji ltar mol ba'i re ba bskang ste mtha' gcod dang bcas pa'i rgyas bsdus 'tsham pa 'dzin chos su bgyis chog pa zhig kyang bris zhes bskul gnad mdzad pa dang gzhan yang tsha ba 'od zer sprul ba'i sku rin po che blo bzang thub bstan rgyal mtshan gzhung ba lha btsun sprul sku rin po @050b tshe blo bzang 'jam dpal rab rgyas sku mched sogs 'dzin grwa gong 'og gi thos bsam don gnyer ba mang pos kyang bskul zhing rang nyid kyang chos tshul 'di la phyogs mthong tsam gyis kyang go ba'i bag chags rnyed na ci ma rung snyam pa'i 'dun pas kun nas bslang ste de yang mtha' gcod 'dir dkyus gcig tu bkod na mang bar 'gyur bas zur du bkod cing gzhan yang dbyis byin pa'i rnam gzhag rgyas pa zur du bkod nas 'dir rtsa ba'i 'bru bsnon gtso bor bgyis nas legs bshad mang po'i gnad don snying por dril te dang pa mkhan po thugs rje'i ming can gyis se ra theg pa chen po'i gling du grub par sbyar ba 'dis kyang thub bstan snying po rje rgyal ba gnyis pa blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyi bstan pa rin po che mtha' dbus phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig aom swasti 'jam mgon bla ma'i legs bshad bsam 'phel nor dri med dgongs 'grel phra tshem gyis mdzes pa lhag bsam rgyal mtshan rtse mor bsgrengs pa'i mthus 'dzam med par gyi mchod sbyin deng 'dir spel de lta'i dge ba gcig tu dkar ba des rgyal ba gnyis pa'i lugs bzang 'dzam gling 'dir nyin byed 'bum ltar gsal zhing de 'dzin kun rtag brtan rdo rje'i khams su zhabs brtan shog khyad par chos 'di'i rgyu sbyor las byed kyis gtsos pa'i @051a * mkha' mnyams lus can ma lus pa rnam dag lam bzang bdag gir gzung byas nas sku gsum gzhal med khang du myur bgrong shog  'di ni dge slong phan bde dang dge slong dam pa gnyis kyis lhag bsam dag pas dpar du bzhengs te 'dul khrims gtsang srung yid dga' chos 'dzin gling grwa tshar gi spar khang du bzhugs "</col>
</item>

<vol>3286</vol>
<tib>byin rlabs mchog stsol mar grags pa'i 'grel pa tshig don rab gsal zhes bya ba bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-20a</p>
<col>@019b (ces pa 'di ni ^skyabs mgon rje btsun mchog gi sprul ba'i sku'i aa khu lags mkhan po dge slong ye shes dge legs mchog nas khyed kyis gsol 'debs de la 'grel pa zhig bris na blo dman rnams la phan pa 'od snyam pas bri dgos gsungs pa dang rgyu mtshan gzhan yang yod pa bcas 'ga' zhig la'ang phan du re nas khong gi thugs bzhed ltar ^skyabs mgon rim byon gyi bka' drin gyis nye bar 'tsho ba'i sa mtha'i dge sbyong gi gzugs brnyan ngag dbang mkhas grub zer ba zhig gis 'phral du bris pa 'dis kyang bstan pa dang @020a * 'gro ba rnams la phan thogs par gyur cig mangga lam aom swasti bslu med dkon mchog gsum gyi ngo bo nyid ngan song 'jigs las sgrol ba'i dpa' bo ste dag pa'i zhing du 'khrid pa'i ded dpon mchog mgon po 'od dpag med la gsol ba 'debs gnang gcod gshin rje'i 'jigs las bskyab tu gsol 'jigs rung bar do'i 'phrang las bsgral du gsol bzod dka' ngan 'gro'i ga-yang las drang du gsol zhing mchog bde ba can 'khrid du gsol bdag gis dus gsum bsags pa'i dge tshogs mthus 'di snang 'gag tshe bde ba can zhing du thogs med skyes nas 'od dpag med mgon gyi zhal mthong gsung gi bdud rtsis rtag 'tsho shog ces pa 'di ni t'a las rje nang mer gan hung thas ci dza sag mi 'gyur rdo rje'i aa ma bde mo rnam rgyal nas bskul ba'i don du ^mkhan po no mong hang wa g'indra pa tu siddhis bris pa dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3286</vol>
<tib>byin rlabs nye brgyud kyi bla ma rnams la gsol ba 'debs pa dngos grub kyi snye ma zhes bya ba kha bskong dang bcas pa</tib>
<p>1a-3b</p>
<col>@003b (ces 'jam mgon bla ma tsong kha pa chen pos mdzad pa'i byin rlabs nye brgyud kyi bla ma rnams la gsol ba 'debs pa dngos grub kyi snye ma zhes bya ba la dpal mnyam med ri bo dga' ldan pa rnams kyi zab chos thun mong ma yin pa rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi chos skor rnams rje bdag nyid chen po nas rang nyid kyis gang las mnos pa'i rtsa ba'i bla ma'i bar gang nas gang du brgyud pa'i bla ma rnams las rje chos bzang dpal ba sogs bla ma bcu gnyis kyi gsol 'debs shu lo ka bcu gnyis khri rin po che ngag dbang blo gros rgya mtsho bas mdzad pa dang khri chen de nyid kyi gsol 'debs shu lo ka gcig po rang nyid kyis sbyar bas kha bskang ste sgrigs pa po ni snyoms las pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan dpal bzang po'o mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>

<tib>rang gi rtsa ba'i bla ma'i sku tshe brtan pa'i phyir tu bla ma dkon mchog la gsol ba 'debs tshul bde chen lhun 'grub ma</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col>@003a * (ces pa 'di ni rigs rus stobs 'byor phun sum tshogs pa'i har chen ja sag thu dbang aol jo'i dbang thegus be'i se thu nu mal gung sogs kyis rang gi rtsa ba'i bla ma bstan 'gro la phan pa'i bsam sbyor bzang po'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa t'a bla ma cha han phu li ching gu'i sku tshe zhabs bad brtan pa'i ched du ngag 'don byas chog pa'i brtan bzhugs kyi tshigs bcad 'ga' zhig gyis zhes bskul ba'i ngor ban rgan snyom las pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan dpal bzang pos mtsho bdun gyi lha khang chen mor sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dpyod ldan dge tshul ngag dbang phun tshogs so</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3286</vol>
<tib>rtsa ba'i bla ma dang 'jam dbyangs zung 'brel gyi rnal 'byor</tib>

<col>@004a * (ces rtsa ba'i bla ma dang 'jam dpal @004b dbyangs zung 'brel gyi bla ma'i rnal 'byor 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes rang gi gam du nye bar 'khod de gang ci'i bya ba la brtson pa lhun len pa'i lhag bsam dge ba can mdo sngags kyi gzhung lugs la sbyangs pas spob pa mi dman zhing rnam dpyod yangs pa'i dka' bcu shes rab dar rgyas gyis bskul ba'i ngor ban rgan gyi na pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan gyis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni gzhung lugs rab 'byams la spobs pa yangs pa'i rab 'byams smra ba blo bzang nyi ma'o 'dis kyang rang gzhan thams cad tshe rabs kun tu mtshan ldan bla mas rjes su 'dzin pa dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig mangga lam bhawantu</col>
</item>

<item>

<tib>sgrol ma nyer gcig gi sgrub thabs las tshogs</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3287</vol>
<tib># thub pa'i dbang po'i mdzad pa bcu'i bsdoms lta bu'i bstod pa bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-2b</p>
<col>@002b (zhes pa 'di ni gzims khang gong nas mchog gi sprul ba'i sku grags pa rgyal mtshan gyi bkas bskul ba la brten nas ston pa bla na med pa de'i zhabs phyir bsnyegs par 'dod pa sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis rgyal tshab dam pas rgyud bla mar mdzad bcu'i bsdoms lta bu gsungs pa ji bzhin du mgyogs par bris pa'i yi ge pa ni mdo sngags rab 'byams pa dge slong blo bzang bstan pa dar rgyas so</col>

<tib># bcom ldan 'das ma seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma nyi ma sbas pa'i lugs bsgrub thabs</tib>
<p>1a-9a</p>
<col>@009a * (ces pa 'di ni bstan pa'i gsal byed rje btsun dam pa'i rgyal tshab hal ha aer te ni pandi ta 'jam dpal rdo rje no mo khang nas bskul ba ltar ^sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes kyis chos grwa chen po bkra shis lhun po dpal gyi sde chen phyogs thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i gling gi gzims chung bka' gdams pho brang du du myur bar sug bris su bgyis pa'o dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3293</vol>
<tib># rdo rje mi 'khrugs pa lha dgu'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ngan song tsha gdung sel ga bur gsar pa'i chu rgyun</tib>
<p>1a-36a</p>
<col>@035a * (ces jo bo chen po dpal mar me mdzad kyi bka' srol las nye bar 'ongs pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mi 'khrugs pa lha dgu'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho @035b ga ngan song tsha gdung kun sel spung gsang ba'i chu rgyun zhes bya ba 'di yang nor 'dzin gyi khyon kun la dbang sgyur ba lugs gnyis la lta ba'i rnam dpyod kyi rtsal dang ldan par rang gi gnas du nye bar bcad pa'i phyag mdzod sa skyong bsod nams rab brtan gyis bskul ba la brten nas dze ta ra'i rgya gzhung dang 'dzam gling bstan pa'i mnga' bdagg khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po tsong kha pa'i gsung rabs rdo rje 'chang chen po'i lam gyi rim pa gnyis kyi rim pa dgongs pa gtso bor byas` `phyogs 'di la tshar med gyur ba'i mkhas pa rnams kyi legs bshad pa brten nas ngag 'don gyi go rims mtha' dag khrigs chags su bsgrigs dmigs pa dang mtshams sbyor gyi rim pa rnams rgyas par bkod pa yi gi mangs pas 'jigs nas khungs thub kyi yig cha gzhan dang mthong rgyud kyi phyag len la kha 'phangs te rgyal dbang rdo rje 'chang dbang 'khon ston chos kyi rgyal po dpal 'byor lhun grub sogs yongs 'dzin chos bzhin du spyod pa du ma'i bka' drin las gsang sngags gsar snying gi rgyud sde'i don ma 'dres par khong du chung ba'i aa wa dh'u d'i pa /za hor gyi btsun pa/ ngag dbang blo bzang rgya mtsho 'jigs med @039a * go cha thub bstan lang tsho'i sdes nyin 'byed dbang po nya khyim du spyod pa'i phyogs phyi ma'i bzang po dang po'i tshis la la dga' ldan pho brang mngon par bkra ba'i lding khang du yi ge pa ni su dh'i a'a yu d'i rgha'o mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3299</vol>
<tib># ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro'i sengge'i gdong can ma'i bdag bskyed cho ga byin rlabs myur 'jug zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-10a</p>
<col>@010a * (ces ye shes kyi mkha' ma 'gro ma seng ge'i gdong can ma'i bdag bskyed kyi cho ga byin rlabs myur 'jug zhes bya 'di ni aaksho badzra gyis sbyar bas 'gro kun bdud las rgyal 'gyur ro dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3299</vol>
<tib>dpal phyag na rdo rje'i sgrub thabs dngos grub kun 'byung zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-6b</p>
<col>@006b (ces dpal phyag na rdo rje'i sgrub thabs dngos grub kun 'byung zhes bya ba 'di ni dge slong grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis bskul ba la brten nas chos rje blo bzang dar rgyas gyis ^dam pa gong ma rnams kyi gsung bzhin du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni bsod nams dbang phyug go 'dis kyang rgyal ba gnyis pa'i bstan pa dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>

<col>@003b (zhes dpal phyag na rdo rje'i tshogs mchod bya tshul bde chen rgya mtsho zhes bya ba 'di ni lugs gnyis zung du 'jug pa'i rnam dpyod mchog tu yangs pa aer te ni mgron gnyer blo bzang sbyin pas nan tan chen pos bskul ba'i ngor dpal mgon bzhad pa rdo rje ming can gyis mkhas grub gong ma'i gsung las btus te bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni bsod nams dbang phyug gis bgyis pa dge legs su gyur cig bkra shis par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<p>1a-14a</p>

<item>

<vol>3343</vol>
<tib>byang chub ltung bshags kyi cho ga sdig mun kun sel nyi 'od 'bum 'phro zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-11a</p>
<col>@011a * ces byang chub ltung bshags kyi cho ga'i sgo nas nyams su len tshul khyer bde 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes gus ldan aer khe gnyer pa blo bzang chos 'phel dang rang gi lag ga-yog gsol dpon bsod nams bkra shis gnyis kyis yang yang bskul ngor grub chen las kyi rdo rje'i gsung nyid la gzhi byas rdo rje 'chang bka' 'gyur pa chen po'i gsung gis zur brgyan dam pa gzhan gyi gsung gi legs chas kyang cung zad kha bskang ste sh'akya'i btsun pa ngag dbang 'jam dpal bstan 'dzin gyis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni sdom brtson dge slong ngag dbang bzod pa'o "</col>
</item>

<tib>rgyas pa'i bstan bcos tshad ma rnam 'grel</tib>
<p>1a-74a</p>
<col>@073b tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi tshig le'ur byas pa 'di ni yul lho phyogs kyi rgyud du byung ba gzhung lugs ngan pa thams cad ches shin tu 'khrul bar 'jug pa snyan pa'i grags pas sa'i snying ma lus par khyab pa 'gran zla med pa'i mkhas pa chen po dpal chos kyi grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so rgya gar gyi mkhan po su bh'u ti shr'i shan ti dang bod kyi lo ts'a ba dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur dpal ldan dam pa'i las la mngon dges pa smad med che ba'i bdag can rgyal po mchog dge ba'i thugs mnga' nges pa sa skyong ba mi yi bdag po dbang sde'i bka' bskul nas btson ldan lhag par dpyod ldan 'chad po dang nyan po rgol dar phyir rgol don nges dang 'brel gtam dga' ston rgya chen myong bya'i phyir 'dzam gling mkhas pa'i rgyun gyur rgyan 'di bsgyur lta ngan kun sel gnyis su med pa yis don dam rnam dpyod lhur len bstan bcos 'di gzhung mang don dka' sgrub par dka' na yang 'bras bu che phyir 'bad par rigs pa yi log pa'i rgyan phyogs rjes su gzhol gyur ba lha ba chu bo bzlog par dka' mod kyi yang dag rig pas legs par brja' sprad na 'ga' yi yid @074a * la ci ste 'bab mi 'gyur sgra don gnyig nyams su bder lon te mun sprul gyis ni ma bslad legs bsgyur ba sngon gyi sgyur byed dam pa de dag gi dri tsam bro ba da lta kho bor zad dpal ldan kha che'i rig pa pa'i gtsug gi nor bu skal ldan ni rgyal po zhes bya la thas nas blo ldan bzang pos 'di bsgyur ro grong khyer chen po dpe med kyi shar phyogs na yul 'khor lo 'dzin zhes bya ba grub pa'i gnas su grags pa'i 'dabs rnam par rgyal ba'i zhing zhes bya ba kha che'i pandi ta chen po skal ldan rgyal po dang bod kyi lo ts'a ba chen po dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o dus phyis sa'i steng na 'gran zla thams cad dang brel ba'i mkhas pa bsod snyoms pa chen po sh'akya shr'i bha dra la sogs pa rnams dang sh'akya'i dge slong kun dga' rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o chos sbyin rgya cher spel phyir dga' ldan phun tshogs gling du par du bsgrubs mangga lam "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3350</vol>
<tib>chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi dgongs don gsal bar byed pa'i legs bshad nyin byed dbang po'i snang ba las snyoms 'jug bstan pa zhes bya ba gnas brgyad pa'i rnam par bshad pa</tib>
<p>1a-57a</p>
<col>@054a * zhes chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi dgongs don gsal bar byed pa'i legs bshad nyin byed dbang po'i snang ba zhes bya ba 'di ni sngar bdag nyid ser smad thos bsam nor bu'i gling du slob gnyer bgyis skabs dka' gnad 'ga' zhig la rang gi go rtogs 'char tshul dang rtsod pa'i rigs pa 'bab tshul brjed byang lta bur bkod pa'i yi ge rim 'khyar la brten don gnyer can 'ga' zhig nas 'di dag phyogs sdebs kyi gzhung tshan gong 'og 'grel ba zhig bgyis dgos zhes bskul bar byed mod kyang bar skabs su rnam par ga-yeng ba'i gzhan dbang 'ba' zhig tu 'phyan pas rim lus khar zhib tu bsam tshe deng sang mkhas btsun bzang gsum 'dzoms pa'i bdag nyid chen po rnams kyang btang snyoms kyi ngal bso mdzad pa las 'di rigs kyi spros pa cher mi mdzad na bdag lta bus @054b smra ba'i khur 'dzin kyang wa skyes sengge'i brtul zhugs 'chang ba ltar babs su mi 'brel zhing mi mkhas mkhas 'dogs kyis bdag nyid sgrog pa lta bu'i yag 'byung ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro snyam nas 'dri ba'i spobs pa skyungs kyang dus phyis ^gong sa lha mi'i 'dren mchog ^rgyal dbang bcu pa chen pos mdzod kyi gsan gzhes bskyangs skabs ^rgyal tshab khri chen no min han nas kho bos btab pa'i sngar gyi bka' gnad brjed byang 'ga' zhig ^sku mdun du phul ba la brten ^gong sa rin po che nas kyang 'di nyid mjug grub par gyis shig pa'i bka'i snang ba stsal cing ^rgyal dbang de nyid kyi mtshan nyid zhabs zhu'i bla ma gzhung lugs rab 'byams la mkhyen pa'i spyan ras yangs pa 'bras blo gleng te 'o dge bshes tshe dbang bsam 'grub ser smad tsha rdor dge bshes dge 'dun tshul khrims dga' ldan shar rtse the bo sprul sku ye shes thub bstan rgyal mtshan rnam gsum nas kyang nan gyis bskul ba dang nye char ser smad rang gi slob gnyer ba smon lam ming btags thon nyer gtugs pa sbom 'bor dge legs rnam rgyal sbom 'bor rgyal mtshan chos rje 'dul rnying 'dzin gra nas kong po ngag dbang tshul khrims rgyal rong blo bzang brtson 'grus sbom 'bor 'jam dbyangs 'od zer rong bo don grub tshul khrims sogs 'dzin gra gong 'og gi slob gnyer ba rnams nas lha rdzas rten gsum gyis sne drangs te myur du rtsom shig pa'i bskul ma'i nyer len la brten des na gzhan la phan pa'i rgyur 'gyur na 'ga' zhig nas ngan smras kyis 'phyas gdags su zin kyang 'gal bar ma mngon no snyam nas slar @055a * yang 'god pa'i khur 'khyer ba po ni gong sa rgyal ba'i dbang po'i ^sku bcar zhabs zhu ba dar han mkhan po ser stod mkhan zur sprul ming blo bzang 'phrin las rnam rgyal du 'bod pas rab byung bcu bzhi pa'i me mo bya lo'i dgun thog ^rje thams cad mkhyen pa tsong kha pa chen po'i bzhugs gnas khyad par can ser chos sdings su mtshams bcad zhig bgyid skabs nas mgo brtsams de'i phyi lo sa khyi lo nang ga-yeng ba dang kha 'don gyi seng dbar nam byung la ci lcogs su bris te lo de kha'i nang ^rgyal dbang 'jig rten gsum mgon sku 'phreng rim byon gyi dgyes zhing rang byung 'phags pa'i bsti gnas gru 'dzin gnyis pa'i gzhal med khang pho brang chen po po ta la'i rang shag tu mjug yongs su grub par bgyis pa'i dge bas 'gro kun thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa la rig pa nyid du gyur cig  "</col>
</item>

<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3354</vol>
<tib>tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi dgongs don rab tu gsal bar byed pa'i bsdus grwa'i rnam bshad rigs pa'i sgo 'byed ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-296b inc [*missing page from 297a*]</p>
<col>@293b ces tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi dgongs don rab tu gsal bar byed pa'i shel dkar me long zhes bya ba'i bsdus grwa'i rnam bshad skal bzang re ba kun skong 'di ni gzhung lugs smra ba'i dbang po nam mkha' rdo rjes yang yang bskul ba dang rang nyid kyang snga sor nas rtsom 'dun yod pa bcas 'tshams sbyar te lung rigs gdong @294a * lnga'i gad rgyangs cher sgrogs nas mkhas rlom lag ldan gyi glad pa 'gems par mdzad pa la 'gran pa'i zla dang bral ba thub bstan spyi dang khyad par rje rgyal dbang gnyis pa'i bstan pa la bka' drin 'khor med gcig bu thams cad mkhyen pa mkhas grub smra ba'i nyi mas mdzad pa'i lung rigs rin chen spungs pa lta bu tshad ma sde bdun yid kyi mun sel la gzhi byas te bsdus grwa sogs nas 'byung ba'i lung rigs kyis brgyan nas 'dzam gling rgyan drug mchog gnyis lta bu mkhas mang skar mas rnam par bkra ba'i chos sde chen po dpal ldan 'bras spungs zhes snyan pa'i bdan dkar po srid pa'i khong nas brgal ba de nyid kyi chos srid gnyis kyi lugs srol bzang po'i gdugs dkar po'i ga-yu ba la brten par byed pa'i 'dzam gling mkhas pa'i chu bo gcig tu babs pa lung rtogs rin chen 'byung gnas dpal ldan bkra shis sgo mang pa'i dge bshes kun gyi tha shal gong du gsal ba'i ming can gyis bka' drin mtshungs med gdan sa chen po dkon de nyid du sbyar ba'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3355</vol>
<tib>byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i 'khrid gser gyi yang zhun zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-21a</p>
<col>@021a * skyes bu gsum gyi lam gyi rim pa'i 'khrid bdud rtsi gser gyi yang zhun zhes bgyi pa rje bla ma'i nyams mgur dang sbyar nas 'khyer bde bar bkod pa 'di ni bstun pa'i gsal byed chen po lugs 'di la shin tu mos shing don du gnyer ba kun mkhyen chen po shes rab dpal bzang gi gdan sa pa chen po mdo chod chos rjes gsol ba nan cher bskul ba la brten nas na tshong phra mo nas rje bla mas byin gyis brlabs pa'i mtshan mtho ba pa sh'akya'i dge slong chos smra ba'i btsun pa bsod nams rgya mtshos dpal ldan 'bras spungs chos kyi sde chen po'i gzims khang dga' ldan pho brang gi nyi 'od rnam par 'khyil bar sbyar ba 'dis kyang bstan pa'i snying po phyogs dus kun tu rgyas par byed nus par gyur cig  bkra shis "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3356</vol>
<tib>bsngo ba'i rgyal po bstan 'bar ma'i dgongs don rgya cher 'grel pa legs bshad bstan pa'i sgron me zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-56a</p>
<col>@055b (ces bsngo ba'i rgyal po bstan 'bar ma'i dgongs don rgya cher 'grel pa legs bshad bstan pa'i sgron me zhes bya ba 'di ni snga sor dgon pa'i khrir sdod skabs kun mkhyen mchog gi bkas bcad ltar lo de bzhin gling bsre skabs su bka' pot lnga'i steng nas bshad pa byed dgos pas lo dang por bcad zhib rgyas gnyis pa dang lnga par dka' gnad don dogs gcod dang bcas pa'i gzab bshad gsum par bka' po ta so so'i chos 'byung dang sprags pa bzhi par bka' pot lnga ka lam gyi lus gcig tu dril ba drug par bstan 'bar ma'i brjod don bslab pa gsum du bsdus shing de ston pa mdo 'dul gnyis dang lung gi mngon pa gong 'og rigs pa'i mngon pa ste bka' pot lngar 'gyur tshul gyi steng nas bshad pa byas par brten rnam dpyod can 'ga' zhig gis de'i nang nas bstan 'bar ma rang rkyang gi bshad pa rnams logs su bkol ba'i tikka zhig dgos zhes bskul ma byung yang rim 'gyangs su lus pa nye char ba ron su nyid shog nas gzhung brgya smra ba'i dbang po rdo ram ngag dbang rab brtan dang hal ha dar han bee li'i shog nas lhag bsam dang rnam dpyod phul du byung ba t'a bla ma dkon mchog chos 'dzin gnyis kyis nan tan du bskul ba'i ngor dbus 'gyur bstan pa'i srog shing snyan brgyud man ngag gi mdzod 'dzin pa dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje can ^rje btsun ye shes rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po dang mdo smad srin po'i yul lta bu 'dir yang @056a * thugs bskyed kyi go cha brtsan po bgos te thub bstan yongs su rdzogs pa 'khor lo gsum gyi sgo nas 'dzin skyong spel bar byed pa la sa'i steng na 'gran pa'i zla dang bral ba nges pa don gyi thams cad mkhyen pa chen po ^rje btsun dkon mchog 'jigs med dbang po rnam gnyis kyi zhabs rdul spyi bor bsten pa'i ^btsun pa dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron mes rab byung bcu bzhi pa'i bgrang bya gnyis pa sa pho 'brug gi lo khrums stod kyi zla bar dben gnas yid dga' chos 'dzin nas mtshams kyi thun gseng du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni gtsug lag lta ba'i blo mig dang ldan pa dge slong dkon mchog kun dgas bgyis pa 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che yun ring du 'bar bar gyur cig  ) ` rgyal bstan rin chen 'bar ba'i smon 'grel 'di ngang gtong lhag bsam yangs pa aer te ni phyag mdzod tshe tsheng tho'ing gyis rgyu sbyar te khu re chen mor par du legs bzhengs mthus mkha' khyab mar gyur 'gro ba ma lus pas ston pa mchog de'i rjes su slob 'gyur cing mgon des dka' bas bsgrub pa'i lung rtogs bstan dus mtha' 'dir yang ring du 'bar gyur cig "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3356</vol>
<tib>dbang chen yang gsang lha dgu'i sgo nas drag po zor gyi 'phrin las rdo rje pha lam zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-24b</p>
<col>@024a * (ces dbang chen yang gsang lha dgu'i sgo nas drag po zor gyi 'phrin las rdo rje pha lam 'di ni mchod dpon ngag dbang shes rab kyis bsnyen chen gtong ba'i tshe chog bsgrigs dgos @024b tshul ltar za hor sngags smyon zil gnon bzhad bstsal gyis lcags mo bya lo sprel zla'i tshes bcu chen mo'i nyin pho brang po ta lar sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni 'tshams dpon dge slong ngag dbang dkon mchog gis bris pa dgra bgegs kyi ga-yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyur gyur cig  bkra shis pa dang dge ba 'phel gyur cig sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3356</vol>
<tib>rgyal ba btsong kha pa chen po la stong mchod 'bul ba'i cho ga bkra shis ga-yas 'khyil zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-24b</p>
<col>@024a * (ces khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po btsong kha pa chen po la stong mchod 'bul ba'i cho ga bkra shis ga-yas 'khyil zhes bya ba 'di ni byang phyogs hor gyi yul la dge ldan ring lugs dar zhing rgyas pa'i phyir p'a rin gyi sa'i cha dgon sde kun mkhyen gling du rje yab sras gsum gyi sku gzugs bzhengs te cho 'phrul smon lam chen mo'i dus chen bco lnga'i nyin dang 'brel zhal zas rgya mtsho mas gtsos stong mchog 'bul skabs las smon bzang pos 'brel ba'i sku skyes blo bzang bstan 'dzin gyis dngul manda lha rdzas dang bcas bskul ba la brten nas btsun gzugs snyoms las pa ngag dbang 'jam dpal bstan pa @024b dar rgyas kyis rang lo so brgyad pa 'phags yul legs sbyar gyi skad du ba h'u bh'a bya tong kus mi bdag gi mdun sar lbu yin stod 'grel pa rnams kyi lugs la 'bru mang po ste sa pho stag gi lo cho 'phrul zla ba'i tshes bzang por sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge tshul legs tshogs dar rgyas bgyis pa 'dis kyang 'gro kun 'jam mgon bla mas rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur cig  par brko ba pa ni dge slong blo bzang rgya mtsho dang dge tshul dpal gyi snying po'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3356</vol>
<tib>sngon 'gro khrid chen bzhi las skyabs 'gro'i dmigs rim bshad pa bde chen thar pa'i pho brang du 'jug pa'i man ngag rin chen them skas zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-29a</p>
<col>@029a * (ces skyabs 'gro'i dmigs rim bshad pa bde chen thar pa'i pho brang du 'jug pa'i man ngag rin chen them skas zhes bya ba 'di yang lung rtogs yon tan gyis phyug pa'i bshes gnyen ja rod zhabs drung 'jam dbyangs tshe ldan dang rab 'byams smra ba 'jam dbyangs blo bzang sogs slob ma 'gas bskul ba bzhin mnyam med sh'akya'i dge slong gi gzugs brnyan pa spyod pa blo bzang tshul khrims rgya mtsho'am ming gzhan gser tog no mon han 'bod pas rang shag bkra shis ga-yang 'khyil gyi yang rtser sbyar ba'o ) tshul 'dir khal kha se chen rgyal khag gi bstan pa'i sbyin bdag chen po t'a cang jun se chen p'e li tshe ring bsam grub dang ga-yung drung rdo rje yid bzhin 'khor lo bcas mthun rkyen sbyar te dpar du bsgrubs pa'i dges skye ba'i phreng bar dal 'byor rten bzang thob drin can bla ma mchog dang mi 'bral zhing sa lam yon tan yongs su mthar phyin shog  mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3357</vol>
<tib>dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i bla rgyud gsol 'debs byin rlabs char 'bebs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-5a</p>
<col>@004b (ces dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i bla rgyud gsol 'debs byin rlabs char 'bebs zhes bya ba 'di ni @005a * chos sde chen po dgon klung byams pa gling gi rgyud pa'i grwa ba spyi mang gis 'dus pa'i bla rgyud gsol 'debs shu lo ka re rer bla ma gsum re'i mtshan thon pa zhig gyis zhes bskul ba la brten nas ban rgan snyoms las pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan dpal bzang pos deng sang rang cag la dbang rgyun bshad rgyun man ngag gi rgyun gsum ka gang las brgyud pa'i bla ma rnams kyi gsol 'debs smon lam dang bcas pa sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge slong bstan 'dzin chos dar ro bkra shis</col>
</item>

<item>

<vol>3357</vol>
<tib>dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dbang chog ngag 'don gyi rim pa go bde ba</tib>
<p>1a-38b</p>
<col>@038b dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ngag 'don gyi rim par bsgrigs pa 'di yang dpal ldan 'dus pa'i lam la nyams len mdzad pa'i sde che chung thams cad kyi 'don pa dang mthun pa zhus dag rgyas par byas shing slar yang dge slong blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi mig lam du phab nas dag par bgyis pa'o "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3357</vol>
<tib>dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i ras bris dang bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor sgrub mchod bya tshul gyi chog sgrig dngos grub char 'bebs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-25a</p>
<col>@024b (ces dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i ras bris dang bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor sgrub mchod bya tshul gyi chog sgrig dngos grub char 'bebs zhes bya ba 'di ni rje bdag nyid chen po rang gis mdzad pa'i dkyil chog dbang don de nyid rab gsal las rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor sgrub cing mchod pa'i tshul gsal bar bshad kyang ras bris dang bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor sgrub mchod bya tshul mi gsal phun tshogs gling gi spar ma las kyang de dang 'dra rje 'dul ba 'dzin pas mdzad pa'i bsam gtan sgrub mchod kyi cho ga las kyang ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor sgrub tshul ma bshad ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor sgrub mchod bya tshul gsal bar bshad pa'i yig cha gzhan yang ma mthong zhing deng sang ras bris la brten pa'i dkyil 'khor sgrub mchod dang dbang bdag 'jug byed mkhan mang @025a * bar snang ba dang rang nyid kyis kyang de ltar byed pa la sgrub grogs sogs kyi ngag 'don grig pa'i phyir bsgrig ma zhig mkho bar bsam nas dbang don rab gsal dang mkhas grub rin po che'i dkyil chog gi lhan thabs 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i bsam gtan sgrub mchod kyi yig cha sogs gung bsgrigs te rang blos dpog tshod kyis dgongs pa dang mi 'gal zhing lag tu blang bde bar yul byang phyogs kyi mthar 'khyams pa'i ban chung snyoms las pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan gyis 'jam dbyangs gong ma chen po'i rgyal khab be'i cing gi bod chos lha khang du grags par bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni nang don rig pa la legs par sbyangs shing rnam dpyod yangs pa'i rab 'byams smra ba blo bzang nyi ma'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba blo bzang grags pa'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3357</vol>
<tib>dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i sgrub thabs rnal 'byor dag rim ngag 'don du bsgrigs pa blo gsal dga' skyed ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-48a</p>
<col>@046b ces bdag cag gi dpal ldan bla ma dam pa rigs @047a * dang dkyil 'khor kun gyi bdag po khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po shar tsong kha pa blo bzang grags pa'i dpal zhes snyan pa'i grags pa sa gsum na rnam par ga-yo ba de nyid kyis mdzad pa'i dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i sgrub thabs rnal 'byor dag rim tshogs 'don dang de'i phyag len bya tshul mthar chags su bsgrigs pa 'di ni ngag 'don gyi dpe spar ma dang bris ma ci rigs snang ba'i phun tshogs gling gi spar ma ngag 'don byed tshul legs shing khyab che bar 'dug na'ang phyag len byed tshul mi gsal ba dang rnal 'byor dag rim dang lhan thabs kyi dpe cha 'dzom zhing rnam dpyod yangs pa rnams la mi dgos na'ang dpe cha 'dzom pa dka' zhing 'dzom kyang sdeb mi shes pa'i blo chung bdag lta bu la nag po 'gro shes 'di lta bu lag tu blang bde ba dang dge 'dun 'ga' zhig tshogs nas rnal 'byor dag rim ngag 'don byed tshe phyag len 'di bzhin byed dgos pa rje yab sras kyi dgongs pa @047b yin shis lhan thabs su bkod par snang bas de bzhin byas pa phan yon che bar bsam nas rang nyid kyi bag chags 'jog pa dang skal mnyam gzhan la'ang phan 'dod kyi bsam pas rnal 'byor dag rim gyi lhan thabs 'dul 'dzin dang mkhas grub kyis mdzad pa gnyis ka mthong ba las 'dir rje rang gis gsang sngags kyi bstan pa'i gnad thams cad bum pa gang byo'i tshul du gang la bstsal bar grags pa'i sras kyi thu bo mkhas grub bstan pa'i nyi ma dge legs dpal bzang pos mdzad pa'i lhan thabs rgyas par snang bas de ji lta ba bzhin du yul byang phyogs kyi mthar skyes pa'i ban chung gyi na ba ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan dpal bzang pos 'jam dbyangs gong ma'i rgyal khab chen po be'i cing gi bod @048a * chos lha khang du grags par bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni gzhung lugs du ma la blo gros yangs pa'i rab 'byams smra ba blo bzang nyi ma'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba blo bzang grags pa'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3357</vol>
<tib>sa brgyad dbang phyug rnam mang thos sras mdud dmar can lha'i dge bsnyen gyi tshul bzung ba chos skyong chen po tshangs pa dung thod can gyi gsol mchod 'dod pa'i re skong zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-2a</p>
<col>@002a * (ces sa brgyad dbang phyug rnam mang thos sras mdud dmar can lha'i dge bsnyen gyi tshul bzung ba chos skyong chen po tshangs pa dung thod can gyi gsol mchod 'dod pa'i re skong zhes bya ba 'di ni dge ldan dge rgyas gling gi dge bsgos chen po sdom brtson blo bzang bstan pas tshogs 'don du 'dugs gyu 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes nan tan chen pos bskul ba'i ngor rgyal ba yab sras kyi gsur rgyun la brten nas dza ya pandi ta blo bzang 'phrin las kyis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni chos la blo mig rgyas pa lha bris pa ngag dbang bzang po'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3358</vol>
<tib>bder gshegs bdun gyi mchod pa'i chog sgrigs yid bzhin dbang rgyal zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-73a</p>
<col>@072a * ces bde bar gshegs pa bdun gyi smon lam gyi cho ga 'di nyid gangs can phan bde'i rtsi sman gyi ljon pa chen po yin par mchims nam mkha' grags kyis mkhan po'i gzhung la dgos nges kyi lhan thabs mdzad pa'i kungs btsun na'ang bar skabs su mdo chog rgyas bsdus kyi dbye ba sogs mkhan por kha ga-yar ba dang mchims kyi chog sgrigs ma la gzhan gyis 'brel med mang du sbyar ba'i nyi ma 'phul thabs dang gzhan mgo skor ba lhur blangs @072b shing la la nyung ba tsam gyis ya mtshan par rloms te tshig sna bsdus pa'i shog ldebs gsum bzhi la tshang ba'i yi ge mang pos lugs srol 'di nyid tshong 'dung 'o ma ltar bslad pa mthong bas rkyen byams mkha' mnyam gyi skye rgu mtha' dag la phan 'dod kyi lhag pa'i bsam pas drangs te snga mo nas rtsom 'dun yod pa dang dbus gtsang du chos sde gsar btsugs phal cher la'ang mdo chog tshugs yod par phan slebs che 'dra snyam pa'i steng thos bsam dar rgyas gling pa'i slob dpon pa 'phrin las rgya mtsho shangs dga' ldan chos 'khor ba'i slob dpon don grub rgya mtsho dbu mdzad blo bzang yon tan mchod dpon ngag dbang shes rab dge slong 'jam dbyangs grags pa gsol dpon ge rab blo bzang mkhyen brtse rnams kyis bskul ba dang phyag mdzod sa skyong blo bzang mthu stobs kyis mri ru ba tshor brag sgo rab 'byams pas snang bar gang dran gyis rgyas 'bring bsdus pa sogs sna tshogs byas tshul gyi sgyur sbyang la brten chog sgrigs shig dgos zhes rmi ru bla ma rin chen rgya mtshos bskul bas kyang rkyen byas nye char chen po hor gyi rgyal khams kyi sa'i cha khal kha ga-yon ru nas 'jam dbyangs sprul pa'i sku blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis gser gyi mandal dang hor gos bsngags btags sogs kyi khyad nor dang bcas gsung gis bskul bas 'tshams sbyar te @073a * yid ches shing spro ba bskyed pa mdo sngags kyi khyad par 'byed pa'i dpyad pa sngon du btang ba'i sgo nas thams cad mkhyen bzhi ba 'tsho'i gsung dngos mar med du mi rung ba'i 'tshams sbyor dang gsal byed kyis brgyan pa'i bder gshegs bdun gyi mchod pa'i chog sgrigs yid bzhin dbang rgyal zhes pa 'di ni yongs 'dzin dam pa chos bzhin du spyod pa du ma'i bka' drin las chos 'di la lhag par mos pa'i ngang pa thob pa za hor gyi bande ngag dbang blo bzang rgya mtsho 'jigs med go cha thub bstan lang tsho'i sdes bag yod ces pa chu glang mgos nya ba'i lhag pa lha mtshams kyi 'grub sbyor gyi dus dge bar rang byung 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang gi gtsug lag khang po brang dmar po rir sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni gnas brtan 'jam dbyangs grags pas bgyis pa lus can mtha' dag sman gyi bla bee d'urya 'od kyi rgyal po'i go 'phang mngon du byed pa'i rgyur gyur cig  chos sbyin rgya cher spel phyir dga' ldan phun tshogs gling du par du bsgurbs sarba mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3358</vol>
<tib>rje btsun seng ldeng nags sgrol la bstod pa mkhas pa'i gtsun rgyan gyi 'grel pa mkhas pa dga' byed ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-29a</p>
<col>@029a * (ces rje btsun seng ldeng nags sgrol la bstod pa mkhas pa'i gtsug rgyan gyi 'grel pa mkhas pa dga' byed ces bya ba 'di ni mdo sngags rab 'byams la blo gros kyi snang ba 'bar ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen bla ma tshe brtan grags pa nas yang yang bskul ma mdzad pa ltar sa mtha'i rigs smra ban chung wa g'indra pa tu siddhis mdo sngags rig gnas kyi tshal hu re chen mor sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni chos kyi mig dang ldan pa'i tsi lu pradzny'a s'a ga ra'o 'dis kyang 'jam mgon bstan pa dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par 'gyur zhing 'gro ba thams cad rje btsun ma yis rjes su 'dzin par gyur cig  sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<col>@163b (ces rnam thar tshig gsal don gsal gyi rnam bshad 'chal spyod dug can tsher ma phyi mar 'thag pa'i rdo rje'i me stag ces bya ba 'di ni rgyal ba'i gsung rab mtha' dag la gzhan 'dring mi 'jog pa'i spobs pa dge ba can gyi nges pa'i don gyi mkhas pa chen po bdag gi bla ma ^bka' drin bla med wa gindr'a rtha siddhis khyod kyis 'di la 'grel pa byed thu ba na bgyis gzhan la phan srid ces bka' stsal ba spyi bos dang du blangs te bla ma de nyid dang gzhan yang bcu phrag rig pa'i gnas la mkhyen pa mkha' ltar yangs shing mdo sngags bstan pa'i snying po la ci dgar rol pa'i dpal ldan bla ma dam pa ^punya mangga la la sogs pa'i bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin gyis nye bar 'tsho ba'i ban chung gyi na ba ('di ni rgya mtsho'i yon tan gyis) zhig gis rab 'byung bcu bzhi pa'i drag po zhes pa lcags pho spre'u lor mdo sngags rigs gnas kun 'dzom gyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen padmo'i mtsho la ngang mo'i khyu tshogs 'khrigs pa lta bu rnams kyis lung dang rigs pa'i sgra dbyangs mdun bsu thub pa'i sde pa yis mgo rgyan me yi rig byed kyi bran ga-yogs sten pa'i yon tan gyi rang bzhin can gyi gzhon nu dang me yi rtse mor gza' yi zla @164a * sbyar ba'i bu mo mdza' ba yi dga' ston la rol ming can no mngon par sgrogs pa'i gnas dga' ldan theg chen gling du sug bris bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang ^rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  sarba k'a le shubham</col>

<tib>ston pa thugs rje can gyi 'khrungs rabs so bzhi pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa theg chen chos kyi sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@005a * (ces 'khrungs rab so bzhi pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa theg chen chos kyi sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba 'di ni ^gangs ri'i mgon po'i sku mdun pa mchod dpon sde drug mkhan po bskal bzang rnam rgyal gyis 'khrungs rab so bzhi pa'i snying po bsdus @005b te ston pa thugs rje can de nyid la bka' drin dran pa'i sgo nas gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshul rgyun du kha ton du byas chog pa 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba la brten nas ston pa thugs rje can de'i rjes su bzhugs te chos smra ba dge slong ^ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis gru 'dzin gnyis pa'i gzhal med khang gi gzim chung bde ba can du sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang thub pa'i bstan pa rin po che 'phel zhing rgyas par gyur cig mangga lam</col>
