<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3367</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das kun rig rnam par mdzad kyi cho ga'i t'i kka gsal ba'i sgron me</tib>
<p>1a-47b</p>
<col>@047a * de ltar kun rig rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i lag len gdon dmigs pa yid la byed tshul shes byed kyi khungs dang sbyar dgag sgrub kyi spros pa cung zad dang bcas te bshad pa 'di ni rgyal ba btsong kha pa chen po'i bka' drin las rgyud sde bzhi'i lam gyi rim pa la blo kha phyogs shing phyad par du mdo sngags kyi bstan pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i mnga' bdag rje btsun shes rab bzang po'i zhabs rdul spyi bos bsten pa la brten nas spyod rgyud kyi gsung rgyun mchan bu bsdus don dang bcas pa dang rje 'dul ba 'dzin pa rang gis mdzad pa'i t'i kka sogs la ring du 'dris par byas pa dang rang gzhan gyi lugs so so'i 'dod tshul phyag len dang bcas pa yang khong du chud par byas te ston pa sangs rgyas nas lo nyi sa stong dang sum brgya bdun cu don gcig song ba ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u'i dus bag yod ces pa chu bo glang gi lo smin drug zla ba'i dkar phyogs la dge slong yon tan bshes gnyen gyis dben gnas yul lha sdings su sbyar ba'o gang gi mtshan tsam rna bar lhung bas kyang ngan song skye ba'i rgyun lam yongs bcad de thar pa'i mchog sbyin rnam par snang mdzad dang dbyer med bla ma'i zhabs la phyag bgyid do de yi rgyud don 'grel byed t'i ka chung zhes nyung gsal legs bshad nor bu'i 'phreng ba 'di par du bskrun pa'i dge @047b bas 'gro ba kun mi khom ngan song la yang las grol gyur cig rtag tu dal 'byor tshang ba'i rten thob cing mtshan ldan bshes gnyen dam pas rjes bzung ste thun mong lam sbyangs sngags kyi sgor zhugs nas rgyud don ji bzhin nyams su len par shog sgo gsum bya bar bcas pa'i lcags kyi khams phyag rgya rnam bzhi'i gser 'gyur rtsis bran te mngon byang lnga yis rnam snang sku thob nas mkha' mnyam 'gro drug 'dren pa'i dpal gyur cig ces pa 'di ni snga sor skyabs mchog 'jigs med dbang po'i bkas t'i ka chung 'di nyid dus 'khor grwa tshang gi 'dzin grwa gsham ma'i 'dzin chos su gtong bzhin pa yin kyang bris nor rgyun 'byams kyis yid brtan shin tu dka' bar brten dpon slob las thog pa mkhas btsun bzang po'i bdag nyid blo bzang 'jam dbyangs skal ldan nas rgyu sbyar te thugs khur bzhes shing smra ba'i dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzin pa 'jam dbyangs chos ldan sogs kyis zhus dag legs par bgyis te par du bsgrubs pa'i par byang du ^btsun pa dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron mes bris pa'o dge'o "</col>
</item>

<tib>dpal mgon 'phags pa klu sgrub rang nyid kyis mdo'i don ji ltar bkral ba'i dgongs don rab gsal sgron me zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3367</vol>
<tib>mkhan chen chos kyi rgyal po'i gsung 'bum las byang chub lam rim gyi 'khrid blo yi mun sel zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-20a</p>
<col>@020a * zhes pa 'di ni dad ldan gyi dge slong kun dga' rgyal mtshan pas lam rim gyi don go sla zhing tshig nyung don tshang bcig nges par dgos zhes dad pa'i me tog dang bcas te bskul ba'i ngor rgyal ba yab sras gnyis kyi zhabs rdul spyi bor len cing gsung gi bdud rtsi myong ba'i lha'i btsun pa ^blo bzang bstan 'dzin rgyal mtshan gyis sbyar ba'i dge bas rgyal ba gnyis pa'i bstan pa dar zhing rgyas la 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gsos sman du gyur cig  sarba mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<tib>mkhan chen chos kyi rgyal po'i gsung 'bum las byang chub lam rim gyi 'khrid blo yi mun sel zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@003b (ces bka' drin gsol @004a * 'debs bla ma'i thugs rgyud bskul ba'i gdung dbyangs zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs dang chos kyi spun grogs ye shes kyi d'i ka ma phan thog srin can ae ri hi tsha kan t'a ra no yon nas bka' drin gsol 'debs dgos zhes bskul ba'i ngor ^dam pa'i ming can gyis bris pa'o de yang ming spel gyi mtshams 'dir bskul ba po li 'dod pas ming srel 'di ltar byas pa yin no zang gar mos kyi rtsa ba'i bla ma'i mtshan bcug pas kyang legs par 'gyur ro ) sarba aartha sidham "</col>
</item>

<tib>brtan bzhugs gsol 'debs 'dod pa'i re skong 'dod rgu yid bzhin 'jo ba'i bum bzang zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-5a</p>
<col>@005a * (ces pa 'di ni ^rgyal ba 'od snang mtha' yas zhing 'dir mi yi gang rol kun gzigs pan chen mchog gi sprul sku rin po che'i zhal dkyil mngon gyur thog mar byung 'phral mtshan blo bzang thub bstan chos kyi nyi ma dge legs rnam rgyal zhes gsol te bstan dang 'gro ba yongs kyi dpal mgon dam par zhing 'dir bskal pa rgya mtsho'i bar du brtan bzhugs kyi gsol 'debs la brtson 'dun gyi yid kyi nyer len dang bcas te yod skabs pan chen mchog gi 'phrin las pa dza sag bla ma nas kyang nan tan chen pos bskul ngor ^sh'akya'i ring lugs 'dzin pa ngag dbang blo bzang thub bstan rgya mtsho 'jigs bral dbang phyug phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba'i sde dpal bzang pos rab byung bco lnga pa sa byi hor zla dang po'i dkar phyogs dga' ba gsum par smras pa dge legs 'phel sarba mangga lam</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3368</vol>
<tib>bsnyen rdzogs sogs su bsgrub tshul gyi cho ga 'khyer bde kun phan zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-17a</p>
<col>@017a * (bsnyen rdzogs sogs su bsgrub tshul gyi cho ga 'khyer bde kun phan zhes bya ba 'di ni khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po shar tsong kha pa blo bzang grags pa'i bstan pa rin po ched shar phyogs kyi nor 'dzin yangs pa'i gzhi chen po dar rgyas su mdzad par smon pa'i 'bras bu legs par grub pa'i skyes chen 'gro ba yongs kyi phan bde'i rtsa lag tu gyur ba'i tho yon hu thog thu blo bzang bstan 'dzin rgya mtsho 'di lta bu zhig gyis zhes bskul ba'i bka' stsal dang du blangs te ban chung snyoms las pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan dpal bzang pos cho ga dngos gzhi dus gsum rgyal ba'i dbang po thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs pa ngag dbang blo bzang rgya mtsho dpal bzang pos mdzad pa'i las cho ga rnam rgyal gser mdog sgra de bzhin pa dang dus go gdams ngag bshad pa phyag len rnams mdor bsdus te 'khyer bde bar bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni sdom brtson rnam dpyod yangs pa'i dge tshul dpal bzang ngo 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3369</vol>
<tib>rgyal ba rdo rje 'chang grub chen brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yi dam bka' sdod dang bcas pa mchod pa'i chog grub dbang bzhad pa'i rol mo zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@029b de ltar rgyal ba rdo rje 'chang grub pa'i dbang phyug brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yi dam bka' sdod dang bcas pa mchod pa'i cho ga grub dbang bzhad pa'i rol mo zhes bya ba 'di ni dran mchog rdo rje 'dzin dbang mchog gi drung nas drin can rtsa ba'i bla ma'i byin brlabs rdo rje 'chang gi byin brlabs sngon 'gro'i grub chen brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yi dam bka' sdod dang bcas pa'i byin rlabs thun mong ma yin pa mnos skabs 'di lta bu zhig bgyis shig pa'i bka' lung sgrub phyir rmongs pan gyi na pa zhi gis bla ma grub thob chen po rnams la gsol ba btab ste gtso cher mkhas grub gong ma rnams kyi gsung las btus shing tshig sbyor 'ga' zhig gsar spel bgyis te bsgrigs pa 'dis kyang bdag sogs 'gro ba kun bla ma grub dbang ye shes kyi sku can rnams kyis rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur cig "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3369</vol>
<tib>rje btsun byams mgon gyi bstod pa</tib>
<p>1a-3b</p>
<col>@003b ces pa 'di mkhas grub kun gyi gtsug rgyan dam pa chos kyi rje bkra shis rin chen gyi zhal snga nas kyi bka' stsal dang du blangs nas blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis dben sa chos kyi pho brang gi gtsug lag khang du sbyar ba dge legs 'phel "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3370</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das sman pa'i rgyal po'i sgo nas gson sbyang bya tshul</tib>
<p>1a-16a</p>
<col>@015b (zhes pa 'di ni dpal ldan 'bras spungs kyi sman pa grwa tshan gi slob dpon mkhan po sman rams pas 'gro ba mi rnams kyi nad sel ba'i ched du rgyab brten dpung grogs 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba'i ngor bka' ma chog par ^dharma swa mis mkhan chen zhi ba 'tsho'i mdzad pa'i yig cha dang gzhir byas nas bris pas sems can thams kyis dug gsum @016a * gyi rgyu 'bras nad las gyur ba nyid du thar pa dang bde gshegs brgyad kyi go 'phang tshe 'di nyid la thob par gyur cig  dad ldan sbyin pa'i bdag po mu h'u yis chos sde bde chen lhun grub gling mchog tu rgyu rkyen sbyar de bar du bzhengs pa'i dges 'gro kun bla med byad chen myur thob shog (bar du brkos pa'i tshe lo don lnga grags</col>

<item>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3370</vol>
<tib>spyan 'dren khrus gsol gyi dmigs rnam mdor bsdus phan bde'i gru char 'gyed pa'i rdzogs ldan sprin gyi sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-10a</p>
<col>@009b ces spyan 'dren khrus gsol gyi dmigs rnam mdor bsdus phan bde'i gru char 'gyed pa'i rdzogs ldan sprin gyi sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba 'di yang dus gsum sangs rgyas kun 'dus kyi ngo bo ^'jam dpal dbyangs dngos dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron me'i zhal snga nas dang bka' drin dang thugs rje mtshungs zla ma mchis pa 'jam dbyangs bla ma rje btsun dkon mchog rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po rnam gnyis las lam khrid bde lam dang 'jam dpal zhal lung gi khrid lan mang po mnos pa'i skabs khrus gsol gyi bshad pa mdor bsdus re gnang ba'i snga phyi'i gsung ris rgyas bsdus kyi khyad par phra mo tshun chad ma brjed par gung bsgrigs @010a * shing bla ma dam pa gzhan dag las thos pa 'ga' zhig gis kyang brgyan te rang nyid kyi blo ngor 'dum bde ba'i phyir btsun gzugs shes rab rgya mtshos phyogs gcig tu bsdebs pa 'di yang tshe rabs thams cad du dam pa'i bshes kyis rjes su bzung ste mdo rgyud zab rgyas kyi gdams pa ma lus pa khong du chud cing de don sgrub pa mthar phyin pa'i rgyu kho nar gyur cig  aom swa sti chos srid 'byor ba'i mdzod dang dge bcu ldan dga' ldan rab rgyas zhes bya'i rgyud grwa cher kun mkhyen 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa yab sras kyi thugs rjes chos sbyin 'dzad med rgyun 'di spel mangga lam "</col>

<item>

<p>1a-17a</p>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3372</vol>
<tib>khams gsum 'gro ba'i bla ma tsong kha pa chen po la sgo gsum gus pa chen po'i sgo nas bstod pa dge ldan bstan pa'i bad tshal rgyas par byed pa'i nyin byed ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-5a</p>
<col>@004b (ces khams gsum 'gro ba'i bla ma ^blo bzang rdo rje 'chang zhes snyan pa'i ba dang dkar po srid pa gsum na che cher ga-yo ba de nyid la sgo gsum gus pa chen po'i sgo nas bstod pa dge ldan bstan pa'i bad tshal rgyas par byed pa'i nyin byed ces bya ba 'di ni ^aa ky'a hu thog thu'i skye bar grags pa'i rigs pa smra ba sha sye na dhar @005a * su rya'am ming gzhan snang mdzad dgyes bshad rdo rje 'bod pas rang lo nyer gicg pa bstod 'grel ltar na phur bu zhes pa dbang thang dang bstun pa sa pho swre'u'i lo'i hor zla dang po cho 'phrul zla bar grags pa'i dkar phyogs dga' ba dad po pas sangs mon gru 'phrad pa'i lang tsho sbyor ba'i nyin ^sku 'bum dga' ldan byams pa gling phyogs thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i chos kyi sde chen po'i aa ky'a bla brang dge ldan chos 'phel gling gi rang nyid kyi brad khang blo bzang rigs pa'i skyed tshal nas sug bris su bgyis pa sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3372</vol>
<tib>khyab bdag 'khor lo'i mgon po rje btsun blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po la bstod cing gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshul don gnyis lhun grub zhes bya ba bzhugs s+ho "</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col>@003a * (de ltar rgyal ba thams cad kyi mkhyen btse nus gsum gyi bdag nyid bdag cag rnams la bka' drin 'khor mtha' ma mchis pa khyab bdag 'khor lo'i mgon po ^rje btsun blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po la bstod cing gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshul 'di yang gang gi rnam thar la mi phyed pa'i dad pas kun nas bslang ste rang nyid skyes sbyongs yon tan gyis dben kyang dam pa'i mtshan gyis byin gyis rlabs pa rgyu mtshan du byas nas mgrin bzang gzig lbags gyon pa'i dang tshul can sh'akya'i rjes 'jug ^blo bzang thub bstan dbang phyug 'jigs med rgya mtshos dus kyi pho nya zhes pas pho rta lor dad rten du rje btsun bla ma dam pa de nyid kyi sku brnyan bzhengs skabs snron zla ba'i tshe bcu dgu'i nyin sug bris su bgyis pa 'dis kyang 'gro kun theg pa mchog gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'dzin par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3372</vol>
<tib>rgyal ba'i bstan srung chen po rnams la las bzhi'i 'phrin las 'chol tshul dngos grub myur 'gugs rdo rje'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-4b</p>
<col>@004b (ces pa 'di yang 'jam mgon rgyal ba gnyis pa'i dngos slob 'phrin las nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sras chen bzhi'i ya gyal 'jam dbyangs chos kyi rje bkra shis dpal ldan pa sogs sku 'phreng du mang rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan phyogs kun tu sgeng bar mdzad pa'i skye rgu'i 'dren pa chen po mtshan yongs su grags pa khal kha rje btsun dam pa blo bzang thub bstan dbang phyug 'jigs med rgya mtsho'i dpal bzang po nas rgyal ba'i bstan bsrungs chen po rnams la dus gtor dang rgyun gyi mchod gtor sogs kyi skabs gang 'os su sbyar chog pa'i las bzhi'i 'phrin las 'chol tshul 'di lta bu zhig gyis shig cas pa ka'i bskul ma gnang ba'i bzhed pa bskong ba'i phyir du rig pa 'dzin pa'i tha shal pa bskal bzang shar gyi dbang po'am ming gzhan blo bzang chos kyi dbang phyug tu 'bod pas bris pa 'dis kyang dam pa mchog de'i 'phrin las phyogs bcur rgyas pa'i rgyur gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>

<vol>3374</vol>
<tib># gcig tu bral gyi yig cha'i dka' gnas kha skang dang bcas pa gsal bar bshad pa'i rnam gzhag blo gsar dga' skyed bee d'urya'i mgul rgyan zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-18b</p>
<col>@017b (ces pa 'di ni ^rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs rje rin po che @018a * la zhal gzigs te man ngag gnang skabs he ru ka lhun po'i rtse mor dngos su zhugs te 'dzam gling spyan ladn 'dug pas byin rlabs ha cang myur du 'dzug pa'i dbang gis rgya gar na he ru ka'i rnal 'byor bas yi rdul lyar mang du byung zhes gsung po'i he ru ka de nyid dpal ldan chos grags la zhal gzigs te ci 'dod gsung bar phyogs las rnam rgyal zhus pas ha ha he zhes gsung byin pa tsam gyis chos grags nyid phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams mu med par btsal khyang rnyed rgyu med pa rigs pa smra ba'i seng ge'i ngar skad sgrog pas phas rgol gyi ri dwags ngan pa yod tshad kyi thod bum dral byed kyi 'gran zla med pa'i pan chen zhig tu gyur ba sogs dran pa tsam gyis byin rlabs mchog stsol zhing sgrub 'brel med par dngos grub mchog stsol ba'i yi dam gyi lha'i gtso bo de nyid bsam bzhin du dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshul bzung ste byang phyogs khal khar byon zhes snang mtha'i pan chen gyis dngos su lung bstan pa'i skyes chen dam pa mtshan brjod par dka' bdon gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te ^rje btsun blo bzang tshul khrims 'jigs med bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po zhes rgya bod hor gsum na yongs su grags pa'i bdan dkar po rnam par bsgreng bde nyid ri bo dge rgyas dga' ldan bshad sgrub gling ci rigs su lo bcu phrag gnyis tsam zhal zhugs pa'i ring la mdo sngags zung 'brel dang thun mong gi rigs gnas rgya bod hor gsum na yod tshad dang bod na yang nub la khad pa'i sgra rigs par mkhas pa'i blo gsal mkhas mang klong brdol du byung zhing rje nyid kyi byin rlabs kyis 'chad rtsod rtson gsum gyi bya ba me ltar 'bar ba'i sgo nas dpal @018b ldan 'bras spungs bkra shis sgo mang gnyis par song ba'i chos grwa chen po dga' ldan theg chen gling pa'i rigs smra'i char gtogs shes brgya zhes pas gcig tu bral gyi dka' gnas skor la snga nas sems la phral phral du byung ba'i mos mno'i tho re ba rnams lung rigs kyis brgyan te bsam kyin yod skabs dpyid chos phyi ma'i dam dam bcar khad nye ba'i tsho gzhung gser gong 'og gi grwa rigs rigs smra'i ser phrug rnams la phan snyam pas rkyen byas te shog bur bris pa 'di yang ^bla ma he ru ka de nyid rmad byung bas kyang rmad byung ngo mtshar bas kyang ngo mtshar ba'i gser zhal bskal brgyad zhugs te sa mtha'i 'gro ba kun gyi ma rig mun pa sel bar mdzad pa'i rgyur gyur cig </col>
</item>

<tib>bstan pa'i gsal byed chen po rgyal khang rtse rin po che rje blo bzang dpal 'byor lhun grub kyi rnam par thar pa skal bzang rna ba'i bcud len zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-39a</p>
<col>@038a * (ces byang phyogs bstan pa'i gsal byed chen po drin can rtsa ba'i bla ma ^rgyal khang rtse hu thug thu rin po che grub pa'i dbang phyug rje blo bzang dpal 'byor lhun grub dpal bzang po'i rnam par thar pa mdo tsam brjod pa skal bzang rna ba'i bcud len zhes bya ba 'di yang ring mo zhig nas bri 'dod pas gsol dpon thos 'en bla ma stobs chen bzang po dang gleng mo zhib tu byas rung rje nyid kyi rnam thar gyis bon med gshis phral du ma grub kyang rjes su lung rig smra dbang thos 'en dge slong rab brtan rdo rje nas rnam thar gyi sa bon tsam ldab ldib yi ger bkod khul dang @038b bcas gsung shing lhag par dad stobs phul du byung ba dza sag no yon chos dkon mchog bkra shis lags nas dngul dang lha rdzas bcas gsol ras gnang ste ces kyang bris shig ces gsung ba'i ngo ldog ma nus ma zad rang nyid kyang rtsa ba'i bla ma thugs rje can de nyid rnam thar brjod bskal bzang po'i rten 'brel du bsam ste thos 'en bla ma nas gnang ba'i sa bon thar thor zin bris su btab pa de la gzhi byas phran rang nyid kyis kyang de nyid kyi 'ga' zhig dngos su mthong zhing zhal lung las thos pa rnams kyis kyang kha bskong ste gangs can mgon po skyabs mgon rgyal dbang yab sras dang byang phyogs bstan 'gro'i gtsug nor lha skal skyabs mchog rje btsun dam pa rin po che sku phreng rim byon zhwa ser bstan pa'i mnga' bdag ^khri chen rdo rje 'chang rnam pa gnyis kyi zhal snga nas sogs mtha' dbus kyi mkhas grub dam pa mang po rnams kyi zhabs rdul bsten cing rje bla ma grub pa'i dbang phyug 'di nyid kyi sku'i drung nas kyang chos kyi bka' thob pa'i rgyal khams pa rab ming ngag dbang blo @039a * bzang ngam ye shes thub bstan zhes pa zhig gis ^dam pa de nyid gzugs sku chos dbyings su bsdus nas lo bco brgyad pa khrag skyug ces pa chu mo phag lo'i sa ga zla ba'i tshes pa brgyad kyi nyin mjug rdzogs par ^skyabs mgon mchog gi gdan sa khu re chen mo'i bsti gnas dga' ldan theg chen gling gi rang sh'ag tu sug bris su bgyis pa 'dis kyang 'gro kun bshes gnyen dam pas rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyur cig mangga lam shr'i dzwa la dzambu dw'i pa aa langk'a ra bha wantu</col>

<tib>no title [@001a * bee byang phyogs lcang lo can gyi pho brang nas rgyal chen rnam mang thos sras rta bdag brgyad nor lha gnod sbyin bye ba'i 'khor dang bcas ]"</tib>
<p>1a-1b</p>
<col>@001b ('di ni chos rje blo bzang rnam rgyal ba'i 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba'i ngor ^blo bzang ming chang bas sug bris su bgyis pa'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3376</vol>
<tib>no title [@001b dpal ldan rtsa ba'i bla ma rin po che bdag gi snying gar padmo'i gdan bzhugs la bka' drin chen po'i sgo nas rjes bzung ste sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol ]"</tib>

<tib>'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa</tib>
<p>1a-30b</p>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3379</vol>
<tib>bsam gzugs chen mo las mdor bsdus te bkod pa bsam gzugs kyi rnam gzhag legs bshad bum bzang zhes bya ba bzhugs pa dge legs 'phel "</tib>
<p>1a-33a</p>
<col>@033a ces bsam gzugs kyi rnam bzhag mdor bsdus pa legs bshad bdud rtsi'i bum bzang zhes bya ba 'di ni yongs rdzogs bstan pa'i mnga' bdag mkhas shing grub pa'i dbang phyug kun mkhyen chen po 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa'i bsam gzugs kyi mtha' dpyod chen mo nyid mkhas pa rnams la rnam par dpyod pa'i sgo mtha' yas pa ster ba'i sngon med pa'i legs bshad rin po che lta bur 'dug kyang dus dbang gis blo gros dang rtsol ba zhan pa rnams kyi blos 'chun dka' bar brten mdor bsdus shig byung na rang dang skal mnyam rnams la phan par bsam ste mang du thos pa'i dge slong rigs pa smra ba dkon mchog 'jigs med dbang pos bsam gzugs chen mo'i tshig sna bstungs te dgongs don dang mi 'gal bar mdor bsdus pa'i lugs su bkod par rtsod pa'i tshe gong 'og tu zhib cha 'don dgos pa'ang yod pas blo gros ma 'dzings pa rnams kyis go rigs ya bral du ma song bas brtag gzhig zhib mor mdzad na ring po mi thogs par rnam par dpyod pa'i padmo rgyas par 'gyur ro "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3379</vol>
<tib>byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i 'khrid gser gyi yang zhun zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-23a</p>
<col>@023a * skyes bu gsum gyi lam gyi rim pa'i 'khrid bdud rtsi gser gyi yang zhun zhes bgyi pa rje bla ma'i nyams mgur dang sbyar nas 'khyer bde bar bkod pa 'di ni bstan pa'i gsal byed chen po lugs 'di la shin tu mos shing don du gnyer ba kun mkhyen chen po shes rab dpal bzang gi gdan sa pa chen po mdo chod chos rjes gsol ba nan cher bskul ba la brten nas na tshong phra mo nas rje bla mas byin gyis brlabs pa'i mtshan mtho ba pa sh'akya'i dge slong chos smra ba'i btsun pa bsod nams rgya mtshos dpal ldan 'bras spungs chos kyi sde chen po'i gzims khang dga' ldan pho brang gi nyi 'od rnam par 'khyil bar sbyar ba 'dis kyang bstan pa'i snying po phyogs dus kun tu rgyas par byed nus par gyur cig  bkra shis "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3379</vol>
<tib>dbu ma rtsa ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa shes rab ces bya ba</tib>
<p>3a-23a inc [*missing page from 1a-2b*]</p>
<col>@023a * dbu ma'i rtsa ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa shes rab ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i chos mngon par rnam par bzhag pa don dam pa'i de kho na yang dag par ston pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gsal bar byed pa slob dpon bdag nyid chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub mi 'phrogs pa'i mkhyen rab dang thugs rjer ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa bla na med pa'i tshul rab tu 'byed pa rab tu dga' ba'i sa bsgrubs nas bde ba can gyi zhing du gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams dang ba'i 'od ces bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas 'od ces bya bar 'gyur bas mdzad pa rdzogs so dbang phyug chen po'i mnga' bdag rgyal po chen po dpal lha btsan po'i bka' lung gis rgya gar gyi mkhan po theg pa chen po dbu ma pa dzny'a na garbha dang zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong cog ro glu'i rgyal mtshan gyis sgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa 'di la rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa bdun shloo ka ni bzhi brgya bzhi bcu rtsa dgu yod bam po ni phyed dang gnyis su byas so slad kyi grong khyer dpe med kyi bandi ta bidya ha su ma ti'i zhal snga nas dang bod kyi lo ts'a ba sh'akya'i dge slong nyi ma grags kyis 'grel ba dang bstun nas shin tu legs par bcos so (ces pa 'di ni bkra shis chos spel grwa tshang gi par du bsgrubs pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3379</vol>
<tib>dpal rgyud sde lnga gtso bsdus kyi bsnyen pa'i kha skong sbyin sreg gi tho yig don 'grub ma</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3379</vol>
<tib>rgyal ba rdo rje 'chang dang dpal rgyud sde lnga'i yi dam gtso bsdus la brten pa'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor bde legs kun khyab ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-12a</p>
<col>@012a * (ces rgyal ba rdo rje 'chang dang dpal rgyud sde lnga'i yi dam gtso bsdus la brten pa'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor bde legs kun khyab ces bya ba 'di ni mdo sngags gzhung lugs rab 'byams smra ba'i dbang po slob dpon rdo rje 'dzin pa [???] yu: badzra nas ne gu lugs rgyud sde lnga dang 'brel ba'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor cung zad rgyas pa lam gyi gnad tshang bzhig ces kyang bri dgos zhes nan tan du bskul ma mdzad ba don yod par bya ba'i phyir rang cag gi shangs chos kyi brgyud pa'i 'brel khyad kyis rje btsun dam pa sgrol ba'i mgon pos mdzad pa'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor spyi mthun zhig la gzhi rten bcol te gsung tshig phal cher bcos med du bkod cing skabs don dang bstun pa'i kha 'gengs dang mtshams sbyor gang 'os su sbyar te bla ma dam pa rnams kyi dka' drin gyis 'tsho ba bhu su ku pa ^dam tshig rdo rjes bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni rig byed 'dzin pa dge slong blo bzang chos ldan gyis bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang gsang chen zab mo'i bshad sgrub kyi ring lugs dri ma med pa phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par byed nus par gyur cig dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3379</vol>
<tib>rgyal ba rdo rje 'chang dang dpal rgyud sde lnga'i yi dam gtso bsdus la brten pa'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor bde legs kun khyab ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-12a</p>
<col>@012a * (ces rgyal ba rdo rje 'chang dang dpal rgyud sde lnga'i yi dam gtso bsdus la brten pa'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor bde legs kun khyab ces bya ba 'di ni mdo sngags gzhung lugs rab 'byams smra ba'i dbang po slob dpon rdo rje 'dzin pa [???] yu: badzra nas ne gu lugs rgyud sde lnga dang 'brel ba'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor cung zad rgyas pa lam gyi gnad tshang bzhig ces kyang bri dgos zhes nan tan du bskul ma mdzad ba don yod par bya ba'i phyir rang cag gi shangs chos kyi brgyud pa'i 'brel khyad kyis rje btsun dam pa sgrol ba'i mgon pos mdzad pa'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor spyi mthun zhig la gzhi rten bcol te gsung tshig phal cher bcos med du bkod cing skabs don dang bstun pa'i kha 'gengs dang mtshams sbyor gang 'os su sbyar te bla ma dam pa rnams kyi dka' drin gyis 'tsho ba bhu su ku pa ^dam tshig rdo rjes bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni rig byed 'dzin pa dge slong blo bzang chos ldan gyis bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang gsang chen zab mo'i bshad sgrub kyi ring lugs dri ma med pa phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par byed nus par gyur cig dge legs 'phel</col>

<tib>gtor ma brgya rtsa'i khrid yig dngos grub kun 'byung zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-19b</p>
<col>@019b ces gtor ma brgya rtsa'i khrid yig dngos grub kun byung zhes bya ba 'di ni snga mo nas dga' ldan dar rgyas gling gi grwa rigs dge slong bsod nams chos grags sogs dang ldan mang pos bskul zhing nye char lugs gnyis ga la mkhyen spyan mchog tu yangs dar hang mkhan po chos mdzad bskal bzang bstan 'dzin rnam rgyal gyis nan chen pos bskul ba la brten nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nas bzung dam pa par ma chad pa las brgyud pa'i gtor ma'i man ngag legs par thob pa rgyal khams pa dge slong ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis pho brang chen po po ta la'i gzim chung bde ba can du sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang thub pa'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs kun tu 'phel zhing rgyas par gyur cig aom swasti rgyal bstan pad tshal phan bde'i dri bsung can bshad sgrub 'dab rgyas rnam grol sbrang rtsi'i bcud 'gro kun sbyor phyir sku 'bum byams gling du gser tog sgar nas mthun rkyon sbyar te bsgrugs sarba mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3385</vol>
<tib>pad+ma dbang chen yang gsang khros pa'i las byang gi skabs su nye bar mkho ba'i sman rak gtor gsum byin rlabs kyi dmigs rnam yid la byed tshul gsal bar bkod pa dbang chen dgyes byed ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-9a</p>
<col>@008b (ces pad+ma dbang chen yang gsang khros pa'i las byang gi skabs su nye bar mkho ba sman rak gtor gsum byin rlabs kyi dmigs rnam yid la byed tshul dbang chen dgyes skyed ces bya ba 'di ni bla ma @009a * gong ma dag gis las byang rnams su gsungs gab dkrug che tsam snang bar brten dpal ldan bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin las 'di'i skor gyi dbang dang gdams ngag mang du thos pa'i rgyal khams pa btsun gzugs ^dam tshig rdo rjes rang gzhan mang mang po la phan 'dod kyi bsam pas kun nas bslangs te 'di'i sgos rgyud du rgyas par ma gsungs kyang sman rag gtor gsum byin rlabs kyi shog dril lo chen be ro'i sbas pa mig byed sgom khog che chung sogs lugs 'di la tshad mar gyur ba'i mkhas grub dam pa rnams kyi gsungs rtams gung bsgrigs rang gi bla ma'i man ngag gis  kyang brgyan nas bris pa dge legs 'phel</col>

<item>

<vol>3391</vol>
<tib>nye brgyud lugs kyi bka' brgyad rig 'dzin zhal lung gi nang tshan bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa khrag 'thung lha dgu'i las byang bklags chog tu bkod pa rta mchog zhal lung zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-12a</p>
<col>@012a * (de ltar kun mkhyen ^rgyal ba'i dbang po rdo rje thogs med rtsal gyi gzigs snang nye brgyud kyi chos sde gsang ba rgya can las bka' brgyad rig 'dzin zhal lung gi nang tshan rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa lha dgu'i las byang bklags chog tu bkod pa rta mchog zhal lung zhes bya ba 'di ni btsun gzugs ^dam tshig rdo rjes gzhan phan gyi bsam pas kun nas blangs te rgya can rtsa ba'i gzhung las byung ba rnyid bcos med du khrigs su bsdebs shing kha skong dang mtshams sbyor ci rigs pas brgyan te dben gnas byang chub gling du shing phag sprel zla'i tshes bcu'i dus chen gyi nyin nye bar sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dpyod ldan rgya mtsho legs bshad do dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3391</vol>
<tib>phar phyin skabs brgyad pa'i mtha' dpyod bsam 'phel yid bzhin nor bu'i phreng mdzes skal bzang mig 'byed ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-68a</p>
<col>@067b ces phar phyin gyi mtha' dpyod bsam 'phel yid bzhin nor bu'i 'phreng mdzes skal bzang mig 'byed ces bya ba 'di ni gangs can gyi phyag na bad dkar 'chang bas bka' stsal gyi me tog yang gnang zhing nye char mkhas 'dus dpal lngan bkra shis sgo mang gis lang gsum chos grwar khang tshan kun dang grwa rgan 'dul ba chos rjes dung dkar gser gshogs can dang mkha 'gro ma thams cad kyi gtso mo lab kyi sgron ma'i dbu thod ring bspel can 'bras bu sna tshogs dang su lba rna sad rgyan pa dang bcas rab 'byams smra ba ngag dbang dge 'dun gyis dkar yom mandal dang bcas tshogs kyi mandal rang gi 'bul tshan dang ` khyad par mang thos mdo sngags smra ba'i dbang po dpon slob gu na ma ti dang rang gi  grwa rgan bla ma sngags rams pa dpal 'bar gnyis kyis lam rim mchod rten mandal che lags 'bul tshan dang @068a * bcas te bskul ba'i ngor bkra shis sgo mang nas dbu btsugs skabs lnga pa yan grub cing rgyal bas lung bstan pa'i chos grwa chen po bkra shis 'khyil du rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zil gnon me rtar sku bltams nas lo gnyis stong drug brgya dang so gsum sangs rgyas shing chos 'khor bskor nas nyis stong lnga brgya dang go brgyad lon pa rnam 'phyang zhes pa sa pho khyi'i lo mgo zla ba'i lnga mchod chen mo'i dus su sh'akya'i dge slong mang thos 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i rdo rjes sbyar ba 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas par gyur cig  mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3392</vol>
<tib>rgyud sde bzhi'i spyi'i don rnam par bzhag pa gsang chen lam bzang gsal ba'i sgron me zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-165a</p>
<col>@164b (ces rgyud sde bzhi'i spyi'i don rnam par bzhag pa gsang chen lam bzang gsal ba'i sgron me zhes bya ba 'di ni bdag gi bla ma thub bstan yongs rdzogs la nang byang chung ba bshad sgrub kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba bka' drin mtshungs med dkon mchog rgyal mtshan pa'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa'i rgyud sde spyi'i rnam par bzhag pa sngags la 'jug pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i lun tshang ma la rgyab rten byas shing khungs bcol de'i rjes su 'brangs par byas phyin de las gzhan du'ang 'chad sa med pas spro bsdu'i 'byin 'jug sogs cung zad byas pa tsam las sa bcad so so'i don 'gang che ba'i rigs phal che ba la gzhung mchog de ga'i tshig sor bzhag tu byas rgyab rten la yig sgyon du mngon pa rnams rje bla ma'i gsung dang bsdur nas @165a * bcos yang bdag yi bla ma yongs rdzogs bstan pa'i mnga' bdag tu gyur ba bka' drin mtshungs med rdo rje 'chang chen po dam tshig rdo rje grags pa'i zhal snga nas sogs rtsa brgyud kyi bla ma dam pa du ma'i gsung gi bdud rtsi'i nying khu lta bu'i man ngag gis kyang zur nas brgyan bshad tshul rje yab sras kyi bshad srol chen por drangs shing rdo rje'i tshig ngo mar ci rigs par bsdus pas khungs thub tu bsgrubs bar skabs rnams su rang blos gang sbobs kyis dpyad pa cung zad re bgyis rang nyid kyis kyang ngal ba 'di lta bu byas pa la brten nas lam yongs rdzogs bsgrigs pa'i las gsar du bsags pa des rgyur byas nas zung 'jug rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang thob dus zhig yong ngam snyam pa'i re ba byas te bdag la kha dog dkar dmar gyi gzhung tshan nas brtsams te lam yongs rdzogs ston pa'i sgo nas bka' drin gzhan dang mi 'dra ba chos rab tu rnam 'byed kyi mkhyen rab kyis mdo sngags kyi chos tshul zab mo thugs su chung ba rdo rje 'chang mkhan po bakshi sogs dge ba'i bshes gnyen du ma'i bka' drin gyis nye bar 'tsho ba bsod nams rgya mtshos legs par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dad brtson rnam dpyod dang ldan pa chos mthun gyi slob bu dge slong skal bzang rdo rjes bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang phan bde'i 'byung ngas blob bzang rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus kun du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3393</vol>
<tib>bla ma'i rnal 'byor bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-2a</p>
<col>@002a * (dus dang gnas skabs kun tu bla ma spyi bor sgom pa'i nan ngag bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun zhes bya ba 'di ni dge slong chos nyid kyis bskul ba'i ngor ^chos rje ngag dbang blo bzang don grub kyis bris pa'i yi ge pa ni dge slong rta mgrin gyis so legs so</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3393</vol>
<tib>bla ma'i rnal 'byor bdud rtsi'i mchog sbyin zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-2a</p>
<col>@002a * (ces bla ma'i rnal 'byor bdud rtsi'i mchog sbyin zhes bya ba 'di ni ^chos rje ngag dbang blo bzang don grub kyis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge slong rta mgrin skyabs so 'dis kyang theg mchog dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis mi phongs pa'i rgyur gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3393</vol>
<tib>bla ma'i rnal 'byor dngos grub kun 'byung zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-2a</p>
<col>@002a * (ces pa 'di ni rnam dpyod yangs pa shes rab kyis bskul ngor ^chos kyi ngag dbang blo bzang don grub kyis bris pa dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3393</vol>
<tib>bstan pa'i nyi ma rje btsun dam pas mdzad pa'i ma ni'i sgrub thabs zab mo'i 'grel pa zab mo snang ba zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-50a</p>
<col>@049b ces byang phyogs bstan pa'i nyi ma gcig pu thugs rje'i bdag nyid rje btsun dam pa blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos mdzad pa'i ma ni'i sgrub thabs zab mo'i 'grel ba zab mo snang ba zhes bya ba 'di ni rje btsun dam pa'i khu re chen mo nas dad brtson rnam dpyod ldan pa dge slong blo bzang bstan 'dzin gyis sku gsung thugs rten gser dngul gos yug spos sman sogs kyi mandal bcas nan tan chen pos bskul ba'i ngor mdo dang sngags kyis bsdus pa'i rgyal ba'i bstan pa yongs su rdzogs pa 'dzin skyong spel bar byed pa la snyigs ma'i dus 'dir sa'i steng na 'gran pa'i zla dang bral ba khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po ^rje btsun dkon mchog 'jigs med dbang po'i zhal snga nas kyi zhabs rdul spyi bor bsten pa'i bka' drin las gsung rab kyi dgongs pa 'grel pa la blo gros kyi snang ba cung zad tsam thob pa'i ^ @050a * sh'akya'i btsun pa dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron mes rgyal ba'i lung gis zin pa'i chos grwa chen po bshad sgrub bstan pa'i 'byung gnas bkra shis 'khyil gyi nye 'dabs dben gnas yid dga' chos 'dzin du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni blo dang ldan pa dge slong dkong mchog kun dgas bgyis pa 'dis kyang 'jam mgon bstan pa'i snying po dri ma med pa phyogs dus kun tu rgyas par gyur cig  "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3393</vol>
<tib>dpal ye shes kyi mgon po tshe bdag la brten pa'i tshe dbang bya tshul zla ba'i chu rgyun ces bya ba bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-16b</p>
<col>@016b (ces dpal ye shes kyi mgon po tshe bdag la brten pa'i tshe dbang bya tshul zla ba'i chu rgyun ces bya ba 'di ni glang pa gser gling gi bla ma dka' bcu ye shes bstan 'dzin gyis bskul bar ma zad rang gzhan mang po la phan par mthong nas skyed shod rdo rje 'chang gi mgon chen bcu gsum gyi nang tshan gyi tshe bdag gi rjes gnang ji lta ba bzhin la man ngag gi rigs kyang sbyar te ^sh'akya'i dge slong rig pa 'dzin pa blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes kyis sbyar ba 'di ha cang yang mang por sbel bar mi bya'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3393</vol>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3393</vol>

<item>

<item>

<tib>rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras la mchod gtor 'bul ba'i rim pa dngos grub kyi bang mdzod ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-24a</p>
<col>@023b (ces rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras la mchod gtor 'bul ba'i rim pa lag tu blang bde bar brjod pa 'di ni gnas brtan sdom brtson dam pa blo gros rgya mtshos bskul ba'i ngor chos smra ba dge 'dun rgya mtsho'i dpal gyis bu ston thams cad mkhyen pa'i yig cha gzhir byas med mi rung rnams kha bkang ste chos 'khor rgyal gyi gtsug lag khang gi bka' gdams pho brang du nye bar sbyar ba 'dis kyang @024a * skye 'gro thams cad dbul phongs kyi sdug bsngal las thar bar gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3444</vol>
<tib>gshin gson dbul 'phongs kun la nyer mkho phan bde bdud rtsis dga' ston zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@007 a* (zhes pa 'di ni gshin rtsis kyi gzhung las bshad tshod ltar bcos rim sogs mi 'grub pa dbul zhing dman pa'i gshin gson 'gro ba mang po la lhag bsam gyis kun nas bslangs te rtsis gzhung dang bla ma dam pa rnams kyi man ngag la brten nas skyabs mgon rje btsun bla ma dam pa'i bka' 'bangs rig 'dzin dpal mgon bzhad pa'i rdo rje ming can gyi soo mya zhes pa sa mo bya lo yi dpyid zla 'bring po'i dmar phyogs kyi dga' ba gnyis par ae te ni jo bo'i gtsug lag khang du sbyar ba'i ye ge pa ni bsod nams dbang phyug gyis bgyis pa'o dge'o legs so bkra shis 'bar gyur cig</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3444</vol>
<tib>mgon dkar yid bzhin nor bu la brten pa'i ga-yang 'bod bya tshul 'dod don 'dab brgya 'byed pa'i nyin byed ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-15a</p>
<col>@014b (ces mgon dkar yid bzhin nor bu sa yi lha mo @015a * bstan ma bcu gnyis yul phyogs kyi gzhi bdag rnams kyi gtsos lha srung rnams la brten nas ga-yang 'bod byed tshul 'dod don 'dab rgyas 'byed pa'i nyin byed zhes bya ba 'di ni dge ldan bstan pa'i sbyin bdag sa skyong mi'i dbang po ho tshang shog gi rdzung wang dkon mchog skyabs kyi chab srid mda' thang rgyas pa'i phyir du 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes lung rtogs yon tan gyis mngon par mdzes pa bla ma blo bzang mkhas grub kyis bskul ba'i ngor rgyal khan po grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis mdo smad bstan pa'i 'byung gnas phyogs thams cad la rnam par rgyal ba'i chos sde chen po dge ldan bkra shis 'khyil ba'i rang spyi la yid dga' chos 'phel du sbyar ba dge legs su gyur cig bkra shis dpal 'bar 'dzam gling brgyan du byon</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3444</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi chos skor las bla blu'i cho ga rin chen srog gi chad mthud zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@006a * (bla blu'i cho ga rin chen srog gi chad mthud zhes bya ba 'di bla 'gugs dgos pa 'ga' zhig gi skabs lag tu bza' btung gi rigs zhig thogs te ming nas khyi 'bod pa bzhin byed pa las bya thabs gzhan mi shes pa mang po mthong pas rkyen byas te mdos gto glud kyi cho ga 'di rigs sde snod la spyangs pa'i dge bshes rnams 'ga' rkyen med cing lto 'grangs nyi mas dros pa'i skabs spangs bya dang nad gdon sogs kyis gtsem dus blang byar mdzad pas spangs blang gi phyogs yin mi shes kyang rma khar phan na khyi tshil gyi dpe bzhin nye bar mkho ba'i skabs kyang srid @006b snyams te btsun gzugs dharma badzra gyis yid dga' chos 'phel zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal du bris pa'o</col>

<item>

<col>@005b ('di yang rje btsun ma yid bzhin 'khor lo'i sgo nas 'chi bslu bya tshul 'chi med bdud rtsis bum bzang 'di lta bu zhig gsol dpon nang so grong cho ga blo gros gsang sgrub kyis 'gro mang po phan pa'i bsam las ^yang yang skul ba'i ngor @006a * sngar ^khyab bdag 'khor lo mgon po rdo rje'i 'chang chen po dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad bstan 'gro don du ngur smrig gar gyi rnam rol pa'i mkhas shing 'grub pa'i dbang phyug don gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te dza ya pandi ta blo bzang 'jig med ^bka' 'dren mnyam med bka' bcu rin po che'i drung du ^sh'akya'i btsun pa blo bzang tshe dbang gis sngon gyis mkhas pa'i yig med kyang dam pa gong mas gsung gro ltar sbyar ba la dkar cha cung zad yod na ^rgyal ba gnyis pa'i bstan pa rgyas pa'i rgyu ru bsngos bkra shis par gyur cig</col>

<item>

<vol>3446</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub bka' sdod bcas pa mchod cing bskang bshags bzlog pa bya ba'i cho ga dngos grub char 'bebs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-20a</p>
<col>@020a * (ces bcom ldan 'das dpal rta mchog rol pa'i gsang sgrub bka' sdod dang bcas pa mchod cing bskang bshags bzlog pa bya ba'i cho ga dngos grub char 'bebs zhes bya ba 'di ni khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po tsong kha pa chen po'i bka' srol dri ma med pa las nye bar 'ong ba'i yi dam bsrung ma'i mchod chog rnams kyi 'gros dang sgo bstun te ku s'a li ^dharma badzra gyis rang gzha la phan pa'i bsam pas dge byed zhes pa chu pho stag gi lo sgrub pa'i gnas mchog bde chen chos gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dang brtson dad ldan pa bhikshu su ma ti aa nantas bgyis pa'o bhu bham sarba mangga lam</col>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3446</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas 'chi blu bya tshul 'chi bdag ga-yul ngo bzlog pa'i dpa' bo zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-14a</p>
<col>@014a * (ces rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas 'chi blu bya tshul 'chi bdag ga-yul ngo bzlog pa'i dpa' bo zhes bya ba 'di yang ku s'a li dharma badzra gyis rang lo bcu phrag bzhi dang nyag ma bdun du sleb pa mdzes byed kyi lo 'brog gnas kyi sman ljongs yid du 'ong ba zhig tu sbyar ba ste yi ge'i byed po aor du su dge slong kun dga' ming can no swa sti tshul 'di dge slong shes rab rgya mtsho yis chos sde bde chen lhun grub glin mchog tu rgyu rkyen sbyar te 'bar du bzhengs pa'i dges 'gro kun bla med byang chen myur thob shog mangga lam ) sgo gsum gus pa'i sgo nas phyag 'tshal zhing phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa ma lus 'bul sdig ltung kun bshags dge la rjes yi rang srid mthar mya ngan mi 'da' brtan bzhugs nas zab rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor du gsol dge ba bla med byang chub chen por bngo (bla med lugs kyi yan lag bdun pa mdor bsdus dharma badzra gyis gsung lags</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3446</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas grib sel bya tshul nor bu ke ta ka zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col>@003a * (rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas grib sel bya tshul nor bu ke ta ka zhes bya ba 'di ni don gnyer ba 'ga' zhig gis 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul bar brten mkha' 'gro'i sgrub thabs dang 'brel ba'i grib sel gyi gdams pa rnams rta mgrin la mi 'grigs bzhin du nan gyis sbyor bar dgos pa ma mchis shing sngar bkod pa'i gdams pa 'di nyid yi dam gang la'ang sbyar chog pas rta mgrin gyi le lag tu blang bar 'gal ba med par bsam nas btsun gzugs dharma badzra gyis bha ta'i sa'i char sgar thog tu sbyar ba'o bkra shis par gyur cig</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3446</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas mo 'dre kha bsgyur ba'i cho ga rims nad gcod pa'i mtshon cha zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@008a * (ces mi 'dre kha bsgyur ba'i cho ga rims nad gcod pa'i mtshon cha zhes bya ba 'di yang ku s'a li ^dharma badzra gyis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni gu shri ngag dbang bstan 'phel lo</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3446</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas sgrib sel bya tshul nor bu ke ta ka zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@003b (rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas grib sel bya tshul nor bu ke ta ka zhes bya ba 'di ni don gnyer ba 'ga' zhig gis 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul bar brten mkha' 'gro'i sgrub thabs dang 'brel ba'i grib sel gyi gdams pa rnams rta mgrin la mi 'grigs bzhin du nan gyis sbyor bar dgos pa ma mchis shing sngar bkod pa'i gdams pa 'di nyid yi dam gang la'ang sbyar chog pas rta mgrin gyi le lag tu blang bar 'gal ba med par bsam nas btsun gzugs dharma badzra gyis bha ta'i sa'i char sgar thog tu sbyar ba'o mangga lam</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3446</vol>

<col>@005b (de ltar rta mchog rol pa gsang sgrub kyi shis brjod ga-yas 'khyil dung gi rang sgra 'di dharma badzra zhes bya'i bhu su ku'i rnam dpyod dbugs kyis bskul te dbyangs su bsgrags dge 'dis spangs rtogs ba gam mthon po'i rtser rab snyan chos dung zab mo bus pa'i sgras srid zhi'i rgud pa'i rims nad kun bsal nas gtan bde'i char ba snying la tshim byed shog </col>
</item>

<item>

<col>@004a * (smras pa theg mchog lam du zhugs pa'i skal ldan rnams rig 'dzin grong du bde blag bsgrod 'dod na yang dag smon pa'i khyu mchog 'di zhon ces chos kyi rdo rjes smras pa dza yantu</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3446</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub mnga' gsol ni lha rgyal snyan pa'i rnga gsang dang pan chen blo bzang chos rgyan gyis mdzad pa'i beg tse'i mnga' gsol bzhugs so  * rta mgrin gsang sgrub mnga' gsol ni"</tib>
<p>1a-2b</p>
<col>@002a * (ces rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi mnga' @002b gsol lha rgyal snyan pa'i rnga gsang zhes bya ba 'di ni zhwa dmar sngags pa gu ru bkra shis kyis lo du mar yang yang nan gyis bskul ngor ^dharma badzra gyis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni rig pa smra ba'i dka' bcu dkon mchog nyi ma'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3446</vol>
<tib>shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i sgo nas bdud bzhi sogs lha 'dre'i gnod pa spyi dang khyad par sri ngan dang dur kha langs pa dang byad phur bzlog pa la shin tu bsngags pa'i mdos chos zab mo</tib>
<p>1a-12a</p>
<col></col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3446</vol>
<tib>ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma sengge gdong can ma'i sgo nas byad kha phur kha mi kha dgra bzlog zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>

<item>

<tib>rnam rtog gis btags pa'i gnod pa'i rigs bzlog pa'i rgyal po ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-18a</p>
<col>@017b ('di ltar rnam rtog gis btags pa'i gnod pa'i rigs bzlog pa'i rgyal po ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba 'di ni 'jam dbyangs gong ma'i rgyal po chen po'i rgyal srid kyi blon po rin po che rigs ni stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba ching gis rigs las byung ba jang jong chen po chen wang gi sras lnga pa bstan srid kyi rig pa dad ldan pa gung rgyal mtshan rdo rje aer khe aa tas dang gso rtsis rig pa'i glo gros rgyas pa aa chi thu @018a * tar han tho yon chos rje blo bzang chos sbyor zhes bya gnyis ka'ang nan tan chen po'i gsung gis yang yang 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba'i ngo khral du khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang chen po byang phyogs bstan pa'i gsal byed dza ya panti ta blo bzang snyan grags dge legs rnam rgyal dpal bzang po'i slob ma rnams kyi tha shal ba nyon mongs kyi bran du 'khol ba blo bzang dpal mgon ming can gyis sa skya pan chen gyi las tshogs la brten nas bsgrigs par bgyis pa 'dir dge ba yod na de yis bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas pa dang bstan 'dzin gyi skyes bu'i sku tshe'i rgyal mtshan brtan pa dang bstan pa'i sbyin bdag bskul ba so sor sems can thams cad gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi phyi nang gi bgegs dang bral nas phan pa dang bde ba rgya chen po 'byung ba'i rgyud gyur cig  bkra shis dge legs 'phel)"</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3450</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi chos skor las  nad bdag stobs 'joms kyi cho ga 'khyer bde bar bkod pa kun phan bdud rtsi'i zeg ma zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-8a</p>

<item>

<vol>3453</vol>
<tib>rang gi gnas pa'i yul lha gzhi bdag spyi dang khyad par mthu chen song ki na ri'i bsangs mchod rten 'bul bde skyid kun 'byung zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3456</vol>
<tib>'phags pa thugs rje chen po zhal bcu gcig pa dpal mo'i lugs kyi sgrub thabs smyung bar gnas pa'i cho ga dang bcas pa phan bde'i snang ba gsar dngom zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-35a</p>
<col>@034b (ces 'phags pa thugs rje chen po zhal bcu gcig pa grub dbang dpal mo'i lugs kyi sgrub thabs smyung bar gnas pa'i cho ga bya tshul dang bcas pa phan bde'i snang ba gsar dngoms zhes bya ba 'di ni bstan pa'i gsal byed dza ya pandi ta hu thog thu dang stag phu sprul sku blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan chos 'khor rgyal mkhan zur sku skye rab 'byams pa bskal bzang rab rgyas lha ldan spro bde khang gsar ba'i dkar po phyogs brgyad pa spyi tshogs dang 'bras spungs sgo mang pa aor du su pe'i se rnam rgyal rdo rje'i shog dka' bcu klu sgrub rgya mtsho bde yangs @035a * rab 'byams pa blo bzang nor bu sogs nas bskul ma rim par byung bar brten rtsom 'dun thog nye char khal kha nas dad stobs dang ldan pa khi pe'i aam pe'i se tshe mchog skyabs kyis bskul ma byung bar brten dpal mgon 'phags pa klu sgrub dang grub brnyes dpal mos mdzad pa'i rgya gzhung sogs la gzhigs gtso cher phyag na padmo thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtshos mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs 'jug pa bde bar brten dar po che bar 'dug pas de nyid gzhir bzung mkhas grub tshad ldan gzhan gyis mdzad pa'i cho ga dang dam pa'i phyag bzhes sogs nas kha 'geng 'os kyis legs par brgyan te sh'akya'i dge slong chos smra ba blo bzang bskal bzang rgya mtshos 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi pho brang po ta la'i gzim chung nyi 'od 'khyil bar sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dar khan dge slong bskal bzang yon tan gyis bgyis pa'o</col>
</item>

<tib>bka' drin gsol 'debs</tib>
<p>1a-17a</p>
<col>@016a * (ces bla ma'i bka' drin dran nas gsol ba 'debs shing thugs rje bskul ba grub pa'i sprin sgra zhes bya ba 'di ni chos brgyad kyi 'ching ba spangs te 'khrul med kyi lam la bsgrub pa snying por byed pa rnams kyi rgyan du gyur ba rang gi slob ma gnas bcu rab 'byams pa dge 'dun rgyal mtshan dang dad pa phun sum tshogs pa'i 'byor ldan gu shri @016b se chen chos rje gnyis kyis lus longs spyod thams cad bltos med du phul nas bla ma'i bka' drin rjes su dran zhing thugs rje bskul ba ming spel dang rgyas pa zhig dgos pa zhes yang yang nan gyis bskul ba la brten nas bla ma dam pa'i bka' 'bangs tha chung mdo rgyud man ngag 'dzin pa'i rgyal khams pa dge slong blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis brda' dang tshig sbyor sogs kyi gra ma bcengs par kun gyis go bde bar mdo rgyud mkhas grub dam pa rnams kyi bka' srol bzhin ras 'phrul snang @017a * sh'akya'i rgyal po'i pho brang du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge tshul blo bzang dar rgyas so de yang ming spel gyi mtshams 'dir rang gang mos kyi rtsa ba'i bla ma'i mtshan bcug pas kyang legs par 'gyur ro bskul ba po'i 'dod pas ming spel 'di ltar byas pa la mdo rgyud rnams dang grub pa'i dbang po rnams kyi rnam thar ma mthong ba 'ga' zhig gis mthong na 'on te zhes sdig rkyen du 'gyur nyen che bas dad ldan phan tshun ma gtogs skal med rnams la gsang na dge 'am snyam mo</col>

<item>

<p>1a-38a</p>
<col>@037a * ces 'phags pa thugs rje chen po zhal bcu gcig pa grub dbang dpal mo lugs kyi sgrub thabs myung bar gnas pa'i cho ga bya tshul dang bcas pa phan bde'i snang ba gsar @037b dngoms zhes bya ba 'di ni bstan pa'i gsal byed dza ya pandi ta hu thog thu stag phu sprul sku blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan chos 'khor rgyal mkhan zur sku skye rab 'byams pa bskal bzang rab rgyas lha ldan spro bde khang gsang ba'i dkar po phyogs brgyad pa spyi tshogs dang 'bras spungs sgo mang pa aor du su ba'i so rnam rgyal rdo rje'i shog dka' bcu klu sgrub rgya mtsho bde yangs rab 'byams pa blo bzang nor bu sogs nas bskul ma rim par byung bar brten rtsom 'dun thog nye char khal kha nas dad stobs dang ldan pa khe ba'i aam pe'i se tshe mchog skyabs kyis bskul ma byung bar brten dpal mgon 'phags pa klu sgrub dang grub brnyes dpal mos mdzad pa'i rgya gzhung sogs la gzhigs gtso cher phyag na padmo thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtshos mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs 'jug pa bde bar brten dar po che bar 'dug pas de nyid gzhir bzung mkhas grub tshad ldan gzhan gyis mdzad pa'i cho ga dang dam pa'i phyag bzhes sogs nas kha 'geng 'os kyis @038a * legs par brgyan te sh'akya'i dge slong chos smra ba blo bzang bskal bzang rgya mtshos 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi pho brang po ta la'i gzim chung nyi 'od 'khyil bar sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dar khan dge slong bskal bzang yon tan gyis bgyis pa'o "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3465</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub bka' sdod bcas pa mchod cing bskang bshags bzlog pa bya ba'i cho ga dngos grub char 'bebs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-10b</p>
<col>@010b (ces bcom ldan 'das dpal rta mchog rol pa gsang sgrub bka' sdod dang bcas pa mchod cing bskang bshags bzlog pa bya ba'i cho ga dngos grub char 'bebs zhes bya ba 'di ni khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po tsong kha pa chen po'i bka' srol dri ma med pa khas nye bar mkho ba'i yi dam bsrung ma'i mchod chog rnams kyi 'gros dang sgo btun te ku s'a li ^dharma badzra gyis rang gzhan la phan pa'i bsam pas dge byed zhes pa chu pho stag gi lo sgrub pa'i gnas mchog bde chen chos gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dad brtson dang ldan pa bhikshu su ma ti aa nandas bgyis pa'o mang ga lam</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3465</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi tshogs 'khor gyi cho ga rnal 'byor rol pa'i dga' ston zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-7b</p>
<col>@007a * (ces rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi tshogs 'khor gyi cho ga rnal 'byor rol pa'i dga' ston zhes bya ba 'di yang zhwa dmar sngags pa gu ru bkra shis kyis bskul ba dang lha 'di nyid yi dam du byed pa mang pa la'ang phan par @007b mthong nas rgyal khams nyul ba'i dharma badzra gyis tshogs 'khor spyi dang sgo bstun cing yig rnying gi dgong pa dang yang mi 'gal bar rna tshogs dbyigs ces pa shing mo sbrul gyi lo mi'i dbang po wang ratna sid sdi'i pho brang du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge slong blo bzang kun dga' pas bgyis so mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3465</vol>
<tib>` bsnyen yig mdor bsdus dngos grub kun 'byung zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@003a * (ces pa 'di ni khro bo'i rigs su skyes pa'i ming mi bskyod rdo rje 'am a'a: yur a'a parta ya zhes pa'i rnal 'byor chen pos 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes nan tan du bskul ba'i ngor gnas chung chos skyong chen po'i bka' lung gis mer gen pantir 'bod pa'i phrang chung rab 'byams pa grags pa bskal bzang rab rgyas kyis sman rim bla ma ye shes dbang phyug gi zhal nas byung ba ltar 'phral du lug bris su bgyis pa 'dis kyang bstan pa dang 'gro ba yongs @003b la phan thogs par gyur cig </col>

<tib>'phags ma gtsug gtor dkar mo'i bzlog bsgyur mi mthun ga-yul las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@009a * (ces 'phags ma gtsug gtor dkar mo bzlog bsgyur mi mthun yul las rnam rgyal zhes bya ba 'di ni bla ma  dkon mchog gsum la mi phyed pa'i dad pa dang dge slong nom che nang so ngag dbang sbyin bskul ngo bsrung ba'i ched du rdo rje 'chang snyigs ma'i dus su ngur smrig 'dzin pa'i zlos kar bsgyur ba rje btsun rdo rje 'chang dza ya pandi ta zhes mtshan yongs su grags pa de nyid zhabs kyi rdul spyi bo'i len bka' 'drin gyis cung zad mon pas byang phyogs sog pa'i yul 'dir 'khyams pa'i phyogs med slob zhi ming can gyi sngon gyi mkhas pa'i gsung rgyun la brten nas bgyis pa 'dis kyang bdag sogs sems can thams cad kyis mi mthun pa'i yul las rnams par rgyal bar gyur cig </col>

<vol>3484</vol>

<p>1a-4a</p>
<col>@004a * (zhes dpal mgon don lnga'i gser skyems 'bul tshul legs tshogs lhun grub zhes bya ba 'di ni rtsod pa'i dus kyi tha ma'i rang cag sems can rnams la mi dang mi min gyi gnod pa char ltar 'bab pa'i dus 'di la rang gzhan kun la phan pa dang khyad par rigs dang rus shin tu mtho zhing phun sum tshogs pa dad pa dang dam tshig gtsang  ma rnam dpyod yangs pa thu she ye gung khun ti ling hur gi che rin chen rdo rje don du sh'akya'i dge slong dzny'a na ming can gyis bris so bstan 'gro yongs la phan 'dogs par gyur cig </col>

<col>@029a * (dpal ldan sa skya pa'i bka' bsrung dbang po rnams la dus rgyun du mchod gtor 'bul ba'i cho ga'i lag le 'bring po zhes bya ba 'di ni gnas 'dir sngar zur du yi ger bkod pa med pa na'ang rang dang nye bar gnas pa'i dge bshes ngag dbang 'od zer thun mong ma yin pa'i bstan pa la dad cing dam tshig dang ldan pa dag snying phugs su bcangs shing nye bar len pa'i rkyen gtsang ba grogs mchog dam pa rgyun du nyams su len pa la blo gsar ba rnams dpe 'tshol bde ba'i phyir du tshigs rgyas par bris na legs snyam ste blo bzang chos 'phel mtshan can gyi dngos slob blo bzang sbyin pa dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyi bka' drin las mgon po 'di rnams kyi dbang rjes gnang dang man ngag lung 'khrid dang bcas pa nod cing bsnyen pa las su rung la khyad par gdan thog gcig tu mah'a k'a la 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi bzlas nas de'i bcu cha sbyin sreg yang byed nas mgon po 'di nyid kyi @029b rnal 'byor par rlom pa'i za nyal 'chag gi rnal 'byor 'od zer gyis bstan pa dang rang dang skal mnyam gzhan la phan 'dod kyi re bas lag tu blang bde bar rgyal ba zhes bya ba shing rta'i lo'i hor zla'i gsum pa mkha' 'gro 'du ba'i dus tshes khyad par can la rang gi sti gnas su 'di ltar bris pa la nyes pa'i tshogs ci mchis pa rnams bla ma dang bsrung ma'i tshogs la bzod par gsol nas bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus gnas skabs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig </col>

<tib>bka' drin gsol 'debs byin rlabs char 'bebs zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@003b (ces bka' drin gsol 'debs byin rlabs char 'beb zhes bya ba 'di yang chos kyi tshul la rnam dpyod @004a * yangs pa 'jam dbyangs srung nas lha rdzas dang bcas bskul ma byung ba bzhin khu ral mkhan po dka' chen blo bzang mkhas mchog gis gsol ba btab ste sbyar ba'o dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3487</vol>
<tib>bla ma yi dam la gsol ba 'debs pa'i rab tu byed pa nang gi khong skran 'don pa'i skyug sman zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-8a</p>
<col>@008a * (zhes bla ma yi dam la gsol ba 'debs pa'i rab tu byed pa nang gi khong skran 'don pa'i skyug sman zhes bya ba 'di ni ^ btsun pa blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis chos grwa chen po lhun grub bde chen gyi gzims chung 'og min chos kyi pho brang du sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>

<tib>bla ma'i rnal 'byor dngos grub char 'bebs</tib>

<col>@010b (zhes rang gzhan gyi mos gus bskyed pa dang spel ba'i don du sh'akya'i dge slong spyan sde pa blo gros rgyal mtshan gyis 'on chos sdings dgon par sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang thub pa'i bstan pa phyogs dus gnas skabs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas nus par gyur cig </col>

<item>

<tib>rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma mngon rtogs sgrub thabs</tib>

<col>@003a * (zhes rje btsun sgrol ma'i mngon rtogs 'di pi chi @003b yi chi dge 'dun rgya mtshos bskul ba'i ngor pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa rdo rje 'chang chen po'i gsung ji lta ba bzhin du lha 'di'i rjes gnang dagn lung rnam par dag pa thob pa'i dge slong blo bzang ming 'chang bas sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni drung yi ge pa blo bzang rnam rgyal lo dge'o legs so mangga lam bkra shis par gyur cig </col>

<item>

<p>1a-6b</p>

<p>1a-13b</p>
<col>@013a * (ces pa 'di ni rta mgrin pad+ma dbang chen gyi sgo nas dkar nag las 'bras dbye ba sho mo khra bo gsal ba'i mngon shes zhes bya ba 'di ni mdor bsdus rta mgrin gi rnal 'byor pa blo bzang bstan 'dzin gyis bskul ba'i ngor ^ gshed kyi rnal 'byor pa rwa lo tswa ba phag te rigs ldan sbyar ba'o mkhas pa mngon shes kun gyi gtso bo rgyas pa gces btus gsungs so bla ma yi dam pad+ma dbang chen bka' sdod chos skyong bsrung ma rnams kyis bzod par gsol rang gzhan gnyis ka'ang @013b las bzhi'i don myur 'grub par gyur gnyis gsum sdug bsngal thams cad byang dag zhing mchog tu go 'phang thob gyur cig  dge'o legs so shu bham bkra shis 'bar gyur cig </col>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3490</vol>
<tib>rgyal ba kun gyi mkhyen brtse nus gsum gyi bdag nyid rje btsun btsong kha pa chen po la dmigs brtse ma'i gsol 'debs dang 'brel ba'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor dga' ldan lha brgya ma'i 'khrid yig dngos grub kun 'byung</tib>
<p>1a-36a</p>
<col>@034a * (ces rgyal ba kun gyi mkhyen brtse nus gsum gyi bdag nyid rje btsun bla ma btsong kha pa chen po la dmigs brtse ma'i gsol 'debs dang 'brel ba'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor bya tshul dga' ldan lha brgya mar grags pa'i dmigs skor nyams su len tshul dngos grub kun 'byung zhes bya ba 'di ni mtshan brjod par dka' ba'i drin can rtsa ba'i bla ma khyab bdag rdo rje sems mchog @034b khri chen ngag dbang mchog ldan pa'i zhal snga nas kyis 'di'i 'khrid yig cig rtsoms shig pa bkas gnang ba dang bstan pa'i gsal byed dza ya pandi ta hu thog thus kyang bskul ma mdzad pa bcas rtsom 'dun gyi thog khal kha ga-yon  ru thu she ye gung rgyal mtshan gyi shog t'a bla ma ae rte ni dar han she r'e ge thu blo bzang bsod nams dang nang so blo bzang brtson 'grus dka' bcu blo bzang chos dbang gsum gyis bla ma'i rnal 'byor 'di ga'i dmigs rim sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang ba'i kha gsal khyer bde ba zhig dgos tshul don gnyer chen pos bskul ba la brten nas 'di ga'i 'khrid yig grub mchog 'jam dpal rgya mtshos mdzad pa gzhi byas te rje bla ma'i bstan pa la shes nas dad pa thob pa'i sh'akya'i dge @035a * slong blo bzang bskal bzang rgya mtshos sug bris su bgyis pa 'dis 'gro ba mtha' dag la phan pa rgya chen po 'grub par gyur cig  sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>

<item>

<vol>3490</vol>
<tib>skabs gsum pa bzhugs s+ho "</tib>

<col>@003b (ces de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa'i jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sh'akya thub pa la bstod pa byin rlabs nyer 'jug ces bya ba 'di ni sde snod 'dzin pa 'jam dpal rgya mtsho zhes bya ba rang gi slob mas gsol ba btab pa'i don du mang du thos pa'i rgyal khams pa blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyis gangs can khrod kyi gangs ri'i dbang po 'o de gung rgyal gyi lha zhol du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni sde snod 'dzin pa bha dra p'a la'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3490</vol>
<tib>thub pa'i dbang po'i mdzad pa bcu'i bsdoms lta bu'i bstod pa bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-2b</p>
<col>@002b (zhes pa 'di ni gzims khang gong nas mchog gi sprul pa'i sku grags pa rgyal mtshan gyi bkas pa bskul ba la brten nas ston pa bla na med pa de'i zhabs phyir bsnyegs par 'dod pa sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis rgyal tshab dam pas rgyud bla ma'i mdzad bcu'i bsdoms lta bu gsungs pa ji bzhin du mgyogs par bris pa'i yi ge pa ni mdo sngags rab 'byams pa dge slong blo bzang bstan pa dar rgyas so</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3490</vol>

</item>

<item>

<tib>btags grol gyi dbang bskur dang rab gnas kyi chog sgrigs mu the la'i 'phreng ba</tib>

<col>@026b ces btags grol @027a * gyi dbang bskur dang rab gnas kyi chog sgrigs mu thil la'i 'phreng ba zhes pa 'di ni mkha' 'gro yang tig gi gzhung gtso bor bzung bla ma yang tig nas kyang kha bkang ste pad+ma'i gdung 'tshob chos rgyal gter bdag gling pa'i gsung rgyun ltar 'khrug bsdebs su za hor gyi bande gang shar rang grol gyis lcags bya hor zla brgyad pa'i gral tshes la sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni rig byed du ma la blo gros kyi snang ba dkar ba mthar rgyas pa blo ba blo bzang dbang pos bgyis pa dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>

<tib>klu'i bsangs bde chen lhun grub ma</tib>

<col>@003b (ces pa 'di ni rje bla ma dam pa'i grwa rgan dad gus dang ldan pa'i pi lig thu dbu mdzad bstan pa zhes bya bas 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba'i ngor sbrang chung phyogs med smyon las pa blo zhi ming can gyis sug bris su bgyis pas bkra shis dge legs 'phel bar gyur cig </col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3491</vol>
<tib>ma ni'i 'don thabs</tib>
<p>1a-2b</p>
<col>@002b (zhes pa 'di yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyis dngos su rjes su gzung ba'i dam pa gong ma rnams kyi gsung byin rlabs can sha sdag btus te btsun gzugs ngag gi dbang pos bsgrigs pa 'dis kyang 'brel ldan yongs la phan thogs par gyur cig  ` 'jams bsdud bzang gsum gyi par 'di kun dka' chos gling grwa tshang du bzhugs dge'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3494</vol>

<tib>byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i snying po bsdus pa dngos grub kun 'byung</tib>
<p>1a-29a</p>
<col>@029a * (ces byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i snying po bsdus pa dngos grub kun 'byung zhes bya ba 'di ni snga mo nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen mang pos bskul ma byung zhing nye char 'jam mgon bstan pa'i snying po la mi phyed pa'i dad pa can lha lcam rin chen skyid 'dzom gyis lam gyi rim pa'i khrid mdor bsdus snying por dril ba rgyun du bskyang chog pa zhig dgos zhes nan gyis bskul ba la brten nas bla ma dam pa rnams kyi zhabs rdul spyi bo'i rgyan du 'dzin pa dge slong ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis yul skyid grong gi nags khrod bkra shis bsam gtan gling du sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang thub pa'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs kun tu 'phel zhing rgyas par gyur cig rje btsun bla ma'i rnam par thar pa la skad cig tsam yang log lta mi skye zhing ci mdzad yon tan mthong ba'i mos gus kyis bla ma'i byin rlabs sems la 'jug par shog 'di yang bstan pa'i sbyin bdag thor rgod wang rnam rgyal tshe brtan shog gi dge slong blo bzang rgyal mtshan gyis mthun rkyen sbyar te chos sde chen po sku 'bum byams pa gling du dpar du sgrubs pa'i 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa yun ring du gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>

<col>@018b (ces dpal ldan lha mo'i thun mong pa'i gtor chen bya tshul bdud las rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'di ni chos rje dka' bcu dpal ldan rdo rje glo bur gyi dgos ched 'ga' zhig gi don du bla ma gong ma'i rnams kyi bzhed pa dang mthun par bsgrig pa 'dis kyang bstan 'grol phan thogs par gyur cig </col>

<item>

<col>@029b (ces pa 'di ni kho bos zur du bris pa'i sgrub dkyil bka' gdams gsal byed kyi snying po bsdus pa @030a * gsal ba'i sgron me la bdag 'jug gi skabs su 'di lta bu tshul gyis tshang bar bris na yi ge ha cang mang por gyur bas ma bri shing 'di'i dbang bskur ba'i rdo rje slob dpon du 'os pa ma zhig ma gtogs blo man rnams kyis der ji ltar bshad pa des lag len bya bar mi bde bas de rnams la phan 'dod kyi bsam pas` dge slong blo bzang dar rgyas kyis bka' gdams gsal byed las gsungs pa bzhin du sbyar ba yin mod kyang bdag blo'i skyon gyis nyes par gyur ba rnams bla ma thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams la snying nas bshags shing bzod par gsol lo 'dis kyang jo bo yab sras chen po'i bka' gdams bstan pa'i snying po dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig </col>

<tib>'go ba'i lha lnga'i mchod sprin bsod nams dpal bskyed zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@011b (zhes lha lnga'i mchod sprin bsod nams dpal bskyed 'di ni chos dbang rin po che'i gter gyon la gzhi byas dge bshes grwa ba mngon shes dpal phyug 'bar gyis gter byon nas kyang kha bskang lha lnga'i dngos 'dzin lugs mthun dang mi mthun sna tshogs snang ba chos bdag lcags sdig dang lcags 'dra yang ldog me'i spu gri'i mang ngag srid pa'i gter khyim sogs nas zhib mor dpyad grod smad pa sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i lha gsol ngag 'don du za hor sngags smyon gyis sa rta hor zla brgyad pa'i yar tshes la sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni gnas brtan 'jam dbyangs grags pa'o bkra shis</col>
</item>

<tib>` rnam rtogs btags pa'i gnod pa rigs pa zlog pa'i rgyal po ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba bzhugs s+ho "</tib>
<p>1a-11a</p>
<col>@010b ('di ltar rnam rtog gis btags pa'i gnod pa rigs bzlog pa'i rgyal po ye shes rdo rje zhes bgyi pa 'di ni 'jam dbyangs gong ma'i rgyal po che po'i rgyal srid kyi slon po rin po che cho rig pa ni stobs kyi 'khor lo bsgyur ba ching gis rags las byung ba jang jong chen po chin wang gi sras lnga pa bstan srid kyi rig pa dang ltan pa gung mtshan rdo rje aer khe aa has dang gso rtse rigs pa'i blo gros rgyas pa aa che mthu tar hang tho yon chos rje blo bzang chos 'byor zhes bya ba gnyis ka'ang nan btan chen po'i gsung gis yang yang 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba'i ngo khral du khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang chen po byang phyogs bstan pa'i mdzad dza ya pandi ta blo bzang snyan grags dge legs rnam rgyal dpal bzang po'i slob ma rnams kyi tha shal pa nyon mongs kyi bran du khol ba blo bzang dpal mgon ming can gyis sa skya pan chen khas tshogs la brten nas bsgrigs par bgyis pa 'dir dge ba yod na de yis bstan po rin po che @011a * dar zhing rgyas pa dang bstan 'dzin gyi skyes bu'i sku tshe'i rgyal mtshan brtan pa dang bstan pa'i sbyin bdag bskul ba po sogs sems can thams cad gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi phyi nang gi bgegs dang bral nas phan pa dang bde ba rgya chen po 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur cig </col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3513</vol>
<tib># 'go ba'i lha lnga'i rjes gnang gi cho ga gsal bar bkod pa lha ngo mi ngo 'phrod pa'i dga' ston zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-12a</p>
<col>@012a * (ces 'go ba'i lha lnga'i rjes gnang gi cho ga gsal bar bkod pa lha ngo mi ngo 'phrod pa'i dga' ston zhes bya ba 'di ni 'di'i rjes chog gi yig rnying nyung du zhig yod kyang ha cang bsdus drags pas rang gzhan gyis lag tu len par dka' bas rjes chog bsdus pa 'dis gzhir @012b byas nas rjes chog gzhan gyi 'gros dar bstun te rang gzhan la nye bar mkho ba'i phyir ^btsun gzugs ngag dbang blo bzang spyin pas sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dpyod ldan dge slong ngag dbang rdo rjes bris pa'o 'dis kyang dkar phyogs skyong ba'i lha bsrung rnams 'go zhing 'grogs nas bstan 'gro la phan pa'i rgyur gyur cig </col>

<col>@008a * (ces rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi tshogs 'khor gyi cho ga rnal 'byor rol dga' ston zhes bya ba 'di yang zhwa dmar sngags pa gu ru bkra bshis kyis bskul ba dang lha 'di nyid yid dam du byed pa mang po la phan mthong nas rgyal khams nyul ba'i dharma badzra gyis tshogs 'khor spyi dang sgo bstun cing lig rnying gi dgos pa dang yang mi 'gal bar sna tshogs da byig ces pa shing mo sprul gyi lo mi'i dbang po wang ratna siddhi po brang du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge slong blo bzang kun dga' bgyis pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>

<col>@010b (ces bka' gdams thig le bcu drug gi lha tshogs la gsol ba 'debs pa pad kar phreng ba zhes byas pa 'di ni shing mo sprul lo bdag nyid chen po rje dzny'a na badzra'i zhal snga nas gyi sgrub gnas khyad par can dga' tshal rdo rje'i brag rdzong ae wam gling du 'di'i bsnyen pa bzhugs pa'i dus su rang gi mos pas rje nyid kyi slob mas tha shal dge slong grags pa dar rgyas gyis 'tshams kyi thun bar bar tu bgyis pa'i yi ge pa ni 'tshams ga-yog pa dge 'dun yar 'phel ba'o 'dis kyang bka' gdams bstan pa'i snying po dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  mangga lam shu wam</col>

<item>

<col>@011b (zhes dpal myur mdzad ye shes kyi mgon po'i thugs chog yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba 'di ni tsa sag ail du chi mer gin das ching mgon po rdo rje'i gr'a tshang dga' ldan phun tshogs gling gi thugs rten btsugs pa'i skabs lha btsun pi lig thu slob dpon dge slong spyin pa rgyal mtshan dang dza sag nyid nas lo re bzhin sgrub mchod bskul ba'i ngag 'don 'jug pa bde ba zhig dgos zhes bskul ba la brten nas rgyal dbang lnga pas mdzad pa'i gur gyi mgon po la sogs pa'i chos skyong srung ma rnams kyi thugs chog dbang drag rol pa la gzhir byas te 'jam dbyangs gong ma bdag chen po'i bka' ching su tsug thu no mon han zhes bsngags pa'i rdo rje 'chang blo bzang nor bu shes rab dpal bzang po yab sras kyi bka' drin gyis nye bar 'tsho ba dpal mgon bzhad pa'i rdo rje ming can gyis gzhan la phan 'dod kyi bsam pas thugs rten gsar 'dzugs pa'i tshul du zil gnon me rta'i sa ga zla ba'i dkar po'i tshes cu la ji ram tha'i chu tshan khar sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni rnam dpyod dang ldan pa bsod nams dbang phyug go 'dis kyang rgyal ba gnyis pa'i bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas la yun rin du gnas par gyur cig  dge'o legs so bkra shis 'bar gyur cig</col>

<tib># bcom ldan 'das ma gdugs dkar lha mang gi bdag mdun dang 'brel nas bzlog bskyur kyi las bsgrub pa'i tshul bar chad thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba</tib>

<tib>bcom ldan 'das sman pa'i rgyal po'i lho sgo bgegs sel nor bu'i bang mdzod zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-13b inc [*missing page from 12a-12b*]</p>

<item>

<vol>3517</vol>
<tib># bstan bsrung sprul ba'i chos rgyal chen po hang kas drag po'i las byang dgra srog gcod pa'i spu gri zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-10b</p>
<col>@010a * (ces lha chen lhang kas drag po'i ngag 'don gsol mchod bkra shis dge mtshan char 'bebs kyi zur 'debs khregs su bsdebs pa dgra srog gcod pa'i spu gri zhes bya ba 'di'ang rang gi lugs sems @010b mi bde ba'i rkyen mang po byung ba'i skabs su grogs bzang po zhig gi drin gyis bla ma lha la sogs pa btab nas zhag 'ga' zhig song rjes 'di lta bu zhig bya dgos pa'i nyams blo bur du byung bas bsam mno gtong ba la hang kas rgyal po 'di nyid ni sngon pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis dam du bcug cing dbang bskur nas bstan pa'i bsrung mar mnga' gsol ba dang de nas rgyal dbang bsod nams rgya mtsho'i sbyan sngar zhwa ser bstan pa bsrung bar zhal 'ches pa dang da lta sa phyogs 'dir 'bras spungs pa slob dpon rin po che nam mkha' bsod nams grags pa la zhal dngos su bstan nas de nyid kyis hang kas rgyal po las bzhi rnam 'gyur sogs dang bcas pa'i mngon rtogs rnams mdzad par tshad ldan rnams kyi sung rgyun las byung ba dang khyad par sngon las kyi 'brel bas rang gi skyes lha yin pa'i rgyu mtshan rnams bsam pa na bla ma lhas khung bstan pa yin nam snyam pas 'phrang du ^rgyal dbang snga snga pa zil gnon drag rtsal rdo rjes mdzad pa'i byes chas ke ta'i las byang la gzhin bzhag nas sgos dbang gis bsnod 'bri dang blo'i tshod kyis byas ste ^rje bla ma dam pa'i zab mo gdams pa'i bdud rtsi myang bas ban rig 'dzin shr'i ha sa badzra n'a tha'i ming can gzhon med sems kyi rdo rjes bya lo dbying nyir dgu'i nyin lhun grub bde chen rin chen jo bo'i gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni bsod nams dbang phyug gis bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang snyigs dus kyi bstan dgra dang rnal 'byor pa'i sgos dgra sgrol ba'i lag gyur cig  sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<tib>dam can chos kyi rgyal po la brten nas lingga bsgral chog srid gsum rnam rgyal zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-10a</p>
<col>@010a * (ces dam can gshin rje chos kyi rgyal po la brten nas lingga bsgral chog srid gsum rnam rgyal zhes bya ba 'di ni khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang bka' drin mtshungs med ^dza ya pandi ta zhes mtshan yongs su grags pa de nyid kyi yang sprul skyabs mgon gzhon nu blo bzang rnam rgyal dpal bzang po'i tshogs chen gyi dge 'dun 'dus pa chen po rgyun du lag len 'debs tshul ces kyang dgos zhes rje btsun dam pa de nyid kyi slob bu ku shri chos rje blo bzang rnam rgyal slob dpon pa chos rin chen slob dpon pa blo bzang rin chen tshe tshen ching dbang gi dge bsgos blo bzang rdo rje dge slong ngag dbang sbyin pa dpung mdzad ngag dbang sengge bstan pa'i sbyin bdag pe'a se tshe dbang nor bu rnams kyis yang yang bskul ba'i ngo ma ldog te gdul bya'i gcig tu gtogs pa sbrang chung phyogs med smyon las pa blo zhi ming can gyis ^rje btsun bla ma'i bstan pa 'dzin pa'i dge 'dun 'dus pa chen po la phan srid snyam pa re ba kun nas blangs te pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung rtsom gzhir bzhag pas gzhan par skabs kyi tshig 'ga' zhig yig chas brgyan te phyogs gcig tu bgyis pa'i 'dis kyang rgyal ba gnyis pa'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs du gnas skabs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas pa dang bdag cag rnams kyi lam bsgrub pa'i 'gal rkyen bar chad mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad nye bar zhi zhing mthun rkyen bsam don yid bzhin du 'grub par gyur cig  bkra shis</col>
</item>

<tib>chos dang chos nyid rnam par 'byed pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa</tib>

<item>

<item>

<vol>3524</vol>
<tib>rje btsun sgrol ma la mandal bzhi mchod kyi sgo nas gsol ba gdab tshul gyi cho ga gsal bar bkod pa 'dod don kun 'grub ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-12a</p>
<col>@011b (ces rje btsun sgrol ma la mandal bzhi mchod kyi sgo gsol ba gdabs tshul cho go gsal ba'i bkod 'dod don kun 'grub ces bya ba 'di ni rang gzhan gyi don du sgrol chog yang lag tu bstar skabs chog sgrogs 'khyer bde ba zhig dgos tshul byung bar brten mchims kyi rtsa gcig gzhir bzhag snang thar ba'i man ngag brgya rtsad ma 'dus pa'i bka' gdams god ma'i yig rnying brungs thub gzhan 'ga' las kyang lag len gyi zhib cha cung zad blangs shing dam pa so sos mdzad pa'i chog sgrigs du ma la yang gzhigs nas 'jug @012a * bde bklags chog ma'i tshul du mkhas shing grub pa'i bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin kho nas 'tsho ba'i rgyal khams pa ^dam tshig rdo rjes dpal ri'i dgon gyi nye 'daabs kyi dben gnas su rgyal zla ba'i chos brgyad kyi nyin sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni rnam dpyod yangs pa'i dge bshes dge slong d'a rgh'a ya badzra gyis bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang bstan 'gro yongs la phan thogs par gyur cig</col>

<p>1a-17a</p>
<col>@016b (ces mnyam med jo bo chen po'i lugs kyi rje btsun sgrol ma nyer gcig gi nang tshun 'phags ma sgrol ma 'gugs shing phongs pa sel ba'i sgo nas bum gter sgrub tshul dngos @017a * grub re ba kun bskongs zhes bya ba 'di ni  rnam dpyod ldan pa dad ldan bu slob dge slong dpal bzang bkra shis bskul ba'i ngor stag sprul blo bzang chos kyi dbang phyug gi stsal ba'i dngos grub rin chen gter mdzod gzhir bzung nad dben sa man ngag gis brgyan te rang bzos ma bslad par ^rdo rje 'dzin pa byams pa tshe dbang gis bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni sngags pa dad ldan bu slob ngag dbang mgon pos bgyis pa de yang blo bzang rgyal ba gnyis pa'i bstan pa ring du gnas par cig  mangga lam dge'o</col>

<col>@005a * (ces pa 'di ni rigs rus stobs 'byor phun sum tshogs pa'i hor chen dza sag thu dbang aol jo'i dbang de gus pe'i se thu nu mal gung sogs kyis rang gi rtsa ba'i bla ma bstan 'gro la phan pa'i bsam sbyor bzang pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa t'a bla ma cha han khu li ching gu'i sku tshe zhabs pad brtan pa'i ched du ngag 'don byas chog pa'i brtan bzhugs kyi tshigs bcad 'ga' zhig gis @005b zhes bskul ba'i ngor ban rgan snyom las pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan dpal bzang pos mtsho bdun gyi lha khang chen mor sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dpyod ldan dge tshul ngag dbang phun tshogs so</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3576</vol>
<tib>sman gyi bla bid'urya 'od kyi rgyal po mched bdun thub pa'i dbang po dang bcas pa bsgrub pa'i mchod pa mdor bsdus pa</tib>
<p>8b-13a</p>
<col>@012b (zhes sman gyi bla bid'urya 'od kyi rgyal po mched bdun thub pa'i dbang po dang bcas pa bsgrub pa'i mchod pa mdor bsdus pa 'di ni 'jam dbyangs gong ma chen po'i hor gyi pho brang gi gtsug lag khang du 'khod pa'i ther gun t'a bla ma dge slong @013a * blo bzang bsam 'grub kyis bskul ba ltar ha cang bsdus pa'i lugs 'di sla chos su 'gro bar snang yang bskul ba po'i blo ngo dang bstun rje chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang kun gzigs lnga pa chen pos mdzad pa'i cho ga rnams las snying por bsdu te ^sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes kyis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni nye 'khor ba gsol dpon blo bzang mkhas mchog go  mangga lam</col>

<tib>zhing mchog yid dga' chos 'dzin du skye ba'i smon lam nor bu'i them skas zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@052b (ces pa 'di ni @053a * yongs kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po gling smad zhabs drung rin po ches bka' stsal ba dang du blangs te phyogs myul gyi rgyal khams pa blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos dpal ldan 'bras spungs kyi gzims chung nye 'od kyi 'khyil bar sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge tshul blo bzang phun tshogs so</col>

<item>

<vol>3582</vol>
<tib>ri bo rtse lnga'i gnas bdag klu rgyal nag po chen po'i bsang mchod</tib>
<p>1a-4a</p>
<col>@004a * ces ri bo rtse lnga'i gnas bdag klu rgyal nag po chen po la bsang mchod byas pa'i tshul 'di yang dad brtson rnam dpyod phun sum tshogs pa'i ja sag bla ma chos 'phel dar rgyas kyis bskul ba ltar ^lcang skya rol pa'i rdo rjes sbyar ba dge legs 'phel dge'o legs s+ho mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3582</vol>
<tib>rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma'i brgya bzhi bzhugs s+ho "</tib>

<col>@004b (brgya bzhi ces pa 'di nas bod kyi yul du dug zer nad sgrib lhog 'brum nad la sogs pa'i sna mang po nad chen 'jigs pa'i tsher thams cad mkhyen pa blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis sbyar ba'o dge legs su gyur cig mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3583</vol>
<tib>dpa' gcig bdud las rnam rgyal gyi bla brgyud gsol 'debs bzhugs s+ho "</tib>
