<col>@003b * (ces pa 'di ni don gnyer can 'ga' zhig gis bskul ba'i ngor rje rin po yan pan chen rin po ches mdzad pa ltar dad de phyin snyoms las pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan dpal bzang pos sbyar ba'o dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3583</vol>
<tib>dpal ldan lha mo'i tshogs mchod kyi cho ga dmag zor rol pa'i dga' ston zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-6b</p>
<col>@006b (ces dpal ldan lha mo tshogs mchod dmag zor rol pa'i dga' ston zhes bya ba 'di ni dad bdag snang sogs 'os yon tan du ma dang ldan pa gnas brtan gu shri ngag dbang blo bzang gis bskul ngor cho ga dngos gzhi rgyal ba dge 'dun rgya mtsho'i gsung ji lta ba bzhin la grub dbang dharma badzra gyi snod bcud byin brlabs sogs cung zad bsnan ba de la phyag len gyi rim pa med du mi rung brtsams kyis kha bskang te ^btsun pa ngag dbang blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis rang gi bsti gnas rab zhi bde ldan dga' tshal du bsgrigs pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3583</vol>
<tib>dpal ldan lha mo'i tshogs mchod kyi cho ga dmag zor rol pa'i dga' ston zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-6b</p>
<col>@006b (ces dpal ldan lha mo tshogs mchod dmag zor rol pa'i dga' ston zhes bya ba 'di ni dad bdag snang sogs 'os yon tan du ma dang ldan pa gnas brtan gu shri ngag dbang blo bzang gis bskul ngor cho ga dngos gzhi rgyal ba dge 'dun rgya mtsho'i gsung ji lta ba bzhin la grub dbang dharma badzra gyi snod bcud byin brlabs sogs cung zad bsnan ba de la phyag len gyi rim pa med du mi rung brtsams kyis kha bskang te ^btsun pa ngag dbang blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis rang gi bsti gnas rab zhi bde ldan dga' tshal du bsgrigs pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3583</vol>
<tib>dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed dpa' po gcig pa'i sgrub thabs bdud las rnam rgyal gyi ngag 'don khrig chags su bsdeb pa bdud las rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-45a</p>
<col>@044a * (ces dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed dpa' po gcig pa'i sgrub thabs bdud las rnam rgyal @044b gyi ngag 'don khrigs chags su bsdeb pa bdud las rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'di yul byang phyogs kyi mthar 'khyams pa'i sprang btsun snyoms las pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan zhes bgyi bas der sang 'jigs byed dpa' po gcig pa'i sgrub thabs 'don cha nyung ba la gtso bor mos pas ngag 'don byed 'dod mkhan mang na'ang rgyal ba'i dbang po rje bdag nyid chen pos mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs bdud las rnam rgyal ni gang zag dbang po rnon pos bsam bsgom byed tshul gtso bor mdzad pas ngag 'don gyi tshe tshig phrad sbyor dgos mang ba sogs kyis dbang po dman pas ngag 'don bya dga' ba dang gzhan bdud las rnam rgyal ji lta ba bzhin ngag 'don du bsgrigs pa'i dpe rang gis ma mthong bas rang gi nye 'khor ba rnams kyis ngag 'don bya ba dang gzhan la'ang phan 'dod kyi bsam pas rje nyid kyi sgrub thabs bdud las rnam rgyal sor bzhag pa la smon lam shis brjod gnyis rje rang gis mdzad pa mi 'dug pas dpal ldan smad rgyud grwa @045a * tshang gi zhal 'don mdzad bzhin pa mkhas pa'i dbang po zhang zhung pa chos dbang grags pas mdzad pa'i smon lam shis brjod gnyis kyis kha bsgang ste mtsho bdun gyi lha khang chen mor bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni gzhung lugs rab 'byams la smra ba'i spobs pa can blo bzang nyi ma'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i dbang po blo bzang grags pa'i chos tshul dri ma med pa phyogs dus thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yung ring du gnas par gyur cig  )` aom swasti lung rtogs 'byung gnas khu ry'ee chen mo'i nang dpal ldan gsang sngags smad rgyud grwa tshang nas chos sbyin mi zad spel slad dpar bsgrubs 'dis rgyal bstan snying po srid ma thar rgyas byed shog  "</col>
</item>

<tib>ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma sengge'i gdong can gtso 'khor gsum gyi gser skyems 'bul tshul las bzhi'i 'phrin bcol mdor bsdus dang bcas pa</tib>
<p>1a-2b</p>
<col>@002b ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma sengge'i gdong can gtso 'khor gsum gyi gser skyems 'bul tshul las bzhi'i 'phrin bcol mdor bsdus dang bcas pa 'di ni sngags rtsom mthong zhing dgos gal che bar brten mos ldan dge slong ngag dbang 'od zer gyis m'o blo dang bstun te chos rged chos kyi ming 'dzin bhiksha ^su ma ti pra dzny'a'i ming ldan gyis byas pa legs so sarba mangga lam dge'o "</col>

<col>@012a * (ces pa 'di yang yab rje rin po che'i yang srid kyis dgongs bzhed ltar bya ba la rdo blas bris pa'o dge zhing bkra shis par gyur cig</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3585</vol>
<tib>bla ma las byangs sogs bzhugs so  * jo no ne ser ba'i bstod pa 'phrin las myur 'grub ni"</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col>@002b (ces jo bo ne ser ba'i bstod pa 'phrin las myur 'grub 'di ni dad can 'phrin las dpal 'byor ming can gyis nan gyis bskul ba'i ngor bka' gdams kyi btsun pa blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis @003a * chos grwa chen po dpal ldan 'bras spungs kyi gzims khang dga' ldan pho brang du sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3585</vol>
<tib>'byung bzhi gtor ma'i gdams pa nyams su len tshhul gsal bar bkod pa nam mkha'i rnga chen zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-41a</p>
<col>@040b ces 'byung bzhi gtor ma'i gdams pa nyams su len tshul gsal bar bshad pa nam mkha'i rnga chen zhes bya ba 'di ni ^'jam dbyangs gong ma'i bka' lung gis ching su tsug thu no mong hang du 'bod pa'i ban chung gyi na ba su ma ti aa bhya sh'a sa na sya dhwa dza zhes bya bas ^snang ba mtha' yas pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa blo bzang chos rgyan dpal bzang po'i gsung chog bsgrigs gzhir bzhag @041a * seng chen sprul pa'i spru rin po che dang bzhad dngul chu bla ma chos bzang pa'i bshad khrid kyi yig cha dang gtor chog gi yi ge gzhan dag las kyang ci rigs par btus te 'khyer bde bklag chog gi tshul du nye bar sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni sdom brtson gam drung dge slong blo ldan gyis bgyis pa'o par yig bris pa po ni blo bzang tshe sgrub pa'o dge'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3585</vol>
<tib>chos skyong dregs pa lcam sring gi gser skyems 'bul tshul</tib>

<col>@003a * (ces pa 'di ni tshe dang ldan pa bstan 'dzin bzang po bskul ba ltar ^sh'akya'i btsun pa dge slong blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes kyis sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3585</vol>
<tib>dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rim gnyis kyi rnal 'byor mthar phyin pa'i sgrub pa po'i lhun grub sku gsum gyi gzhal yas su dpa' bo dpa' mo'i tshogs ston bya tshul srid gsum bdud sde'i ga-yul las rgyal ba'i skye ba lnga pa'i dung sgra gnas gsum mkha' 'gro gnyis pa'i rol mo zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-6a</p>
<col>@005b 'di ni rgyal @006a * mchog bdun pa chen po'i gsungs ji lta ba zhal bshus kyi tshul du bkod pa'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3585</vol>
<tib>lha chen drag po gdong bzhi pa'i mngon rtogs bskang bshags bstod bskul dang bcas pa</tib>
<p>1a-16a</p>
<col></col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3585</vol>
<tib>lha mchog rnams la dga' bar byed pa'i bsangs mchod bcu gsum mu tig phreng ba</tib>
<p>1a-18a</p>
<col>@017b (zhes pa 'di ni lha mchog rnams la bsangs mchod bcu gsum 'bul bar dgos zhes don gnyer can mang pos bskul ba'i ched du sngon gyi mkhas pa'i dpe rnying la gtugs te aa @018a * ring las byung ba'i mdo stod kyi jo ni dgon pa'i sh'akya'i dge slong grags pa bshad sgrub kyis sa phyogs yul khams thams cad dga' bar byed pa'i phyir du dge ldan chos gling du sbyar ba'o bkra shis pa dang dge ba 'phel gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3587</vol>
<tib>rgyal po chen pos sde lngas gsol mchod 'bul tshul 'phrin las 'gag med rdo rje'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-43a</p>
<col>@042a * (ces sprul pa'i chos rgyal chen po 'khor dang bcas pa dgyes dgur spyod pa'i 'phrin las 'gag med rdo rje'i sgra dbyangs zhes pa 'di yang sa chen po bde bar skyong ba'i phyag mdzod bsod nams rab brtan gyis tshang la 'khyer bde ba zhig dgos zhes bskul @042b ba la brten bla ma'i las byang thugs sgrub yang snying 'dus pa las bsdus shing gsol mchod kyi rim pa rnams mnga' bdag gi gter byon gyi 'phrin las don btsum dang sgrub skor la gzhi byas thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtshos gnang ba las legs cha blangs shing tshig sbyor gsar du dgos pa rnams bsgrigs te gnod sbyin chen pos stong grogs tshul bzhin mdzad pa'i za hor gyi rigs las byung ba'i bande ngag dbang blo bzang rgya mtsho bla med rdo rje rtsal gyis rgyal po chen pos 'phral du sgrub @043a * dgos pa'i mtshan ma byung ba ltar nyin gcig la grub par bgyis pa'i yi ge pa ni ngag dbang dge legs so dge'o legs so sarba mangga lam shu bham ba wantu</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3587</vol>
<tib>slob dpon chen po pad+ma k'a ra'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa'i 'bum bsangs beed'urya'i sngon po bkra shis 'dod pa'i re skong ma zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-35b</p>
<col>@033b (ces 'bum bsangs beet'urya'i sngon mo bkra shis 'dod pa'i re skongs 'di ni rje khri srong lde'u btsan rgyal po'i skabs su slob dpon chen po pad+ma k'a'i zhabs kyis dpal bsam yas kyi gtsug lag khang bzhengs pa'i tshe lha srin sde brgyad la sogs pa nag phyogs pa rnams kyi 'dul ba'i ched du mdzad pa de'i rjes su gangs can bod kyi sa la nad rims dang dal yams sad ser btsa' mu ge than pa @034a * la sogs pa byung ba'i dus su de dag thams cad kyi zhi bar byed pa'i thabs 'di shin tu mchog gi zer ba sngags 'chang pad dkar 'dzin pas yang gonga bzhin mdzad pa de'i rjes su snyigs ma lnga bdo'i dus lha 'dre mi gsum 'khon 'dzin 'thab rtsod kyis sa phyogs yul khams thams cad la char chu dus su mi 'babs pa dang lo phyugs ma legs pa dang rtswa shing chu gsum 'dzom med pa dang nad dang rims tshad la sogs pa ltas ngan pa mtshan ma gyur ba la btsun pa 'jam dbyangs dga' ba'i blo gros kyi yar klungs kyi stod la 'di dag gis zhi bar byed thabs 'di mchog go snyam pa'i lhan thabs su mdzad pa'i cho ga bzhin du phyogs phyogs su 'bum bsangs 'di btang ma thag @034b tu bkra shis pa'i dge ltas mang du byung ba la mi la sogs pa 'gro ba rnams kyi dbul phongs kyi sdug bsngal sel ba dang phan pa rgya chen po'i bde skyid ldan pas tshe srog dbang thang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur ro bkra shis</col>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3592</vol>
<tib>` byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i dmigs rim khyer bde'i lhan thabs 'don sgrigs su bkod pa dngos grub gter mdzod ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-36a</p>
<col>@034b zhes byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i dmigs rim 'khyer bde'i lhan thabs 'don sgrigs su 'di yang kun mkhyen chen po lcang skya @035a * rdo rje 'chang ye shes bstan pa'i sgron me dpal bzang pos sku gong mas mdzad pa'i dmigs rim de la lhan thabs bsnan nas ri bo rtse lnga'i rdo rje'i phug gi ri khrod pa rnams kyi tshogs 'don du kun tu bde ba'i tshal gyi sgrub khang ae wam dga' 'khyil nas gnang ba'i phyag bzhes ji lta ba bzhin bris pa 'di kyang 'jam mgon bla ma'i mdo sngags kyi bstan pa'i snying po 'di nyi phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig mangga lam ` 'gro ba thams cad la dge 'bar gyur cig  @035b rgyal yum legs bshad gsung rab snying po'i bcud gcig tu bsdus pa byang chub lam rim gyi nye lam mdor bsdus spar du sgrub pa'i dges rgyud sbyor 'dis mtshon mkha' mnyam 'gro kun gyi sa lam sgrub pa'i 'gal rkyen zhi ba dang skyes bu gsum gyi lam gyi rim pa yi rtogs pa ma lus myur du skyes ba dang sku bzhi'i rgyal sa mchog la dbang bar shog @036a * (zhes 'di lta bu'i sbyar byang dgos tshul ko shri bkra shis rab brtan gyis bskul ngor lcang skya ho thog thus sbyar ba'o bkra shis</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3594</vol>
<tib>bla ma mchod pa'i cho ga dngos grub 'dod 'jo'i snying po bsdus pa yid bzhi\n gyi nor bu zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1b-11b</p>
<col>@011b (ces bla ma mchod pa'i cho ga dngos grub 'dod 'jo'i snying po bsdus pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bya ba 'di ni mang thos rab 'byams smra ba aer te ni rab 'byams pa dang bin thu dge slong gnyis kyis rgyang ring po nas nan gyis bskul ba'i ngor bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' 'bangs tha chung gzhung lugs rab 'byams smra ba sku skye blo bzang 'phrin las ming gzhan rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pa chen po'i bka' lung gis dza ya pandi ta khu thug thu zhes 'bod pas rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pa chen po'i mdzad pa'i bla ma mchod pa bsdus pa snying po bsdus shing legs cha 'ga' zhig thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtsho dang pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po gnyis kyis mdzad pa'i bla ma mchod pa nas kha bskang ste 'phags yul du durma ti zhes 'bod cing rgya nag po'i yul du shen yu lu zhes grags pa blo ngan zhes pa lcags mo bya lo'i hor zla bcu gnyis pa'i tshes bdun gza' nyi ma dang skar ma mchu 'brang pa'i 'phel sbyor gyi nyin sug bris su bgyis pa 'dis kyang bdag dang sems can thams cad tshe rabs kun tu bshes gnyen mchog gis rjes su 'dzin par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<vol>3594</vol>
<tib>byin rlabs kyi gter chen po dga' ldan lha brgya mar grags pa'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor gyi bsdus don blo gros mig 'byed ces bya ba</tib>
<p>9b 'og -11a</p>
<col>@010b ces byin rlabs kyi gter chen po dga' ldan lha brgya mar grags pa'i @011a * bla ma'i rnal 'byor gyi bsdus don blo gros mig 'byed ces bya ba 'di ni chos grwa chen po bkra shis lhun por sde snod 'dzin pa'i bshes gnyen brgya phrag mang po la 'di'i khrid rgyas par byas skabs rang gzhan la phan pa'i bsams pas dge slong ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang thub pa'i bstan pa rin po che mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan du gyur cig  ` bka' dang dgongs bgrel gdams dag ma lus pa brtse chen ye shes stobs kyis dbang bsgyur zhing tshul khrims rnam dag thar pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin drin can bla ma gnyis la gsol ba 'debs (zhes pa 'di ni bka' chen ye shes rgyal mtshan gyi tshigs bcad bstod pa gsol 'debs so</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3594</vol>
<tib>dga' ldan phyag rgya chen po'i sngon 'gro bla ma'i rnal 'byor gyi bsdus don snyan rgyud mdzod brgya 'byed pa'i 'phrul gyi lde mig ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-9a</p>
<col>@009a * ces dga' ldan phyag rgya chen po'i sngon 'gro bla ma'i rnal 'byor gyi bsdus don snyan rgyud mdzod brgya 'byed pa'i 'phrul gyi lde mig ces bya ba 'di ni rje btsun bla ma grub pa'i dbang phyug chen po blo bzang rnam rgyal dpal bzang po'i zhabs drung du chos 'di'i zab khrid rgyas par thob pa'i tshe dben gnas phug po cher brjed tho zhin bris su bris pa dus phyis chos tshul 'di la dge ba'i bshes gnyen mang pos don gnyer mdzad pa mthong ba na rang dang skal pa mnyam pa 'ga' zhig la phan res dge slong ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bkra shis bsam gtan gling du sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang dga' ldan snyan rgyud kyi bstan pa rin po che 'phel bar gyur cig  "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3594</vol>
<tib>dge ldan bstan pa rgyas pa'i smon lam grub pa'i bden tshig ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col>@003a * (ces pa 'di ni lhag bsam rnam dpyod yangs pa rab 'byams blo bzang bstan pas bskul zhing spyir deng dus rje bla ma'i bstan pa 'di ni zungs zad kyi nang ba sman pas bor ba bzhin du bdag tu 'dzin pa 'ga' mi snang bas cung zad re ba sring thub na'ang ci ma rung snyam du smon pa'i yid kyis ^btsun pa dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron mes bris pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3594</vol>
<tib>dge slong gi bslab bya'i sdom tshig 'dul ba'i snying po zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-11a</p>
<col>@010b zhes dge slong gi bslab bya'i sdom tshig mdor bsdus su bkod pa 'dul ba'i snying po @011a * zhes bya ba 'di ni dge slong ye shes dpal ldan gyis khrims nyis brgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum gyi ngos 'dzin gsal zhing go bde ba yi ge nyung ngur byas pa 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes byang dang yang du bskul zhing nye char chos grwa chen po bkra shis lhun po dpal gyi sde chen phyogs thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i gling du 'dul ba'i bslab bya rgyas par bshad pa'i tshe don gnyer can mang por phan du re ba'i bsam pas 'dul ba 'dzin pa dge slong ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang thub pa'i bstan pa rin po che mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan du gyur cig  "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3594</vol>
<tib>dus bstun gyi gsol 'debs sogs dang bkra shis brtsegs pa bzhugs so  * dus bstun gyi gsol 'debs sogs ni"</tib>
<p>1a-3b</p>
<col>@003a * (ces pa 'di dus bstun gyi gsol 'debs 'di lta bu zhig bgyis zhes slob bu rnam rgyal dge slong gis bskul ba'i byed pas dam pa'i ming can gyi gyi na pas bgyis pa'i yi ge pa'i ngang du byed rab 'byams blo gros kyis so</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3594</vol>
<tib>gsol 'debs thugs rje myur 'jug ma</tib>
<p>1a-3b</p>
<col>@003a * zhes pa ltar gyi rang la lung rtogs kyi yon tan gang yang med bzhin du rang la bstod pa ni @003b mkhas pa rnams 'brel ba'i rgyud 'dug kyang rang gi slob ma mer ken chos rje aer te ni chos rje gnyis dang aa ri lugs na yo ga tsa ri dad pa gtong ba'i rgyan gyis mdzes pa'i aer te ni yel deng ho sha'i ja dang dpon mon mon dha ra tshe dbang rdo rje rnams kyis ded rnams kyis rgyun du kha ton byas chog pa'i gsol 'debs zhig ces kyang dgos zhes nan tan chen pos bskul ba'i ngo mchog par byin rlabs kyi khyad kyis tshigs bcad dang po dang mjug gi sho lo ka gsum rgyal dbang mchog gis mdzad pa rnams bcug cing gzhan sho lo ka bcu bdun gsar rtsom gyi tshul du tshig sbyor spangs te go bde bar rab 'byams smra ba sku skye blo bzang 'phrin las ming gzhan rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pa chen po'i bka' lung gis dza ya pandi ta khu thug thu zhes 'bod pas dza sbyor gcig gi yun la sbyar ba'i dge bas bdag gzhan sems can thams cad myur du sangs rgyas thob par gyur cig  dge'o "</col>
</item>

<item>

<item>

<tib>rigs gsum spyi sgrub kyi bla ma'i rnal 'byor 'jam mgon thugs rje'i char rgyun bskul byed sprin gyi sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@012b ces rigs gsum spyi sgrub kyi bla ma'i rnal 'byor 'jam mgon thugs rje'i char rgyun skul byed sprin gyi sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba 'di ni cha har khu bo khu kho'i phyogs 'bras sgo mang grwa rigs dge slong blo bzang rgya mtsho dang dge slong dbang phyug rin chen gnyis kyis nan chen pos bskul ba la brten nas 'jam mgon snyan rgyud 'dzin pa'i spong ba pa dge slong ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis pho brang chen po po ta la'i gzim chung bde ba can du sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che 'phel zhing rgyas par gyur cig  "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3594</vol>
<tib>rje btsun sgrol ma la brten pa'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor</tib>
<p>1a-6b</p>
<col>@006b (ces rje btsun sgrol ma la brten pa'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor mdo sngags gnyis ka'i lam gyi gnad tshang pa 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes dge slong byams pa thabs mkhas kyis yang dang yang du nan chen pos bskul ba la brten nas rje btsun sgrol ma'i rjes gnang dang sgrub thabs kyi lung man ngag bcas thob pa dge slong ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bkra shis bsam gtan gling du sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang 'gro kun 'phags ma sgrol mas rjes su 'dzin par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3594</vol>
<tib>rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis kyi ngos 'dzin bya tshul mdor bsdus</tib>
<p>1a-8a</p>
<col>@008a * (ces pa 'di ni gzhung lugs smra ba dka' cehn ye shes 'byung gnas kyis 'di lta bu zhig cis kyang dgos zhes nan cher bskul ba la brten nas rgyal khams pa ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis chos grwa chen po bkra shis lhun por sbyar ba'o mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3594</vol>
<tib>sems dang sems byung gi tshul rnam par bshad pa'i sdom tshig rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-16a</p>
<col>@015b (ces sems dang sems byung gi tshul rnam par bshad pa'i sdom tshig rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba 'di ni rang gi dran pa gso ba dang skal mnyam gzhan la'ang phan pa'i bsam pas dge slong @016a * ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bkra shis bsam gtan gling du sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang thub pa'i bstan pa rin po che 'phel zhing rgyas par gyur cig  ` 'di ltar bgyis pas tshe rab thams cad du gang du su dar 'grogs pa de yi tshe bdag nyid kun las dman par blta ba dang gzhan nyid mchog tu gces par 'dzin par shog ma rgan sems can rnams kyi bran du gyur mi mnyes kun sbang mnyes pa kho na byed khyod nyid snying gi dkyil du 'dzin byed pa'i byang sems yar ngo'i zla ltar rgyas par shog rigs drug sems can re re'i drung du yang bdag gis sprul pa re res bskyangs byas te nges 'byung byang sems yang dag lta ba dang rim gnyis rnal 'byor mchog la 'god par shog  sho lo ka gsum yang klong rdol rin po che'i gsung ngo dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3594</vol>
<tib>` dga' ldan lha brgya ma'i bla brgyud gsol 'debs</tib>
<p>9a og-9b 'og</p>
<col>@009b 'og (dga' ldan lha brgya ma'i bla brgyud gsol 'debs 'di yang chos tshul 'di la mos pa mang por phan par bsams nas dge slong ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bkra shis bsam gtan gling du sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3594</vol>
<tib>` skyabs 'gro'i nyams len mdor bsdus</tib>
<p>9a gong- 9a og</p>
<col>@009a * 'og (zhes skyabs 'gro'i nyams len mdor bsdus snying por dril ba 'di ni bstan pa'i gsal byed aa ky'a hu thog thu blo bzang 'jam dbyangs rgya mtshos bskul ba la brten nas dge slong ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis pho brang chen po po ta la'i gzim chung bde ba can du sbyar ba'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3595</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po dpal rta mchog rol pa gsang sgrub kyi chos skor rnams phyogs gcig tu bsgrigs pa las rtsa'i yig rnying</tib>

<tib>dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bum bskyed ngag 'don gyi rim par dril ba</tib>

<col>@004b (zhes dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bum bskyed ngag 'don gyi rim par dril ba 'di yang dge slong blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis sbyar ba'o bkra shis par gyur cig</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3595</vol>
<tib>dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub thabs dang zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes kyis mdzad pa</tib>
<p>1a-15b</p>
<col>@015b (zhes dpal rdo rje sems dpa' sgrubs thabs dang sbyin bsreg gi cho ga 'di ni chos rje aer te ni pandi ta mkhan po dpal ldan rgya mtsho nas bskul ba ltar ^pandi ta chen po aa bhya: k'a ras mdzad pa'i sbyin bsreg 'od kyi snye ma dang khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po rgyal ba gnyis pa'i legs bshad chen po dngos grub rgya mtsho sogs kyi dgongs pa dang mthun pa ^sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes kyis sbyar ba'o dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>

<vol>3595</vol>
<tib>dpal rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi gtor 'bul rgyun khyer</tib>
<p>3a-4b</p>

<item>

<tib>rje btsun ma yid bzhin 'khor lo tshe sgrub thabs bzhugs s+ho "</tib>

<col>@004a * (zhes rje btsun ma yid bzhin 'khor lo bsgrub pa'i thabs 'di yang dad pa gtong ba dang tshul khrims dang rnam dpyod phun sum tshogs pa grwa tshang chos rje 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis yang yang nan cher bskul ba la brten nas sde snod 'dzin pa dge slong blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis bkra shis lhun po'i gzims chung yid dga' chos 'dzin du sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3597</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi bzlas pa byed tshul spu gri ngar 'dogs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-20a</p>
<col>@019b ces rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi bsnyen sgrub las gsum gyi rnam bzhag rgyal gdon sog gi spu gri'i kha bskongs bzlas dmigs dang sngags sham 'dogs tshul bshad pa spu gri'i ngar 'dogs zhes bya ba 'di ni lhag pa'i lha 'di nyid la mi phyed pa'i dad pa ldan pa mang pos phyi nang gsang ba de kho na nyid kyi bzlas pa @020a * dang dmigs skor gang yod sngags kyi sham bu dgos tshul dang bcas pa shin tu gsal ba zhig dgos zhes yang dang yang du bskul ba la brten nas rgyal khams pa ^dharma badzra gyis dam pa mang po'i yig cha las 'dir sbyar du rung ba rnams phyogs gcig tu bsdus te kun ldan gyi lo snron zla'i yar tshes bzang por skyed mos tshal yid dga' chos 'phel du sbyar ba'o dge'o legs so bkra shis so "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3597</vol>

<item>

<vol>3600</vol>
<tib>dpal ldan lha mo dmag zor rgyal mo gtor chog dang 'brel bar ma mo'i 'khrugs skongs bya tshul gyi cho ga mkha' 'gro mnyes byed ces bya ba</tib>

<col>@015b (zhes pa 'di ni bla ma rig 'dzin brgyud pa gong ma dag gi phyag bzhes bzhin dam tshig rdo rjes gdams pa so so'i rgyun thob par byas te lag tu blang bde bar bsgrigs pa'o mah'a su kha si ddhi rastu: dge'o</col>

<col>@002b (zhes pa 'di ni ma ni pa ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis @003a * 'di lta bu zhig dgos tshul gyi 'phros pa byung phral gzhan la phan sems nye bar bzhag nas ^ dpal rta mgrin gyi rnal 'byor pa blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes kyis myur bar bris pa'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3624</vol>
<tib>yi dam mkha' 'gro chos bsrung spyi la sbyar rung gi bzlog pa'i cho ga mi mthun phyogs las rgyal ba'i ru mtshon zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-8b</p>
<col>@008b (ces yi dam chos bsrung spyi la sbyar rung gi bzlog pa'i cho ga mi mthun phyogs las rgyal ba'i ru mtshon zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam dpyod yangs pa'i dge slong blo bzang dpal ldan dang dad ldan dge slong mkhas mchog sogs don gnyer can 'ga' zhig gis yang yang bskul ba'i ngor btsun gzugs ratna'i ming can gyis rje 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa dang grub dbang tho'u bkwan rin po che skyabs rje ngag dbang rgyal mtshan sogs kyi gsung las btus te bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni dge slong pa tu bha tras bris pa dza yantu</col>

<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3626</vol>
<tib>mkhan chen chos kyi rgyal po blo bzang dbang chen dpal 'bar dpal bzang po'i 'khrungs rab gsol 'debs rnams bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-4b</p>
<col>@004a * (ces no min han blo bzang dbang chen dpal 'bar gyi 'khrungs rabs dang 'brel ba'i gsol 'debs zhabs brtan smon tshig 'di ni khal kha nas dang stobs dang ldan pa can jun ching wang bde chen skyabs kyis bskul ba'i ngor ^sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang skal bzang rgya mtshos sbyar ba'o slar yang grwa tshang ga-yas ru dga' ldan chos gling phyogs las rnam rgyal gyi slob dpon gu shri ngag dbang phun tshogs dga' ldan bkra shis dge 'phel gling gi slob dpon blo bzang rab brtan dga' ldan bde ba can gling @004b gi slob dpon rdo rje rgyal mtshan phyag mdzod rgya mtsho rin chen dge slong blo bzang sbyin pa bcas kyis dbus ga-yon ru dga' ldan chos gling phyogs las rnam rgyal gyis mtshon grwa tshang khag bzhi'i grwa rigs mtha' dag nas bskul ma'i ri mo skyes bcas dang ched gnyer gyi mi sna da'i ching chos rje blo bzang tshul khrims dang khal kha chi blo bzang tshe ring aer te ni no yon chos rje blo bzang gsang bdag bcas kyis bskul ba'i ngor sngon du rgyal dbang mchog nas ji ltar stsal bar gzhi brten gsar du brtags bkod pa rnams kyi kha bskongs dang bcas te tshangs pa dud thang can gyis 'phral du smras pa'i yi ge pa ni bkra shis tshe ring gis bgyis pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3626</vol>
<tib>'phags pa'i gnas brtan bcu drug dang zab yangs ma dang rigs gsum mgon po'i bstod pa dang rgyan drug mchog gnyis kyi bstod pa bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-7a</p>
<col>@007a * (ces pa 'di ni mang du thos pa'i btsun pa dge 'dun rgya mtsho'i dpal gyis sbyar ba'o</col>

<item>

<vol>3626</vol>
<tib>rje btsun dam pa blo bzang bstan pa'i sgron me'i rje de nyid kyi 'khrungs rabs gsol 'debs</tib>
<p>1a-4a</p>
<col>@003b (ces pa 'di yang rtag brtan chos sde'i dbu mdzad chos khrims sogs drag rim rnams kyis nan cher bskul ba la brten nas sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis rje btsun mchog gi sprul sku kun dga' snying po'i gsung ji lta ba bzhin rtag brtan chos sde chen @004a * po'i gtsug lag khang du thogs med du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge tshul rnam dpyod dang ldan pa blo bzang dbang rgyal lo ` blo gter ngur smrig gar rol tsod kha ba'i lugs bzang bstan pa'i sgron me legs bzung nas gdul bya'i yid kyi ma rig mun sel ba'i yongs 'dzin dge ba'i bshes la gsol ba 'debs shlo ka 'di pan chen blo bzang ye shes kyis mdzad pa'i rje nyid kyi gsol 'debs las phyung ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>

<item>

<vol>3627</vol>
<tib>bla ma rta mchog rol ba gsang sgrub kyi sgrub thabs zhal gdams bdud rtsi'i rol mtsho yis skyed rim sdom tshig dge legs skyes lnga'i dbyangs dam pa'i gsung gi zur brgyan 'dir</tib>
<p>1a-68a</p>
<col>@067b (ces skyer skang lugs dge legs skye lnga'i sgra dbyangs dam pa'i gsung gi zur rgyan zhes bya ba 'di ni kha kha khu re chen mo nas sgo 'gog pa dge 'dun pa 'gyur med dang hal ha jo nang pe se'i shog nas dad gus kyi dpal ldan bstan pa dge bsgom dge 'ban 'jam dpal dang dam pa'i chos la mkhyen rab phul du khyen pa dge tshul thos bsam rgya mtsho sogs lugs 'di la mos pa'i gus ldan gyi slob ma mang pos yang yang nan gyis bskul zhing ` lhag par dge ldan rang lugs 'dzin pa'i mnga' bdag chos 'khor rgyal mkhan po sangs rgyas rdo rje'i yang sprul mkhyen brtse'i bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang grags pa rgyal mtshan gyi lung gis rta mgrin 'di khyod kyi yi dam lhag pa'i lha yin pas bsgom sgrub la 'bad na legs tshul dang lha mchog 'di nyid la sgrub thabs mang yang rang phyogs su zhal lung 'di 'brel chags shing de la lhan thabs kyi tshul du phyogs mthun gyi yig cha nas blang ste dbang chog sogs deng sang gi dam pa 'ga' zhig gi gnang bar yod pa 'dir gzhir bzhag pa'i bskyed rim zhig bgong du mi rung ba med de dam pa gong mas dngos su bskyed @068a * rim gyi tha snyad gnad na'ang don thob la lam 'khyer gsum tshang ba'i cho ga mdzad pa 'di bzhin yod ces dbang chog nor bu'i phreng ba ces pa'i dpe cha dang yang 'di ni sku gsum gyi 'bras bu smin byed kyi rten 'brel yin zhes gsungs te shing tog au shu gsum lha dar dang bcas gnang ste kho bo dbugs dbyung bar mdzad pa la bsten nas ` kun mkhyen chen po 'jam dbyangss bzhad pa'i rdo rje'i gsung gi bshad pa rnams gtso bor bzung rje btsun dkon bstan pa'i sgron me rdo rje 'chang ratna dha dza rje btsun blo bzang chos kyi nyi ma sogs kyi dam pa tshad thub rnams kyi gsungs bshad gzhir bzhag rang gi myong grub gtan tshig sna tshogs kyis phra btab rab dkar dge legs kyi ri mor shar bas mtshams sbyor dar gyi phyi dor byas te go sa dang skyes mang grags pa'i nor gyis 'pham na'ang dam pa'i gsung gsang bdud rtsi'i bcad kyis 'tsho ba ` dge slong dge 'dun sengge 'am rig 'dzin rnam snang rdo rjes dag nas gang thon snying kar bzhugs pa'i bla ma'i rdo rje 'chang gi gsung du rtogs pa'i ngos nas bkod pa'o thog mar yi ger bkod pa ni las smon mtshams sbyor gyis rang gi drug 'khor aer dhe ni nang so dge 'dun yon tan dang shes rab phul du phyin pa tho yon dge legs mkhas btsun rnam gnyis bris pa tshe rabs thams cad du mtshan ldan rdo rje slob dpon gyis rjes su bzung ste gsar chen zab mo'i chos la doms pa med par longs spyod pa'i rgyur gyur cig  dge legs 'phel bkra shis par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<tib>lha mo gtad dkar 'gro bzang ma'i sgrub mchog dang 'brel ba'i dus mchod bya tshul phyugs ga-yang 'gug byed don yod lcags kyu zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>

<vol>3630</vol>
<tib>rin chen jo bo'i bla ma nom chi chos rje grags pa dar rgyas kyi 'khrungs rabs don gnyis mthar phyin bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-4a</p>
<col>@003b (ces dpal sa skya ba chen po sngags 'chang bla ma thams cad mkhyen pa bdag chen dbang sdud snying po nas snga phyir rim bzhin khal kha'i ao che ras pa thu thu she ye thu han tshe ldan rdo rje yab yum sras sogs mchog dman thun mongs nas nan cher bskul ba'i ngor stsal ba aer te ni jo bo'i dgon pa'i bla ma nom chi chos rje grags pa dar rgyas kyi 'khrungs rabs gsol 'debs brtan bzhugs dang 'brel ba don gnyis mthar phyin byin rlabs char 'bebs zhes bya ba dang de'i kha bskong gsol 'debs yid ches mos gus bden mthu mngon gyur zhes bya ba gnyis ka'ang 'don bde'i ched du phyogs gcig tu bsres pa 'di yang bzhad rdor gyis bris pa'i dge bas rjes 'jug rnams kyi rgyud la byin rlabs myur du @004a * 'jug pa'i rgyur gyur cig  'das pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig pa dang da ltar zhugs pa'i ston pa sh'akya thub ma 'ongs sangs rgyas bde gshegs dri med dpal rnam grangs dbyings su gcig la gsol ba 'debs zhes pa'ang gong dang bstun par byas so</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3630</vol>
<tib>rje btsun ye shes bstan pa'i nyi ma'i 'khrungs rabs gsol 'debs bde gshegs snying po</tib>
<p>1a-4a</p>
<col>@003b (ces grub thob kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po nag po spyod pa chen po'i skyes rabs gsol 'debs 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes khal kha'i thed gun mah'a sa mu tra ma ni bha dra dang la'i che chen hang gis bskul ma mdzad pa ltar ^ yongs su grags pa rnams bzhag nas gsang ba'i rnam thar las byung ba bzhin sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes kyis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge tshul blo bzang mkhas mchog go </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3630</vol>
<tib>rten 'brel bstod pa legs bshad snying po</tib>
<p>15a-20a</p>
<col>@020a * (ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten thams cad kyi ma 'dis pa'i mdza' bshes chen po ston pa bla na med pa la zab mo rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba gsung ba'i sgo nas bstod pa legs par bshad pa'i snying po zhes bya ba 'di ni mang du thos pa'i dge slong blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyis gangs can khrod kyi gangs ri'i dbang po'i de gung rgyal gyi lha zhol dben gnas lha'i sdings ming gzhan rnam par rgyal ba'i gling zhes bya bar sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni nam mkha' dpal lo</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3630</vol>
<tib>sgrol dkar gyi bstod pa mkhyen brtse ma</tib>
<p>54a-56b</p>
<col>@056b (ces rgyal ba'i yum mchog rje btsun sgrol ma dkar mo la bstod pa tshe dang ye shes spel bar byed pa'i rin po che zhes bya ba 'di ni sh'akya'i dge slong dge 'dun grub pa dpal bzang pos dpal byang chub chen po'i dben gnas theg chen pho brang du sbyar ba'o</col>

<item>

<vol>3631</vol>
<tib>rlung rta'i mchod chog phan bde'i pad+ma dkar po'i mdzes rgyan bung ba gzhon nu'i glu dbyangs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>17b-25a</p>
<col>@024b ('di la rlung dang klung zhes pa gnyis yod pa don 'dra ba'am gang ltar yang snga ma'i yi ge ltar byas te mchog gsum spyi ma mchod pa'i sgo nas rlung rta dar bar byed pa'i cho ga 'di ni chen po hor yul gyi grwa rigs blo bzang lung rtogs dang rnam rgyal gnyis kyis rlung rta'i bskang bshags cig gyis zhes dngos po'i skyes dang bcas yang nan gyis bskul ba'i ngor  ^ btsun gzugs ngag dbang thub bstan rgya mtshos rang lo nyer brgyad la babs pa'i nag zla'i tshes bzang por chos sde chen po bkra shis 'khyil du rang gzhan nas ga-yar khral tsam du bris pa'i @025a * yi ge pa ni dpyod ldan dge slong bsam sgrub ming can gyis bgyis pa ) stag seng khyung 'brug bzhi dang grogs pa yi rlung rta yang la bskyed pa'i rten 'brel la brten nas 'gro 'dug smra spyod dpal dar zhing bde bskyid phun tshogs gong du rgyas gyur cig  (dge'o legs so sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3631</vol>
<tib>rlung rta'i rab gnas bya ba'i rim pa ni"</tib>
<p>3a-4b</p>
<col>@004b (ces pa 'di rlung rta'i bsrung 'khor rab gnas bya tshul pad+ma 'byung gnas kyi rgod ma brgyan zhes bya ba 'di ni yon tan rgya mtshos bris pa'o</col>

<vol>3634</vol>
<tib>nyer tshe kun sel bi ha ra bzhugs so lha mo'i ri khrod ma lo ma gyon ma sgrub par 'dod pa</tib>
<p>1a-7b</p>
<col>@006b(ces lha mo'i ri khrod pa lo ma gyon ma'i sgrub thab nyer tshe'i kun sel zhes bya ba 'di dad ldan gyi slob ma dge slong ngag dbang rgya mtshos 'di lta bus dgos zhes bskul ba la brten nas brgya rtsa sogs gzhung dang khyad par rje de nyid kyi mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs yod bzhin bdag 'dra bas sgrub thabs rtson pa ni sa skya pan chen gyis 'gro mgon @007a * sangs rgyas gzhung bzhin du ston pa gzhan la gus byed pa yan lag brgyad chu 'gram du ba tshu'i khron pa brko ba bzhin zhes gsungs pa'i dper song na'ang bskul ba po'i 'dod pas sgrub thabs mang ba'i phyogs dang mi 'gal bar bya zhing khyad par rje de nyid kyis mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs gzhir zhag byas nas bum tshogs bla ma'i dam pa'i gsung rgyun ltar 'grig nas gnam bskos jing gir rgyal po'i ding las son cing pan chen phyogs thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba khams gsum chos kyis rgyal po don gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te rje btsun blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas dang rigs dang dkyil 'khor kun gyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang chen po dkon mchog rgyal mtshan gnyis kyi zhabs rdul spyi bor len cing gsungs gis bdud rtsi myong ba'i lha'i btsun pa blo bzang bstan 'dzin rgyal mtshan gyis shing pho byi ba'i hor zla ba bcu gcig pa'i chos la sbyar ba'i dge ba'i ma gyur sems can thams cad phyi gi nyer 'tshe thams cad las rgyal nas bde ba can du thogs pa med par 'gro bar gyur cig  mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3634</vol>
<tib>rnam rgyal stong mchod kyi cho ga'i zur 'debs bdud rtsi'i zil mngar zhes bya ba bzhugs so * bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma lha dgu'i sgrub thabs stong mchod kyi cho ga dang bcas pa 'chi med bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-5b</p>
<col>@005b (zhes pa 'di ni lhag bsam rnam dpyod mchog tu dge ba chos rje ye shes dar rgyas kyis bskul ba'i ngor btsun pa dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron mes bris pa'o dge'o legs so</col>

<item>

<tib>pad+ma yang gsang khros pa'i las byang gyer sgom 'jigs med rdo rje'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs so"</tib>
<p>1a-77a</p>
<col>@076b (ces pad+ma yang gsang khros pa khrag 'thung lha dgu'i las kyang gyer sgom 'jigs med rdo rje'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba 'di yang rgya sngags 'chang chen po 'jam dpal gsang ba'i rigs las 'jig rten dbang phyug phyag na pad dkar kyis rjes su bzung ba'i gdung dri ma med pa las byung ba gnas rnying chos kyi rjes sku 'bring po'i gsung gis snga nas bskul ba dang nye lam chos sde chen po theg chen gling gi byes mkhas nyan grwa tshang ba'i slob dpon bsod nams rgyal mtshan gtor sgrub par bcas pa rnams dang grong smad pa 'phrin las rgya mtsho sogs kyis bskul ba brten nas mkhon ston rdo rje 'chang dpal 'byor lhun grub sogs lam 'di'i sgo nas grub pa brnyes pa'i yongs 'dzin dam pa chos bzhin du spyod pa rnams kyis bka' drin la brten nas zab mo'i tshul 'di la blo gros kyi snang ba cung zad rgyas pa'i za hor gyi rigs las a'a bh'u tr'i pa'i btsun pa ngag dbang blo bzang rgya mtsho ming @077a * gzhan gang shar rang grol du 'bod pa'i ldom bu pas yang gsang khros pa'i rgyud lo chen bee ro tsa na'i 'gyur aer ba se ba gdong nas gter ston rnam gsum gyis spyan drangs pa'i gter ma grub thob 'dar char la bka' babs pa slob dpon chen po  pad+ma 'byung gnas kyi mdzad pa'i las byang mus sras pa dpal ldan seng ge'i mdzad pa'i 'phrin las kyi sgom khog rin chen 'phreng ba bla chen chos dpal bzang pos mdzad pa'i sgom khog gnyags kyi ban dhe rnam rgyal bzang pos mdzad pa'i las byang tshar chen chos kyis rgyal pos mdzad pa'i chos skyong skor gyi yi ge rnams la gzhi byas yig rnying pho mo'i tshigs bcad rnams byin rlabs kyi tshan kha che ba'i phyir rang sor bzhag gsar du kha skong dgos pa rnams dang tshig lhug phal che tshigs bcad du bsdebs nas myos byed lo hor zla lnga pa'i dkar phyogs kyi dga' ba gnyis pa'i tshe la dga' ldan pho brang du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni sngags ban ngag dbang 'phrin las so dge'o bkra shis</col>

<tib>mkhan chen chos kyi rgyal po'i gsung 'bum las bla ma mchod pa'i 'khrid dngos grub kyi char 'bebs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-42a</p>
<col>@041a * (ces bla ma mchod pa'i khrid yig dngos grub char 'bebs zhes bya ba 'di ni dbu mdzad blo bzang rab brtan dang nye gnas blo bzang rdo rje gnyis kyis snga mo nas bskul kyang rnam par ga-yang bsang dung lus pas na phyis aem chi dge slong sangs rgyas bkra shis dang aor du su'i dge slong ngag dbang bsod nams gnyis yang 'tshams sbyar bas rang nyid kyang khyab bdag bla ma'i zhal rgyun gyi brjod gsos su bsam te dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyi mkhyen brtse ma lus pa gcig tu ba'i ngo po bdag nyid chen po don gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te bdag gi mkhan po @041b rin po che pan chen phyogs thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po dang bka' drin mnyam med khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang chen po dkon mchog rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas gnyis kyi bka' drin gyis 'tsho ba'i lha'i btsun pa blo bzang bstan 'dzin rgyal mtshan gyis ston pa mya ngan las 'das nas lo gnyis stong lnga brgya re drug 'das pa rab byung bcu gnyis pa'i skyes bdag lcags mo lug gi lo'i rje de nyid kyi dul mchod chen po nag pa zla ba'i tshes bcu gsum la 'go btsugs te ston pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus chen sa ga zla ba'i tshes bco lnga'i nyin rma chu'i 'gram du @042a * rdzogs par bgyis pa'i yi ge pa ni dge slong blo bzan grab brtan no 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa spyi dang khyad par du yang rgyal ba gnyis pa'i bstan pa'i snying por gyur ba rgyal ba dben sa pa chen po'i ring lugs dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  sarba mangga lam</col>

<col>@018a * (dam can chos rgyal ma he'i zhal can la tsa mundi dang ya ba ti la sogs pa gshin rje pho mo'i 'khor gyis bskor ba ni phyi sgrub dang khro bo'i zhal can la ma he'i zhal can bzhis bskor ba ni rje nyid la dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyis mngon sum du bka' bsgo mdzad nas brang du bkos pa'i chos rgyal nang sgrub shun tu gnyan pa yin te de gnyis la gtor ma 'bul ba'i cho ga cung zad rgyas par phye ba rje de nyid kyi zhabs kyi padmo la gus pas gtugs pa'i zhal gyi man ngag 'dzin pa gshin rje'i gshed kyi rnal 'byor ba dge legs dpal bzang pos nyang stod rig pa'i 'byung gnas ri bo mdangs can gyi dgon par sbyar ba'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3641</vol>
<tib>dam can chos kyi rgyal po'i gtor chog bskang gso bstod bskul sogs</tib>
<p>1a-28b</p>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3641</vol>
<tib>dam can chos kyi rgyal po'i mchod 'phreng tshigs su bcad par sdebs pa ni"</tib>
<p>22a-26a</p>
<col></col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3641</vol>
<tib>dam can mgar ba nag po la brten nas dgra la 'phen pa'i zor chog gnam lcags rdo rje'i mda' zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-13b</p>
<col>@013b (dam can mgar ba nag po la brten pa'i zor chog gnam lcags thog gi mda' char zhes bya ba 'di ni chos skyong 'di nyid la dad pa brtan pa thob cing ^ skyes mchog tu ma'i zhabs pad spyi bor brten pa'i btsun gzugs gyi na ba pra nydz'a ming can gyis bla ma chos bsrung la gsol ba btab ste bris pa'i dge bas rang gzhan thams cad dgra med pa tshe rabs kun tu bla ma chos bsrung gis rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3641</vol>
<tib>dpal ldan lha mo'i sgo nas glo bur las bcol gyi zor 'phen dgra bgegs phye mar 'thag pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-10a</p>
<col>@010a * (ces dpal ldan lha mo'i sgo nas glo bur las bcol gyi zor 'phen tshul dgra bgegs phye mar 'thag pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'di yang ^ btsun pa ngag dbang blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis bsgrigs pa'o dge'o legs so</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3641</vol>
<tib>god kha bsrung ba'i man ngag 'di ni mdos gzhung 'bum tig las bris pa'o "</tib>
<p>1a-3b</p>
<col>@003b (god kha bsrung ba'i man ngag 'di ni mdos gzhung 'bum tig las gsal bar bris nas mi mthun god kha thams cad kyi ga-yul las rgyal bar gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3641</vol>
<tib>gshin rje'i chos kyi rgyal po la nang sgrub kyi tshul du bstod pa gdud bdud dpung rnam par 'thag pa zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>18a-19b</p>
<col>@019b (ces gshin rje'i chos kyi rgyal po la nang sgrub kyi tshul du bstod pa bdud dpung rnam par 'thag pa zhes bya ba 'di ni sdom brtson sde snod 'dzin pa 'jam dpal rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i rang gi slob mas gsol ba btab pa'i don du gshin rje'i gshed kyi rnal 'byor pa mang du thos pa'i rgyal khams pa blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyis sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3641</vol>
<tib>mgon po tshe dpag med kyi 'chi blu srog glud</tib>
<p>1a-7a</p>
<col>@007a * (zhes pa 'di yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen sde snod 'dzin pa mang pos yang yang nan gyis bskul ba la brten nas mdo rgyud man ngag 'dzin pa'i spong ba pa blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis chos grwa'i chen po bkra shis lhun po'i gtsug lag khang du slob dpon dze ta ri'i gzhung bya rgyud spyi'i lam dang mthun par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge tshul blo bzang dar rgyas so bkra shis</col>
</item>

<item>

<p>19b-20b</p>

</item>

<p>1a-6b</p>
<col>@006a * (ces @006b gnod sbyin chen po rdo rje bdud 'dul gyi bskang gso'i rim pa bar chad kun sel zhes bya ba  'di yang rigs rus mchog tu dge zhing dad pa dang rnam dpyod phun sum tshogs pa rig gnas mtha' dag la mkhyen pa'i spyan yangs ga-yo ba'i sde pa rnam sras dzam la zhes bya bas bskul ba'i ngor mdo rgyud dam pa'i man ngag 'dzin pa sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis 'di'i sgrub thabs slob dpon pad+mas mdzad par grags pa dang grwa ba mngon shes kyis mdzad zer ba'i yig rnying 'ga' zhig 'dug kyang snga mo nas brgyud pas bris nor mngan che zhing phal tshig ring thung yang mi snyoms pa yid brtan dka' ba dang gzhan ma khungs btsun pa'i gtor chog gtsang ma zhig ma mthong yang 'di'i rjes gnang las tshogs rags rim dpal ldan bla ma dam pa'i zhabs drung du thob pa'i gdams pa la gzhi byas sngar gyi yig rnying de dag gi legs cha rnams kyis kyang kha bskangs te chos grwa chen po bkra shis lhun po'i gtsug lag khang du sug bris su byas pa las slar yi ge pa ni rab 'byams smra ba'i lo tstsha ba dge 'dun dpal 'bar ro 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan du gyur cig bkra shis pa dang dge ba 'phel gyur cig </col>

</item>

<item>

<col>@008b (ces rang gi rtogs pa brjod pa mdo tsam du bshad pa 'di ni mang du thos pa'i dge slong shar tsong kha pa blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyis @009a * 'brog ri bo che dge ldan rnam par rgyal ba'i gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dka' bzhi pa rin chen dpal lo 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che phyogs kun tu rgyas par byed nus par gyur cig </col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3645</vol>
<tib>sman bla bsdus pa'i kha skong bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-7a</p>
<col>@006b (ces pa 'di ni sa lug lo ^ ri bo dge rgyas dga' ldan bshad sgrub gling la sogs pa'i chos sde che chung rnams su mdo cho ga yid bzhin dbang rgyal dang mdo chog yid bzhin nor bu zhal 'don du 'jug skabs mdo chog bsdus pa'i kha skong du sh'akya'i rjes 'jug tha shal ^ blo bzang thub bstan dbang phyug 'jigs med rgya mtshos bris nas par du bzhengs pa'i mthus snyigs dus kyi rgud pa'i ming yang med par sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rin po che rgyas par gyur cig sarba mangga lam yangs pa'i rgyal @007a * khams 'dis mtshon mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten khams kyi rgud pa kun zhi zhing chos dang 'byor ba phun sum tshogs pa yi dpal la rtag tu rol ba'i bkra shis shog   'di rje btsun ^blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi gsung aom su pra ti sh+shra badzra sw'a h'a "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3645</vol>
<tib>sprul pa'i bstan bsrung tha 'og chos kyi rgyal po'i tshogs mchod 'phrin las myur grub zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-5b</p>
<col>@005b (ces pa 'di ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen skal bzang mkhas grub nas 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes gsung gis yang yang bskul ba'i ngor dad gshin gyi dkor la 'dzem med du spyod par bla ma'i ming du 'bod pa dge legs kyis bris pa'o zhal gro dge'o</col>

<item>

<col>@007b (ces khros nag lha lnga'i sgrub thabs rgyun 'khyer mkha' 'gro'i zhal lung zhes bya ba 'di ni sngags pa tshe ring thar gyis lan du ma'i bar du bskul ba la brten nas ^ dharma badzra gyis sa dge'i mkhas pa 'ga' zhig gi yig cha dang mthun par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni aor du su dge slong blo bzang kun dga'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3649</vol>
<tib>gcod kyi gdon sla ba'i 'debs 'gro mkha' 'gro sde lnga'i bsnyen pa byed tshul yid bzhin dbang gi rgyal po zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-8a</p>
<col>@007b (ces mkha' 'gro'i rigs lnga'i bsnyen pa bya tshul yid bzhin dbang gi rgyal po zhes bya ba 'di ni blo gros kyi nor dang ldan pa'i rab 'byams smra ba blo bzang rgyal mtshan dang gzhan yang don gnyer ba mang pos lnga phyir bskul ba la brten nas drin can bla ma thub dbang @008a * rdo rje 'chang dang dbyer ma mchis pa'i rje btsun ^ ngag dbang byams pa'i zhal snga nas kyi gsungs las byung ba bzhin dam pa'i de nyid kyi zhabs rdul yan lag mchog gis bdegs pa'i skal ba thob pa'i btsun gzugs snyoms la spa blo bzang chos kyi nyi ma kyis dpal ldan 'bras spungs du sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>

<vol>3649</vol>
<tib>gcod kyi man ngag rigs drug ma</tib>

<item>

<col>@003a * (ces ma gcig lab kyi sgron ma la gsol ba 'debs pa dngos pa dngos grub 'gug pa'i pho nya zhes bya ba 'di ni rje btsun de nyid kyi gdams pa zab mo blun po'i log chos kyi bsre bslad dang bral ba zab mo bdud kyi gcod yul la mos pa'i rnal 'byor pa blo bzang chos kyi nyi mas rang gi dad pas bskul te chos 'khor dpal gyi lha sa'i byang phyogs kyi ri khrod zhig tu sbyar </col>

<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3651</vol>
<tib>bde ba can gyi smon lam zhing mchog sgo 'byed zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-7b</p>
<col>@007b (bde ba can gyi zhing du skye ba 'dzin pa'i smon lam zhing mchog sgo 'byed ces bya ba 'di ni blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyis rdzing phyi'i gtsug lag khang du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni bzang skyong gis bgyis so</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3651</vol>
<tib>blo bzang rgyal ba kun gyi thugs rje ni "</tib>
<p>1b-4b</p>
<col>@004b ces pa 'di ni yan chad yongs kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po gling smad zhabs drung rin po ches bka' stsal pa dad du blangs te phyogs myul gyi rgyal khams pa blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos dpal ldan 'bras spungs kyi gzims chung nyi 'od 'khyil bar sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge tshul blo bzang phun tshogs so da ltar bstod pa'i zhes pa nas 'phrin las rgyas gyur cig ces pa'i bar shlooka gnyis 'di yang pan chen rin po che nyid kyi gsung ngo</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3651</vol>
<tib>blo gros dpag bsam ma sogs brtan bzhugs gsol 'debs bzhi</tib>
<p>1a-2b</p>
<col>@002b (ces pa 'di ni rang nyid rtsom pa'i spobs pa phra bar ma zad rang gis rang la bstod bsngags kyi tshig rtsom la spro bar ma gyur kyang gsang sngags rgyud pa grwa tshang nas rje zhal snga nas dang dbu chos mchod dpon nor gnyer sogs kyis snga phyir bskul nan ma chogs par ^sh'akya'i btsun pa blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes kyis sa mo sbrul lo'i cho 'phrul zla ba'i tshes bcu gsum la bka' gdams pho brang du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni gsol dpon ye shes dge 'dun gyis bgyis pa'o dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3652</vol>
<tib>dpal myur mdzad ye shes kyi mgon po phyag drug pa'i nang rten 'dzugs pa'i cho ga lag len 'khyer bde ba</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col>@003a * (^aartha siddhi badzra gyis snang ba mtha' yas pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa blo bzang dpal ldan bstan pa'i nyi ma phyogs las rnam rgyal dpal bzang pos mdzad pa'i chos skyong rnams kyi thugs rten 'dzugs pa'i cho ga kha shas la gzhi byas te rang bzos bslad par sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang bstan 'gro yongs la phan thogs par shog </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>

<item>

<vol>3656</vol>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3656</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi zhi rgyas dbang gsum gyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga ye shes me long zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-16a</p>
<col>@016b (ces rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi zhi rgyas dbang gsum gyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga ye shes me 'od ces bya ba 'di ni lha 'di nyid yi dam du byed pa dag gis bsnyen pa'i kha skong rang gzhan gyi rim 'gro sogs la sbyin sreg sgrub dgos skabs du mar yig cha gzhan mang po la ltos mi dgos pa'i tshig cho ga lag len sgril ba zhig byung na legs pa 'dug bsam rang nyid kyis 'dri 'dun yog thogs chos sde bkra shis chos gi khri ba zhwa dmar rab 'byams pa chos snyan grags kyis kyang bskul ba la rten nas gsang ba spyi'i cho ga 'od kyi snye ma'i dgongs pa bzhin khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po tsong kha pa chen po'i bka' srol mthun par ku s'a li ^dharma badzra gyis 'phang ba zhes pa lcags mo glang gi lo'i rgyal zla ba'i yar tshes la bla brang bkra shis 'od 'bar gyi gzims chung bde chen phug tu sbyar yi ge pa ni dge slong blo bzang kun dgas bgyis pa'o legs so dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3656</vol>
<tib>sdom gsum bslab bya rin po che'i phreng ba bskal bzang mgul rgyan zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-18a</p>
<col>@018a * (ces sdom gsum bslab bya rin po che'i phreng ba skal bzang mgul rgyan zhes bya ba 'di na dpal ldan smad rgyung grwa tshang gi grwa rigs dam pa sbyin pa rgyal mtshan gyis nyin zhag phrugs rer thun drug tu sdom gsum gyi bslab bya rnams la bsngo bgrang bya tshul 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes yang dang yang dnan chen pos bskul zhing rang dang skal ba mnyam pa gzhan la'ang phan du re ba dang rje thams cad mkhyen pas gangs ri'i khrong 'dir rgyal ba'i bstan pa'i snying po sdom gsum gyi bslab bya rnams rgyal ba rang nyid kyi dgongs pa ji bzhin du gsal bar mdzad pa'i lugs bzang 'di nyid slar yang ches cher 'phel na ci ma rung snyam du smon @018b pas dge slong ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bkra shis bsam gtan gling du sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang bstan pa'i snying po 'di nyid 'phel zhing rgyas par gyur cig</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3657</vol>

<p>1a-31a</p>
<col>@031a * (ces drug cu pa'i sgo nas blo bur las bcol gyi gtor ma 'phen tshul bstan dgra gzhom pa'i gnam lcags 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'di ni pha ron su nyid shog nas bstan 'gror smanpa'i lhag bsam dang bzang po'i bag chags kyis mthu brtas pa nom che zhabs drung skal bzang dar rgyas kyis bskul ngor ^btsun pa dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron mes dben gnas yid dga' chos 'dzin du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni bikshu ratna a'anantas bgyis pa 'dis kyang rgyal ba gnyis pa'i bstan pa bstan 'dzin dang bcas pa mtha' dag bdud sde'i ga-yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan phyogs dus kun tu bsgreng par gyur cig bkra shis par gyur cig shu bham dge'o</col>

<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3658</vol>
<tib>` dam can chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyi sgo nas bzlog bsgyur byed pa'i tshul</tib>
<p>1a-10a</p>
<col>@010a * (zhes sogs bzlog pa byas nas yon bdag gi ngan phyogs su btang nas me la bsreg mjug gi pa'i cho ga spyi ltar dgyes zhes pa 'di ni gshin rjes ngan sngags 'di ni rje btsun thams cad mkhyen pa bsod nams rgya mtsho dpal bzang pos sbyar bas bzlog bsgyur byed pa'i las shin tu dka' ba'i phyir cung mzad rgyas par bgyis dgos zhes jang jung chen po chen wang gi tshogs chen gyi bla ma lo rig yon tan ldan pa'i pi lig thu chos kyi don grub rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i nan tan chen po'i gsung gi bskul ba'i ngo khril du skyabs gnas dam pa dza ya pandi ta blo bzang snyan grags dge legs rnam rgyal dpal bzang po'i slob ma rnams tha shal blo bzang dpal mgon ming can gyis bgyis pa'i nyes pa'i tshogs ci mch pa rnams bla ma yi dam lha dang chos rgyal yab yum 'khor dang bcas pa bzod cing yangs par mdzad du gsol ngo tsha khris yod 'jig rtogs med pa'i sems bskyed 'bras bu rang la phan bde byung ba'i rgyur gyur cig  bkra shis dge legs 'phel gyur cig</col>

<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3658</vol>
<tib>` dpal ldan lha mo'i bzlog bsgyur zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3661</vol>
<tib>gza' skar 'bras bshad sogs so so byed</tib>
<p>1a-100a</p>
<col>@0098b (zhes phug lugs rtsis kyis legs bshad mkhas pa'i mgul rgyan beet'urya dkar po'i do shal dpyod ldan nor las gza' skar sbyor byed sogs so so'i 'bras bu bshad pa'i 'bras bu bshad 'di ni ma nas ri mo'i dus cha shas phra mar kyang yul dus sogs na zhib par brtags dgos par bshad kyi rigs mthun pa ches dkon pa'i shin tu mal nad che yang gtso bo mdo rgyud dang 'bras bu bshad rgya gar nas 'gyur rigs kyang cung zad mi mthun pa'i 'di dag 'di mi dag gam sa mtshon gcod dka' zhing phug lugs la yang rin cen phreng ba phyi nad lta na thabs dang kun 'dus nor bu'i phring ba sogs mang yang cung zad mi mthun zhing gzhan yang rgya phrug pa'i rtsis 'go brgya pa dag na sar ge bum pa dkar phreng ba sogs @099a * phyis rims kyis rnam grangs mang zhing bzang ngan dbye ba dka' des shig mchis na'ang 'di ni mdo rgyud rnams nas 'bras bu kha 'thor gsungs rigs dang` `'bras rtsis rang kha che'i pandi ta sh'akya shr'i dang 'bro lo ts'a ba grags 'byor shes rab kyis bsgyur ba rigs ldan rgyal dka' mdzad pa'i yan lag lnga pa pan chen sh'akya shr'i bhadras mda' ris su rgyal po chos kyi rje la gnang ba pan chen sh'akya shr'i dang phal chen sde ba'i pandi ta dzny'a na shr'is ga-yas ru shangs kyi lugs su gdong du bsgyur ba'i 'bras rtsis sh'is aa ban dznya'i le'u dang po'i khyim gyis 'bras rtsis pandi ta ga ya ngha ra'i yid bzhin nor b'i phreng ba'i rgyud nas bshad pa'i 'bras rtsis` `phyi rol gyi rgyud le'u drug pa la nye bar mkho ba rgya gar lho'i pandi ta dza ra smis mdzad pas shar phyogs kyi pandi ta dz'a na shr'i'i zhas snga nas las thon te lta'i skad la legs par zhugs pa lotstsha ba gnas brtan nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'i skar ma'i 'bras bu pan chen shr'i dza ya aananta lo dz'a pra dzny'a ratnas bsgyur ba'i dus sbyor gyi 'bras rtsis sogs rgya gzhung gi rigs dang rgyal mtshan dpal bzang gi rten 'brel gyi 'bras rtsis dang nag rtsis kyi sdong dgu 'dus sogs rgyud dang khrom rtsis le'u brgyad cu them yig @099b sogs dang gyis kyi 'bras bshad mang mo smos su ma zad chos kyis sgos bo la bka' tshal bla ma dkon mchog lhun grub sogs kyi 'bras bshad sogs mtha' dag la zhib tshor rtag pa bcug cing khungs thub rnams shas che mthun chi btso bor bzung la lar rang gis khungs 'gral khul rnams spyad smon 'gron chen mched kyi mtshan bu ltar skyabs mgon chen po 'dis rgyun du nyams bzhes rags pa mang gnang ltar gyis kha brgyan gza' skar gyi mngon rtogs dus kyi 'khor lo dang rgyud sde rnams nas gsungs pa'ang mi 'dra ba dang nag rtsis sogs mi mthun pa mang zhing skabs 'dir dus 'khor nag rtsis gnyis 'brel che ba gnyis ka bkod na ha cang rdzogs ches pa dang bcas gto bcos sogs la stobs bde khyad nag rtsis ltar bkod gza'i khams rnam gdan du bting tshos kyis bdag gzugs 'gros rnams sa bdag le'ur med gang yin rtogs bzo lta bu khungs ha cang mi tshe yang rin chen 'phreng ba lhan thabs sogs la 'dri srol 'dug pa ltar bkod sbyor bur bu ston 'bri khung chos mgon pa sogs lha yod par bzhed kyang bcom ldan rig ral gyis mtshon phyis kyis mkhas pa pa rnams dag sgrub mang bas med pa 'thad par sems pa dang kun dga' dus dbyigs sogs 'dir med rnams ha cang khungs @100a * ma 'brel bas bzhag pa dang bcas bgyis pa'i le'u ste so gso gsum pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>

<vol>3662</vol>
<tib># brgya bzhi'i cho ga ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-12a</p>
<col>@012a * (ces brgya bzhi'i cho ga legs pa don grub ces bya ba 'di ni snga rabs pa rnams kyi ngag rgyun phyag len ltar sh'akya'i btsun pa bstan 'dzin ming can gyis bkod pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3662</vol>
<tib># myur mdzad ye shes kyi mgon po'i bzlog bsgyur 'chi bdag ga-yul las rnam rgyal bdud sde'i 'joms pa'i mi zad mtshon cha'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-11a</p>
<col>@011a * (zhes pa 'di yang myur mdzad ye shes kyi mgon po'i bzlog bsgyur 'chi bdag ga-yul las rnam rgyal bdud sde'i 'joms pa'i mi zad mtshon cha'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'di ni ngo skol tu bstan pa'i 'gro ba rnams la gnod byed pa de dag thams cad 'joms byed la mkho nas ba'i 'jam dbyangs grags pa'i pas 'phral du bris 'dis kyang bstan pa dang bstan 'dzin skyes bu thams cad kyi 'gal rkyen mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad nye bar zhi bar gyur cig bkra shis aom bde legs su gyur cig  bkra shis 'bar gyur cig sarba mangga lam dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3662</vol>
<tib>chos skyong dregs pa lcam sring gi bzlog bsgyur zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-7a</p>
<col>@010b (zhes pa 'di ni chos @011a * skyong lcam sring gis rtsa brgyud kyi gzhung las len pa de ni shin tu bsdus pa'i phyir de las chung rgyas nas bgyi bzhes aer te ni tsas bzang bstan pa dar rgyas zhes bya ba 'di lta bu dgos zhes nan tan gyis yang yang bskul ba'i ngo mchog par skyabs gnas dam dza ya pandi ta blo bzang snyan grags dge legs rnam rgyal dpal bzang po'i slob ma rnams kyis tha shal pa rgyud rgyal bu song ba'i blo bzang dpal mgon ming can gyi bris pa la lhag chad dang la sogs pa'i nyes skyon thams cad bla ma lha dang chos kyong lcam sring 'khor bcas kyis thugs rtse bas bzod par mdzad du gsol gal te legs par cung zad dag yon na 'di bdag sogs 'gro kun deng nas byang chub ma thob kyi bar du lam zang gi rkyen ngan bar chod kun bzlog pa'i grogs mdzad par gyur cig</col>
</item>

<tib>sman gyi lha mo'i gsang ba'i smra ba'i man ngag 'dod gsal sgron zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@004b (zhes sman gyi lha mo'i gsang smra ba'i man ngag gang 'dod gsal sgron zhes bya @005a * bya ba 'di ni ^sman ram pa blo bzang don grub dang bsod nams blo gros gnyis kyis yang yang bskul ba'i ngor ^blo bzang lhun grub ming can gyis gzhis byed gyi khung ldan yig cha ma rnyed kyang yig rnying 'ga' zhig las gzhir byas te bris pa'o bkra shis</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3664</vol>
<tib>` dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed dpa' bo gcig pa'i sgo nas gshin po'i sbyang chog zhing mchog sgro 'byed zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@016b (ces dpal rdo rje 'jigs 'byed dpa' bo 'jigs pa'i sgo nas gshin po'i rjes su 'dzin pa'i cho ga zhing mchog sgo 'byed zhes bya ba'i 'di ni mang thos yon tan gyi mdzes pa'i aer te ni chos rje dang kun rigs gwa tshang gi bla ma dbu mdzad chos rjes dang slob dpon pa au lim ji blo bzang rin chen dang tshogs chen dbu mdzad blo bzang shes rab dang pi lig thu blo bzang bstan pa dbu mdzad sogs don gnyer can 'ga' zhig gis nan tan chen pos yang yang bskul ba'i ngo bsrung ba'i ched du rje btsun rdo rje 'chang chen po mkhas shing grub pa'i dbang phyug dza ya pandi ta zhes mtshan yongs su grags pa de nyid kyi zhabs kyi rdul spyi bos len pa bka' drin gyis bcung zad mnos pa byang phyogs sog po'i yul grur 'khyams pa'i phyogs med blo zhi ming can gyis sngon gyi mkhas pa'i gsung rgyan la rten nas bgyis pa'i 'dis kyang sems can @017a * thams cad 'khor ba dang ngan song gi sdug bsngal las thar te myur tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig dge legs 'phel</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3668</vol>
<tib>'jam mgon bla ma'i thun mong min pa'i bka' bsrung chos rgyal dkar po'i sgo nas zhi ba'i drug cu pa byed tshul dngos grub gter mdzod ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-7a</p>
<col>@007a * (ces ^'jam mgon bla ma'i thun mong min pa'i bka' bsrung chos rgyal dkar po'i sgo nas zhi ba'i drug cu pa byed tshul dngos grub gter mdzod ces bya ba 'di ni don @007b gnyer can 'ga' zhig gi don du ^mkhan zur ngag dbang blo bzang don grub kyis bris pa'i yi ge pa ni lha'i btsun blo bzang dge 'dun no 'dis kyang rgyal ba gnyis pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas par gyur cig sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<vol>3668</vol>
<tib>ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma seng ge'i gdong pa can gtso 'khor gsum ma'i sgrub thabs spu gri 'bar ba'i 'khrul 'khor zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-10a</p>
<col>@010a * (nyi char bla brang bkra shis 'od 'bar du pha rol gyi bsam sbyor ngan pa'i mthu gtad sogs kyi ltas mtshan byung ba bzlog ched du seng gdong ma dang chags lugs khro rgyal gtsug gtor 'bar ma gnyis kyis gtso bo'i phyir bzlog gi sgrub pa khag 'ga' zhig 'dzug 'dun skabs` klag chog 'di lta bu nyer 'khor 'dug tshul 'ga' zhig gis mos pa la brten nas btsun gzugs dharma badzra gyis rje lcang ska gong ma dang rgal dbang bskal bzang rgya mtshos mdzad pa'i seng gdong ma gtso rkyang gi sgrub thabs dang rdo rje'i 'dzin pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i gtso 'khor gsum ma'i sgrub thabs rnams gong 'go bsgrigs te gzhis ka ao rgyan gling du mgyogs par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge slong blo bzang don 'grub pa'o</col>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3669</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma dbang chen rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa lha dgu'i las gzhung rta mchog bzhad pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi sgom rim bsnyen thabs dang bcas pa'i rnam bshad gnad don rab gsal kun phan sgron me zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-47a</p>
<col>@046b (ces ltag pa'i lha mchog bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma dbang chen rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa khrag 'thung lha dgu'i 'phrin las kyi gyer gzhung rta mchog bzhad pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi bsgom don gyi dmigs rim bsnyen mtshams kyi lag len dang bcas pa'i rnam par bshad pa gnad don rab gsal kun han sgron me zhes bya ba 'di ni ^rigs brgya'i khyab bdag bla ma rdo rje'i 'chang gi zhal snga nas kyi bka' las las gzhung 'di dar rgyas che bar yod tshod du 'dug pas rnam bshad zhig bris na legs tshul gyi rdo rje'i lung spyi bor stsom pa dang tshul 'dir mos pa'i rdo rje slob bu 'ga' zhig gis kyang 'di'i steng nas bsnyen pa byed tshul gyi yi ge shin tu gsal ba zhig ces kyang dgos zhes nan tan chen pos bskul zhing rang nyid kyis snga sor gzhan gyi 'dod mos ltar rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung las kyang rgyun 'khyer snying po bcud bsdus dang 'brel ba'i sgom rim mdor bsdus tsam bris pa gzhung cung zad bsdus drag pas cha lag tshang zhing rang skya pher ba zhig du ma byung bar brten sgom khog che chung sogs 'di kha'i gzhung rnying che ba rnams kyi bsdus don lte mig lta bu zhig byung phan sle ba che bar mthong bas kyang @047a * yid spro bar gyur te rtsa ba'i brgyud dang 'gran zla med pa'i lo pan zung gi bzhed gzhung rnams gzhir bzung de dag gi dgongs 'grel gyi legs bshad brgyud 'dzin mkhas grub gong ma rnams kyis mdzad pa du ma'i snying po bsdus shing rang gi rdo rje slob dpon mchog gi phyag bzhes man ngag gis kyang nye bar brgyan nas lam 'dir mkhas shing grub pa brnyes pa'i yongs 'dzin dam pa du ma'i bka' drin las lugs 'di'i dbang dang smin grol gyi gdams pa zab cing gsang ba mang du thos pa'i rgyal khams pa ^btsun gzugs dam tshig rdo rjes mkhas grub rgya mtsho'i 'byung gnas chos sde chen po dpal ldan ser theg chen gling gi nye 'dabs gyi dben gnas brag ri dga' ldan byang chub gling du me pho byi ba lo'i sa ga zla ba'i dus chen dang bstun te legs par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni blo ldan gzhon du tshe ring dar rgyas so</col>

<item>

<vol>3671</vol>
<tib>bstan bsrung sprul ba'i chos skyong rgyal po sku lnga'i sgo nas bzlog bsgyur gyi cho ga gnam lcags kyi thog mda' zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@004a * (ces bstan bsrung sprul ba'i chos skyong rgyal po sku lnga'i sgo nas bzlog bsgyur gyi cho ga gnam lcags kyi thog mda' zhes bya ba 'di ni dad ldan dge slong blo bzang bkra shis kyis yang yang bskul ba'i ngor rdo rje 'chang ngag dbang blo bzang rgya mtsho'i mdzad pa'i rgyal po sku lnga'i gtor chog rdo rje sgra dbyangs dang bla ma dam pa rnams kyis mdzad pa'i bzlog bsgyur gyi cho ga las gzhir byed slob ma'i tha shal pa aartha siddhi ming can gyis sug bris su sbyar ba'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3673</vol>
<tib>gter chen drug cu pa'i zhal shes bdud sde rab tu 'joms pa'i gnam lcags zhes bya ba bzhugs pas 'di lta ba'i dus su 'jigs byed dang las gshin la tshogs gtor bzang ba gnad che tshes 'di'i gnyer kha las kyi gshin rje 'khor dang bcas pas mdzod la snod min gyis blta na snying khrag lhag med du 'thungs shig  "</tib>
<p>1a-11b</p>
<col>@010b (zhes zhwa ser cod pan 'dzin pa rnams kyi man ngag gi phul du gyur pa mtshon cha 'bar ba'i 'phrul 'khor la sogs pa gtor ma'i las rnams kyi man ngag zhal shes kyi rigs 'phran bu yi ger bris pa 'di ni yongs rdzogs bstan pa'i gsal byed dam pa rgyal ba'i chos tshul mtha' dag la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing rdo rje slob dpon chen po'i go 'phang brnyes pa rdo rje 'chang lcang skya rol pa'i rdo rjes ^'jam dbyangs gong ma'i rgyal khab nas dbus gtsang gi ljongs su bstan 'gro spyi'i don bla na med pa'i phyir du zhabs kyee 'khor lo bkod pa'i dus su 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ma mdzad pa ltar 'jam dpal gshin rje'i gshed bcu gsum gyi 'khor lo'i lha tshogs dang las gshin 'khor bcas ^bla ma lha'i tshogs dang bcas pa @011a * rnams la gtor ma dang mandal sogs la 'bad de gsol ba ring du btab nas ^lha mchog rnams kyis gnang ba stsal ba'i mtshan ma cung zad cig byung ba na phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi rgyal ba'i mkhyen brtse nus gsum yon tan 'phrin las ma lus pa gcig tu 'dus pa'i bdag nyid rigs dang dkyil 'khor kun gyi bdag po mthong thos dran reg gi 'gro ba rnams smin grol gyi lam la 'god par mdzad pa rdo rje 'chang chen thams cad mkhyen gzigs ^blo bzang bskal bzang rgya mtsho dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas dang rigs kun khyab bdag grub dbang ^blo bzang bzod pa khyab bdag rdo rje sems dpa' ^rje ngag dbang byams pa sogs kyi zhabs rdul spyi bos reg pa la brten nas ^'jam dpal zhi khro bka' sdod dang bcas pa'i smin byed kyi dbang grol byed kyi khrid rgyab rten lung la sogs pa ci rigs thob la lhag par grub pa'i dbang phyug ^blo bzang bzod pa'i zhabs drung nas mngon spyod kyi las 'di'i bka' lung zhal shes rnams thob par ma zad ^'jam dpal gshin rje'i gshed kyi rnal 'byor la brtson zhing grangs kyi bsnyen pa @011b kha skongs dang bcas pa mthar son pa'i dge slong snang mdzad rdo rje'am ming gzhan ^blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes zhes 'bod pas khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyis ches kyi sku mthar thug pa mngon du mdzad nas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i go 'phang brnyes pa'i dus bzang po 'dul lugs kyi mtshan mo'i cha la mar me'i ngos la phal cher dang de'i sang nyin rdzogs par tshig sbyor sogs spangs te sug bris su bgyis pa yin cing rigs kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis mtshon cha 'bar ba'i 'phrul 'khor la bka' rgyas ji ltar btab pa bzhin 'dir yang btab pa yin pas bkas ma khrol ba rnams la shin tu gsang ba dang ma rungs pa rnams la rdo rje'i thog dang mtshungs pas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rin po che spel zhing bsrung ba'i thabs la 'bad par mdzod cig  gu hya sa ma ya rgya: rgya: ) "</col>
</item>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3673</vol>
<tib>'jam mgon rgyal ba gnyis pa la tshogs mchod 'bul chog bde ldan lam stegs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-5a</p>
<col>@005a * (ces rje btsun btsong kha pa la tshogs mchod 'bul ba'i chog bde ldan lam stegs zhes bya ba 'di ni gung bkra shis tshe ring gi gcung tho yon dge slong dpal ldan rgya mtshos 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes srid na ring ba'i lha rdzas dri med ma skyes 'bul bcas bskul ba'i ngor skyes stobs kyi shes rab dman zhing sbyangs stobs kyi yon tan med bzhin du yod par sgro btags pa sngags rams pa'i skam ming 'chang ba snan mdzad rdo rje'am brda sprod kun bshad kyi ming btags dbyangs can bzhad pa'i blo gsal du 'bod pas rang lo gya gcig thog tu sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni slob dpon dge slong 'jam dpal lo 'di la nongs pa'i cha rnams la tshad ldan mkhas pa rnams kyis bzod par gsol gal te legs cha yod na rgyal ba gnyis pa'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs mthar rgyas pa'i cha rkyen du gyur cig </col>

<item>

<col>@008a * (ces rje btsun sgrol ma'i sgo nas 'chi bslu ba'i cho ga rtsa tshig gi dgongs pa ji 'dra ba bzhin bkra la ba'i bton bsgrigs 'di ni deng sang gi sa mtha'i grong chog mkhan po rnams la phan pa'i bsam pas chos brgyad 'khol bo ^ratna ming can gyis bris pa'i yi ge pa ni rnam dpyod langs dge tshul 'jam 'jam mchog gis bris pa dza yantu</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3673</vol>
<tib>lha klu gzhi bdag rnams kyi khrus byed pa'i chog kun phan nyi 'od zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-6a</p>

<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3676</vol>
<tib>lab rtse brtsigs tshul gyi bshad pa 'dod dgu'i dpal 'byor 'byung ba'i gter chen zhes bya</tib>
<p>1a-15a</p>
<col>@014a * (zhes gter bum dang lab rtse brtsigs tshul gyi bshad pa 'dod dgu'i dpal 'byor 'byung ba'i gter chen zhes bya ba 'di ni @014b sems dul ba dang po nye bar zhi ba chos la blo mig rgyas pa ku shr'i chos rje blo bzang rnam rgyal dang rnam dpyod dang ldan pa aer te ni chos rje blo bzang rgyal mtshan nyid kyis gzhan don du lag tu blang bde ba 'di lta bu zhig zhes gsung gis bskul ba la brten nas gong rtsis 'phrul gyi rgyal po dang slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas nyid kyis mdzad pa'i lab rtse brtsigs tshul dang sa mkhan minyu thung gis mdzad pa'i sa'i cho ga dang jo bo aa ti shas mdzad pa'i gter bum sgrub tshul rnams kyis gzhir byas nas rang gi gang dpogs kyi legs chas kha bskang te lha'i btsun pa su ma ti ma ni pra dzny'as rab byung zhes pa me mo yos lo'i rgyal zla ba'i dga' ba dang po la sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni chos la blo mig rgyas pa khur tsha @015a * bi lig thu ye shes grags pa'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas pa dang 'jigs rten gyi khams thams cad du bde legs phun sum tshogs pa dang sems can thams cad rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang myur tu thob par gyur cig</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3676</vol>
<tib>'phags ma yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@013a * (ces bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma yid bzhin 'khor lo'i zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun zhes bya ba 'di ni rang gzhan la phan pa'i bsam pas chos kyi rgyal po btsong kha pa chen po'i @013b bka' srol dang mthun bar zhwa ser cod pan 'dzin pa sh'akya'i dge slong dkon mchog 'jig med dbang pos sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni ae mdo khar ba dge slong blo bzang legs grub kyis bgyis pa dza yantu</col>

<tib>no title [@008b bla ma blo bzang thub dbang rdo rje 'chang dbyer med thugs rje'i gter chen byams pa mgon nam yang bslu med skyabs gnas dkon mchog gsum nyam thag gdung ba'i dbyangs 'dir dgongs su gsol ]"</tib>

<p>1a-11b</p>

<item>

<vol>3683</vol>
<tib>dzam dkar lha lnga'i nor sgrub bya tshul gyi zur 'debs gser gyi lde mig dang dzam dmar sgrub thabs 'dod dgu'i mchog sbyin sogs</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3683</vol>

<tib>gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po rgyal po'i klag pa'i cho ga bkra shis dge legs spel ba'i nyi 'od zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-17b</p>
<col>@017a * ('phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po rgyal po 'don pa'i cho ga bkra shis dge mtshan spel ba'i nyi ma zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs rus phun sum tshogs shing stobs dang ldan pa thu she ye gung ta la'i ta'i ching bsod nams dbang phyug zhes bya bas dam pa rnams kyi lung bstan la bsten nas gser 'od mang du 'don dgos pa'i tshe dngul gyi mandal kha btags dang bcas 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bka' stsal ba dang du blangs te dam pa rnams kyi zhabs rdul spyi bos len pa'i btsun gzugs ye shes don gnyis lhun grub kyis rang lo nyi shu'i dgu'i thog mdo kha na'i lugs dang mthun par sbyar nas phyis rtsom byang bkod de rdzogs bar bgyis pa'i yi ge pa ni dgon gnyer dge slong blo bzang @017b bstan 'dzin nye gnas dge slong btsun 'grus dpal gyis bris pa 'dis kyang thub pa'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas pa dang sbyin pa'i bdag po rnams kyis gtso byas rang gzhan sems can thams cad la phan bde rgya chen po 'byung bar gyur cig</col>
</item>

<item>

<item>

<vol>3690</vol>
<tib># bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen yang gsang khros pa khrag thung lha dgu'i sgo nas gtor bzlog bya tshul gyi cho ga bsgrigs rdo rje'i thog mda' zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-29a</p>
<col>@028b (ces bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen yang gsang khros pa khrag 'thung lha dgu'i sgo nas gtor bzlog bya tshul gyi chog bsgrigs rdo rje'i thog mda' zhes bya ba 'di ni rang gzhan gyis lag len du nye bar mkho bar mthong nas snga 'gyur gyi las spyor sgor gyis gzhung spyi dang khyab par slob dpon chen po'i gsung gtor ma'i las tshogs sogs gtor bzlog gi yig rnying bur bzhugs pa 'ga' zhig dang mus srad pa byams pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi bzlog pa'i lag len gyi yi ge kun gzigs lnga pa @029a * chen pos mdzad pa'i zor 'phrin rdo rje pha lam sogs la shig tu dpyad de gzhi blangs bla ma'i phyag bzhes man ngag gis kyang brgyan nas rgyal khams myul ba'i btsun gzugs ^dam tshig rdo rjes shing tu gsal zhig lag tu blang bde bar sbyar ba'o</col>

<item>

<p>1a-41a</p>
<col>@040b (ces byin rlabs kyi gter chen pa bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen yang gsang khros pa khrag 'thung lha dgu'i 'phrin las thun mongs ma yin pa'i 'jug bde gnad don kun tshang rta mchog bzhad pa'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba 'di ni 'di'i rgyud dang sgrub gzhung gi dgongs pa gtso bor bzung ste ^rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pa'i mdzad pas las byang rgyas pa 'jigs med sgra dbyangs kyi tshig tshogs che ba rnams cang zad bsdus shing yig skyon du mngon pa rnam khungs thub pa bcos med du mi rung pa kha skong 'ga' zhig dang bsgom don dang mthun pa'i 'khrugs sdebs cung zad bgyis te bsnyen sgrub sogs kyi skabs rgyas bsdus 'tshams zhing cha lag tshang ba'i tshul du bla ma dam pa @041a * pa rnams kyi bka' drin las phyogs 'di la blo gros kyi snang ba cung zad thob pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i tha shal ba ^dam tshig rdo rjes rang gzhan mang po la phan 'dod kyi bsam pas kun nas blangs te nye bar sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni lha mchog 'di nyid la mi phyed pa'i dad pa dang ldan zhing yi dam du byed pa'i dge slong blo bzang bstan dar gyis bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan du gyur cig 'gro ba rnams tshe rabs thams cad du lhag pa'i lha mchog pad+ma dbang chen gyi rjes su bzung ste gsung rdo rje 'od dpag med kyi ngo bor myur du mtshang rgya bar gyur cig las gzhung 'di'i spros pa'i yang lag gi rim pa ni zur rgyan logs su 'god pa las shes par bya'o `bkra shis kun gyi dpal du bkra shis shing lhar bcas bkra shis dge legs bkra shis pa ngo mtshar bkra shis mchog tu bkra shis te skyabs gsum bkra shis lhag lha'i bkra shis shog dge'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3691</vol>
<tib># bla ma'i rnal 'byor dang 'brel nas tshe lha rnam gsum la brten pa'i rang gzhan gyi tshe 'phel ba dang ril sgrub bya tshul 'chi med bum bzang zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3691</vol>
<tib>bla ma mchod pa'i cho ga bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-19a</p>
<col>@018b ces bla ma mchod pa'i cho ga 'di ni 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i chos kyi grags pa dang blo bzang phun tshogs gnyis kyis 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes yang yang bskul ba la brten nas sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis grub chen gling gis mdzad pa'i bla ma mchod pa dang dbang lo chen pos mdzad pa'i bla ma mchod pa dang sa skya pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po du mas mdzad pa'i bla ma mchod pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa @019a * dge 'dun rgya mtshos mdzad pa'i bla ma mchod pa dang mkhas grub chen po mkhan po rin po che sangs rgyas ye shes kyis mdzad pa'i bla ma mchod pa dang gzhan yang grub mtha' so so'i bla ma mchog dman du mas mdzad pa'i bla ma mchod pa mang po zhig mthong zhing brjod bya'i don rnams khong du chud par byas te legs pa'i cha thams cad legs par bsdus nas mdo rgyud dam pa'i man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du tshig sbyor spangs te go bde bar chos grwa chen po bkra shis lhun po'i gzims khang rgyal mtshan mthon po'i yang thog tu sbyar ba'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3691</vol>
<tib>dbang chog</tib>
<p>1a-26b</p>
<col>@026b ('di dag ni gtso bor bdag 'jug len pa'i dbang du byas la dbang don bshad pa snga phyi thams cad dngos su rang gis brjod kyang slob ma'i byab rnams rang gis dang slob dpon gyi bya ba rnams bla ma dang dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo tha mi dad pas mdzad par bsam mo dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ngag 'don gyi rim par bsgrigs jpa 'di yang dpal ldan 'dus pa'i lam la nyams len mdzad pa'i sde che chung thams cad kyi 'don pa dang mthun pa zhus ngag rgyas par byas shing slar yang dge slong blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi mig lam du bab nas dag par bgyis pa'o mangga lam gnyis zhus</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3691</vol>
<tib>dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bsnyen sgrub las gsum las bsnyen pa'i yi ge 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi zhal lung dngos grub rdzogs ldan sprin bzang klag pa'i don grub skal ldan 'jug ngogs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-27a</p>
<col>@027a * ces dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bsnyen sgrub las gsum gyi nang nas bsnyen pa'i yi ge 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi zhal lung dngos grub rdzogs ldan sprin bzang klag pa'i don 'grub skal ldan 'jug ngogs zhes bya ba 'di ni rgyan drug mchog gnyis lta bu'i mkhas mang 'ba' zhig gis bkang ba'i grwa tshang phan tshun zhes pa'i nang tshan mkhas mang blo gsal gling gi slob dpon rin po che mdo sngags thub bstan mongs la sbyangs pa'i mkhas pa sbyin pa dang tshul khrims sogs dam pa'i yon tan gyis mdzes pa ye shes mgon po sogs tshe sngon 'grub pa'i rtags mtshan gyis mtho ba sogs yon tan du mas phyug pa de nyid kyis bsod nams @027b kha btags dang zho'i snying po che legs dang phyag bris bcas yang yang bskul ba dang gzhung brgya smra ba mi nyag chos rje nor bu'i mtshan can gyis dngul gyi me tog dang bcas yang yang bskul ba dang slad nas kyang tshe blos btang gi dga' ldan chos 'phel gyi bla ma dge slong ye shes bzang pos rje rin po che'i gsang ba'i rnam thar khyad 'phags rje legs bzang bas zin bris mdzad nas rje'i spyan lam phab pa de nyid dang dngul gyi me tog bhu ru cheng nyin bed dang bcas drag tu gsol ba btabs pa'i ngor lus 'byung bzhi ma snyoms kyang 'phral mar ngag nas ci thon du bsnyen pa'i gnad don gsal bar mang du thos pa'i dge slong 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i rdo rjes dge 'phel gyi ri rtse mkha' spyod phur khang du sbyar ba 'dis 'gro ba rnams 'jam dbyangs zhi khros rjes su bzung ste mchog gi dngos grub la longs spyod par gyur cig mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3691</vol>
<tib>'jam dpal gshin rje gshed kyi bka' sdod dam can chos kyi rgyal po gsang sgrub yid bzhin nor bu'i gtor sgrub yid bzhin dbang gi rgyal po'i gter mdzod ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-22b</p>
<col>@022a * (ces 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed kyi bka' sdod dam can chos kyi rgyal po gsang sgrub yid bzhin nor bu'i gtor sgrub yid bzhin dbang gi rgyal po'i gter mdzod ces bya ba 'di ni phu rang shogs su gal te bkra shis chos 'phel gling gi grwa rgyun 'bras bkra shis sgo mang rab 'byams pa su ma ti su bh'u tis mandal rten gsum @022b lha rdzas dang bcas yang yang lo snga phyir bskul ngor bstan srung 'di'i skor dam pa gong ma'i gsung thor bu rnams phyogs bsgrigs khyer bde ba rang bzos ma bslad par sgo slob dpon mkhyen rab bstan pa chos 'phel gyis bla brang thub bstan chos kyi gter mdzod gling du spel ba'i yi ge pa ni gung ru rab 'byams pa bstan pa chos grags so 'dis kyang mdo sngags bstan pa nyin mo ltar gsal bar gyur cig dge'o par 'di 'bras gung ru bla brang du bzhugs so dge'o dge'o par bskos dbu chung rnam rgyal tshe ring bkra shis</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3691</vol>
<tib>lhag pa'i lha gang la'ang sbyar chog pa'i sbyin sreg gi chog smin byed nyi ma'i 'od zer zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@035a * (ces lhag pa'i lha gang la'ang sbyar chog pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga smin byed nyi ma'i 'od zer zhes bya ba 'di ni nor bu phreng ba'i sbyin sreg dngos grub ster byed dang gzhan dam pa gong mas mdzad pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga gzhung chen mo rnams nas kha bskangs te mkhan ming 'dzin pa bsam grub bstan 'dzin gyis skyabs mgon mchog gi gdan sa chen mo dga' ldan bshad sgrub gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge tshul blo bzang bstan 'dzin no 'dis kyang bstan 'gro yongs la phan thogs par gyur cig </col>
