<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3692</vol>
<tib># pad+ma dbang chen khrag 'thung rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa'i 'phrin las kyi gzhung dang 'brel bar gdab las kyi rim pa lag tu blang ba'i mchog bsgrigs rta mchog rngams pa'i bzhad sgra zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-28a</p>
<col>@027a * (ces pad+ma dbang chen khrag 'thung rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa'i 'phrin las kyi gzhung @027b dang 'brel bar gdab las kyi rim pa lag tu blang ba'i cho ga bsgrigs rngams pa'i bzhad sgra zhes bya 'di ni rang dang gzhan gyi lag len du nye bar mkho bar mthong nas ^rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pas las gzhung 'jigs med rdo rje'i sgra dbyangs su gsungs pa la gzhi byas der mi gsal ba 'ga' zhig bee ro'i sbas pa mig byed dang mus srad pa yab sras kyis gsung rnams las kha bskangs shing bsgom don dang mthun pa'i 'khrugs sdebs cung zad dang bcas bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin las 'di skor gyi man ngag dmar 'khrid phyag bzhes dang bcas pa legs par thob pa'i rig sngags 'dzin pa'i gzugs brnyan ^dam tshig rdo rjes rgyas bsdus 'tsham zhing 'khyer bde bar sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dang brtson rnam dpyod dang ldan pa dge slong blo bzang bstan dar gyis bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang @028a * bstan 'gro yongs la phan thogs par gyur cig dza yantu</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3692</vol>
<tib>bka' gdams gsal byed gyi snying po bsdus pa gsal ba'i sgron me la bdag 'jug gi zur 'debs skal ldan mgul rgyan nor bu'i do shal zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-31a inc [*missing page from 30a-30b*]</p>
<col>@029a * (la la dag rje bla mas glags bam ma gsan cing byang chub lam gyi rim par glegs bam gyi lung 'dren @029b gtan nas mdzad 'dug pas glegs bam chos rnam dag min no zhes zer mdo spyir chos kyi rgyal po tsong kha pa chen po sangs rgyas dngos yin pa la de nyid kyis glegs bam gyi chos gsan sogs kyi tshad gzung sus rtogs rtogs na ni khyod kyis nam mkhas mtha' 'jam bar nus 'dug pas ngo mtshar che byang chub lam rim ni skyes bu mchog dmag mtha' dag sangs rgyas su 'khrid par byed pa'i lam gyi 'gros ston pa'i tshogs chos yin la glegs bam 'di ni slob dpon nam rin pa yan chad du bka' rgya shin tu dog de nas cung yangs song yang rje dge 'dun grub yan chad du bka' rgya dam mi ba rang mdzad pa zhig byung 'dug pa rgyal ba tsong kha ba chen pos snyan brgyud yin par dgongs nas lam rim du lung 'dren ma mdzad pa yin no snyan brgyud tshig brgyud tshogs chos sogs kyi rnam dbye ma dod par mig gis mthong ba dang rna bas thos tshad kyi tshig skam khal khyer nas lho phyir du kun la sgrog cing rang nyid dang ma mthun pa rgyu mtshan du byas te chos la brten pa'i sdig pa sogs pa'i smre sngags kyi skad ngan phyogs bcur sgrogs rnams dang sngon byon gyi dam pa'i skyes bu rnam thar mi 'dra pas blo ldan legs par @031a * snying po bsdus pa gsal ba'i sgron me la bdag 'jug gi skabs su 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis tshang bris na yi ge ha cang mang por gyur bas ma bri shin 'di'i dbang bskur pa'i rdo rje slob dpon du 'os pa zhig ma gtogs blo man rnams kyis der ji ltar bshad pa'i des lag len bya bar mi bde rnams la phan 'dod kyi bsams pas dge slong blo bzang dar rgyas kyis bka' gdams gsal byed las gsungs pa bzhin du sbyar ba yin mod kyang bdag blo'i skyon gyis nyes par gyur ba rnams bla ma thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams la snying nas bshags shing bzod par gsol lo 'dis kyang jo bo yab sras chen po'i bka' gdams bstan pa'i snying po dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3692</vol>
<tib>dgra lha mched dgu la mchod gtor 'bul 'bul dgra lha'i dbang bstod sogs bya tshul gyi cho ga dngos grub bdud rtsi'i rol mtsho zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-12a</p>
<col>@011b (ces dgra lha mched dgu la mchod gtor 'bul tshul dang dgra lha'i dbang bstod sogs bya tshul gyi cho ga dngos grub bdud rtsi'i rol mtsho zhes bya ba 'di ni ^bshad sgrub bstan pa'i 'byung gnas @012a * dpal ldan bkra shis 'khyil gyi bla brang thub bstan pho brang chen po nas ^skyabs mgon bla ma mchog gi zhabs brtan dang dgon grong gi chos srid kyi las don du dgra lha mched dgu la bskang gsol dang dgra lha'i dpang bstod bya tshul sogs 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bla brang chen mo'i las khur 'dzin pa dpyod ldan rab 'byams pa dkon mchog sbyin pa nang mdzod dang bcas yang yang bskul ngor ^rje bla ma mtshan brjod par dka' ba rdo rje 'chang blo bzang thub bstan 'jigs med rgya mtsho'i zhabs rdul spyi bor len pa'i slob bu rgyal mkhan po grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge slong dkon mchog byams pa'o</col>
</item>

<col>@003a * (ces pa 'di ni sh'akya btsun pa su ma ti pranydzas sbyar ba'o sarba mangga lam dge'o bkra shis par gyur cig</col>

<tib>no title [@001a * ji ltar nam mkha' mnyam par 'gro ba ru ma nyam thag pa skyabs med bshes bral rang gis rang nyir slus pa de dag rnams skyabs kyi dam pa bla ma rin po che la skyabs su mchi'o ]"</tib>
<p>1a-2b</p>
<col></col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3693</vol>
<tib># sgrub thabs rgya mtsho nas bshad pa'i lha tshogs kyi mngon rtogs rjes gnang gi cho ga dang bcas pa'i tho yig gi don 'grel 'dod dgu'i ljon shing rin po che'i snye ma'i kha skang yang gsal blo gros mig 'byed ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-171a</p>
<col>@171a * (sgrub thabs rgya mtshor grags pa'i bstan bcos chen po nas bshad pa'i lha tshogs rnams kyi mngon rtogs rjes gnang gi cho ga dang bcas pa'i tho yig gi don 'grel sh'akya'i btsun pa nam mkha' dpal bzang gis mdzad pa'i 'dod dgu'i ljon shing rin chen snye ma zhes bya ba sgrub thabs dang rjes gnang phyi ma rnams la mi 'dra ba'i khyad par tsam bshad pa ma gtogs dgyus su nyams su blang ba la shin tu mdor bsdu bas blo dman pa rnams kyis gzhung gi dgongs pa dang mthun par sgrub dka' bas gzhung de nyid la brten nas lha so so'i sgrub thabs dang mdun bskyed dang rjes gnang sogs kyi cho ga mdor bsdus pa rnams rgyas bar gsal ba'i cho ga blo gros mig 'byed ces bya ba 'di ni mtshungs med yongs 'dzin dam pa mang pos bka' drin gyis bskyangs shing thugs brtse ba chen pos rjes sung zung zhing zhabs kyi rngul phreng rnyog pa med pa'i gtsug gis blangs pa'i mthul brten nas mkhan zur pa ngag dbang blo bzang don grub kyis bris pa'o `'dis phams gtso byas pa'i sems can thams cad kyi lus dag yid gsum gyi sdig sgrib spyangs nas sku gsum gyi go 'phang thob par gyur cig gi cho ga dang po thub pa rdo rje gdan pa la rgyas par bshad nas sgrub thabs dang rjes gnang sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<col>@022b ces bsnyen yig dngos grub @023a * rgya mtsho zhes bya ba 'di ni rang gi nye 'khor ba dka' bcu shes dar ba sogs du ma dang sngon goms legs spyad kyi bag chags 'thug po sad cing skye bas thob pa dang sbyangs pa'i rnam dpyod mchog tu yangs pa rgyal dbang dge 'dun rgya mtsho'i gdan sa chen po rgyal me tog thad gi seng ge'i khrir 'khod pa'i mkhan rin po che ches pa bde thang sprul sku blo bzang rin chen tshangs dbyangs phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba dang nang rigs pa dang gso ba rig pa la rnam dpyod yangs pa'i rab 'byams smra ba ngag dbang bstan 'dzin mdo sngags rab 'byams la sbyangs pa mi dman zhing rnam dpyod yangs pa'i rab 'byams smra ba bstan grags pa skye bas thob pa'i blo gros kyi rtsa la gsung rab la lta ba'i mig dang ldan zhing don gnyer dang bcas pa'i dge slong chos rgya mtsho dang tshul khrims dpal bzang la sogs pa'i don gnyer can mang pos bskul ba'i ngor sprad ban snyoms las pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan gyis mtsho bdun gyi lha khang chen mor sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni rnam dpyod rje brtson pa mi dman pa'i dge slong grags pa'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  "</col>

<col>@012a * (ces pad+ma yang gsang khros pa lha dgu'i drag po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga 'jigs rung me yi 'khor lo zhes pa 'di ni mkhas pa'i snyan grags gyi rgyal rnga 'jig rten gsum gyi rna ba'i bcud du 'jebs pa'i ser byed gra tshang du kun chen blo gros rin chen dang 'khon ston chos kyi rgyal po dpal 'byor lhun grub sogs grub pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dam pa du mas lta 'di'i sgrub pa gtor bzlog sogs kyi phyag len 'khrul pa med pa'i rgyun bzang po 'dzugs par mdzad pa'i rgyud 'dzin rig sngags 'chang ba'i gtor sgrub pa rnams kyi bskul ma mdzad par rten gtso bor 'di'i dgos rgyud le'u bcu gsum pa slob dpon chen pos mdzad pa'i byang bsrug pa lo chen bee ros mdzad pa'i sbas pa mig 'byed gser gyi thur ma tshar chen chos kyi rgyal pos mdzad pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga dngos grub rin po che'i bang mdzod kun mkhyen lnga pa chen pos mdzad pa'i zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg ye shes snang ba rab 'bar rnams bzhir bzung tshig ris bsnan dgos dang phyag len gyi khyad par 'dir ma gsal ba rnams 'jam dpal tshe bdag nag po'i sbyin bsreg dus kyi me lce'i 'phreng ba drang srong lo ki'i hom gyis lag len yang gsang rgya can las rdo rje khro bo sbyin sreg gshin rje dregs pa 'joms byed kyi bsreg las song rigs mthun khung btsun du du mas kha rgyan te rgyal khams pa 'phags pa dge legs rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po 'am pad+ma dgyes pa rtsal du 'bod pas ser ra theg chen gling gi chos grar sbyar ba'o</col>

<p>1a-61a</p>
<col>@060b sku gsum gling du 'grod pa'i nye lam mchog @061a * rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i 'di nyid kyi dbang chog nor bu'i phreng ba dang seng chen sprul sku blo bzang bstan 'dzin dpal 'byor gyis mdzad pa'i dbang chog bgegs dpung kun 'joms dbang gi rgyal po'i do shal nyid gzhir bzhag ste rgyud sde spyi'i dgongs pa dang mthun par rang re'i dge ldan pa'i bla ma dam pa rnams kyi gsung las kha bskong bar sa chog sta gon dang` thig rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor sgrub mchod dbang dang bcas pa phur bu zhes pa sa sprel lo'i chu stod zla ba'i yar ngo'i tshes drug gi nyin mor gsar du bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni gang de'i slob ma rnams kyi tha shal du gyur ba'i dge slong rta mgrin no 'dis kyang sangs rgyas bstan pa spyi dang khyad par 'jam mgon rgyal ba gnyis pa'i bstan pa rin po che 'di nyid 'khor ba ji srid ma stong gi bar de srid du gnas pa'i rgyur gyur cig dge legs 'phel "</col>

<item>

<item>

<col>@009b (ces pa'ang khal kha ga-yon ru dza sag so rgyan skabs kyi shog zhabs drung dar han ko shr'i chos rje bsod nams dam pa nas dbang rjes gnang lung khrid bcas kyi go don spyir tshul 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba ltar rwa sgreng no mon han gyis ser theg pa chen po'i gling byes mkhas snyan grwa tshang gi yang steng du sbyar ba'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3698</vol>
<tib>brgya bzhi'i chog ji ltar bya ba'i tshul phan bde'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>

<item>

<col>@015a * zhes pa snying po'i don gsum gyi 'khrid yig byams mgon pho nya zhes bgyi pa 'di ni rang gi nye slob ddge slong grags pa rgyal mtshan pas yang yang nan gyis bskul ba'i ngo mchog par dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyi mkhyen brtse ma lus pa gcig tu bsdus pa'i bdag nyid chen po don gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te mkhan po rin po che rdo rje 'chang blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos mdzad pa'i yig cha gzhir byas rje dge 'dun rgya mtshos mdzad pa'i dga' ldan them skas kyis zur brgyan lo ts'a ba byams pa'i dpal dang rje ba so ba chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang byang sems rwa sgreng pa rnams kyi khrid yig dang gzhan yang zin bris mang po yod pa rnams kyis kha bskang ste lag len snying por dril nas kun gyi go sla bar jing gir rigs kyi lha'i btsun pa ^blo bzang bstan 'dzin rgyal mtshan gyis sbyar ba'i dge bas mar gyur sems can thams cad mi pham dbang pos rjes su 'dzin par gyur cig mangga lam "</col>

<item>

<vol>3743</vol>
<tib>dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rtsa rgyud le'u bcu bdun gyi so so dang spyi'i don 'grel pa'i bshad rgyud rgyud phyi ma gsang ba thams cad ston pa'i 'grel pa gsang ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i don zhib tu bshad pa'i rnam bshad skal bzang mig 'byed ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-117a</p>
<col>@116a * dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rtsa rgyud le'u bcu bdun gyi so so dang spyi'i don 'grel pa'i bshad rgyud rgyud phyi ma gsang ba thams cad ston @116b pa'i 'grel pa gsang ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i don zhib tu bshad pa'i rnam bshad skal bzang mig 'byed ces bya ba 'di ni dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor pa gru dpal ldan bzang pos dben gnas dga' ldan pho brang nas 'go brtsams te 'bring mtshams gangs dkar po'i phyogs su chu mo lug lo brum zla ba'i dkar phyogs tshes bcu bzhi'i nyin rdzogs par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni don grub po 'dis kyang mdo sngags kyi bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus kun tu rgyas par byed nus par gyur cig  ` aom swa sti rgyud rgyal ston mdzad khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang rgyud don mngon gyur pan chen n'a ro pa rgyud gzhung gsal mdzad dpal ldan bzang po'i zhabs rgyud sde rnam bzhi'i lha srung bcas pas skyongs gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud sde rgya mtsho che legs srubs las 'khrungs tsinta ma ni 'di bgrang yas 'gro la chos sbyin char 'bebs skad rnam dga dpal gyi dhwa dza'i rtser bkod do @117a * 'di bzhengs rnam dkar nyin byed 'od zer gyis mdo sngags bshad sgrub phyogs mthar rab rgyas shing bstan 'dzin zhabs pad rdo rje'i khams ltar brtan 'gro ba'i phan bde'i skyed tshal 'phel 'gyur cig  khyad par 'brel thogs gtso byas lus can kun tshe rabs 'phreng bar mtshan ldan bshes dad 'jal thos bsam sgrom pa'i gru zings nyer bsten nas zung 'jug rin chen gling du myur phyin shog gsang chen bla med 'dus pa'i rim gnyis lam tshul bzhin sgrub la nyer 'tshe mi 'byung zhing las gshin la sogs bstan skyong rgya mtshos kyang ga-yel ba med par rtag tu grogs byed shog  ('di ni khu re chen mo'i rgyud grwa tshang gi grwa ba rnams kyis rgyu yon sbyor te par du legs par bsgrub pa'o</col>
</item>

<tib>bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs la mchod pa'i cho ga kun tu bzang po'i mchod sprin</tib>
<p>77a-91b</p>

<col>@004b (ces pa 'di ni aa ma'i sdig sbyong du dmigs nas bde gshegs so lnga'i sku brnyan bzhengs pa'i tshe mkhan ming pa tu siddhis bris pa'o dge'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3745</vol>
<tib>byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i zab khrid mdor bsdus phan bde'i lam bzang gi sngon 'gro sbyor ba'i chos drug rgyas par byed tshul gyi 'don sgrigs</tib>
<p>1a-13b</p>
<col>@013a * (zhes pa 'di yang rang gi bsti gnas sgrub sde yid dga' chos 'dzin gling du byang chub gling du byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i zab 'khrid kyi ngag 'don gsar du 'dzugs skabs chos grwa pa rnams kyi 'don sgrigs su ^ dam tshig rdo rjes bris pa dge legs 'phel</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3745</vol>
<tib>dpal 'khor lo bde mchog l'u ai pa'i rim pa dang po'i smar 'khrid zab mo dpal ldan srad rgyud pa'i zin bris su bkod pa bde chen gsal ba'i dgongs rgyan zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-77b inc [* missing page from 78a *]</p>
<col>@076b (ces pa 'di ni bka' 'drin gzhal du med pa manydzu'i mtshan can la lo gsum tsam gyi sngon nas yang dang yang du zhus nas gsol ba btab pa ltar lhas smon gong du rgyal ba 'phags pa lha dang rgyal ba'i sras po rnam gnyis kyis gtso byas dge 'dun drug cu skor la n'a ro mkha' spyod ma'i bskyed rdzogs dang 'di ka'i sngags bcu dang bskyed rdzogs kyi nyams 'khrid bcas rgyas par zin @077a * thun du bstsal ba'i rjes su bskyed rim 'di la zin bris ma dag pa mang du 'dug pas khyod kyis mang nyung 'tshams la dag pa zhig bris zhes kha btags bzang po gnod sbyin dang bcas bka' phebs pa dang du blangs te rdo rje 'chang de nyid kyi zhabs rdul spyi bos len pa ngag dbang byams pa zhes pas zin bris rnying pa rgyas bsdus gnyis 'dug pa'i bsdus  pa la ma dag pa dang mtshang ba rnams bcos rgyas pa la mtshon don sogs ha cang bshad grags sam snyam pa rnams phri nas dngos su zin thun gnang ba nyid gzhir bzhag ste yos bu'i lo rgyal zla ba'i mar ngo'i tshes bcu dpa' bo dang dpa' mo ngang gis 'du ba'i dus khyad par can gyi nyin phur bu lcog byang chub gling du rdzogs par zin bris su btab pa slar yang rdo rje slob dpon de nyid kyi spyan lam du bstar te dag par bgyis pa 'dis kyang 'jam mgon chos kyi rje rgyal ba gnyis pa'i mdo sngags kyi bstan pa phyogs dus kun tu rgyas par byed par gyur cig  mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3745</vol>
<tib>dpal 'khor lo bde mchog l'u ai pa'i rim pa dang po'i smar 'khrid zab mo dpal ldan srad rgyud pa'i zin bris su bkod pa bde chen gsal ba'i dgongs rgyan zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-78a</p>
<col>@076b (ces pa 'di ni bka' 'drin gzhal du med pa manydzu'i mtshan can la lo gsum tsam gyi sngon nas yang dang yang du zhus nas gsol ba btab pa ltar lhas smon gong du rgyal ba 'phags pa lha dang rgyal ba'i sras po rnam gnyis kyis gtso byas dge 'dun drug cu skor la n'a ro mkha' spyod ma'i bskyed rdzogs dang 'di ka'i sngags bcu dang bskyed rdzogs kyi nyams 'khrid bcas rgyas par zin @077a * thun du bstsal ba'i rjes su bskyed rim 'di la zin bris ma dag pa mang du 'dug pas khyod kyis mang nyung 'tshams la dag pa zhig bris zhes kha btags bzang po gnod sbyin dang bcas bka' phebs pa dang du blangs te rdo rje 'chang de nyid kyi zhabs rdul spyi bos len pa ngag dbang byams pa zhes pas zin bris rnying pa rgyas bsdus gnyis 'dug pa'i bsdus  pa la ma dag pa dang mtshang ba rnams bcos rgyas pa la mtshon don sogs ha cang bshad grags sam snyam pa rnams phri nas dngos su zin thun gnang ba nyid gzhir bzhag ste yos bu'i lo rgyal zla ba'i mar ngo'i tshes bcu dpa' bo dang dpa' mo ngang gis 'du ba'i dus khyad par can gyi nyin phur bu lcog byang chub gling du rdzogs par zin bris su btab pa slar yang rdo rje slob dpon de nyid kyi spyan lam du bstar te dag par bgyis pa 'dis kyang 'jam mgon chos kyi rje rgyal ba gnyis pa'i mdo sngags kyi bstan pa phyogs dus kun tu rgyas par byed par gyur cig  mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3745</vol>
<tib>dus gsum rgyal ba'i spyi gzugs bka' drin gsum ldan gyi drin can rtsa ba'i bla ma rgyal sras rdo rje 'chang chen po'i 'khrungs rabs gsol 'debs smon tshig dang bcas pa ngo mtshar au dumba ra'i 'phreng mdzes ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-5a</p>
<col>@005a * (ces dus gsum rgyal ba'i spyi gzugs 'jam mgon bstan pa'i srog shing mtshungs zla ma mchis pa rigs dang dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i mnga' bdag bka' drin gsum ldan gyi drin can rtsa ba'i bla ma rgyal sras rdo rje 'chang chen po bskal bzang thub bstan 'jigs med bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i zhal mnga' nas kyi 'khrungs rab gsol 'debs smon tshig dang bcas pa ngo mtshar au dumba ra'i 'phreng mdzes ces bya ba 'di yang  ^ 'jam dbyangs ^ gong ma chen po'i bka' yis bku? rab bstan pa'i gsal byed 'gro kun bde skyid kyis 'cho ba rje btsun dam pa zhes bsngags pa 'jam dbyangs gzhon nu ngur smrig gar gyis rnam par rol pa byang phyogs 'gro ba'i 'dren pa chen po 'jam mgon bstan pa'i sgron me mtshungs zla ma mchis pa blo bzang thub bstan dbang phyug 'jigs med rgya mtsho'am mtshan gzhan blo bzang dge legs rab rgyas dpal bzang po nas 'di lta bu zhig gyis shig ces chag shog gi lam nas bka' stsal phebs pa gus pas nod de yongs su grags pa'i 'khrungs rab rnams kyi steng tshad thub kyi yig cha shes nas byung bas kyang kha bskang ste ^ rgyal ba kun las lhag pa'i bka' drin dang thugs rje'i gter chen drin can bla ma mchog de'i zhabs rdul spyi bos len pa'i bka' slab tha shal stag phu'i sprul ming ^ sh'akya'i dge slong rmongs rtul gyi na ba blo bzang chos kyi dbang phyug tu 'bod pas rang gi bsam gtan gyi bsti gnas dge 'phel byang chub gling du gus pa chen pos sbyar ba dis kyang tshe rabs kun tu drin can bla ma mchog gis dgyes bzhin rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur cig  dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3745</vol>
<tib>par byang smon tshig ni"</tib>
<p>77b-78a</p>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3745</vol>
<tib>tshad ma kun las btus pa zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-17a</p>
<col>@017a * (tshad ma kun las btus pa zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so rgya gar gyi mkhan po rigs pa smra ba'i gtsug gi nor bur grags pa  pa sudha ra rakshi ta dang bod kyi lo tstsha ba dge bsnyen seng rgyal sras kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o aom swa sti gsung rab kun gyi rigs gnad bsdus rtsom tshe ngo mtshar brtags mang byung 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis legs bskul ba'i ngo mtshar tshad ma kun btus la dus ngan snyigs ma'i mtha' khob tu slob gnyer byed mkhan med ma zad slob gnyer dgos pa'i gtam tsam med dpe yang shin tu rnyed dka' bas tha na dpe rgyas ci ma rung snyam du smon pa'i yid bskul nas dka' bcu blo bzang bkra shis dang dge bsnyen tshangs pa gnyis po yis par bsgrubs rnam dkar dge ba'i mthus 'gro kun rten bzang rim brgyud de sangs rgyas go 'phang myur 'thob shog khyad par bstan 'dzin zhabs pad brtan 'gal rkyen kun sel mthun rkyen bsgrubs bstan pa yun ring gnas 'gyur cig  ces pa 'di ni dka' bcu blo bzang bkra shis kyis bris pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3746</vol>
<tib>chos 'dul rgya mtsho'i dgongs don gsal bar byed pa tsinta ma ni'i 'phreng mdzes blo gsal mgul rgyan las gzhi smad skabs</tib>
<p>1a-88a</p>
<col>@087b (ces kun mkhyen bla ma rnam gnyis kyi thugs bcud 'dul ba rgya mtsho'i dgongs don gsal bar byed pa tsi nta ma ni'i phreng mdzes blo gsal mgul rgyan zhes bya ba 'di ni bka' bod gzhung lnga'i dgongs don rigs pa'i lam nas smra ba rdor ma blo bzang rgya mtshos lha rdzas srid du ring pa dang bcas nan tan @088a *  chen pos bskul zhing rang gis kyang bla ma yab sras kyis bzhed srol thun mong ma yin pa'i 'di nyid ngan rtog rlung gis mi ga-yo bar yun ring du gnas na ci ma rung snyam pas gzhan phan gyi bsam pas kun nas bslangs te` 'dul ba lung dang mdo rtsa'i rang 'grel rgya cher 'grel ba ma ldan rnams zhib tu dpyad de rje'i mdo rtsa'i zin bris dang bslab bya gnyis rin phred rnams gtso byas mtsho ti ka dang bde legs nyi ma blo gros legs bzang bsod grags pa skyes tshal mkhan po sogs kyi gzhung gis zur brgyan te btsun gzugs snyoms las pa blo gros rgya mtshos sug bris su bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa'i rtsa ba chos 'dul ba'i bshad sgrub phyogs dus kun tu rgyas par gyur cig mdo smad dpal ldan bkra shis 'khyil gling gi bshes gnyen chen po gung thang blo gros kyis mdzad pa'i chos 'dul dgongs don gsal byed 'di aa go'i dgon par dpar du bsgrubs pa dge sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3747</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dgongs pa rab gsal</tib>
<p>1a-76a</p>
<col>@075a * bcom ldan 'das dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dgongs pa rab gsal zhes bya ba 'di ni snga mo nas mdo rgyud kyi sde snod 'dzin pa ches mang pos yang yang bskul ba la brten nas rgyal ba thams cad kyi mkhyen brtse gcig tu bsdus pa'i ngo bo grub pa'i dbang phyug thams cad mkhyen pa rje btsun chos kyi rgyal po tsong kha pa chen po'i zhabs kyi padmo gus pas bsten pa'i bka' drin las dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud don la phyin ci ma log pa'i blo gros kyi snang ba rgyas pa shes bya'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa dri ma med pa'i rigs pa'i mig gis lta ba'i skal ba mchog dang ldan pa'i btsun pa dge legs dpal bzang pos rgyud 'grel gyis dngos su bstan pa la spyi 'gro dang 'thun pa'i cho gas kha nges par 'gengs dgos pa rnams bskangs shing rwa 'bro gnyis kyi bla ma brgyud pa'i bzhed pa'i legs cha ma lus pa bsdus pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston rin po che'i phyag bzhes rnam par dag pa la'ang @075b brten la rje rin po che nyid kyi thun mong ma yin pa'i gsung gi legs bshad kyis brgyan te gtsang nyad stong rig pa'i 'byung gnas kyi sa'i cha dpal ri bo mdangs can gyi dgon pa sbyar ba'o swa sti ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i yab srid zhi'i dpal 'byor mi zad gter dngos grub kun gyi byed pa po dus kyi 'khor lor phyag 'tshal lo dpal ldan blo gros bzang po'i lus yon tan lang tshos snyoms pa yi grags pa khor yug ri bo'i bar nam yang nyams pa med pas skyongs gang 'di dge ba'i bshes gyur bas legs par bshad pa'i dpal yon che skal ba bzang po'i rna ba la 'bod mkhas smra ba'i dbang po rgyal sh'akya'i rgyal pos rmad kyi chos bgrang las 'das pa bstsal ba'i phul 'jig rten gsum gyi rin po che dpal ldan rgyud kyi rgyal po'o gang gi lam nas bgrod pa la smin byed dbang gi chu bo'i rgyun ma nyams spel byed pad dkar gyi dri ma med pa'i dag byed mchog yang dag smra la 'jig med pa dge legs bstan pa'i dpung gnyen des rang gi mgon gyis gdams pa'i gtam thun mong yi ge'i sbyor bar bkod skabs der skal bzang 'jug ngogs che shing rta'i srol chen btod pa'i lam gang nas zhugs pa'i myur lam pa bye bas phyogs 'di gang ba byung de nas bstan pa rin chen mchog gtsug rgyan nor bu la 'grogs te mi phyed dad pas rab 'tsho zhing 'khor los bsgyur ba'i lung dag gis lugs gnyis gser gyi 'khor lo che ma nyams khrims kyi dpung pa yis rnal du 'god pa'i kha lo pa @076a * 'jigs bral bsod nams rgya mtsho'i bkas rab dkar gtong ba'i dril chen gyis mi zad yi ger 'pho ba'i rgya gnag min sbyor bas bsgrubs shig ces legs 'doms dger 'os bstsal ba byas de tshe legs byas bskyed tshal du bsam 'phel 'dod dgu'i dar rgyas can yid kyi shing rta doms ldan pas rje bo'i bka' lung spyi bor blangs 'thun pa'i rkyen gyur yi ge pa mkhas pa zhang gi skyabs mchog ste 'bur du btod pa'i rig byed pa phul byung chos skyong la sogs so rnam par dkar bas sa chen 'dir dbang bsgyur chos rgyal khu dpon gyi sku yi lhun po ga-yo med cing chab srid phyogs mthar rgyas pa dang stobs chen bsod nams mthu grub pas shar phyogs rtag rtse'i pho brang cher rgya mtsho'i gos can skyong ba'i dpal yid kyi 'dod pa 'jo gyur cig phyogs 'dir cung zad dkar ba'i las bgyis dang bgyid bstsal rangs rnams kyang dam pa'i mgon gyis rjes gzung ste ma lus dam chos 'dzin par shog ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa sgo thams cad nas phyogs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3747</vol>
<tib>dka' bcu pa 'jigs med rdo rje'i dris lan</tib>

<col>@014b (ces rnam dpyod mchog tu yangs pa'i dka' bcu 'jigs med rdo rjes dogs pa dris pa'i lan du mang thos rigs smra'i gzugs rnyan ^ sprang btsun ngag dbang dpal ldan gyis bris pa'o</col>

<item>

<tib>dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud 'debs dang smon lam shis brjod bcas</tib>

<col>@006b (ces dpal ldan dang po'i sangs rgyas dus kyi 'khor lo'i bshad pa dang dbang gi brgyud pa'i bla ma rnams kyi gsol 'debs 'di ni aa ri lugs san aer te ni no mon han ngag dbang lhun grub dar rgyas kyis bskul ba'i ngor ^sh'akya'i dge slong rig pa 'dzin pa blo bzang bskal bzang rgya mtshos sbyar ba'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3747</vol>
<tib>dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i smon lam shis brjod dang bcas pa ni"</tib>
<p>6b-12b</p>
<col>@012a * ces dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i smon lam shis brjod dang bcas pa 'di ni mkhas grub chos kyi rgyal pos mdzad pa'i dus kyi 'khor lo'i mchod @012b 'phreng las mjug tu smon lam bkra shis rgyas par bya'o zhes gsung ba'i dgongs pa kha bkangs ste sh'akya'i btsun pa blo gros kyis sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba blo bzang grags pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas shing sems can thams cad dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i go 'phang thob par gyur cig "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3747</vol>
<tib>'jam dbyangs dkar po'i las tshogs kyi khrid kyi zin bris mi zad ngag gi 'dod 'jo zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-21a</p>
<col>@020b (ces ma ti'i lugs kyi 'jam dpal dbyangs dkar po'i sgrub thabs las tshogs dang bcas pa'i khrid dmigs mi zad ngag gi 'dod 'jo zhes bya ba 'di ni 'jam mgon smra ba'i dbang phyug rdo rje 'chang dngos dkon mchog rgyal mtshan po'i zhabs drung nas snga phyir 'di'i khrid len bcu phrag tsam mnos pa'i @021a * skabs kyi gsung bshad rnams brjed par phangs te dge slong shes rab rgya mtshos sde chen po bkra shis 'khyil gyi gar 'dug sgyu ma'i mgron khang du bris pa'o ) dka' bcu blo bzang bkra shis sogs kyis rgyu yon sbyar te dper du bsgrubs pa'i rnam dkar dge ba'i mthus la brten nas rje rgyal le ba gnyis pa'i bstan pa phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas gyur cig "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3747</vol>
<tib>mkhan chen chos kyi rgyal po'i gsung 'bum las rtsa ltung rnam bshad mdor bsdus pa</tib>
<p>1a-5a</p>
<col>@005a * zhes pa 'di yang dad gus thun mong ma yin pa dad ldan pa'i tha'i ji tshe ring don grub kyis bskul ba'i ngor lha'i btsun pa ^ blo bzang bstan 'dzin rgyal mtshan gyis dgon gsar dge 'phel gyi bla brang du sbyar ba'i dag pas 'gro kun rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang myur du thob par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3747</vol>
<tib>` dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i bla rgyud gsol 'debs kha skong ni"</tib>
<p>12b-13a</p>
<col>@012b (ces pa 'di ni dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i lam bzang la snying nas mi phyed pa'i dad stobs ldan pa nyan po sang zing ri khrod bla ma bskal bzang dam chos kyi thugs mos bzhin ^rgyal sras bskal bzang thub bstan 'jigs med bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis bris pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3748</vol>
<tib>dul ba'i bslab bya chen mo 'dul 'dzin grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa</tib>
<p>1a-153a</p>
<col>@152b dge slong pha'i rten la bcas shing dngos kyi sdom gyis bsdus pa nyis brgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum dang ma'i rnam 'byed dang gzhi bcu bdun gyi gzhi ci rigs nas 'byung ba'i bslab bya mdor bsdus pa dang bcas pa 'di ni rgyal ba'i gsung rab mtha' dag la gzhan gyi dring pi 'jog pa'i spobs pa brnyes nas 'gro ba rnams smin grol gyi lam la 'gong par mdzad pa chos kyi rje blo bzang grags pa'i dpal la sogs pa bla ma dam pa rnams kyi gsung gi bdud rtsi la brten nas 'dul ba 'dzin pa grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis dben gnas chos sdings su sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che phyogs thams cad nas sgo thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  ` aom swa sti chos kyi sbyin pa rgya cher spel ba'i phyir @153a * dad ldan dge slong blo bzang tshul khrims kyis yon bdag rnams dang bcas pa rgyu sbyor nas so sor thar pa'i bslab bya chen mo 'di dge ldan chos sde bkra shis 'phel rgyas gling zhes byar par du sgrub pa'i dge ba'i mthus rgyal bstan spyi dang khyad par tsong kha pa'i bstan pa'i snying po ring du rgyas pa dang mde 'dzin skyes bu dam pa'i sku tshe bsring sa skyong sbyin bdag rnams kyi mnga' thang rgyas bdag cag gtso byas mar gyur 'gro kun tshe ring nad med bde skyid ldan pa dang bslab gsum smin grol lam rnams mthar phyin te 'gro kun 'drin pa'i dpal du 'gyur bar shog  mangga lam bha wantu</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3749</vol>
<tib># 'bum sogs su byung ba'i theg chen gyi dge 'dun dkon mchog las rgyal sras zhe brgyad dang mtshon bya don gyi dge 'dun gyi grangs ka btsun pa rnams kyi mig gi ltos sa ma rgan ji snyed thams cad mkhyen par bgrod pa'i lam yig zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-5a</p>
<col>@004b ces skyabs 'gro'i yan lag dge 'dun dkon mchog gi khyad par shes pa'i @005a * don du dmigs te ^tshe ring don grub kyis bsgrigs so mangga lam ` khal kha 'gro ba'i dbang po sa'ing no yon gyi ael dmag dman rnams skyong ba t'a wan aer te ni jo nang ae rte ni ga thu me rgan no yon shr'i badzra ^'jam dbyangs gong ma srid 'bar ldan rgyal srid skyong ba'i lo gnyis pa rab byung bco lnga pa'i 'dzin byed me pho byi lo zla ba bcu gcig pa'i tshes dgu par sku'i bkod pa bsdus pa gang gi dge rtsa rdzogs byang du bsngo ba'i rten rta legs pa gcig dang dar zab lug kha bdun lhag lha rdzas bcas gnang bar brten dpar 'di bsgrubs pa'i legs spyod kyis mtshon ma rgan sems can thams cad la srid zhi'i rgud pa mtha' dag las grol ba'i mthar thug gi mngon mtho phun sum tshogs pa'i bde bsgrub par dmigs te sku gsum phun tshogs gling du bkod pa'o</col>

par 'chal bar spyod pa rnams zhang blon sogs sman srung rnams kyis de'i snying khrag rol par gnyer du gtad pa'o gong gsal sbyor tshad ma dpe bris ma rgyun 'byams su song nas chad lhag mang po byung ba mo dpal ldan phrang ba des nyams dang rmi lam gyi tshul du byin gyis brlabs nas pandi ta chen po mi dbang sangs rgyas rgya mtsho la stsal de la tshe rig pa wa gindra shr'i bha tras 'di skor gyi zhal <tib>rig zigs</tib>
<p>1a-37a</p>
<col>@037a * (zhes pa 'di ni ^ 'jam dbyangs bla ma ngag dbang bkra shis dpal bzang po'i gsung bshad ^ phran chos skyong rgya mtshos zin bris su btab pa lags aom swa sti sngon med 'phrin las bzang po'i mnga' thang gis bstan 'gro yongs la dbang bsgyur skyabs mgon rjes brtse bas rjes bzung bshad sgrub dar rgyas gling gang der chos sbyin mi zad mdzod 'di spel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3754</vol>
<tib>rim lnga gsal sgron gyi zin bris me tog sil ma</tib>
<p>1a-21a</p>
<col>@021a * (zhes pa 'di ni rgyal ba kun 'dus kyi ngo bo rdo rje 'chang chen po kun mkhyen gnyis pa 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa pandi ta dkon mchog 'jigs med dbang po'i drung nas spyir gsang ba 'dus pa'i bskyed rdzogs chen mo gnyis ka'i gzab bshad dang khyad par rdzogs rim rim lnga gsal sgron gyi bshad lung lan gnyis thob pa'i ^ pan chung rigs smra dkon mchog rgyal mtshan gyis bla ma'i gsung gi gces spras su bsam nas bris pa'i brjed tho thor bu kha shas yod pa phyis yun ring lon nas phyogs gcig tu bsdebs pa'o 'di shar phyogs mi dbang gtsug gi rgyan gyur khri chen mchog gi sprul pa'i sku mkhas shing grub pa'i dbang phyug rje 'jigs med nam mkha' dpal bzang po'i bka' rkyen zlog ma nus par glo bur du 'bul dgos byung nas bsgrigs pa 'di skabs gsal sgron dang bsdur ma thub pas gzhung dang gsung bshad gong 'og gi go rim skabs 'gar cung zad 'khrugs pa sogs nongs pa'i rigs ci mchis mkhas pa rnams kyis bzod par mdzod cig  'dis kyang thub bstan snyon po rgyal ba gnyis pa'i mdo sngags kyi bstan pa dar rgyas su gyur cig  'di yang kun mkhyen 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i sde'i thugs rje brten bkra shis 'khyil gling gi lho rgyud mdo sngags chos gra sgrogs pa'i tshal dga' ldan chos 'khor gling du legs par grub  mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3758</vol>
<tib>shing rta'i srol 'byed kyi rnam gzhag rin chen rigs pa'i ri bo zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-23a</p>
<col>@023a * aom swa sti rnam grol bshad sgrub rin chen 'byung gnas mchog rnam 'dren rje btsun dam pa'i gdan sa cher rnam mang 'gro la chos sbyin spel phyir du rnam dag par gyi 'phrul bzang deng 'dir bsgrubs dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3759</vol>
<tib>grub chen l'u ai pa'i lugs kyi 'khor lo sdom pa'i mngon rtogs nag 'gros su bkod pa</tib>
<p>1a-27a</p>
<col>@026b (bde mchog l'u ai ba'i lugs kyi mngon rtogs 'di la 'don cha 'dra min sna tshogs zhig 'dug pa las dben dgon du gsung chog ji ltar mdzad pa'i @027a * lugs bde chen gsal ba dang mthun pa 'dug pa ltar slar yang chig phran chegs mi 'dra ba rnams rtsa ba dang mthun par byas te btsun pa blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis ngag 'don khrigs chags su bsgrigs pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>

<tib>dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bskyed rim dngos grub kyi snye ma zhes bya ba bzhugs "</tib>

<item>

<vol>3764</vol>
<tib>nam mkha'i rnal 'byor gar gyi dbang po yi 'khrul snad rol par shar ba'i rdzun chos las rje btsun seng ldeng nags sgrol sgrub pa'i thabs 'phrin las gnad ldan tshinta ma ni bzhugs dam med log lta'i bang mdzod can dag la bstan par mi bya dam tshig rdo rje'i rgya "</tib>
<p>1a-40a</p>
<col>@039b  ces dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi 'phrin las ma lus pa gcig tu bsdus pa'i lha mchog rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs zab lam rim pa gnyis kyi rnal 'byor nyams su len tshul sogs 'phrin las rab 'byams kyi gnang kun ma tshad pa med pa'i gdams pa'i snying khu tsinta ma ni zhes bya ba 'di yang gangs can lha gcig rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen gzigs chen po'i sku'i zhabs 'bring ba gtsug lag lugs brgyar 'jug pa'i mkhyen spyan yangs shing dang stobs phul du byung ba 'dod 'jo'i dpal 'khyil gui rgyun bzo'i dod ma pa mkhan po lcang grod chos mdzad nas ga-yang ti'i bum pa dang su warna'i @040a * phur ma sring gi 'khor lo gdab sogs dngos po'i skyes dang bcas 'di lta bu zhig ci nas kyang dgos zhes don gnyer chen pos bskul ma byung ba la brten nas lhag pa'i lha mchog rje btsun thugs rje'i gter chen la yad nas yang du gsol ba btab pa'i ngor gsung gi gnang ba ji ltar rtsal ba la rang gzos bslad pa med par sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang chos kyi dbang phyug gam ming gzhan skal bzang gar gyi dbang por 'bod pa'i rmongs rtul gyi na ba zhig gis rang gi bsti gnas ri khrod dge 'phel byang chub gling du bkod pa 'dis kyang 'gro kun rje btsun sgrol mas dgyes bzhin rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur cig  zin bris las thog mar 'bebs pa'i yi ge pa ni sngags rab pa ngag dbang bskal bzang gis bgyis pa'o "</col>
</item>

<item>

<tib>rgyal ba kun gyi mkhyen brtse nus gsum gyi bdag nyid rje btsun btsong kha pa chen po la dmigs brtse ma'i gsol 'debs dang 'brel ba'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor dga' ldan lha brgya ma'i 'khrid yig dngos grub kun 'byung</tib>
<p>1a-15a</p>
<col>@014b (ces rgyal ba kun gyi mkhyen brtse nus gsum gyi bdag nyid rje btsun @015a * bla ma btsong kha pa chen po la dmigs brtse ma'i gsol 'debs dang 'brel ba'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor bya tshul dga' ldan lha brgya mar grags pa'i dmigs skor nyams su len tshul dngos grub kun 'byung zhes bya ba 'di ni mtshan brjod par dka' ba'i drin can rtsa ba'i bla ma khyab bdag rdo rje sems mchog khri chen ngag dbang mchog ldan pa'i zhal snga nas kyis 'di'i 'khrid yig cig rtsoms shig pa bkas gnang ba dang bstan pa'i gsal byed dza ya pandi ta hu thog thus kyang bskul ma mdzad pa bcas rtsom 'dun gyi thog khal kha ga-yon  ru thu she ye gung rgyal mtshan gyi shog t'a bla ma ae rte ni dar han she r'e ge thu blo bzang bsod nams dang nang so blo bzang brtson 'grus dka' bcu blo bzang chos dbang gsum gyis bla ma'i rnal 'byor 'di ga'i dmigs rim sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang ba'i kha gsal khyer bde ba zhig dgos tshul don gnyer chen pos bskul ba la brten nas 'di ga'i 'khrid yig grub mchog 'jam dpal rgya mtshos mdzad pa gzhi byas te rje bla ma'i bstan pa la shes nas dad pa thob pa'i sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang bskal bzang rgya mtshos sug bris su bgyis pa 'dis 'gro ba mtha' dag la phan pa rgya chen po 'grub par gyur cig  sarba mangga lam</col>

<tib>mkhas pa dang blun po brtag pa'i bstan bcos dge ldan legs bshad pad+ma dkar po'i chun po'i 'grel pa nyi ma'i 'od zer zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@101b ces mkhas pa dang blun po brtag pa'i bstan bcos dge ldan legs bshad pad+ma dkar po'i chun po'i 'grel pa nyi ma'i 'od zer zhes bya ba 'di ni mang thos dge ba'i bshes gnyen na'i mang @102a * lha rams pa ngag dbang bstan 'dzin gyis snga phyir nan gyis bskul ba'i ngor mkhas grub dam pa du ma'i zhabs rdul spyi bos bsten pa'i btsun gzugs snyoms las pa dbyangs can dga' ba'i blo gros kyis ga-yar khral tsam du bkod pa'o aom swa sti tshul 'di khal kha jo nang be se'i shog dpyod ldan dge slong ngag dbang bstan 'dzin gyis chos sbyin rgya cher spel ba'i lhag bsam gyis mthun rkyen sbyar te par du legs par bsgrubs legs byas 'dis mchon dus gsum dge ba'i mthus tshe rabs kun tu dal 'byor rten brgyud de dpal ldan bla mas dgyes bzhin rjes bzung nas smin grol lam bzang myur du mthar phyin shog  mangga lam ) na mo gu ru bhya : lnga rig rnam dpyod mchog gi chu gter las legs 'khrungs bsod nams cha shas rab rdzogs pa gdung ba'i mun sel grags pa'i 'od dkar 'phro zla bral mkhas pa'i dbang por snying nas 'dud gang gi zhal gyi padmo las 'ongs pa'i dge ldan legs bshad 'di ko rmad du byung 'di'i dgongs 'grel nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis ya rabs chos tshul 'dab brgya ci yang rgod zla gzugs gcig las gzugs brnyan rab 'byams bzhin dkar 'jam shog bu ji snyed mchis pa'i nang de snyed 'byung ba'i thabs mkhas 'phrul chen dbang dge slong bzang pos rgyu @102b rkyen sbyar te bsgrubs dge 'dis rgyu 'byor 'brel thogs skye bo kun tshe rabs kun tu dal 'byor rten brgyud de rgya chen gzhung la thos bsam bsgom gsum gyis sa lam rim bgrod byang chub myur 'thob shog  (ces pa 'di ni mkhas dbang rab 'byams pa ngag dbang thub bstan gyis bka' gnang ba bzhin dang brtson ldan pa dge slong bzang pos mthun rkyen sbyar te mkhas pa dang blun po brtag pa'i bstan bcos dge ldan legs bshad pad+ma dkar po'i chun po'i 'grel pa nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi par legs par sgrubs pa'i byang du ngag dbang 'jigs med kyis bris pa dge legs 'phel 'di'i par kun dga'i chos gling gi par du 'dug  dge'o</col>

<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3769</vol>
<tib>shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi dgongs 'grel pad+ma dkar po'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-25a</p>
<col>@025a * shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi dgongs 'grel pad+ma dkar po'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba las mkhas shing grub pa brnyes pa'i dge slong dge 'dun bstan pa dar rgyas kyis sbyar ba'i bsam gzugs kyi spyi don bshad zin to "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3770</vol>
<tib>gzhi smad kyi sdom tshig zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-40a</p>
<col>@040a * (ces pa 'di ni khu re chen mo'i mkhan zur pa mchog sprul dge 'dun rgya mtshos 'phrel dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa'i 'dul ba'i sdom tshig las gzhi smad kyi skabs rdzogs so</col>
</item>

<tib>rje btsun ma phyag 'tshal nyer gcig gi lha tshogs la gsol ba 'debs pa blo gros rgya mtsho'i mdzad pa</tib>
<p>1a-8b inc inc [* missing page from 9a *]</p>
<col>@008a * (ces pa 'di yang rmongs brtul ma ti sa ra zhes bya ba zhig gis dben nas nyi ma stengs su rang gis 'dod gsol byas pa'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3770</vol>
<tib>sngon 'gro khrid chen bzhi las bla ma'i rnal 'byor gyi dmigs rim bshad pa dngos grub sbrang char 'jo ba'i byin rlabs chu 'dzin dbang po zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-25b</p>
<col>@025a * (ces sngon 'gro khrid chen bzhi'i dmigs rim 'di ni rang nyid la rab 'byams gzhung lugs rgya mtsho chen por thos bsam gyi sgro 'dogs chod cing sgom pa'i nyams rtogs kyi klong brdol ba'i dbang gis 'chad rdzod rtsom pa la thogs pa med pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs til 'bru tsam yang med pas chos 'chad pa dang rtsom pa sogs gsal 'os mod sangs rgyas dngos dang khyad par med pa'i gsum ldan rtsa ba'i bla ma grub dbang rin po che sogs dam pa du ma'i zhabs rdul spyi bor brten pa las mdo sngags kyi man ngag zab rgyas kyi bka' drin cung zad mnos pa la skyabs 'cha' ste skal ldan gyi slob ma bcu phrag lnga brgal par sngon 'gro bzhi'i khrid lung phul ba'i rjes su rab 'byams gzhung lugs kyi dgongs don la blo mig gsal ba ja rod zhabs drung 'jam dbyangs tshe ldan dang gso ba rig pa'i man ngag la nang byan chu de @025b pa au cu mu chin shog gi rab 'byams pa 'jam dbyangs blo bzang sogs slob ma du mas lha rdzas dang rin po che gnyis pa srang nyi shu rtsa lnga sogs skyes bzang po dang bcas khrid chen bzhi'i dmigs rim gsal zhing go bde ba zhig dgos zhes bskul ngor sku 'bum mkhan zur gser tog no mon khan blo bzang tshul khrims rgya mtsho'am ming gzhan mi pham changs sras dgyes pa'i rdo rjes rang lo bcu phrag gsum dang nyag ma drug tu slebs pa'i khrums zla ba'i tshes bzang po nas 'go brtsams te tha skar zla ba'i rgyal ba dang po'i nyin mjug grub par bgyis te sku 'bum gser tog bla brang bde chen bsam gtan gling gi gzims chung bkra shis ga-yang 'khyil gyi yang rtser sbyar ba'o tshul 'di khal kha se chen rgyal khag gi bstan pa'i sbyin bdag chen po t'a cang jung se chen p'e li tshe ring bsam grub dang ga-yung drung rdo rje yid bzhin 'khor lo bcas mthun rkyen sbyar te dpar du bsgrubs pa'i dges skye ba'i phreng bar dal 'byor rten bzang thob drin can bla ma mchog dang mi 'bral zhing sa lam yon tan yongs su mthar phyin shog  mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3770</vol>
<tib>sngon 'gro khrid chen bzhi las mandal gyi dmigs rim bshad pa rab 'byams dge tshogs sdud pa'i ngo mtshar yid bzhin lcags kyu zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-26b</p>
<col>@026a * (ces mandal gyi khrid dmigs bshad pa rab 'byams dge tshogs sdud pa'i @026b ngo mtshar yid bzhin lcags kyu zhes bya ba 'di ni chos srid la 'dren byed kyi 'od snang gsal ba ja rod zhabs drung 'jam dbyangs tshe ldan dang au cu mu chin shog gi grwa rigs mkhyen dpyod yangs pa'i rab 'byams smra ba 'jam dbyangs blo bzang sogs kyis bskul ngor ^sh'akya'i dge slong gi gzugs brnyan 'chang ba blo bzang tshul khrims rgya mtsho'am ming gzhan gser tog ho thog thu ta'i ching aer ti ni chos kyi rgyal por 'bod pas rang gi bsti gnas bkra shis ga-yang 'khyil gyi yang rtser sbyar ba'o tshul 'di khal kha se chen rgyal khag gi bstan pa'i sbyin bdag chen po t'a cang jun se chen p'e le tshe ring bsam grub dang ga-yung drung rdo rje yid bzhin 'khor lo bcas mthun rkyen sbyar te dpar du bsgrub pa'i dges skye ba'i phreng bar dal 'byor rten bzang thob drin can bla ma mchog dang mi 'bral zhing sa lam yon tan yongs su mthar phyin shog  mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3770</vol>
<tib>sngon 'gro khrid chen bzhi las skyabs 'gro'i dmigs rim bshad pa bde chen thar pa'i pho brang du 'jug pa'i man ngag rin chen them skas zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-29a</p>
<col>@029a * (ces skyabs 'gro'i dmigs rim bshad pa bde chen thar pa'i pho brang du 'jug pa'i man ngag rin chen them skas zhes bya ba 'di yang lung rtogs yon tan gyis phyug pa'i bshes gnyen ja rod zhabs drung 'jam dbyangs tshe ldan dang rab 'byams smra ba 'jam dbyangs blo bzang sogs slob ma 'gas bskul ba bzhin nnyam med sh'akya'i dge slong gi gzugs brnyan la spyod pa blo bzang tshul khrims rgya mtsho'am ming gzhan gser tog no mon han du 'bod pas rang shag bkra shis ga-yang 'khyil gyi yang rtser sbyar ba'o tshul 'di khal kha se chen rgyal khag gi bstan pa'i sbyin bdag chen po t'a cang jun se chen p'e le tshe ring bsam grub dang ga-yung drung rdo rje yid bzhin 'khor lo bcas mthun rkyen sbyar te dpar du bsgrub pa'i dges skye ba'i phreng bar dal 'byor rten bzang thob drin can bla ma mchog dang mi 'bral zhing sa lam yon tan yongs su mthar phyin shog  mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3770</vol>
<tib>stag bu'i sgrol ma'i brgyud 'debs dang smon lam bdud rtsi'i bum bzang zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-3b</p>
<col>@003b (ces ded rang gi thos pa'i brgyud rim ltar gyi stag phu'i dag snang sgrol ma'i brgyud 'debs dang rim gnyis dang 'brel pa'i smon lam 'du lta bu zhig dgos zhes au tsu mu chin pa'i le'i shog gi zhabs drung rnam dpyod yangs pa 'jam dbyangs bde mchog gis yang yang bskul ngor btsun gzugs ngag dbang thub bstan rgya mtshos bris pa'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3791</vol>
<tib>'dul ba rgya mtsho'i dka' gnad mdor bsdus pa nor bu'i phreng ba zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-51b</p>
<col>@051a * ('di ni btsun pa dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron mes rang lo nyer gsum pa la lha ldan smon lam grwa skor gyi dus gtugs pas rtsa ba blo 'dzin ngos der mi gsal kha 'geng dgos rnams dge slog gang bgyis dran tho rags pa tsam sug bris su btab pa las phyis dpe rim par 'khyar te chos grwa chen po dpal ldan @051b bkra shis 'khyil gyi dga' ram 'dzin krwa'i chos grwa ba rnams nas rtsod pa la phan skyed che bar 'dug pas par du 'khod dgos zhes par yig btab zin 'dug kyang spyir dang po nas rang gi brjed tho tsam du bsam ste tshig sbyor sogs rtsom pa'i lugs su ma byas shing lhag par de skabs rtsod pa cha tshang ma song bas gong 'og ma 'brel ba lta bu re gnyis 'dug pa zhu dag cung zad bgyis yod kyang da dung blo gros can rnams kyis dpyad par mdzad na legs so 'dir 'bad legs byas gangga'i klung rgyun gyis nyes ltung rnyog pa'i dri ma rab sbyangs nas chos 'dul rgya mtsho'i gling du phyin gyur te bslab gsum nor bu'i mdzod la dbang 'byor shog sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3791</vol>
<tib>slob ma la springs pa'i rnam bshad 'dod pa'i zug rngu sel bar byed pa'i snying gi thur ma zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-63b</p>
<col>@063a * (ces slob ma la springs pa'i tshig don mdor bsdus su 'grel ba snying gi thur ma zhes bya ba 'di ni legs nyes 'byed pa'i blo gros kyi mig dang ldan pa lha btsun dge slong ngag dbang 'od zer gyis 'di lta bu zhig ces kyang bris shig pa'i au tshugs mthar bskyel gyi ngor dam pa du ma'i zhabs rdul spyi bos len pa'i sa mtha'i btsun chung wa g'indra pa tu siddhis skyabs mgon dam pa rim byon gyi gdan sa chen po ri bo dge rgyas dga' ldan bshad sgrub gling du sug bris su bgyis pa spyir na bdag lta bu'i yig 'jog bstan pa'i than ltas lta bur song bar ma zad gzhung ngan 'ga' zhig gi khog pa zug pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba las 'os med na'ang mkhas pa'i byab ba 'chad rtsod rtsom gsum smon pa'i yul du byed nas dam pa'i rjes su zlos pa yin pas 'dis kyang tshangs spyod rnam par dag pas gzhi bzung ba'i 'jam mgon bstan pa dar zhing rgyas par gyur cig  ) * aom swa sti lha mi'i ston pa kun mkhyen zas gtsang sras lnga rig pan chen btsun pa zla ba'i zhabs rgyal ba gnyis pa blo bzang grags pa sogs thub dbang rgyud 'dzin bcas la snying nas 'dud bka' dang gdams ngag gangs ri'i sbor 'gying zhing 'chad rtsod rtsom la dbang ba'i lus stobs rgyas rnam dag bslab gsum ral pa'i khur 'chang ba mkhas grub bstan 'dzin gdong lnga'i dbang por 'dud gang de'i legs bshad snying gi thur ma 'dis don gnyer 'dod pa'i snying rlung sel ba'i slad kho bo dngos po'i mthun rkyen legs sbyar te chos sbyin mi @063b zad bkod legs sbar 'di bsgrubs 'dis mtshon rang gzhan rnam dkar bsdoms pa'i mthus phan bde'i gter gcig rgyal ba'i lung rtogs chos 'jam dpal snying po'i dgongs pa ji lta bar bshad dang sgrub pas rtag tu 'phel bar shog 'di la 'brel thogs gtso byas 'gro ba kun skye bar dal 'byor rten thob rab tu 'byung theg pa mchog gi bshes kyis rjes bzung ste thos bsam sgom pas rang rgyud sbyong bar shog lan grangs du mar rgyal bas bsngags pa yi rnam dag tshul khrims zhing sa gshin pa la ting 'dzin shes rab lo tog cher smin te rnam grol 'bras bu'i dpal la spyod par shog ma rig 'khrul 'khor snying gi zug rngu kun ye shes rno rgyun 'bab pa'i thur ma yis drung phyung sgrib gnyis dgra las rnam rgyal ba'i thub chen dpa' po'i go 'phang myur thob shog ces par byang smon tshig 'di nyid dam chos 'gyur med gling gi bla ming 'dzin pa bhikshu aa yusti ta k'irtis bris pa dge "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3791</vol>
<tib>slob ma la springs pa'i rnam bshad 'dod pa'i zug rngu sel bar byed pa'i snying gi thur ma zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@063a * (ces slob ma la springs pa'i tshig don mdor bsdus su 'grel ba snying gi thur ma zhes bya ba 'di ni legs nyes 'byed pa'i blo gros kyi mig dang ldan pa lha btsun dge slong ngag dbang 'od ba'i 'jam mgon bstan pa dar zhing rgyas par gyur cig  ) * aom swa sti lha mi'i ston pa kun mkhyen zas gtsang sras lnga rig pan chen btsun pa zla ba'i zhabs rgyal ba gnyis pa blo bzang grags pa sogs thub dbang rgyud 'dzin bcas la snying nas 'dud bka' dang gdams ngag gangs ri'i sbor 'gying zhing 'chad rtsod rtsom la dbang ba'i lus stobs rgyas rnam dag bslab gsum ral pa'i khur 'chang ba mkhas grub bstan 'dzin gdong lnga'i dbang por 'dud gang de'i legs bshad snying gi thur ma 'dis don gnyer 'dod pa'i snying rlung sel ba'i slad kho bo dngos po'i mthun rkyen legs sbyar te chos sbyin mi @063b zad bkod legs sbar 'di bsgrubs 'dis mtshon rang gzhan rnam dkar bsdoms pa'i mthus phan bde'i gter gcig rgyal ba'i lung rtogs chos 'jam dpal snying po'i dgongs pa ji lta bar bshad dang sgrub pas rtag tu 'phel bar shog 'di la 'brel thogs gtso byas 'gro ba kun skye bar dal 'byor rten thob rab tu 'byung theg pa mchog gi bshes kyis rjes bzung ste thos bsam sgom pas rang rgyud sbyong bar shog lan grangs <tib>rgyud sde spyi'i rnam par bzhag bsdus pa rgyud sde rin po che'i gter sgo 'byed pa'i lde mig</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3793</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla bde bar gshegs pa brgyad kyi stong mchod byed tshul rin chen 'phreng ba zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-5b</p>
<col>@005b (ces bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla bde bar gshegs pa brgyad kyi stong mchod byed tshul rin chen phreng ba zhes bya ba 'di ni dge slong blo bzang chos grags kyis lhag bsam bzang pos au ru'i skyes dang bcas dam pa'i phyag len 'khrul med 'di ltar 'dri dgos tshul gyis rna ba gzer bar brten nas 'du gsum pa sh'a sa na dhwa dzas dam pa'i gsungs dang zhal rgyun ltar bris pa slar shog bur 'bebs pa po ni dge slong dkon mchog 'od zer gyis bgyis pa lus can mtha' dag sman gyi bla ma'i go 'phang mngon du byed pa'i rgyur gyur cig dza yantu</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3793</vol>
<tib>bsngo ba'i rgyal po bstan 'bar ma'i dgongs don rgya cher 'grel pa legs bshad bstan pa'i sgron me zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-56a</p>
<col>@055b (ces bsngo ba'i rgyal po bstan 'bar ma'i dgongs don rgya cher 'grel pa legs bshad bstan pa'i sgron me zhes bya ba 'di ni snga sor dgon pa'i khrir sdod skabs su kun mkhyen mchog gi bkas bcad ltar lo re bzhin gling bsre skabs su bka' pot lnga'i steng nas bshad pa byed dgongs pas lo dang por sa bcad zhib rgyas gnyis pa dang lnga par dka' gnad don dogs gcod dang bcas pa'i gzab bshad gsum par bka' pot so so'i chos 'byung dang sbrags pa bzhi par bka' pot lnga ka lam gyi lus gcig tu dril ba drug par bstan 'bar ma'i brjod don bslab pa gsum du bsdus shing de ston pa mdo 'dul gnyis dang lung gi mngon pa gong 'og rigs pa'i mngon pa ste bka' pot lngar 'gyur tshul gyi steng nas bshad pa byas par brten rnam dpyod can 'ga' zhig gis de'i nang nas bstan 'bar ma rang rkyang gi bshad pa rnams logs su bkol ba'i t'ikka zhig dgos zhes bskul ma byung yang rim 'gyangs su lus pa nye char pa ron su nyid shog nas gzhung brgya smra ba'i dbang po rdo ram ngag dbang rab brtan dang hal ha dar han bee li'i shog nas lhag bsam dang rnam dpyod phul du byung ba t'a bla ma dkon mchog chos 'dzin gnyis kyis nan tan du bskul ba'i ngor dbus 'gyur bstan pa'i srog shing snyan brgyud man ngag gi mdzod 'dzin pa dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje can ^rje btsun ye shes rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po dang mdo smad srin po'i yul lta bu 'dir yang @056a * thugs bskyed kyi go cha brtsan po bgos te thub bstan yongs su rdzogs pa 'khor lo gsum ? 'dzin skyong spel bar byed pa la sa'i steng na 'gran pa'i zla dang bral ba nges pa don gyi thams cad mkhyen pa chen po ^rje btsun dkon mchog 'jigs med dbang po rnam gnyis kyi zhabs rdul spyi bor bsten pa'i ^btsun pa dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron mes rab byung bcu bzhi pa'i bgrang bya gnyis pa sa pho 'brug gi lo khrums stod kyi zla bar dben gnas yid dga' chos 'dzin nas mtshams kyi thun gseng du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni gtsug lag lta ba'i blo mig dang ldan pa dge slong dkon mchog kun dgas ? 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che yun ring du 'bar bar gyur cig  ) ` rgyal  bstan rin chen 'bar ba'i smon 'grel 'di ngad gtong lhag bsam yangs pa aer te ni phyag mdzod tshe tsheng tho'ing gyis rgyu sbyar te khu re chen mor par du legs bzhengs mthus mkha' khyab mar gyur 'gro ba ma lus pas ston pa mchog de'i rjes su slob 'gyur cing mgon nges dka' bas bsgrub pa'i lung rtogs bstan dus mtha' 'dir yang ring du 'bar gyur cig "</col>
</item>

<item>

<vol>3793</vol>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3793</vol>
<tib>lung gi bar sdom mchan dang bcas pa</tib>
<p>1a-4b</p>
<col></col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3793</vol>
<tib>nam mkha' sgo 'byed kyi dbang byed tshul</tib>
<p>1a-3b</p>
<col>@003b smras pa zab lam nam mkha' sgo 'byed byin rlabs tshul yang dag ltar snang 'dres pa'i lugs mang yang rnam dag dam pa'i gsung bzhin rin chen 'phreng mdor bsdus chig gi srang bur spel ba 'di sde snod 'dzin pa du mas bskul ba'i ngor mang du thos pa'i dge slong rgyal khams pa blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes byas bkod dge bas 'gro kun bdud bzhi las rgyal te sku gsum dbang gi rgyal po thob gyur cig ces lha ldan sprul ba'i gtsug lag khang du sbyar ba'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3793</vol>
<tib>rtags kyi 'jug pa'i dgongs 'grel rab gsal snang ba zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-18a</p>
<col>@018a * (ces pa 'di ni khal kha se chen han gyi shog rig gnas la mkhyen dpyod rab tu yangs pa t'a bla ma blo bzang sbyin pas mkhas pa chen po bra ti dge bshes kyi sum cu pa'i 'grel pa rgyas par bzhugs na'ang rtags 'jug gi bshad sbyar tshigs bcad ma mdor bsdus tsam las ma mthong bas dper brjod dang bcas cung zad rgyas tsam zhig dgos zhes lha dar par gyi mthun rkyen dang bcas bskul ba'i ngor snyoms las pa dbyangs can dga' ba'i blo gros kyis chos sde chen po sku 'bum byams pa gling du sbyar ba kun la phan thogs par gyur cig</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3793</vol>
<tib>thang shing ring mo'i rtsis las legs par btus pa</tib>
<p>1a-9a</p>
<col>@009a * ces thang shing ring mo'i rtsis mdor bsdus pa 'di'ang ga-yeng ba'i rang bzhin can gyi grong chog pa dge slong gi tshul 'dzin pa rab yangs gdong lnga'i ming can gyis bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni ngag dbang bsod nams so sarba mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3793</vol>
<tib>tshe gcig gi nyams len bya tshul rnams khrig chags su bsdebs pa chos spyod gsal ba'i sgron me zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-20b</p>
<col>@020a * ces tshe gcig gi nyams len rnams nyin zhag phrugs gcig la sbyar te lag tu bster ba'i tshul chos spyod gsal ba'i sgron me zhes bya ba 'di ni rgyal ba'i gsung rab la thos bsam tshul bzhin du byas pa rdo ram pa tshangs dbyangs rgyal mtshan gyis thos don sgrub pa la sbyar ba'i ched du dben pa'i ri khrod du 'gro bar chos pa'i tshe 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes nan tan du bskul bar brten thun drug gi rnam 'byor dang sdom pa gsum gyi bsngo bgrang sogs la nyams len gyi mthil du byed pa ni rgyal ba'i dgongs pa mthar thug pa dang mnyam med ri bo dge ldan pa'i khyad chos bla na med pa yin pas de rnams gtso bor bzung byin rlabs kyi khyad nas rje yab sras dang pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung gi tshag ris rnams rang sor bzhag bar mtshams su tshig sbyor cung zad snon dgos pa rnams bsnan te btsun pa dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron mes dpal ldan bkra shis 'khyil gyi 'du khang chen mo'i mang rtser sbyar ba 'dis kyang 'jam mgon bstan pa'i snying po phyogs dus kun tu rgyas par gyur cig rnyed dka' dal 'byor tshang @020b ba'i rten bzang po don ldan bgyid pa'i thabs kyi rtser son pa dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi dgongs pa'i mthil nyams len zab mo'i gnad bsdus thun drug gi rnal 'byor gzhir byas chos spyod rim pa 'di mi zad par du bskrun pa'i legs byas mthus tshang lam nor bstan pa'i snying po 'di phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas gyur cig bdag sogs kun rkyang skye ba'i phreng ba ru bshes gsnyen dam pas 'bral med rjes 'dzin zhed yang dag lam bzang bgrod pa mthar phyin nas zung 'jug go 'phang bde blag thob gyur cig ces pa 'di ni dad brtson lhag bsam mchog tu dge ba rab 'byams pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas kyis 'di nyid par du bsgrubs pa'i tshe smon tshig cig dgos tshul ltar ^btsun pa dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron mes bris pa'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3793</vol>
<tib>tshe lha rnam gsum gyi mngon rtogs</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col>@003a * zhes pa 'di ni tshe lha gsum char sgrub par 'dod kyang so sor mi lcogs pa rnams la 'jug pa bde ba'i phyir 'di 'dra zhig dgos zhes dad brtson ldan pa dge slong dkon mchog zla bas bskul ngor ^btsun pa dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron mes bris pa'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3794</vol>
<tib>byin rlabs kyi gter chen po dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i rim pa dang po'i zab khrid 'jam mgon snyan rgyud kyi man ngag yid ches gsum ldan zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-100a</p>
<col>@100a * ces byin rlabs kyi gter chen po dpal rdor je 'jigs byed chen po'i rim pa dang po'i zab khrid ^'jam mgon snyan brgyud kyi man ngag yid ches gsum ldan zhes bya ba 'di ni 'jam mgon bstan pa'i gsal byed lung dang rtogs pa'i yon tan gyis thugs rgyud phyug pa stong 'khor sprul pa'i sku ngag dbang 'jam dbyangs bstan 'dzin rgya mtshos lo mang po'i bar du nan cher bskul zhing pe cing pho brang chen por phebs nas kyang me lug lo'i mkhan nang gi mdun du'ang 'phrin yig gi lam nas bskul ma nan cher byung ba la brten nas ^'jam mgon snyan brgyud kyi man ngag 'dzin pa dge slong ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis pho brang chen po po ta la'i gzim chung bde ba can du sbyar ba'o dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che nam yang mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan du gyur cig yi dam 'di shin tu bka' gnyan pas 'di'i dbang ma thob pa dang thob kyang 'jam mgon snyan brgyud la mi dad pa'i snod min rnams la shin tu gsang bar bya'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3795</vol>
<tib>blo rab 'bring tha ma gsum gyi yid kyi dga' ston ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-13a</p>
<col>@013a * ces blo rab 'bring tha ma gsum gyi yid kyi dga' ston ces bya ba'i gtam rnam dpyod lang tsho ldan pa'i mgul rgyan 'di ni sangs rgyas me rta la 'khrungs nas me stag la mya ngan las 'da' tshul bstan pa'i dbang du byas nas bgrangs pa'i lo nyes stong dang lnga brgya dang nga brgyad 'das sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa lnga brgya pa phrag bcu'i tshul khrims kyi le'ur steng nas long brgyad 'das pa'i rab byung bcu gnyis pa'i nag pa zla ba'i gsang sngags kyi chos 'khor bskor ba'i dus chen gyi dus bya rgod phung ri gnyis pa stag tshang bkra shis chos gling gi dben gnas btab de nas lo nyer lnga song ba'i me 'brug gi rgyal zla ba'i tshes la gnas brtan bikshu bsam gtan sogs 'di lta bu la mos pa'i blo ldan rnams kyis nan cher byas pa la brten nas bya btang rab brtan gyis bgyis pa phyogs dus kun tu dge zhing shis par gyur cig  shu bam "</col>
</item>

<tib>'phags mchog dzam lha rigs lnga gter gyi ga'u la brten nas sgrub tshul phun tshogs char 'bebs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-17a</p>
<col>@016b (ces 'phags mchog dzam lha rigs lnga gter gyi ga'u la brten nas sgrub tshul phun tshogs char 'bebs zhes bya ba 'di ni ^yab rje blo bzang rgyal mtshan sengge dpal bzang por 'gying rol sprul pa'i sku 'jam dpal bstan pa'i sgron me sogs kyis lha mchog 'di rnams phyogs gcig tu ga'u la brten nas nor sgrub bya tshul zhig yod na legs tshul yang yang bskul kyang sa bon lta bu zhig gnang ba bar skabs rkyen dbang gis nub rjes sor slar yang bskul tshe bdag la khyod kyi slar bris na legs tshul gyi bka' me tog spyi bor 'thor ba ltar 'dren pa gang de'i bka' drin kho nas rnam pa kun tu 'tsho zhing 'du gsum pa bstan pa rgyal mtshan gyis mngon rtogs phal cher sgrub thabs rin 'byung gzhir bzhag @017a * dzam lha rang rang gi gter sgrub so so nas skyes chen dam pa chen po rnams kyi gsung rdo rje tshig rnams byin rlabs che khyad rang sor bzhag te rang rtsom 'brel med kho nam byas par mgon po gang de'i bzhed pa ji lta bar byas pa'i khur gyis rab byung bcu bzhi pa'i lcags phag lo'i cho 'phrul zla ba'i yar tshes brgyad kyi nyin gza' skar phun sum tshogs pa'i dus tshod dge bar mjug grub par byas ste sug bris su bgyis pa las slar yang gnyis bris byed po re skong ljongs kyi rigs sngags 'chang ba kun bzang rdo rjes bgyis pa skyes dgu'i dbul ba'i sdug bsngal sel ba'i rin chen dbang gi rgyal po lta bur gyur cig dza yantu</col>

<item>

<vol>3796</vol>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3796</vol>
<tib>rgyal sras lag len gyi 'grel pa gzhan phan bdud rtsi'i rol mtsho zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-63b</p>
<col>@062b (zhes rgyal sras lag len gyi 'grel pa gzhan phan bdud rtsi'i rol mtsho zhes bya ba 'di ni rgyal ba'i gsung rab mtha' dag la thos bsam bsgom pa gcig dril du mdzad pa'i gnas brtan chen po dkon mchog dge 'dun dang dad brtson dang mkhyen rab phul du byung ba gser kha chos rje rnam gnyis kyis nan gyis bskul ngor ^rgyal mkhan ming grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis dad pas sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge tshul dkon mchog bstan 'dzin gyis bgyis pa dge legs su gyur cig aom swa sti ye shes spyan ras stong gi cha kun nas rigs drug 'gro la nyin mtshan dus drug tu brtsegs gzigs pa nam @063a * yang mi lhod pa 'phags mchog spyan ras gzigs la gus pas 'dud rgyal kun byams brtse bdud rtsi'i snying po kun gcig tu 'khyil ba'i mtshan dpe'i za ma tog nor bu pad+ma 'dzin pa'i mtshan gsol lha ngur smrig tshul bzung rgyal sras thogs med pa'i dam chos 'o ma bsrubs pa las phyungs pa'i byang sems skye 'phags bslab bya'i mar gsar zas bsten pa'i mdo la sems dpar lus bsgyur ba'i mdo sngags srog gi bcud len bdud rtsi 'di rang gi phyi nang chos ldan bya ba kun gcig tu khur du 'khyer ba'i lhag bsam gyis 'di phyir phan pa sgrub pa'i nye gnas mchog dge slong 'jam dbyangs brtson 'grus zhes bya bas 'dzad med par du bsgrubs pas tshe rabs su 'phags pa'i nor bdun mtho ris yon tan dang theg mchog 'khor lo bzhi ldan legs thob nas srid pa'i rgya mtsho che las myur thar shog ma 'ongs skye ba'i phreng ba thams cad du 'bral med thar pa sgrub pa'i grogs bgyid cing khyad par nam zhig tshe lo brgyad khri'i dus byams mgon mdun sar shes bzhin mjal bar smon dal 'byor pad+ma dkar po'i phreng bar yang bshes gnyen nyin byed 'od kyis reg pa las byang sems sbrang rtsi'i zil mngar rab rgyas shing lung rtogs 'dab brgya ches cher bzhad par shog sras bcas rgyal ba'i rlabs chen smon lam dang sems dpa' chen po'i gzhan phan @063b (zhes rgyal sras lag len gyi 'grel pa gzhan phan bdud rtsi'i rol mtsho zhes bya ba 'di nyid rang gi nye gnas dge slong 'jam dbyangs brtson 'grus kyis mthun rkyen sbyar te par du bsgrubs pa'i tshe smon tshig 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes par du bsgrub pa po nyid kyis bskul ngor rgyal mkhan po grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dka' bcu blo bzang dar rgyas kyis bgyis pa 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  dge'o sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3797</vol>
<tib>grub mtha'i rnam bzhag gces btus dran thor bkod pa gzhung lugs rgya mtshor bgrod pa'i lam yig ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-33b</p>
<col>@033a * ces phyi nang gi grub mtha'i rnam bzhag gces btus dran thor bkod pa gzhung lugs rgya mtshor bgrod pa'i lam yig ces bya ba 'di ni yig cha'i khas len dang mthun pa'i grub mtha'i rnam bzhag mdor bsdus shing gnad tshang ba 'di lta bu zhig 'bri na rang dang skal mnyam gzhan la'ang phan thogs par 'gyur ram snyam pa'i 'dun pa snga mo nas yod thog gzur gnas chos kyi spyan ldan gyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po 'ga' zhig nas kyang 'bri na legs tshul gyi rting bskul byung zhing nye char rang gi slob ma 'ga' zung gis cis kyang 'bri dgos pa'i mthun 'gyur byed pa rnams la brten nas ^rgyal ba'i lung gis zin pa'i chos sde chen po dga' ldan theg chen gling gi rig smra yongs kyi tha shal du btogs pa blo bzang rta dbyangs ming pas gzhung gi byings blo gling yig cha'i khas len gyi rgyun la @013b gzhir bzung zhing khas len phyogs mthun gzhan rnams grub mtha'i yig cha tshad thub rnams kyi tshig zin sgra sor bzhag tu bkod pas legs par brgyan te sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni chos kyi mig can gyi zhabs drung 'phags pa skyabs kyis bgyis pa dge legs 'phel 'dis kyang kun mkhyen sh'akya'i sras kyi ring lugs dri ma med pa de nyid sgo thams cad nas phyogs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la dus yun ring du gnas shing mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad las rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig dza yantu "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3797</vol>
<tib>grub pa'i mtha'i rnam par bzhag pa rin po che'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-30a</p>
<col>@030a * (ces phyi nang gi grub mtha'i rnam bzhag mdor bsdus pa rin po che'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba 'di ni dad brtson rnam dpyod dang ldan pa gu shri ngag dbang skal bzang dang dge slong ngag dbang bzang po gnyis kyis bskul ngor btsun pa dkon mchog 'jigs med dbang pos chu sprul chu stong zla ba'i yar tshes la sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni rta mgrin tshe ring ngo mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3797</vol>
<tib>'jam mgon bla ma yab sras chos rgyal rigs ldan rnams dang bcas pa'i phyag mchod cho ga 'khyer bde gnad tshang btson 'don cang shes zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-11a</p>
<col>@011a * (ces 'jam mgon bla ma yab sras chos rgyal rigs ldan rnams dang bcas pa'i phyag mchod cho ga 'khyer bde gnad tshang btson 'don cang shes zhes bya ba 'di ni dang gus rnam dpyod can gyi bu slob rtsis rams pa ngag dbang brtson 'grus dang dge slong aa pa ra dzi ta gnyis kyis so so nas rab dkar lha rdzas dang rten 'brel 'grigs pa'i dngos 'bum dang bcas te nan tan du bskul ba bzhin ^sh'akya'i btsun gzugs 'jam dbyangs dgyes pa'i bshes gnyen gyis dpal gdong lo'i skar ma smin drug gis nya pa'i nyin dge bar chos sde chos dbyings 'od gsal gling gi nye 'dabs kyi bsti gnas brag ser khrod du sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang yul dang dus mtha'i bstan 'gro yongs la rgya cher phan thogs par gyur cig  ` aom swa sti skyabs mgon bzhi pa'i thugs rje'i 'od stong gis dus mthar rgyal bstan 'dab brgya bzhad pa'i tshal chos grwa bkra shis chos 'byor gling mchog nas spar gyi chos sbyin sbrang rtsi'i dga' ston spel sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3797</vol>
<tib>'jam mgon bla ma yab sras chos rgyal rigs ldan rnams dang bcas pa'i phyag mchod cho ga 'khyer bde gnad tshang btson 'don cang shes zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-11a</p>
<col>@011a * (ces 'jam mgon bla ma yab sras chos rgyal rigs ldan rnams dang bcas pa'i phyag mchod cho ga 'khyer bde gnad tshang btson 'don cang shes zhes bya ba 'di ni dang gus rnam dpyod can gyi bu slob rtsis rams pa ngag dbang brtson 'grus dang dge slong aa pa ra dzi ta gnyis kyis so so nas rab dkar lha rdzas dang rten 'brel 'grigs pa'i dngos 'bum dang bcas te nan tan du bskul ba bzhin ^sh'akya'i btsun gzugs 'jam dbyangs dgyes pa'i bshes gnyen gyis dpal gdong lo'i skar ma smin drug gis nya pa'i nyin dge bar chos sde chos dbyings 'od gsal gling gi nye 'dabs kyi bsti gnas brag ser khrod du sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang yul dang dus mtha'i bstan 'gro yongs la rgya cher phan thogs par gyur cig  ` aom swa sti skyabs mgon bzhi pa'i thugs rje'i 'od stong gis dus mthar rgyal bstan 'dab brgya bzhad pa'i tshal chos grwa bkra shis chos 'byor gling mchog nas spar gyi chos sbyin sbrang rtsi'i dga' ston spel sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3797</vol>
<tib>ngan song sbyong ba'i lha mchog gang mos la sbyar chog pa'i gshin po rjes 'dzin gyi cho ga gzhan phan kun khyab 'od snang zhes bya ba bzhugs so  "</tib>
<p>1a-14b</p>
<col>@014a * (ces ngan song sbyong ba'i lha mchog gang mos la sbyar chog pa'i gshin po rjes 'dzin gyi cho ga gzhan phan kun khyab 'od snang zhes bya ba 'di ni hal ha ga-yas su sar thu la shog gi dpon gzhis grwa tshang nas dri med rnam gnyis kyi gshin po ?? @014b tshul byung zhing chos grwa 'di kha nas kyang ngan song sbyong ba'i lha lnga'i gshin po sbyang chog dgos tshul ltar ^sh'akya'i btsun gzugs 'jam dbyangs dgyes pa'i bshes gnyen gyis gcig gis kun 'thus kyi tshul du ri khrod bka' gdams chos sdengs su bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni dpyod ldan slob bu ngag dbang brtson 'grus kyis bgyis so 'dis kyang rgyal bstan nyin byed ches cher 'bar zhing 'khor ba sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho 'di nyid myur du skem par gyur cig  dge'o ` aom swa sti skyabs ma ? bzhi pa'i thugs rje'i 'od stong gis dus mthar rgyal bstan 'dab brgya bzhad pa'i tshal tshes grwa bkra shis tshes 'byor gling mchog nas sbar gyi chos sbyin sbrang rtsi'i dga' ston spel sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3797</vol>
<tib>rgyal ba ma pham mgon po la mdo chog gi lugs bzhin mchod tshul rje gung pas mdzad pa</tib>
<p>1a-5a</p>
<col>@004b (ces rgyal ba ma pham mgon po la mdo chog gi lugs bzhin mchod cing gsol ba gdab pa'i rim pa 'di ni hal ha ngo long shog gi dad brtson blo dang ldan pa rab 'byams pa dkon mchog grags pas yul mtha' der bstan pa'i mang gzhi 'dzug pa'i lhag bsam rnam dag gis bskul ba bzhin ^btsun pa dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron mes sbyar ba'i yi ge pa sngags ram pa dkon mchog kun dga'o</col>
</item>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3797</vol>
<tib>ston pa gnas brtan bcu drug dang bcas pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa yongs 'du'i 'khri shing zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-35a</p>
<col>@035a * (ces ston pa gnas brtan bcu drug dang bcas pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa yongs 'du'i 'khri shing zhes bya ba 'di ni rab yid me rta lor rkyen dbang gis rten brten pa kun gsar bskrun gyi skabs ^yab rje'i thugs rjer gnas bcu'i sku brnyan rtogs brjod kyi bris sku khyad mtshan can thog mar byung rjes sor khri ngag dbang 'jam dpal tshul khrims rgya mtshos ngo mtshar dge mtshan lo rgyus du ma dang ldan pa'i gnas brtan gyi sku brnyan gong ma'i byin chen gnang ba sogs la dad pas mtshams sbyar te dga' rigs kyi mdzod pa na bstan pa rgyal mtshan gyis ^yongs 'dzin rin po che'i mdzad pa'i rtogs brjod gzhir bzhag te mchod brjod bri dus khang steng du ganti brdungs pa dang mtug rdzogs nyin grub dus su tshogs dung 'bud pa byung ba bcas su bris su byas shing slar gnyis bris byed pa po ni bka' 'bum gyi bar yig pa dge slong 'jam dbyangs shes rab kyis bgyis pa'i dge bas rgyal bstan rin po che dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas pa'i rgyur gyur cig dza yantu</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3797</vol>
<tib>thub dbang gnas brtan chen po rnams dang khyad par 'phags pa ba ku la'i thugs dam bskul ba'i dundu dhi'i dbyangs snyan zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-15b</p>
<col>@015b (ces thub dbang gnas brtan spyi dang khyad par gnas brtan chen po ba ku la'i thugs dam bskul ba'i dundu dhi'i dbyangs snyan zhes bya ba 'di ni chos rje bla zur gyi na ba blo bzang chos 'dzin gyis sug bris su bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa spyi dang khyad par rje tsong kha pa'i bstan pa dri ma med pa sgo thams cad nas phyogs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas pa'i rgyur gyur cig dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3797</vol>
<tib>thugs rje dang byin rlabs kyi gter gyur lha mchog lnga la phyag mchod 'bul zhing gzungs chen sde lnga 'don pa'i sgo nas bsag sbyang bya ba'i cho ga skye dgu'i gdung sel bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs mkha' khyab sprin chen zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-47a</p>
<col>@046b (ces thugs rje dang byin rlabs kyi gter gyur lha mchog lnga la phyag mchod 'bul zhing gzungs chen sde lnga 'don pa'i sgo nas bsag sbyang bya ba'i cho ga skye dgu'i gdung sel bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs mkha' khyab sprin chen zhes bya ba 'di ni dad gus rnam dpyod ldan pa'i zhabs drung 'phags pa skyabs kyis rang gzhan la sman yon bsgrub pa'i lhag bsam dkar bas kun nas bslangs te rab dkar lha dar dang dngul tam gyi rten dang bcas par 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes nan tan du bskul ma byung ba bzhin rang nyid kyang rjes su yi rang bas 'tshams sbyar te ^mong rgyud man ngag rgya mtsho'i phreng ba 'dzin pa'i btsun gzugs snyoms las pa blo bzang rta dbyangs ming can gyis rab byung bco lnga pa'i shing pho 'brug lo'i lha babs dus chen gyi nyin dag par ^bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' 'bum du bzhugs pa'i 'dod lha du ma'i phyag mchod gsung tshig byin can rnams la dgos @047a * khyad kyis bsgyur bkod snon 'bri chad chung bgyis dos rang bzos ma bslad pa'i 'khul du bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni bskul ba po rang nyid kyis byas so 'dis kyang mtha' dbus skye 'gro mtha' dag sgrib gnyis byang zhing tshogs gnyis rdzogs te dan song 'khor ba'i 'jigs skrag las grol zhing mtho ris byang grol gyi dga' bde zag med la gtan du ci dgar longs su spyod par gyur cig  ) * aom bde legs su gyur cig chos kun mngon rdzogs byang chub rgyal kun gyi chos nyid spros bral dbyings dang mnyam bzhugs pa'i chos sku'i ring bsrel gzungs chen sde lnga'i chog chos sbyin spel slad dpar du bzhengs pa'i dges blo bzang 'jam dpal thugs gsang mkha' dbyings su mkhyen dpyod rta ljang dbang shar rig gnas lnga'i legs bshad dbyangs snyan gzi 'od mngon 'bar ba'i bla ma mchog gi zhabs pad brtan gyur cig rnam dpyod yangs pa dge slong chos spel dang dmigs yul tshe 'das tshul khrims gtso byas pa'i 'brel thogs 'gro kun theg mchog bshes gnyen gyis rjes bzung sgrub pas mnyes pa lhur len shog 'jam dpal snying po'i phul byung mkhyen brtse las legs 'ongs thub bstan snying khu sgron me mchog spar ba'i rgyan du dus gsum dge tshogs dang chabs gcig mchod chog 'di yang 'jug par shog (ces pa 'di ni ^bla ma 'di nyid kyi zhabs rdul spyi bos len pa'i tha shal pa zhig gis rgyal phur 'dzom pa'i nyin bzang por bgyis pa dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3797</vol>
<tib>thugs rje dang byin rlabs kyi gter gyur lha mchog lnga la phyag mchod 'bul zhing gzungs chen sde lnga 'don pa'i sgo nas bsag sbyang bya ba'i cho ga skye dgu'i gdung sel bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs mkha' khyab sprin chen zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-47a</p>
<col>@046b (ces thugs rje dang byin rlabs kyi gter gyur lha mchog lnga la phyag mchod 'bul zhing gzungs chen sde lnga 'don pa'i sgo nas bsag sbyang bya ba'i cho ga skye dgu'i gdung sel bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs mkha' khyab sprin chen zhes bya ba 'di ni dad gus rnam dpyod ldan pa'i zhabs drung 'phags pa skyabs kyis rang gzhan la sman yon bsgrub pa'i lhag bsam dkar bas kun nas bslangs te rab dkar lha dar dang dngul tam gyi rten dang bcas par 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes nan tan du bskul ma byung ba bzhin rang nyid kyang rjes su yi rang bas 'tshams sbyar te ^mong rgyud man ngag rgya mtsho'i phreng ba 'dzin pa'i btsun gzugs snyoms las pa blo bzang rta dbyangs ming can gyis rab byung bco lnga pa'i shing pho 'brug lo'i lha babs dus chen gyi nyin dag par ^bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' 'bum du bzhugs pa'i 'dod lha du ma'i phyag mchod gsung tshig byin can rnams la dgos @047a * khyad kyis bsgyur bkod snon 'bri chad chung bgyis dos rang bzos ma bslad pa'i 'khul du bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni bskul ba po rang nyid kyis byas so 'dis kyang mtha' dbus skye 'gro mtha' dag sgrib gnyis byang zhing tshogs gnyis rdzogs te dan song 'khor ba'i 'jigs skrag las grol zhing mtho ris byang grol gyi dga' bde zag med la gtan du ci dgar longs su spyod par gyur cig  ) * aom bde legs su gyur cig chos kun mngon rdzogs byang chub rgyal kun gyi chos nyid spros bral dbyings dang mnyam bzhugs pa'i chos sku'i ring bsrel gzungs chen sde lnga'i chog chos sbyin spel slad dpar du bzhengs pa'i dges blo bzang 'jam dpal thugs gsang mkha' dbyings su mkhyen dpyod rta ljang dbang shar rig gnas lnga'i legs bshad dbyangs snyan gzi 'od mngon 'bar ba'i bla ma mchog gi zhabs pad brtan gyur cig rnam dpyod yangs pa dge slong chos spel dang dmigs yul tshe 'das tshul khrims gtso byas pa'i 'brel thogs 'gro kun theg mchog bshes gnyen gyis rjes bzung sgrub pas mnyes pa lhur len shog 'jam dpal snying po'i phul byung mkhyen brtse las legs 'ongs thub bstan snying khu sgron me mchog spar ba'i rgyan du dus gsum dge tshogs dang chabs gcig mchod chog 'di yang 'jug par shog (ces pa 'di ni ^bla ma 'di nyid kyi zhabs rdul spyi bos len pa'i tha shal pa zhig gis rgyal phur 'dzom pa'i nyin bzang por bgyis pa dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3797</vol>
<tib>` gnas brtan rnams la gsol ba gdab tshul gyi go rim ni"</tib>
<p>15b-17a</p>
<col>@017a * zhes pa 'di ni chos ming bas gong bstun sbyar ba dge legs 'phel ` dge 'dis tshe rabs phreng ba thams cad du bla ma mchog dang nam yang mi 'bral zhing chos mthun 'byor ba yid bzhin 'grub 'gyur te bshad sgrub chos spyod gong du 'phel bar shog 'di ni nom che'i khams tshan dge bshes bstan dar gyis rgyu yon sbyor te par du legs par bsgrubs pa'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3797</vol>
<tib>` gnas brtan rnams la gsol ba gdab tshul gyi go rim ni"</tib>

</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3798</vol>
<tib>rdo rje 'chang chen po'i lam gyi rim par blta ba'i mig 'byed</tib>
<p>1a-42a</p>
<col>@042a * (ces pa 'di ni yid dga' chos 'dzin du grub dbang klong rdol gsung la gzhi byas nas rdzogs rim skor sogs bri snon mdor bsdus shig blo dman bdag gi blo dang 'tshams par sbyar par 'di kun mkhyen 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i sde'i thugs rje la brten pa bkra shis 'khyil gling gi lto rgyud mdo sngags chos sgra sgrogs pa'i tshal dga' ldan chos 'khor gling du legs par grub ) sarba mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3798</vol>
<tib>rgyud sde bzhi'i spyi'i don rnam par bzhag pa sngags la 'jug pa'i sgo zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-70a</p>
<col>@070a * (ces rgyud sde spyi'i rnam par bzhag pa sngags la 'jug pa'i sgo zhes bya ba 'di ni rje btsun 'jam dpal dbyangs mi'i gar gyis rnam par rol pa bstan pa'i mnga' bdag rje btsun ^dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron me dpal bzang po de nyid nas sngags kyi spyi don rgyud la sbyangs par 'dod pa'i gsar bu pa rnams kyis 'dzin skyor bde ba zhig bsgrigs na legs zhes bka'i me tog spyi bor bcings pa la brten nas rigs pa smra ba ^dkon mchog rgyal mtshan gyis 'phral du mgo brtsams kyang le lo'i dbang gis cung zad 'gyang ba sems kyi zug rngur gyur te chu mo lug gi lo 'dir bla ma'i bka' dang thugs dgongs rdzogs pa'i mchod par dmigs nas gang mgyogs dang long gang yod la bris nas lha babs dus chen gyi nyin bshad sgrub bstan pa'i 'byung gnas dpal ldan bkra shis 'khyil gyi rang gi bsti gnas bka' gdams khang bzang du mjug rdzogs par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dad brtson rnam dpyod yangs pa'i dge slong dar rgyas kyis bgyis shing 'phral du gang dgos cung zad re rang gi nye gnas sngags ram pa blo bzang bstan 'dzin gyis bgyis pa 'dis kyang mar gyur 'gro ba thams cad zung 'jug rdo rje 'chang gis myur du reg par gyur cig  chos sbyin rgya cher spel phyir chos gra chen po dga' ldan chos 'khor gling nas dpar du bsgrubs</col>
</item>
