<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3800</vol>
<tib>dpal gyi rdo rje mtshon cha can lha bcu gsum ma'i bskyed rim la brten nas rgyud sde lnga'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyis chabs gcig tu bsgom tshul gyi sgrub thabs gsal bar bkod pa dngos grub 'dod dgu'i bang mdzod ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-35b</p>
<col>@035a * (zhes kyee rdo rje mtshon cha can lha bcu gsum ma'i bskyed rim la brten nas dpal rgyud sde lnga'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyis chabs gcig tu bsgom tshul gyi sgrub thabs gsal bar bkod pa dngos grub 'dod dgu'i bang mdzod ces bya ba 'di ni mdo sngags yongs rdzogs kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po 'ga' zhig gi bkas bskul zhing rang dang skal mnyam gzhan dag la'ang phan 'dod kyi bsam pas kyang kun nas bslangs te 'phags yul gyi pan grub chen po rdo rje gdan pas mdzad pa'i sgrub dkyil dang dpal ldan shangs pa bka' brgyud kyi ring lugs 'dzin pa'i mkhas grub du ma'i gsung rab rnams la rang blo'i gang spobs kyis 'dris par byas te gsang sngags @035b spyi'i gzhung dang 'jam mgon chos kyi rgyal po tsong kha pa chen po yab sras kyi bzhes srol dang mi 'gl ba'i phyogs nyid gtso bor bzung lugs 'di ga'i thun mong ma yin pa'i khyad par rnams tshad ldan gyi yig rnying rnams sor bzhag tu bkod cing ngag 'don gyi rim pa phal che ba brjod pa gtsang zhing 'jug pa bde ba'i phyir da lta rang rer yongs su grags pa'i cho ga rnams kyi 'gros dang bstun par byas te rgyas bsdus 'tsham zhing lag tu blang bde bar bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin las dkyil 'khor chen po 'di dag gi spyi sgos kyi dbang dang gdams ngag mang du thos pa'i btsun gzugs ^dam tshig rdo rje zhes bgyi bas mkhas grub rgya mtsho'i 'byung gnas dpal ldan ser theg chen gling gi nye 'dabs dben pa'i gnas mchog brag ri dga' ldan byang chub gling du nye bar sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dad brtson rnam dpyod sogs bsngags par 'os pa'i yon tan du ma'i rgyan gyis rnam par mdzes pa dge sbyong blo bzang nam mkha' rdo rjes bgyis pa'o 'di la lhag chang nor 'khrul sogs nongs pa'i rigs su byur ba thams cad rtsa brgyud kyi bla ma yi dam dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs su dpal myur mdzad ye shes kyi mgon po dpa' bo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang bcas pa la snying thag pa nas 'chags par bgyi dan thugs brtse ba chen pos bzod par bzhes te rnam pa kun tu dge zhing bkra shis par mdzod du gsol lam bzang 'dir 'bad pa'i dge ba'i mthus mkha' khyab kyi sems cad thams cad kyi 'phral dang yun gyi phan bde ma lus pa'i 'byung gnas rgyal ba'i bstan pa'i snying po dri ma med pa khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po rgyal ba blo bzang grags pa'i ring lugs 'di dag sgo thams cad nas phyogs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3800</vol>
<tib>dpal ldan rgyud sde chen po rnam pa lnga'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs sgrub cing mchod pa'i cho ga dngos grub kun gyi gter mdzod ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-70a</p>
<col>@069b (ces shin tu zab cing gsang ba dpal ldan rgyud sde chen po rnam pa lnga'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs sgrub cing mchod pa'i cho ga dngos grub kyi gter mdzod ces bya ba 'di ni deng sang bdag lta bu brtson 'grus zhan cing stobs 'byor dman pa dag gis kyang bla na med pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po khyad par can du ma'i sgrub mchod tshogs chung dus dus gcig tu bsgrub tshul yid ches kyi khungs dang ldan pa 'di nyid tshogs gsog sgrib sbyang gi sgo phul du byung bar mthong ste rang dang skal mnyam gzhan la'ang phan 'dod kyi lhag bsam rnam par dag pas kun nas blangs te lugs srol 'di nyid 'dzin skyong spel bar mdzad pa'i mkhas grub du ma'i legs bshad rnams las btus te blo dman rnams kyis kyang 'jug pa bde ba'i phyir shin tu gsal zhing lag tu blang bde bar bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin las rgyud sde chen po 'di dag gi dbang dang gdams ngag gis mtshon pa'i zab rgyas kyi gdams pa mang du thos pa'i rgyal khams pa ^dam tshig rdo rje zhes bgyi bas ston pa rdo rje 'chang gis gling 'dir chos kyi 'khor lo rgya cher bskor ba'i dus chen gyi nyin grub par sbyar ba'i mthun rkyen sbyor byed las smon @dge bas 'brel ba'i snying gi slob bu rnam dpyod lang tsho'i dpal gyis mngon par mtho ba badzas m'anta dha dra'o 'dis kyang 'jam mgon bla ma'i mdo sngags kyi bstan pa rin po che yongs su rdzogs pa phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  sarba mangga lam ` yig cha 'di rje btsun thams cad mkhyen pa t'a ra n'a thas mdzad pa'i sgrub dkyil kho na'i lugs su bkod pa yin pas de'i bzhed dgongs kho nar mos pa dag gis yi ge 'di la brten pas khyab la kho bos gzhan du bsgrigs pa'i sgrub dkyil rnams ni rje sangs rgyas dpal bzang gi yig cha gzhir bzung zhing cho ga zor yang ba gtsor 'don byas mod 'ong kyang 'di'i mchod 'phreng bstod pa rgyun bshags tshogs mchod smon lam shis brjod rnams ni grub brnyes dam pa'i gsung byin rlabs kyi tshan kha can sha stag yin pas spro zhing nus na de dag las skabs su gang babs kho bo'i ngag bsgrigs kyi dkyil chog dngos grub 'byung gnas nyid la ji ltar rigs par sbyar kyang mi 'gal zhing legs pa'i yan lag tu 'gyur ba yin no de ltar na dam pa'i phyag bzhes so so ba gngal brten cing rung ste gtso bor zab gsang rmad du byung ba'i gdams pa 'di nyid deng dus shin tu nyag phra bar gyur te ming tsam sgrog pa'ang dkon par snang bas tshul 'di dag dus kyi mthar yang mi cub cing phyogs kun tu dar zhing rgyas pa'i thabs la sgo du ma nas 'bad par rigs so dar rgyas 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3800</vol>
<tib>dpal ldan rgyud sde chen po rnam pa lnga'i rigs bsdus kyi dkyil 'khor chen por dbang bskur tshul gyi cho ga dngos grub rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-54a</p>
<col>@054a * (ces dpal ldan shangs pa bka' brgyud kyi ring lugs dri ma med pa las nye bar byon pa'i rgyud sde lnga rigs bsdus kyi dkyil 'khor chen por dbang bskur tshul gyi cho ga lag tu blang bde bar bkod pa dngos grub rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba 'di ni rgyal ba'i mdo sngags yongs su sngogs pa'i mnga' bdag bka' drin mtshungs med rigs kun khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang chos kyi rgyal po mkhan chen mchog gi sprul pa'i sku rin po ches bka' stsal ba spyi bos nos te bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin las byung sde chen po 'di dag gi dkyil 'khor so so ba dang rigs bsdus kyi dbang dang gdams ngag mang du thob pa'i dge sbyong rig pa 'dzin pa'i gzugs brnyan ^dam tshig rdo rje zhes bgyi bas 'jam mgon rgyal ba gnyis pa'i legs bshad kyi dgongs gzhir bzung lugs 'di'i srol 'dzin mkhas grub dam pa rnams kyis mdzad pa'i dkyil chog rgyas bsdus du ma'i legs chas brgyan te 'jug pa bde bar chos sde chen po se ra theg chen gling gi chos gur grub par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dad brtson rnam dpyod kyi dpal dang ldan pa'i rab 'byams smra ba dge slong blo bzang bstan pa dar rgyas so dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3800</vol>
<tib>dpal ldan rgyud sde lnga rigs bsdus kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga gsal bar bkod pa dngos grub myur ster nor bu gzi 'bar zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-22a</p>
<col>@022a * (ces dpal ldan shangs pa bka' brgyud kyi ring lugs dri ma med pa las nye bar byon pa'i dpal ldan rgyud sde lnga rigs bsdus kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga gsal bar bkod pa dngos grub myur ster nor bu gzi 'bar zhes bya ba 'di ni yi dam gyi lha khyad par can nang po'i lam la bag chags brtan bod 'jog pa dang tshul 'di la sos shing don du gnyer ba dag la phan pa'i bsam pas kun nas bslangs shing sngar bkod pa'i sgrub thabs dang dkyil chog gi cha lag tu'ang mkho nges su mthong ste slob dpon chen po aa bhya ka ras mdzad pa'i sbyin sreg spyi'i gzhung chen po 'od kyi snye ma dang 'jam mgon rgyal ba gnyis pa'i gsung sbyin sreg gi rnam bshad chen po dngos grub rgya mtsho gnyis gzhar bzung tshad lan gyi dam pa gong ma'i legs bshad dang phyag bzhes kyis nye bar brgyan te las dang po pas kyang 'jug pa bde bar bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin las lugs srol 'di'i man ngag mang du thob pa rgyal khams pa ^dam tshig rdo rje grags kyis dben pa'i gnas mchog brag de dga' ldan byang chub gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni sdom brtson dge slong blo bzang nam mkha' rdo rjes bgyis pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3800</vol>
<tib>dpal ldan rgyud sde lnga rigs bsdus kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga gsal bar bkod pa dngos grub myur ster nor bu gzi 'bar zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-22a</p>
<col>@022a * (ces dpal ldan shangs pa bka' brgyud kyi ring lugs dri ma med pa las nye bar byon pa'i dpal ldan rgyud sde lnga rigs bsdus kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga gsal bar bkod pa dngos grub myur ster nor bu gzi 'bar zhes bya ba 'di ni yi dam gyi lha khyad par can nang po'i lam la bag chags brtan bod 'jog pa dang tshul 'di la sos shing don du gnyer ba dag la phan pa'i bsam pas kun nas bslangs shing sngar bkod pa'i sgrub thabs dang dkyil chog gi cha lag tu'ang mkho nges su mthong ste slob dpon chen po aa bhya ka ras mdzad pa'i sbyin sreg spyi'i gzhung chen po 'od kyi snye ma dang 'jam mgon rgyal ba gnyis pa'i gsung sbyin sreg gi rnam bshad chen po dngos grub rgya mtsho gnyis gzhar bzung tshad lan gyi dam pa gong ma'i legs bshad dang phyag bzhes kyis nye bar brgyan te las dang po pas kyang 'jug pa bde bar bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin las lugs srol 'di'i man ngag mang du thob pa rgyal khams pa ^dam tshig rdo rje grags kyis dben pa'i gnas mchog brag de dga' ldan byang chub gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni sdom brtson dge slong blo bzang nam mkha' rdo rjes bgyis pa'o</col>
</item>

<tib>par byang smon tshig ni"</tib>

<col>@006b (ces ^skabs mgon mtshungs med khyab bdag dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyal sras rdo rje 'chang bskal bzang thub bstan 'jigs med rgya mtsho dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyi gsung rab legs bshad rgya mtsho lta bur byon dang 'byon 'gyur rnams las bka' rtsoms sngon ma rnams chos @007a * sding bla brang nas par bzhengs grub 'dug cing de tshan chad nas rab byung bcu bzhi pa mo yos zla tshes phan gyi bka' 'bum rnams par du 'khod na bstan rgyun la phan par dgongs nas byang phyogs bstan pa'i sgron me rje btsun dam pa blo bzang thub bstan dbang phyug 'jigs med rgya mtsho nas 'di nas khur blangs kyi sgrub dgos par bka'i lung phebs 'phral ngos kyi bkod pas 'doms par byas nas mdzod pa ye shes rab brtan nas 'khyur blangs kyi don dam kun bde gling spyi gnyer tshul khrims rin chen nas bgyis shing zhus dag pa rig gnas kun la mkhas pa rnam spyod yangs pa bzhis sde dpon slob shes rab rgya mtsho dang dge bshes ngag dbang dpal ldan par brkos pa dbu chen bsam 'grub tshe ring dbu chang ba sangs byings ka rma dbang 'dus nor bu dpal 'byor mi 'gyur zhi bsri thar karma bsam 'grub kun bzang rab brtan stobs rgyal nor bu dgra 'dul karma tshes brgyad karma tshe dbang nor bu dbang 'dus bcas mi grangs bcu gsum skor dang par yig 'dri med dbu chen phun tshogs rab brtan dang tshe ring don ldan karma rnam rgyal nas bgyis te dbus gtsang kun bde gling gi bla brang lhun grub bde chen du bzhengs skabs par byang smon tshig 'di yang rta tshag pa rgyal tshab ming 'dzin ye shes blo bzang bstan pa'i mgon pos kun bde gling gzim chung bde ba can du bris pa bla ma dam pa'i gsung rab rgya mtsho'i gos can khyon kun tu rgyas par 'phel ba'i rgyur gyur cig  dar rgyas 'phel</col>

<tib>byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i khrid tshigs su bcad pa khyer bde ba</tib>

<col>@011a * (byang chub lam gyi rim pa gsal bar byed pa'i sgron me zhes bya ba 'di ni rab 'byams smra @011b ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyis byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i khrid dmigs rim du dril ba zhig gyis zhes nan cher bskul ba la brten nas lam 'di la shes nas dad pa thob pa'i dge slong blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bgyi bas blo bzang mdun sa dben sa chos kyi pho brang du sbyar ba 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  ) ` na mo gu ru bhya: snang ba mtha' yas dharma dhwa dza yi zhal gyi bum bzang las 'ongs bdud rtsi rgyun byang chub lam rim gsal bai sgron me 'di dga' ldan phun tshogs gling du par du brkos 'di yi dge bas ma rgan 'gro ba rnams mi khom gnas pa dal 'byor rten thob nas thun mong lam gyi rim pas rgyud sbyangs te sku gsum go 'phang dam pa thob par shog sbyin pa'i bdag po bde legs rdo rje yi chab srid brtan zhing mnga' thang rigs brgyud 'phel legs tshogs thams cad dbyar mtsho'i dpal bzhin du gong nas gong du 'phel ba'i bkra shis shog (zhes pa 'di ni lugs gnyis la mkhyen dpyod yangs pa gung bde legs rdo rjes byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i khrid tshigs bcad pa khyer bde ba 'di ni par byang @012a * smon tshig 'di lta bu zhig dgos tshul la brten ^dzny'a na'i ming can gyis ga-yar khral tsam du bgyis pa'i yi ge pa ni dad ldan ye shes shes rabs so mangga lam ) "</col>

<tib>lam rim dmar khrid kyi zin tho byang chub gsal ba'i sgron me zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>11b-31a</p>
<col>@030b (ces lam rim dmar khrid kyi zin tho byang chub gsal ba'i sgron me zhes bya ba 'di ni rgyal ba kun gyi mkhyen brtse gcig tu tshogs pa'i rang gzugs thub bstan yongs rjogs gsal ba'i dbang po ^'jam mgon bzhad @031a * pa'i thugs kyis mchog yab rje'i gsang ba'i mdzod 'dzin dbyings rig zag med bde ba'i ye shes 'byams klas thabs mkhas 'khul gyis zung 'jug sgyu ma'i gzugs skur bzhengs pa yab gcig 'jam mgon gnyis pa 'di nyid kyis skal ldan gyi gdul bya la legs gsung gi gdams ba nam mkha' las rgya che rgya mtsho las gting zab nyi zla las 'od gsal tshangs dbyangs las gdangs snyan pa zhig bka' stsal zhing khyad par du shing mo yos kyi lo gsar zla ba'i tshes la sku phyos kyi byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i dmar khrid 'jam dpal zhal lung gi snying po bsdus bde nyid byin rlabs kyi dri ngad sdang zhing nang nyams rtogs kyi myong steng nas khrid che bdag blo gros kyi 'jug pa chung la snang shes kyi tha gus bcing zhing mos gus zhan pas bla ma dam pa'i gsung gi rgya mtsho las ku sha'i rtse'i zegs ma tsam zhig rang gi dran pa gso phyir du bdag bu slob kyi grwa la gsham pa chos skyong rgya mtshos bris pa 'dis kyang rje btsun tsong kha pa'i bstan pa slar yab rje rnam gnyis kyis ches cheng bsal bar mdzad pa 'di nyid phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang rang cag byang chub snying po'i bar du yab rje dam pas thugs kyi sras su bzungs te mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub ma lus pa myur du thob par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3804</vol>
<tib>lam rim zin bris kyi skor las byang chub lam sgron dang bde lam gnyis kyi gsung bshad zin bris su bkod pa</tib>
<p>1a-7b</p>
<col>@007b (rang gi skyabs mgon 'jam dbyangs bla ma khri rin po che ^ngag dbang bkra shis pa'i zhal snga nas kyis lam sgron dang bde lam gyi ljags bshad mdzad pa rje nyid kyi bka' drin gyis 'tsho ba'i phran bu chos skyong rgya mtsho zin bris su bkod pa 'di yang rgyal bstan phyogs bcur rgyas shing rje bla ma yab sras kyis tshe rabs thams cad du dgyes bzhin du rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3804</vol>
<tib>rje rin po che'i byang chub gzhung lam gyi steng nas rje bla mas gsung bshad gnang ba zin tshod</tib>
<p>46b-49a</p>
<col>@049a * (zhes khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po kun mkhyen blo bzang grags pa'i byang chub gzhung lam ^'jam mgon chos kyi rgyal po kun mkhyen ngag dbang bkra shis dpal bzang pos dpal ldan bkra shis 'khyil gyi mkhas grub 'dus sde rgya mtsho la legs par bstsal tshe phran chos skyong rgya mtshos zin bris cung zad bgyis pa'i mthus rgyal ba'i bstan pa yun ring du rgyas par gyur cig  ) snogn med 'phrin las bzang po'i mnga' thang gis bstan 'gro yongs la dbang bsgyur skya bas mgon rjes brtse bas rjes bzung bshad sgrub dar rgyas gling gang der chos sbyin mi zad mdzod 'di spel sarba mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3804</vol>
<tib>rtags rigs thang ka'i brjed byang bkod pa</tib>

<col>@022a * rtags sbyor rigs pa'i spro tshul ni bdag blor bskal don yin mod kyang drin can bla ma'i bka' drin gyis brjed byang bkod pa 'di la'ang nor 'khrul phung po las gzhan ci de phyir 'di la nongs pa kun mkhas pa rnams la bzod par gsol skal mnyam thugs khrel ma mdzad cig 'dis mtshon dge bas bla ma khyod nyid dang 'bral med chos kyi bdud rtsis tshim byed nas shambha la ru khyod kyi rjes bzung nas zung 'jug go 'phang thob pa'i rgyur gyur cig  "</col>

<col>@009a ` sloo ka gnyis po 'di gra thang sor bzhag dus 'god nas par byang la gnang ba sprul zhing blta na sdug pa'i grong khyer nas rig pa'i ye shes gzugs gzhan yongs bsgyur ba'i srog 'tsho'i mchod sbyin 'gyed mkhas byang ngos pa gso rig dar rgyas byed pos bskul ba las  yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bdud rtsi'i bcud 'khrul med glegs bam za ma tog 'khyil ba slar yang yid bzhin 'dod pa 'jo ba'i par sde bzhi'i dpal po ta la nas spel ` 'di yang t'a la'i t'a chen gung gi shog gso rig 'dzin pa'i dge slong mi bskyod dang dge slong rgyal mtshan gnyis kyis bskul bskrun nas brko mkhan tho ga chi dang gsum ka yis dad pa'i sems kyis yid mthun 'gro ba kun dus gsum nyon mongs mtha' dag sel ba las mthar thug mngon mtho nges legs thob pa'i ched dmigs te phun tshogs gling du dpar du bkod "</col>

<p>1a-40a</p>
<col>@039b (ces rgyal ba'i gsung rab rab 'byams thams cad kyi gnad don yongs su rdzogs pa gcig tu bsdus pa byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i gdams pa zab mo nyams su len tshul gyi man ngag thun mong ma yin pa phan bde'i lam bzang zhes bya ba 'di ni rang gi rgyun gyi nyams len dang blo dman gzhan dag la'ang phan 'dod kyi bsam pas kun nas bslangs te pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa chen po'i rdo rje'i gsung byang chub bde lam nyid gzhir bzung ste de'i don gyi snying po rnams ma tshang ba med par bsdus pa la gal che ba'i dmigs skor 'ga' zhig gis kyang kha bskangs las dang po pas tshig gi sgo nas kyang bshar sbyang byed pa la brjod pa bde ched dngos gzhi'i 'khrid dmigs rnams kyang ngag 'don gyi tshul du bsgrigs rang gi bla ma dam pa'i man ngag phyag bzhes kyis kyang legs par brgyan nas 'jug @040a * pa shin tu bde bar bla ma dam pa du ma'i bka' drin gyis nye bar 'tsho ba'i btsun gzugs snyom las pa ^dam tshig rdo rjes gangs can bod kyi rdo rje gdan chen po lha ldan sprul pa'i gtsug lag khang gi nye 'dabs zhig tu nye bar sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni chos mthun snying gi slob bu dge slong blo bzang nam mkha' rdo rjes bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang 'jam mgon rgyal ba'i mdo sngags kyi bstan pa rin po che 'di nyid nam yang mi nub cing phyogs dus gnas skabs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas pa dang bstan 'dzin gyi skyes chen dam pa thams cad sku khams bzang zhing sku tshe ring ba dang rnam par dkar ba'i mdzad pa 'phrin las dar rgyas su 'byung ba dang 'gro ba kun kyang rgyal ba dgyes pa'i lam mchog 'di dag dang nam yang mi 'bral zhing zung 'jug rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang myur du thob pa'i rgyur gyur cig 'di'i mthus bdag kyang tshe rabs thams cad du theg mchog mgon gyis rjes bzung la ma bzang 'di thos bsam bsgom dang 'chad rtsong rtsom pa yis 'dzin skyong spel la mnga' dbang 'byor bar shog  dge legs 'phel</col>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3806</vol>

<col>@033b (bde mchog l'u ai ba'i lugs kyi mngon rtogs 'di la 'don cha 'dra min sna tshogs zhig 'dug pa las dben dgon du gsung chog ji ltar mdzad pa'i lugs bde chen gsal ba dang mthun pa 'dug pa ltar slar yang tshig phran tshegs mi 'dra ba rnams rtsa ba dang mthun par byas te btsun pa blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis ngag 'don khrigs chags su bsgrigs pa'o ) ye dharm'a he tu pra bha b'a he tunte sh'a nta th'u ga to hya ba dat te sh'a nytsa yo ni ro dha ae wam w'a d'i mah'a shra ma na: ` aom swasti phan bde'i 'byung gnas rgyal bstan yongs 'du'i ljon rab rgyas 'gro kun thar mchog 'bras bzang la spyod phyir bkra shis lhun grub chos grwa cher chos sbyin 'dzad med dal 'gro'i rgyun 'di spel sarba mangga lam "</col>

<item>

<col>@016a * ces grub pa'i mtha' rnam par bzhag pa 'khrul spong gdong lnga'i sgra dbyangs thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam bzang gsal ba'i rin chen sgron me zhes bya ba 'di ni snga mo nas mang thos gser khang chos rje gu na ma tis snyan tshig me tog gsar pas bskul zhing @016b dus phyis yongs kyi bshes gnyen chen po mkhas mchog lcang rwa slob dpon pa 'phags pa rin chen gyis khams chab mdo nas ja ga-yu kha thag gi rten bcas nas chab shog tshigs su bcad pa'i sgo nas stag lo'i dgag lan 'jam rgyas dgos zhes bskul ba'i bka' ngo dang khyad par rang blo goms sogs dam pa du ma'i zhabs rdul spyi bos len cing rje bla ma'i mdo sngags rnams la nges shes rnyed cing 'phags bod kyi grub mtha' gzhung dang khyad par sher sgron tshad chen rtsa 'grel dus 'khor sogs gzhung lugs chen po rnams la brten gsung rab dang grub mtha' rab 'byams smra ba 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i rdo rjes tshig nyung don gsal rgyas 'grel du dkar po zhes pa sa mo sbrul gyi lo cho 'phrul zla ba dkar phyogs rdzogs pa gsum pa'i nyin gangs can gyi bya rgod phung po gnyis pa dpa' po mkha' 'gro'i @017a * 'du gnas ri bo dge 'phel gyi gar 'dug theg mchog rol mtsho gsang sngags bde ba chen po'i pho brang nas sbyar ba la slar yang 'bri bsnon cung zad byas pa 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa phyogs dus thams cad du dar zhing rgyas par 'gyur cig  bkra shis pa dang dge legs 'phel gyur cig  "</col>

<p>1a-140a</p>
<col>@139b (ces zab pa dang rgya che ba'i lam gsal bar byed pa'i bstan bcos dbu ma la 'jug pa'i tshig don gyi 'grel bshad rgyal sras rgya mtsho'i 'jug ngogs zhes bya ba 'di ni chos sde chen po dga' ldan bkra shis tshe 'phel gling gi lam rim chos grwa'i grwa tshang brka shis chos 'khor gling gi dbu ma gsar ba'i 'dzin grwa thun mong nas gzhung 'di'i tsheg 'grel gsal zhing go bde ba 'dzin sbyor byed chog pa zhig 'phral du dgos tshul nan tan byung @140a * bar brten rgyal tshab thams cad mkhyen pa rgyal dbang dge 'dun grub pa kun mkhyen blo gros rin chen seng ge pan chen lung rigs rgya mtsho sogs kyis mdzad pa'i tshig 'grel dang bsdus don ci rigs pa'i ti ka chung 'ga' zhig mthong ba pas mkhas shing grub pa'i dbang phyug chen po sgom bde nam mkha'i rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i sbyor ti ka gnyid snga ma rnams kyi snying po 'dus shing gsal la go bde ba'i legs bshad rmad du byung bar snang yang da lta'i dpe rgyun spar bris gang la'ang chad lhag dang yig nor gong 'og 'khrugs pa sogs ma dag pa ches mang pos bslad 'dug par dpe dag pa zhig ma rnyed pas rje bla ma'i rnam bshad chen mo sogs dang bstun pa'i zhu dag gang spobs bgyis te tshig 'grel byings de nyid sor gnas la rtsa 'grel phan tshun do sprod bde ched gzhung tshig tshang ma dkyus su bkod cing yig tshogs mang du dogs te sa bcad snga phyi'i mtshams sbyar rgyas par gsungs pa rnams ci rigs par bsdus shing gal che ba'i kha skong phran tshegs kyis brgyan pa sogs skabs bstun gyi dbri bsnan cung zad byas te 'jug pa shin tu bde bar bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin gyis nye bar 'tsho ba'i rab 'byams smra ba d'irgh'a yu badzra k'irtis dge ldan dpal ri'i sgrub gnas yid dga' chos 'dzin du 'bad pas bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni dad brtson rnam dpyod ldan pa'i slob bu chos mdzad dge slong bstan 'dzin bzang po'o 'dis kyang 'jam mgon rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par byed nus par gyur cig dge legs 'phel</col>

<item>

<tib>shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan 'grel pa dang bcas pa'i rnam bshad snying po rgyan gyi dgongs 'grel rnam bshad tshig don rab gsal zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@171b ces shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan 'grel ba dang bcas pa'i rnam bshad snying po rgyan gyis dgongs 'grel rnam bshad tshig don rab gsal zhes bya ba 'di ni mkhyen rab kyi dbang phyug yongs 'dzin dam pa don yod dpal ldan pa'i zhal snga nas kyi bka' drin las bstan bcos rtsa 'grel la nges pa cung zad rnyed pa sh'akya'i dge slong yum den smra ba bsod nams grags pa dpal rnam dpyod mchog gis sdes me mo lug gi lo la dpal ldan 'bras spungs chos kyi sde chen po'i gzims khang du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni rigs byed rin chen mgon po'o 'dis kyang bstan rin po che dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  mangga lam gabta wantu  "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3811</vol>
<tib>bde mchog byin rlabs can gyi rgyud las rtsa dbu ma'i nang rlung bsgom tshul gyi zhal zhes dhu t'i'i gsang thig gi phreng ba</tib>
<p>1a-9a</p>
<col>@008b bde mchog dril bu lus @009a * dkyil gyi bskyed rdzogs kyi zhal shes snyan brgyud dh'u t'i'i gsang thig gi 'phreng ba 'di ni lam lam 'di'i rnal 'byor pa chen po lcang skya pa dang 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa yab sras kyi gsung ngag 'khrul med bla ma he ru ka chen po ngag dbang mchog ldan pas bdag rol pa'i rdo rje lcang skya sku skye la dgyes bzhin du bstsal ba'o mangga lam "</col>

<item>

<tib>zhugs pa dang gnas pa'i skyes bu chen po rnams kyi rnam par bzhag pa blo gsal bgrod pa'i them skas zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-46a</p>
<col>@045b zhugs pa dang gnas pa'i skyes bu chen po rnams kyi rnam par bzhag pa blo gsal bgrod pa'i them skas zhes bya ba 'di ni bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab thams cad la chos kyi spyan ldan chen po dpal ldan sa skya'i pandi ta red mda' ba gzhon nu blo gros kyi drin las chos mngon pa'i gzhung gong 'og thams cad kyi don la blo'i snang ba thob cing mdo sde dang 'dul ba'i sde snod dang gtan tshigs rig pa'i tshul la yang spobs pa dge bas rigs pa dang mi rigs pa rnam par dpyod par nus pa ^shar tsong kha pa blo bzang grags pas blo gsal don gnyer dang ldan pas 'gas bskul ba'i ngor chos grwa chen po bde ba can du sbyar ba'o aom swa sti thub bstan 'dzin mar skal bzang zhing pa'i tshogs phan bde'i lo tog longs su spyod pa'i phyir bkra shis ga-yas su 'khyil ba'i chos grwa las @046a * chos sbyin bdud rtsi'i gru char 'di phab bo sarba mangga lam "</col>

<item>

<vol>3815</vol>
<tib>bsam gzugs chen mo las mdor bsdus te bkod pa bsam gzugs kyi rnam bzhag legs bshad bum bzang zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-34b</p>
<col>@034b ces bsam gzugs kyi rnam bzhag mdor bsdus pa legs bshad bdud rtsi'i bum bzang zhes bya ba 'di ni yongs rdzogs bstan pa'i mnga' bdag mkhas shing grub pa'i dbang phyug kun mkhyen chen po 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa'i bsam gzugs kyi mtha' dpyod chen mo nyid mkhas pa rnams la rnam par dpyod pa'i sgo mtha' yas pa ster ba'i sngon med pa'i legs bshad rin po che lta bur 'dug kyang dus dbang gis blo gros dang rtsol ba zhan pa rnams kyi blo 'chun dka' bar brten mdor bsdus shig byung na rang dang skal mnyam rnams la phan par bsam ste mang du thos pa'i dge slong rigs pa smra ba dkon mchog 'jigs med dbang pos bsam gzugs chen mo'i tshig sna bsdungs te dgongs don dang mi 'gal bar mdor bsdus pa'i lugs su bkod par rtsod pa'i tshe gong 'og tu zhib cha 'don dgos pa'ang yod pas blo gros ma 'dzings pa rnams kyis go rigs ya bral du ma song bas brtag gzhig zhib mor mdzad na ring po mi thogs par rnam par dpyod pa'i padmo rgyas par 'gyur ro sarba mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3815</vol>
<tib>legs par bshad pa rin po che'i gter zhes bya ba'i bstan bcos</tib>
<p>1a-34a</p>
<col>@033a *  'tsho byed zas su sgro btags nas sman gyis nad chen gso ba ltar 'jig rten lugs kyi rjes 'brang nas bdag gis dam pa'i chos 'di bstan thos pa rgya mtsho'i gling nas rab 'khrungs shing blo gros klu yi dbang pos yongs bzung ba dpal ldan legs par bshad pa rin chen gter blo gsal blo yi bang mdzod dgang ba dang mkhas pa rnams kyis 'dod dgu bsgrub pa'i phyir sh'akya'i dge slong kun dga' rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos dga' ba'i yid kyis legs brtags nas @033b phyogs rnams gsal bar bya phyir 'di phye'o de las byung ba'i dge ba dri ma med bsil zer bya ba'i 'od ltar rab gsal bas skye bo snying gi mun pa phyir rabs te blo gsal blo yi kun mud rgyas gyur cig  shes bya kun la rab sbyangs pas thams cad mkhyen pa thob pa'i phyir des na bdag gis bstan 'chos 'di rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'thob phyir byas legs par bshad pa rin po che'i gter zhes bya ba'i bstan bcos yul byang phyogs kyi rgyud kha ba can gyi ljong byang chub kyi snying po rdo rje'i gdan las byang phyogs su dpag tshad brgya brgya bgrod pa'i gnas gtsang la stod dgrom pa dpal ldan sa skya'i gtsug lag khang na gnas pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis 'od zer gyis padmo'i ze'u 'bru cung zad kha phye bas  sgra dang tshad ma dang snyan ngags dang sdeb sbyor dang @034a * tshig gi rgyan dang bde bar gshegs pa'i gsungs rab kyi don yongs su grags pa phal mo che thos shing rtogs nas khong du chud cing 'dris par byas pas lung dang rig pa dang man ngag gi gnad phyin ci ma log par blo gros kyi snang ba thob pa 'chad pa dang brtsom pa dang sgom pa'i tshul la spobs pa dge ba can sh'akya'i dge slong rigs par smra ba kun dga' rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po zhes bya bas dpal sa skya'i dgon par legs par sbyar ba re shig rdzogs so bkra shis "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3815</vol>
<tib>legs par bshad pa shing gi bstan bcos lugs gnyis yal 'dab brgya ldan zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-6b</p>
<col>@006a * (ces legs par bshad pa shing gi bstan bcos lugs gnyis yal 'dab brgya ldan zhes bya ba 'di ni mthong snang sna tshogs kyis rkyen byas te btsun pa dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron mes chwa rgan sman chur phyin pa'i lam khar gang dran sug bris su bgyis pa'o ` 'di ni slob dpon rin chen 'byung gnas zhi bas @006b phur bu na re yi dam ches lnga len na re bud med 'jam zla ba na re zhu na bza' ser skya re srog chags brtse zhes bstan bcos bzhi tshig nyung bas don rgyas pa bsdu bar gsungs pa bzhin no</col>

<item>

<vol>3815</vol>
<tib>ming don brda sprod rnam lnga</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3815</vol>
<tib>rgya nag sa bcos</tib>
<p>1a-3b</p>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3816</vol>
<tib>dbus dang mtha'i rnam par 'byed pa'i bstan bcos kyi 'grel pa mi pham dgongs zab gsal ba'i legs bshad sgron me zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-179a</p>
<col>@177b ces dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa'i bstan gyi 'grel pa mi pham dgongs zab gsal ba'i legs bshad zhes bya ba 'di ni ^mdo sngags bshad sgrub kun gyi mnga' bdag mkhas grub chen po rje btsun bla ma dkon mchog rgyal mtshan pa'i zhal snga nas gsung 'phros kyi zhar la byams chos sde lnga'i gzhan gsum la tikka grags chen @178a * mang du 'dug kyang 'byed rnam gnyis la rang re'i mkhas pa dag gis 'grel pa byas pa ma mthong pas khyod kyis dbus mtha' rnam 'byed la 'grel pa zhig bri gos zhes bka' stsal pa dang du blangs te dbus mtha' rnam 'byed kyi bod 'grel gcig kyang ma mthong yang dbyig 'grel dang blo brtan 'grel bshad gnyis la zhib tu bltas sa sde dang theg bsdus kun btus mdzod rtsa 'grel rnam bshad rigs pa nyi shu pa sum cu pa phung po lnga'i rab byed sogs 'di'i skor gyi rgya gzhung phal mo che la yang mang du bltas zhing khyad par du rje bdag nyid chen po dang kun mkhyen 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i rdo rje yab sras kyi legs bshad dri ma med pa rnams la yang yang du 'dris par byas pa'i stobs kyis gzhung don la dpyod pa'i sgo cung zhig rnyed pas spobs pa skyes te le'u gnyis pa yan chad bsgrigs nas gzigs 'bul @178b zhus par legs bshad rmad du byung ba gcig yod par 'dug pas cis kyang mjug rdzogs par gyis zhes gsung gi me tog yang yang phebs par brten dam pa de nyid kyi zhabs brdul spyi bos len pa'i pa na chung rigs pa smra ba 'jam dbyangs bstan pa'i nyi ma zhes bgyi bas rang nyid byams pa'i gzhung la bag chags khyad par can 'jog pa'i smon lam gyi rten du dmigs bshad sgrub bstan pa'i 'byung gnas chos sde chen po dga' ldan bkra shis 'khyil gyi rang gshag thub gsung me tog 'khrigs pa'i dga' tshal du bris pa dza yantu smras pa rgyal ba kun gyi mkhyen brtse ma lus pa gcig tu bsdus pa 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i sde de yi lugs bzang spel la zla bral ba mkhas mchog smra ba'i nyi ma gzhon nu des mdo dang sngags kyi gnad don kun tshang ba'i legs bshad gtam tu 'gyed pa'i dka' 'bum gyi dpar 'di mi dbang badzra kirti dang the the'i ku ma ta sogs dad ldan 'gas lhag bsam mchog tu dkar bas bskrun pa'i mthus tshe rabs kun tu dal 'byor rten thob cing @179a * longs spyod mnga' thang dbyar mtsho ltar rgyas te dge ldan bstan la sri zhu lhur len shog mdor na deng nas byang chub snying po'i bar mtshan ldan bshes gnyen dam pas rjes bzung ste mdo dang sngags kyi chos tshul ma lus pa phyogs bcur spel la smon pa'i mthu grub pa 'jam dpal kun bzang la sogs rgyal sras kyi rlabs chen spyod pa tshul bzhin spyad pa'i mthus 'jig rten yangs pa'i rgyal khams thams cad du bde skyid rdzogs ldan dga' ston dar gyur cig  (ces pa 'di ni dad brtson rnam dpyod dang ldan pa t'a bla ma 'jam dbyangs rgyal mtshan dang 'jam dbyangs dpal ldan gnyis kyis bskul ngor ^sh'akya'i btsun gzugs skal bzang thub bstan dbang phyug gis sbyar ba'o aom swa sti bar 'di 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i mdo sngags kyi bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'i chos sde nas 'jam dbyangs bla ma'i gzigs pa rnam pa lnga'i gzi byin dpal ldan gtsug lag khang du bsgrubs 'di bris dge bas bdag gzhan 'gro ba kun sgrib sbyangs tshogs rdzogs kun mkhyen myur thob shog </col>
</item>

<vol>3817</vol>
<tib>bde gshegs 'dus pa'i dbang gi cho ga'i gter gzhung gi mjug tu lag len gsal byed kyi yig chung sbyar ba bzhugs so  * dpal rta mgrin bde gshegs 'dus pa'i dbang gi cho ga ni"</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3817</vol>
<tib>bla ma mgon po dbyer med la gsol ba 'debs pa dngos grub 'gugs pa'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-3b</p>
<col>@003b ces bla ma mgon po dbyer med la gsol ba 'debs pa dngos grub 'gugs pa'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba 'di ni rgyal khams pa lcang skya rol pa'i rdo rjes chu 'brug lo sgro zla ba la 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sprul pa'i gnas mchog ri bo rtse lnga'i dben gnas kun tu bde ba'i tshal du bla ma mgon po dbyer med kyi sgrub pa la zhugs pa'i thun 'tshams su thol byung du smras pa'i yi ge pa ni las smon dge bas 'brel ba'i nye gnas dge slong dge legs nam mkha' bgyis pa 'dis kyang skye ba kun tu bla ma mgon po dbyer med kyis rjes su 'dzin par gyur cig bkra shis dpal 'bar 'dzam gling rgyan gyur cig "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3817</vol>
<tib>chos skyong lcam sring 'khor bcas la mdos glud 'bul tshul</tib>

<col>@005b chos skyong lcam sring 'khor bcas la mdos glud 'bul tshul zhes pa 'di ni byang phyogs bstan pa'i gsal byed dza ya bandi ta'i sku gzhogs grwa tshang phan bde gsang sngags gling gi bstan srid kyi blo rig pa ldan pa dem chi aer ti ni tsas san bskal bzang dge legs dang jang jing chen po chin wang gi mnga' 'bangs gso rtsis kyi blo rig pas brgyan pa'i dem chi blo bzang ngag dbang zhes bya ba gnyis ka nan tan chen pos 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba'i ngor khral du ^byang phyogs bstan pa'i gsal byed dza ya pandi tas mtshan gzhan blo bzang snyan grags dge legs rnam rgyal dpal bzang po'i slob ma'i tha shal ba nyon mongs kyi bran du sgyur ba @006a * blo bzang dpal mgon zhes kyis pas sbyar ba 'di yis gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi 'gal rkyen bar gcod kun sel zhing rgyal ba'i go 'phang 'thob pa'i rgyu ru bngo bkra shis "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3817</vol>

<vol>3817</vol>
<tib>dgra lha'i spyan 'dren bskang bshags bstod bskul zhes bya bzhugs s+ho "</tib>

<col>@005b (ces dgra lha'i bskangs gso dkar po rgyal byed ces bya ba 'di ni rang gi mtshan grod dho'i zhes pa 'di lta bu zhig bgyis zhes sngon yod pa'i yid cha bskangs gso ma mthor pas gu ru'i gtor dgra lha'i dbang bstod zhig la gzhi byas skabs bkod pa 'di ni sngags 'chang smon lam lhun grub sbyar bas yi ge pa n sdig gnas skad tsis sogs su mal mkhas pas rnam dpyod can blo @006a * bzang dbang phyug gos ces dgra lha'i bskang gso 'di ni tha ji sman bya skyabs kyi yin la dgra lha'i 'di la bsten nas blo chos su so chos lam dung sod lam la bar chad med par mi phyugs 'phel zhing ces bsam pa'i don grub shog ) dgra lha gnyan po gnyan po 'khor dang bcas rnams kyis nyin gsum bya ra mtshan gsum mel tshe mdzod rkyab kyi rden pa mdun gyi mkhar ba dang phar 'gro'i skyil ma tshur 'ong bsu ba mdzod nad gdon chags che bar chad kun las skyobs bsam don lhun gyis 'grub pa'i 'phrin las mdzod "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3818</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi zhi ba'i sbyin sreg ji ltar bya ba'i cho ga'i ngag 'don blo gsar nyin byed dbang po</tib>
<p>1a-17a</p>
<col>@016b (zhes dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg ji ltar bya ba'i cho ga'i ngag 'don ci zhig bkod blo gsar nyin byed dbang po zhes bya ba 'di ni byang phyogs 'dzin ma'i yul du 'khrungs shing rgyal ba gnyis pa tsong kha pa chen po'i ring lugs 'dzin skyong spel ba la mi 'jigs pa'i spobs brnyes pa dpal ldan bla ma dam pa don gyi gnas lnga'i rig pa'i dza ya pande ta chen po'i dka' 'babs tha shal sh'akya'i btsun pa blo bzang bkra shis rnam rgyal gyis blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i gzhung nang du mi gsal ba ni gsal bar bsgrigs pa 'dis kyang zab mo rdo rje theg pa'i mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan phyogs dus gnas skabs thams cad du bsgreng bar gyur cig</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3818</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen yang gsang khros pa khrag 'thung lha dgu'i las byang thun mong ma yin pa 'jug bde don tshang rta mchog bzhad pa'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya</tib>
<p>1a-27a</p>
<col>@026b (ces byin rlabs kyi gter chen po bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa khrag 'thung lha dgu'i 'phrin las thun mongs ma yin pa 'jug bde gnad don kun tshang rta mchog bzhad pa'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba 'di ni 'di'i rgyud dang bsgrub gzhung gi dgongs pa gtso bor bzung ste rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pa'i mdzad pa'i las byang chub rgyas pa 'jigs med rdo rje sgra dbyangs kyi tshig tshogs che ba rnams cung zad bsdus shing yig skyon mngon pa rnams khungs thub par bcos med du me rung ba'i kha bskong 'ga' zhig dang bsgom don dang mthun pa'i 'khrugs sdebs cung zad bgyis te bsnyen sgrub sogs kyi skabs rgyas bsdus 'tsham zhing cha lag tshang ba'i tshul du bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin las phyogs 'di blo gros kyi snang ba la cung zad sbyangs pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i tha shal ba dam tshig rdo rje rang gzhan mang po @027a * la phan 'dod kyi bsam pas kun nas blangs te nye bar sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni lha mchog 'di nyid la mi phyed pa'i dad pa dang ldan zhing yi dam du byed pa'i dge slong blo bzang bzang bstan dar gyis bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan du gyur cing 'gro ba rnams tshe rabs thams cad du lhag pa'i lha mchog pad+ma dbang chen gyis rjes su bzung ste gzung rdo rje 'od dpag med kyi ngo bor myur du 'tshang rgya ba'i rgyur cig dge legs 'phel las gzhung 'di'i spros pa'i yan lag gi rin po ni zur rgyan 'god pa las shes par bya'o</col>

<item>

<vol>3818</vol>
<tib>dpal phyag na rdo rje gos sngon can gyi sgrub thabs dngos grub gter mdzod ces bya ba</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3818</vol>
<tib>dpal rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa'i 'phrin las dang 'brel bar skongs bshags bya tshul khyer bde rtsa gsum dgyes skongs dag byed bdud rtsi zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-17a</p>
<col>@016b (ces byin rlabs dang thugs rje'i gter chen bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma dbang chen rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa'i 'phrin las dang 'brel bar skongs bshags bya tshul gyi cho ga rtsa gsum dgyes skongs dag byed bdud rtsis zhes bya ba 'di ni spros kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen rdo rje 'dzin pa mkhyen rab mtshan can spro don gnyer can dga' zhig gis chog sgrigs 'khyer bde ba zhig cis kyang dgos zhes nan tan chen pos bskul zhing rang gzhan mang po'i lag len du phan par bsam nas skongs bshags kyi gzhung bka' gter tshad ldan ma dang mkhas shing grub pa'i bla ma dam pa rnams kyi phyag bzhes la brten nas rgyas sdus 'tsham zhing 'jug pa bde bar ^dge sbyong rig pa 'dzin dam tshig rdo rjes lha ldan sprul pa'i gtsug lag khang gi nye 'dabs zhig tu blo lha @017a * la tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i mchod pa dang bcas gsol ba btab ste legs par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dad brtson dam tshig dang ldan pa'i rdo rje'i slob bu dge slong blo bzang nam mkha' rdo rje'o des kyang bdag gi tshe 'di'i lus bskyed cing bskyangs pa'i drin can pha ma gnyis kyis gtso bya bas pa'i nam mkha'i mtha' khyab kyi mi rgan sems can thams cad myur ba nyer du sgrib gnyis byang shing tshogs gnyis rdzogs te kha sbyor yan lag bdun ldan zung 'jug rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang bde blag tu thob pa'i rgyur gyur cig</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3818</vol>
<tib>dpal rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa'i skongs bshags kyi cha lag tu nyer mkho ba drin med bshags rgyud las gsungs pa'i phyag tshal dang bshags pa'i rim pa 'ga' zhig bkol byang du byas pa</tib>
<p>1a-6a</p>
<col>@006a * (zhes pa 'di ni kho po dam tshig rdo rjes dpal rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa'i skongs bshags kyi cho ga'i cha lag tu drin med bshags pa'i rgyud las btus bris pa 'dis kyang rang gzhan thams cad kyi dam tshig nyams chag sogs sdig sgrib thams cad myur du byang zhing dag te dngos grub thams cad bde blag tu 'grub pa'i rgyur gyur cig </col>

<col>@018b (ces rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras kyi mnga' gsol 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes dpyod ldan rab 'byams smra ba skal ldan rgya mtshos yang yang bskul zhing rang gis kyang rgyun 'don la mkho bar bsam nas thams cad mkhyen pa rin po che'i gsung la gzhi byas te dge slong 'jam dpal gyis smras pa'i yi ge pa ni dge slong ngag dbang bzod pa'o</col>

<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3850</vol>
<tib>dpal ldan sa gsum ma bzhugs s+ho "</tib>
<p>1a-10a</p>
<col>@010a * theg chen lam gyi gzhung shing byang chub sems yang dag lta ba'i gnad dang rim gnyis la 'khrul med nges pa rnyed nas brtson pa yis khyod gsung sgrub pa snying po dpyod par shog  spe snod gsum dang rgyud sde rnam pa bzhi gdams pa'i mchog tu gzigs pa'i bshad sgrub kyis thub bstan phyogs dus kun du rgyas mdzad pa'i blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyi bkra shis shog  mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3852</vol>
<tib>bla ma yi dam chos bsrung gang mos kyi sgo nas bzlog bsgyur bya tshul mi mthun rgyal ba'i mtshan ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so  "</tib>
<p>1a-10a</p>
<col>@009b zhes bla ma yi dam chos bsrung gang mos kyi sgo nas bzlog bsgyur bgyed tshul mi mthun rgyal ba'i @010a * mtshan ma zhes bya ba 'di ni bya sla tshigs chung don che bas rang gzhan la phan 'dod kyi bsams pas kun nas brlangs te ke'u tshang sprul ming pas rje btsun shes rab seng ge'i mdzad pa'i bzlog bsgyur gyi dpe chas gzhir byas la bla ma dam pa'i man ngag gis brgyan nas sbyar ba 'di la 'brel med don gzhan gis nongs pa ci mchis pa thams cad kyi dran dbang rnams kyis gzigs nas bzod par gsol zhing zhus dag par stsol zhig legs cha cung zad yod na bstan pa dang 'gro ba mang po phan thogs pa'i thabs su gyur cig  bkra shis par gyur cig  dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3852</vol>
<tib>mkhan chen chos kyi rgyal po'i gsung 'bum las brgya bzhi cho ga bdud las rnam rgyal zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-16a</p>
<col>@016a *  (zhes brgya bzhi cho ga bdud las rnam rgyal zhes bgyi ba 'di ni rang gi slob ma dge slong blo bzang rab brtan sogs don gnyer can mang pos rje dge 'dun rgya mtsho'i mdzad pa'i cho ga gzhir bzhag la bskyed chog mchod phreng sogs rgyas pa gcig nges par dgos zhes nan gyis bskul ba'i ngo ma chag par de nyid gzhir byas pan chen rdo rje 'chang chen pos mdzad pas zur brgyan nas snga rabs pa mang po'i phyag len khungs btsun pa 'ga' bsnan te ^ pan chen rdo rje 'chang phyogs thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba de nyid kyi zhabs rdul spyi bos len pa'i lha'i btsun pa ^ blo bzang bstan 'dzin rgyal mtshan zhes bgyi bas rab byung nyi ma aangkira'i lo yi zla ba bcu gcig pa'i tshe bco lnga la bgyis pa'i yi ge pa ni blo ldan dge slong blo bzang rab brtan no 'dis kyang 'gro ba thams cad bdud bzhi'i ga-yul las rgyal zhing rnam 'dren sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi go 'phang myur du thob par gyur cig  dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3852</vol>
<tib>phyag na rdo rje drag po gsum bsgril gyi bsgrub thabs byabs srung dang bcas rdo rje lhun po brtsegs pa zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-10b</p>
<col>@010b (ces phyag na rdo rje drag po gsum bsgrib gyi khrus kyi cho ga rdo rje lhun po brtsegs pa zhes bya ba 'di ni byabs khrus kyi cho ga mang po la bltos na sems can thams cad la phan pa'i bsam pa rnam dag gis kun nas slang nas dge slong su ma ti pa la da sha ming can gyis bsgrigs pa'o des kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas pa dang mar gyur sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang thob par gyur cig  bkra shis par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>

<vol>3852</vol>
<tib>rdo rje mkha' lding nag po' mdun bskyed bskang gso'i rim pa dang khyung nag gi sgo nas byabs khrus dang 'brel ba'i bzlog bsgyur gdon bgegs srog spu gri</tib>
<p>1a-4b</p>
<col>@004b (ces rdo rje mkha' lding nag po'i mdun bskyed bskang gsol gyi rim pa  'di ni dgos ched du babs tshe aa ha'i bla ma gsung gis bskul ba la brten nas chas pa shri ge thu bla ma'i thol byung du bris pa dza yantu bkra shis par gyur cig </col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>

<tib>byang chub lam gyi sgron ma</tib>

<col>@012a * byang chub lam gyi sgron ma slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so rgya gar gyi mkhan po d'i bam k'a ra shr'i dzny'a na dang bod kyi lo tstsha dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o (byang chub lam gyi sgron ma 'di cha har dad ldan sgron ma yis dpar du bskrun pa'i rnam dkar gzis 'gro rgyud mun tshogs myur 'joms shog 'di'ang shes rab rgyas kyis bris</col>
</item>

<tib>dam can rdor legs kyi mngon rtogs bskang bshags bstod pa dang bcas pa</tib>
<p>1a-15a</p>
<col>@014b (ces pa 'di ni bstan pa'i sgron me 'gro ba'i mgon po gcig pu byams mgon gyi sprul sku ngag dbang byams pa lhun grub kyis rgyal po kun 'dus dngos grub bang mdzod ces bya ba mdzad pa las dam can rdor legs kyi mchod gtor gsol kha nye bar mkho ba'i phyir zur du bkod pa yin bar skabs kyi lhan thabs @015a * chung du bsnon pa ni tshul khrims ming can gyis bgyis pa'i dge ba sems can thams cad kyi don du bsngo'o  ` swa sti rin chen za ma tog sogs par bskrun mthus 'gro kun bstan la gus shing las 'bras la yid ches dge bcu la spyod byams brtses mthun bshad sgrub bstan pa rdzogs ldan bzhin dar zhing 'khor lo gsum ldan bshes gnyen tshul bzhin bsten khrims gtsang dge 'dun tshogs kyis sa steng gang bla ma'i byin rlabs chos bsrung 'phrin las dang chos dbyings bden mthus re 'bras myur 'grub shog ces 'jigs byed lha bcu gsum ma'i sgrub thabs dang chos skyong so so'i gtor chog zor mdos tshes gtor spyi stabs kyi cho ga rnams han khu khe'i dgon pa dga' ldan dar rgyas gling du legs par bsgrubs pa'o</col>

<col>@005a * (ces de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa'i jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sh'akya thub pa la bstod pa byin rlabs nyer 'jug ces bya ba 'di ni sde snod 'dzin pa 'jam dpal rgya mtsho zhes bya ba rang gi slob mas gsol ba btab pa'i don du mang du thos pa'i rgyal khams pa blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyis gangs can khrod kyi gangs ri'i dbang po 'o de gung rgyal gyi lha zhol du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni sde snod 'dzin pa bha dra p'a la'o</col>

<tib>'dul bya rgya mtsho'i snying poa bzhugs "</tib>

</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3887</vol>
<tib>sgrol ma'i mandal bzhi pa'i cho ga phan bde'i ster</tib>
<p>1a-11b</p>
<col>@010b (ces rje btsun 'phags ma @011a * sgrol mar thugs rje bskul ba'i cho ga brjod bya'i don ma lus par tshad zhid mdor bsdus tshogs 'don du byas chog zhig dgos zhes rdo rje slob dpon rab 'byams pa tshul khrims 'od zer byang 'dren rab 'byams pa rgya mtsho dger bskos rab 'byams pa thub bstan phyogs glang bcas nas bskul ma byung ba ltar dam pa gong ma rnams kyi phyag srol nyams pa med par rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum gyi tshul du rgyal sras bskal bzang thub bstan 'jigs med bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis kun la phan pa'i bsam pas dad du blangs ste bris pa'i yi ge pa ni rab brtan ming can gyis bgyis pa'o) bkra shis dge'o blo bzang @011b grags bstan der brten 'gro kun bde bde skyid byed po bstan 'dzin 'phel rgyas zhing zhing gi mthu las gang bsam chos dpal 'bar 'bar la rdo rje lta bur brtan gyur cig  (ces gsung 'bum chi blo bzang gis dang blang kyis kho rang gi khag bstar te bzhengs pa'i bar byang du ^rje btsun dam pa'i ming 'dzin gyis bris pa dge</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3887</vol>
<tib>zhags kha khram kha la sogs pa'i skeg bsal ba'i me long ye shes ral gri zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-12b</p>
<col>@012a * (ces pa 'di ni ael teng dpon po dpal mchog rdo rje zhes bya bas rang gi dpe cha rling la lar @012b byin rlabs dang dgug gzhug med 'ga' zhig la gshegs gsol dang bzlog emd pa'i phyir 'di dag bsgrigs shig zhes bskul ba'i ga-yar khral ba la nyon mongs gyi bran ga-yog la 'khol ba'i byang rgyal du song ba'i shri ya au da pushta zhes bya bas bsgrigs pa'i dge ba 'di yis 'gro ba'i don 'grub par gyur cig</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3887</vol>
<tib>` chos skyong spyi'i gtor cho ga la mkho man ngag</tib>
<p>1a-7b</p>
<col>@007a * zhes pa 'di ni khal kha'i dpal ldan 'bras bungs bkra shis tshe 'phel gling @007b gi grwa pa rnams phan sems kyis bla ma gong ma rnams kyi man ngag las byung ba ltar bzhad rdor ming can gyis sa pho spre'u lo smin drug zla'i nyer dgu la bsgrig pa'i yi ge pa ni bsod nams dbang phyug gis bgyis pas bstan dang 'gro ba thams cad phan par gyur cig </col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3894</vol>
<tib>zab lam bla ma'i rnal 'byor dang 'brel bar gshin po'i sbyang chog lag tu len tshul mdor bsdus su bkod pa gzhan phan sgron me zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-26a</p>
<col>@025b ces zab lam bla ma'i rnal 'byor dang 'brel bar gshin po'i sbyar ba'i chog lag tu len tshul mdor bsdus su bkod pa gzhan phan sgron me zhes bya ba 'di ni dge bshes gnyen don gnyer can 'ga' zhig gis kyang nan tan du bskul zhing rang gzhan mang po la'ang phan par bsam ste snyan rgyud kyi gdams pa rgya mtsho'i mnga' bdag ^rdo rje 'chang rje btsun blo bzang chos kyi nyi ma dpal @026a * bzang pos mdzad pa'i lam rim sngon 'gro bla ma'i rnal 'byor gyi zhal shes kun mkhyen lam bzang dang 'khrid kyi gsung bshad kyi dgongs don gzhir bzhag mkhas grub dam pa so sos mdzad pa'i sbyang chog du ma la gzhigs nas gnad tshang don 'dus bklag chog gi tshul du ^btsun gzugs snyoms las pa ^dam tshig rdo rjes sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang 'gro ba mang po la phan thogs par gyur cig  bkra shis dge legs 'phel gyur cig  "</col>
</item>

<vol>3899</vol>
<tib>brgyad stong don bsdus</tib>

<col>@010b 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma bsdus pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so kha che'i pandi ta ti la ka ka la sha dang lotstsha ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o legs ga-yung shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i chu gter che las skyes gyur cing nyer zhi'i lam la 'god byed yang dag lta ba'i chu khur ci yang 'dzin lam dang lam min rnam 'byed mngon par rtogs pa'i glog 'od kyis mtho ba'i rgyal yum snying po zab mo'i chu 'dzin phyogs kyi glang pos mdzad gzhung 'di @011a * gangs ri'i khord kyi kun mkhyen gnyis pa rong ston chen mo'i bka' lung gi rig byed mkhas pa brtson 'grus bzang pos pha ma'i don du par du sgrubs rab dkar dge ba ku mu da dkar dang ston zla ba'i phreng ba lta bu yis ma lus 'gro ba rnams mkha'i mtha' klas kun mkhyen sa la rig gyur cig zhus dag pa ni dpal rtse thang gi btsun pa nam mkha' bkra shis kyis bgyis pa'o aom hr'i: shru ti smri ti bi dza ye sw'a h'a pradzny'a pa ra mit'a ya sarba du rga ti shodh'a ya ra dz'a ya sw'a h'a shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i sngags so "</col>

<col>@022a * ces rje btsun sgrol ma la mandal bzhi mchod kyi sgo nas gsol ba gtab tshul gyi chog gsal bar bkod pa 'dod don kun 'grub ces bya ba 'di ni rang gzhan gyi don du sgrol chog yang yang lag tu bstar skabs chog sgrigs 'khyer bde ba zhig dgos @022b tshul khyung bar brten mchims kyi rtsa chig pa zhir bzhag snar thang ba'i man ngag brgya rtsar ma 'dus pa'i bka' gdams gong ma'i yig rnying khungs thub gzhan dga' zhig las kyang lag len gyi zhib cha cung zad blangs shing dam pa so so'i mdzad pa'i chog sgrigs du ma la yang gzhig nas 'jug bde bklags chog pa'i tshul du mkhas shing grub pa'i bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin lo nas 'tshol ba'i rgyal khams pa ^dam tshig rdo rjes dpal ri dgon gyi nye 'dabs dben gnas @023a * su rgyal zla ba'i tshes brgyad kyi nyin sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni rnam dpyod yangs pa'i dge bshes dge slong d'i rgh'a yu badzra gyis bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang bstan 'gro yongs la phan thogs par 'gyur cig  bkra shis pa dang dge legs 'phel dge'o "</col>

<col>@013b (zhes manydzu shr'i'i gsol dpon bsod nams bkra shis kyis bskul ba'i sgrol ma'i mandal bzhi pa'i cho ga dngos gzhi la mgor bla brgyud gsol 'debs dang bar du bla ma dang rje btsun ma dbyer med la gsol ba 'debs mjug tu smon lam shis brjod dang bcas pa zhig dgos pa zhes rgyal chen rtse ba dge slong phun tshogs @014a * chos 'phel gyis bskul ba ltar sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes kyis sbyar ba dge legs 'phel bar gyur cig 'di ltar bka' rtsom snga phyi phyogs bsgrigs dang 'dod gsol smon tshig gis zung rgyan sogs kyi tshig don la dag ma dag sogs slar yang dpyad pa dgos tshul byung bar bdag nyid kyis legs par bklags te yig 'khrul nor skyon sogs ngor te zhus dag par bgyis pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>

<vol>3962</vol>

<col>@009b (zhes lha lnga'i mchod 'phrin bsod nams dpal bskyed 'di ni chos dbang rin po che'i gter byon la gzhi byas dge bshes ? mngon shes dbang phyug 'bar gyi gter byon las byang kha bskang lha lnga ngos 'dzin lugs mthun mi mthun sna tshogs snang ba tshe bdag lcags sdigs dang lcags 'dra yang bzlog me'i spu gri man nag srid pa'i gter khyim sogs nas kyang zhib mod dpyad de grong smad sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i lha gsol gyi ngag 'don du za hor sngags smyon gyis sa rta hor zla brgyad pa'i yar tshes la sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni gnas brtan 'jam dbyangs grags pa'o sarba mangga lam</col>

<item>

<tib>dpal rdo rje ‘jigs byed dpa’ po gcig pa’i bsgrub thabs bla rgyud smon lam shis brjod dang bcas pa</tib>

<col>@013b (ces rdo rje ‘jigs byed bdud las rnam rgyal las kyi smon lam gyi shis brjod thar par ‘dren pa’i shing rta zhes bya ba ‘di ni rang gi gam du gnas pa’i sku gzhogsgrwa tshang dang sman bla grwa tshang thun mong pa’i slob dpon rin chen bkra shis rnam rgyal las dpal bzang po @014a * rgyan du zhal ‘don las cho ga’i lag tshang ba las dgongs shing lhag par tshe ‘das dge bsnyen mas tshe ring dpal mo’i mar ‘dren phyi phyir du dam gyi nas ‘di lta bu zhig dgos shis bka’ nan che ba phebs pa ltar lam ‘di las mos pa’i blo chan sku skye rab ‘byams smra ba’i blo bzang ‘phrin las ming gzhan rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen pa chen po’i bka’ lung gis dza ya pandi tas hu thug thu zhes ‘bod pas ‘phags pa’i yul bha wa zhes ‘bod cing rgya nag gi yul grur bya klu’i zhes grags pa dngos po zhes pa shing pho khyi lo’i hor zla dang po phyi ma’i bcu dgu las sbyar ba ‘dis kyang rdo rje theg pa’i bstan pa rin chen dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig sarba mangga lam</col>

<item>

<tib>rje btsun ma 'phags ma seng ldeng nags sgrol gyi sgo nas 'chi ba bslu'i cho ga bya tshul bdud rtsi bum bzang zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-12a</p>
<col>@011b (zhes rje btsun ma 'phags ma seng ldeng nags sgrol gyi sgo nas 'chi ba bslu'i cho ga bya tshul bdud rtsi bum bzang zhes bya ba 'di ni snga mo nas rtsom 'dod yid pa'i sreng nas dad brtson dang rnam dpyod @012a * phun tshogs pa'i da'i ching dge bskos dge slong 'jam dbyangs shes rab kyis 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes lhas ? te bskul ba la brten nas rje btsun sgrol ma'i byin rlabs nas gsung gi gnang ba thob pa'i dge slong chos kyi ?? ming gzhan skal bzang gar gyi dbang po'i mdzad pa'i rje btsun sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs 'phrin las gnad ldan tsinta ma nis gzhir byas nas dam pa gong ma'i man ngag gis brgyan ste btsun gzugs kun rdor ming cang yis nyi sgrol byed ces pa shing pho'i spre lo'i sa ga zla'i yar ngo'i tshes bcu'i nyin bden chen rab rgyas gling du sug bris su bgyis pa 'dis kyang bstan pa dang sems cad thams cad la phan thogs par gyur cig tshul 'dir 'bad las byung ba'i dge ba 'dis bdag sogs 'gro kun deng nas byung bar bshes gnyen rje btsun sgrol ma las rjes bzung ste rang gzhan don gnyis 'grub pa'i rgyu ru bsngo bkra shis dpal 'bar 'dzam gling brgyan 'grub shog dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3982</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin dang mgon po sprag sgrub kyi gtor bzlog bya tshul gyi yig chung rin chen 'phrul gyi lde mig ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-6a</p>
<col>@005b ces khro bo'i rgyal po dpal rta mchog rol pa dang myur mdzad ye shes kyi mgon po sprag sgrub kyi sgo nas gtor bzlog bya tshul gyi yig chung 'phrul gyi lde mig ces bya ba 'di ni mdo smad kyi bshad gra kun gyi dbus na rgyal mtshan gyi hog lhar mngon par 'phags pa'i chos sde chen po bkra shis 'khyil gyi gso rigs gra tshang du bstan pa bstan 'dzin dang bcas pa'i rim gror dmigs te lo re bzhin rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi gtor bzlog phyag len rgyun chags su mdzad rgyun rdo rje'i 'phrul skyogs su bka' sdod beg tse dang sprag pa 'brel mi mtshungs pa ga la yin rung rang bstan gyi srung ma'i gtso bo mgon po dang sprag sgrub byed tshul zhig byung na legs pa 'dug pas ci'i kyang yi ger bkod pa dgos @006a * zhes gra tshang de kha'i slob dpon nang don tha snyad rigs pa mtha' dag la nang byan chud pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen blo bzang 'jigs med kyis yang yang nan tan du bskul ba bzhin du ku s'a li dharma badzra gyis skyed tshal yid dga' chos 'phel du shar mar spel ba'i yi ge pa ni aor du su dge slong blo bzang dge 'phel lo "</col>
</item>

<item>

<vol>3982</vol>
<tib>skyabs 'gro'i bshad pa shin tu bsdus pa zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>5b-7b</p>
<col>@007a * zhes pa 'di ni sku skye rin po che chos kyi grags pa nyi mas bskul ba'i ngor sog yul gyi las dang po pa rnams la'ang phan par bsams te ^blo bzang bstan 'dzin rgyal mtshan gyis 'phral du bgyis pa la nor ba dang log par @007b bshad pa sogs byung ba rnams dkon mchog rin po che rnam pa gsum gyis bdag la sgrib par mi 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol "</col>

<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3985</vol>
<tib>lo glud du grags pa'i lo rim sde brgyad spyi mchod char 'bebs sang ser bsrung ba dang bcas pa bzhugs so  * lo glud du grags pa'i lo rim sde brgyad spyi mchod ni"</tib>
<p>1a-7b</p>
<col>@007b (ces lo glud du grags pa'i lo rim du dmigs nas 'jig rten pa'i sde brgyad chen po spyi la dmigs nas mchod tshul 'di ni ga-yo sa'i sngags 'chang tshe dbang rab brtan sogs gzhan 'ga' zhig gis bskul ba'i gtor sh'akya'i btsun pa bshad sgrub ming can gyis dpe snga ma gsum tsam mthong yang ma 'brel ba dang ma tshang ba che 'dug pas dpal mgon 'di ngag mdo sngags kyi phyogs gnyis ka nas 'byung zhing grags che bar ma zad gzhan ban bon po rnams kyi kyang bkur zhing mchod 'dug pas khyad che bar bsams nas tso ni'i dgon nyid spyir ba ste bar gyi yi ge pa ni t'a yi la lung blo bzang don grub po mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3985</vol>
<tib>myur mdzad ye shes kyi mgon po la rten pa'i blo bur las bcol gyis gtor bzlog byed tshul</tib>
<p>1b-7a</p>
<col>@007a * ces myur mdzad ye shes kyi mgon po la rten pa'i blo bur las bcol gyis gtor bzlog byed tshul 'di yang khal kha ga-yon ru'i mer rgan dbang gi shog lugs gnyis kyi mkhyen dpyod mchog tu yangs pa'i tho'ing dge slong bsod nams rdo rjes 'di lta bu zhig cis kyang bgyis shig pa'i bskul ngo gyen ldog mi nus par dharma swa mi'i ming gis sgro btags pa'i gyi na ba pa tu siddhis de skor gyi gzhung dang mi 'gal bar dam pa'i man ngag gis brgyan te bris pa lags par yid ches pa'i gnas su bzung shig  'dis kyang bstan 'gro'i mtha' dag mi mthun ga-yul las rnam par rgyal nas dkar po'i ru mtshon srid rtser bsgreng bar gyur cig  "</col>
</item>

<col>@017a * (rgyal chen sku lnga la brten nas bzlog gyur byed tshul gnam lcags 'khor lo dngos grub gter mdzod ces bya ba 'di ni rigs rus dpal gyis mngon par mtho zhing lugs gnyis la mkhyen pa'i spyan rgyal la ^aer te ni spi zhi ril thu dza sag thu hang gi bkas bskul ba la brten nas rnam ga-yeng gi khol bar phyogs med 'byams pa nyon bran du gyur ba ^no mon hang mi bskyod rdo rjes ^dge ldan bshad sgrub gling gi kun gzigs rin chen pho brang du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni lha bzo dang bod kyi yi ge dang chos la blo mig rgyas pa dge slong mgron gnyer aer khe zhi dar blo bzang phun tshogs so 'dis kyang rgyal ba gnyis pa'i bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig </col>

<item>

<vol>3986</vol>
<tib>dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs za ma tog ngag 'don bya tshul go bde bar bsgrigs pa 'jam dpal dgongs rgyan zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-46a</p>
<col>@046a * (zhes rje bdag nyid chen pos mdzad pa'i dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs rin po che'i za ma tog ngag 'don bya tshul go bde bar bsgrigs pa 'jam dpal dgongs rgyan zhes bya ba 'di ni snga sor sgrub thabs kyi ngag 'don phun tshogs gling gi spar ma sogs ci rigs snang bar za ma tog dang mthun mi mthun sna tshogs 'dug pas rdo rje 'jigs byed lha bcu gsum ma'i sgrub thabs bsgom bzlas tshul bzhin du byed pa lta zhog ngag 'don tsam yang za ma tog dang mthun par byas na phan yon dang byin rlabs che bar bsams nas rang nyid kyis bag chags 'jog pa dang skal mnyam gzhan la'ang phan 'dod kyi bsam pas rje bdag nyid chen po'i sras kyi thu bo 'dul 'dzin pa sogs kyis mdzad pa'i lhan thabs sogs mkhas grub dam pa'i man ngag las 'byung ba ltar yul byang phyogs kyi mthar skyes pa'i ban chung gyi na pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan dpal bzang po zhes bgyi bas 'jam dbyangs gong ma chen po'i rgyal khang be'i cing gi bod chos lha khang du grags par bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni sdom brtson sde snod 'dzin pa'i rab 'byams smra ba blo bzang nyi ma'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba blo bzang grags pa'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus gnas skabs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig </col>

<item>

<col>@051b (de yang rkang 'bam gyi bcos thabs gzhung du mi rgyas pas man ngag kho bos dgong shing gces bsdus phan bde'i snying po'i cha lag tu @052a * dka' med du yod pa dang aol chos 'phel gyis yang yang bskul ba la brten nas 'bam bcos mang po'i kha bsdus re myong ba'i gnang gung sgrigs pa 'di nyid dpal 'bri gung pa dharma k'irtis'i bka' 'bangs dkon mchog 'gro phan dbang po zhes sam 'tsho byed tshe dbang brtan pas sku zhang snye mo pa'i phro bde legs gling du zin bris bgyis pas slar bzang ri shar gyi gdan sa bsod nams dbang gi grogs pa'i thugs bzhes ltar 'cham bus go der bgyis pa'i dge bas rang gzhan thams cad gnas skabs dang mthar thug pa'i brug rdu'i sdug bsngal las grol bar gyur cig  bkra shis zhus dag lan gcig song yang bla 'khel rang ma byung bas slad kyi mkhas pa rnams kyis bzo bcos mdzad dgos yod</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3988</vol>
<tib>'jam mgon bla ma'i gsol 'debs dge ba rdzogs byang du bsngo ba'i gnad tshang ba bla ma'i rnal 'byor</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col>@003a * (ces khal kha dwa las cang cun ba'i le rnam rgyal rdo rjes rang nyid kyi chos gnas 'dus spyis lo lo bzhin dmigs brtse ma la brten pa'i bum sgrub mdzad skabs ^'jam mgon bla ma'i gsol 'debs dge ba rdzogs byang du bsngo ba'i gnad tshang pa 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes 'phrin yig gi lam nas bskul ba ltar ^sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang dpal ldan bstan pa'i nyi ma phyogs las rnam rgyal dpal bzang pos gzims chung bka' gdams pho brang du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni gam bcar brtswa gnyer rdze drung blo bzang dpal 'byor ro</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3988</vol>
<tib>'jam mgon bla ma'i gsol 'debs dge ba rdzogs byang du bsngo ba'i gnad tshang ba bla ma'i rnal 'byor</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3988</vol>
<tib>rje bla ma'i phyag mchod kyi cho ga dang 'brel ba'i stong mchod 'bul tshul</tib>
<p>1a-2a</p>
<col>@002a * (zhes pa 'di ni dpyod ldan mang du thos pa'i rab 'byams pa ngag dbang shes rab kyis kho bos sbyar ba'i phyag mchod kyi cho ga dang 'brel te stong mchod 'bul tshul zhig dgos zhes bskul ba'i ngor ^sprang btsun ngag dbang dpal ldan gyis bris pa 'dis kyang 'gro kun 'jam mgon bla ma'i rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur cig  sarba mangga lam</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3988</vol>
<tib>rje btsun bla ma chos kyi rgyal po tsong kha pa chen po'i yon tan la bstod pa dad pa'i rol mtsho zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-4a</p>
<col>@004a * (rgyal ba thams cad kyi mkhyen brtse gcig tu bsdus pa'i ngo bo rje btsun bla ma chos kyi rgyal po tsong kha pa chen po'i yon tan rmad du byung ba la mdor bsdus par bstod pa'i rab tu byed pa dad pa'i rol mtsho zhes bya ba 'di ni yon tan rin po che dum ma'i rgyan gyis nye bar mdzes shing 'gro ba du ma'i 'dren par gyur ba'i shar rgyal mo rong pa bla ma tsha go ba dpal ldan chos kyi grags pa'i gsung gis bskul nas mang du thos pa'i btsun pa dge legs dpal bzang pos lhan bye gling gi gtsug lag khang du sbyar ba'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3988</vol>

<item>

<vol>3988</vol>
<tib>rta bdag chen po gnod sbyin ku be ra'i bslab srin bsam pa lhun grub ces bya ba</tib>

<col>@010a * (tshul 'di ni khu re chen mo'i mkhan po no mong han gyi ming 'dzin wa g'indra pa tu siddhis bsdebs pa yi ge pa ni gzhung lugs lta ba'i mig can dge slong pradzny'a sa ga ra'o 'dis kyang gnod sbyin dbang pos 'phrin las ga-yel med du sgrubs par gyur cig mangga lam</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3988</vol>
<tib>skyabs 'gro'i khrid yig</tib>
<p>1a-13a</p>
<col>@013a * (ces pa 'di ni rigs rus stobs 'byor dad 'dun brtson pa phun sum tshogs pa'i phar chin skul bzang ae phu dbang gis skyabs 'gro'i dmigs rim rgyas shing go bde ba cig gyis zhes bskul ba ltar ban rgan gyi na ba ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan dpal bzang pos bod chos lha khang du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni sdom brtson rnam dpyod yangs pa'i dge slong dpal bzang ngo aom swa sti thub bstan dar zhing de 'dzin zhabs brtan ched par 'di bzhengs pas rgyu sbyor gyis gtsos pa'i 'gro kun dkon mchog gsum dang mi 'bral zhing bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub myur thob shog ces skyabs khrid kyi par 'di nyid aerte ni phyag mdzod pa dam chos rab rgyas kyis bzhengs pa'i par byang du 'du gsum pa ^blo bzang thub bstan dbang phyug 'jigs med rgya mtshos bris sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3989</vol>
<tib>byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i zab 'khrid byang chub bde lam gyi dmigs rnam snying por dril te nyams su len tshul phan bde'i lam bzang zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-42a</p>
<col>@041a * ces rgyal ba'i gsung rab rab 'byams thams cad kyi gnad don yongs su rdzogs pa gcig tu bsdus pa byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i gdams zab mo nyams su len tshul gyi man ngag thun mong ma yin pa phan bde'i lam bzang zhes bya ba 'di ni rang gi rgyun gyi nyams len dang blo dman gzhan dag la'ang phan 'dod kyi bsam pas kun nas bslangs te pan chen thams @041b cad mkhyen pa chen po'i rdo rje'i gsung byang chub bde lam nyid gzhir bzung ste de'i don gyi snying po rnams ma tshang ba med par bsdus pa la gal che ba'i dmigs skor 'ga' zhig gis kyang kha bskangs las dang pos tshig gi sgo nas kyang bshar sbyang byed pa la brjod pa bde ched dngos gzhi'i 'khrid dmigs rnams kyang ngag 'don gyi tshul du bsgrigs rang gi bla ma dam pa'i man ngag phyag bzhes kyis kyang legs par brgyan nas 'jug pa shin tu bde bar bla ma dam pa du ma'i bka' drin gyis nye bar 'tsho ba'i gtsun gzugs snyom las pa ^dam tshig rdo rjes gangs can bod kyi rdo rje gdan chen po lha ldan sprul pa'i gtsug lag khang gi nye 'dabs zhig tu nye bar sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni chos mthun snying gi slob bu dge slong blo bzang nam mkha' rdo rjes bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang 'jam mgon rgyal ba'i mdo sngags kyi bstan pa rin po che 'di nyid nam yang mi nub cing phyogs dus gnas skabs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas pa dang bstan 'dzin gyi skyes chen dam pa thams cad sku khams bzang zhing sku tshe ring ba dang rnam par dkar ba'i mdzad pa 'phrin las dar rgyas su @042a * 'byung ba dang 'gro ba kun kyang rgyal ba dgyes pa'i lam mchog 'di dag dang nam yang mi 'bral zhing zung 'jug rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang myur du thos pa'i rgyur gyur cig 'di'i mthus bdag kyang tshe rabs thams cad du theg mchog mgon gyis rjes bzung la ma bzang 'di thos bsam bsgom dang 'chad rtsod rtsom pa yis 'dzin skyong spel la mnga' dbang 'byor bar shog  bkra shis pa dang dge legs 'phel mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3989</vol>
<tib>byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i zab 'khrid mdor bsdus phan bde'i lam bzang gi sngon 'gro sbyor ba'i chos drug rgyas par byed tshul gyi 'don sgrigs</tib>
<p>1a-13b</p>
<col>@013a * (zhes pa 'di yang rang gi bsti gnas sgrub sde yid dga' chos 'dzin gling du byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i zab 'khrid kyi ngag 'don gsar du 'dzugs skabs chos grwa pa rnams kyi 'don sgrigs su ^dam tshig rdo rjes bris pa dge legs 'phel ^na mo gu ru mdo sngags lam bzang kun gyi gzhir gyur ba rgyal ba'i gsung rab kun gyi snying po'i don gcig tu bsgril nas nyams su len pa'i tshul byang chub lam rim phan bde'i lam bzang gi sbyor ba'i chos drug dkyus las rgyas byed tshul zur du bkod pa'i sbyor chos 'don bsgrigs 'di dad ldan dge slong chos kyi grags pa yis chos sbyin rgya cher spel phyir par du bsgrub dge ba 'di yis tshe rabs thams cad du theg mchog dge ba'i bshes kyis rjes bzung nas lam bzang 'di nyid goms pa mthar phyin te 'gro kun sgrol phyir rnam mkhyen myur thob shog  ) @013b tar hang dge slong 'od zer bzang po sogs lam rim yong rdzogs par du brkobs pa gyis thar ba don gnyer bdag gzhan 'gro ba kun bla med byang chub go 'phang myur thob shog  "</col>
</item>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3989</vol>
<tib>'dus sde rin po che la khrims su bca' ba'i yi ge bde legs kun gyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-18b</p>
<col>@018b ces 'dus sde rin po che la khrims su bca' ba'i yi ge bde legs kun gyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba 'di ni dgon sde rgyal bstan dar rgyas gling gi bla grwa thun mong nas rang dgon du bca' yig cig dgos zhes lha dar gyi gnang skyes dang bcas skul ma nan tan mdzad kyang 'grig lam gyi skor bshad sgrub kyi sde chen mo rnams kyi bca' yig la dpe byas te zhib rgyas shig bris kyang yul dus sogs kyi dbang gis gang ci nas stabs bde ba zhig yod rgyu re zhig la dka' bar mthong nas skabs su mkho ba'i bslab bya spyi 'gro'i rim pa 'di tsam zhig mkhas grub dam pa rnams kyi gsung gi rjes zlos kyi tshul du ^sa mtha'i chos smra ba'i gzugs brnyan ngag gi dbang pos rab tshe nang gi dmar ser can gyi lo nag zla'i tshes dge bar rang gi bsti gnas su sbyar 'dis kyang snyigs dus kyi bstan 'gro la phan pa rgya chen po 'byung bar gyur cig bkra shis dpal 'bar 'dzam gling rgyan du byon "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3989</vol>

<col>@020b (ces gshin rje chos kyi rgyal po la nang sgrub kyi tshul du bstod pa bdud dpung rnam par 'thag pa zhes bya ba 'di ni sdom brtson sde snod 'dzin pa 'jam dpal rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i rang gi slob mas gsol ba btab pa'i don du gshin rje'i gshed @021a * kyi rnal 'byor pa mang du thos pa'i rgyal khams pa blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyis sbyar ba'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3989</vol>
<tib>'khor lo 'bar ba'i rig sngags nyams su blang tshul phung sri phye mar 'thag pa'i 'khrul 'khor zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-9a</p>
<col>@008b (zhes phyir zlog 'khor lo 'bar ba'i @009a * rig sngags nyams su blang tshul gsal bar bkod pa phung sri phye mar 'thag pa'i 'khrul 'khor zhes bya ba 'di ni mchog dman mang pos nye bar bskul ba dang tsakra bcu gsum sri ldang ba la phan no zhes pa'i grags pas yid 'phrog te kha ton byed mkhan mang ba 'dug kyang dmigs gnad sogs kyi man ngag shes pa dkon par snang la phung sri'i gnod pa shin tu khya rgyal ba'i dus 'dir gdams pa zab khyad can 'di lta bu med mi rung du mthong nas gongs thams cad mkhyen pa lnga pa chen po'i gsung la 'bri khung nas brgyud pa'i zhal gdams man ngag gis brgyan te ^dharma badzra gyis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni blo bzang kun dga'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3989</vol>

</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3989</vol>

<col>@007b (ces 'phags ma gdugs dkar mo can gyi sgo nas byad phur grol byed kyi rgyun khyer tshig nyung ngu zhig dgos zhes skyabs mgon rgyal tshab thams cad mkhyen pa'i bka' lung stsal ba spyi bor nod de ^rig pa 'dzin pa 'phags pa dge legs rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos bris pa'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3989</vol>
<tib>rgyal po chen po sde lnga'i gsol mchod 'bul tshul 'phrin las 'gag med rdo rje'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-39a</p>
<col>@038b (ces sprul pa'i chos rgyal chen po 'khor dang bcas pa dgyes dgur spyod pa'i 'phrin las 'gag med rdo rje'i sgra dbyangs zhes pa 'di yang sa chen po bde bar skyong ba'i phyag mdzod bsod nams rab brtan gyis tshang la khyer ba ba zhig dgos zhes bskul ba la brten nas bla ma'i las byang thugs slub yang snying 'dus @039a * pa las bsdus shing gsol mchod kyi rim pa rnams mnga' bdag gter byon gyi 'phrin las don bcu ma dang sgrub skor la gzhi byar thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtshos gnang ba las legs cha blang shing tshogs sbyor gsar du dgongs pa rnams bsgrigs te gnod sbyin chen pos stong grogs tshul bzhin mdzad pa'i za hor gyi rigs las byung ba'i bande ngag dbang blo bzang rgya mtsho bla med rdo rje rtsal gyis rgyal po chen pos phral du sgrub dgos pa'i mtshan ma byung ba ltar nyin gcig la grub par bgyis pa'i yi ge pa ni ngag dbang dge legs so mangga lam ` rgyal chen sku lnga la gsol mchod 'bul tshul 'phrin las 'gags med rdo rje sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba 'di ni sa ga'i zla ba'i tshe brgyad pa la spar gsar du bskrun pa'i tshe ^pad+ma yo go grwa tshang du byon nas dge legs 'phel shu bham</col>
</item>

<item>

<tib>no title [@012b h'um 'jam dbyangs bka' sdod stobs chen gshin rje'i gtso khyod ni drin can rtsa brgyud bla ma dang rab 'byams rgyud sde bzhi dang yongs 'brel ba'i yi dam @013a * lha tshogs ngo bor mnga' gsol lo ]"</tib>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3990</vol>
<tib>bla ma aer te ni no yon ho thog thu blo bzang 'jam dpal bstan 'dzin gyi gsol 'debs ni "</tib>
<p>26a-26b</p>
<col>@026b (ces khal kha aer te sba dur gung seng ge rdo rje rje btsun dam pa'i zhabs gras aer te ni spi lig thu tho yon zhabs drung tshe ring rdo rje khu khan thugs tha'i slob ma dge slong blo bzang mgon po rtsas bzang bla ma blo bzang mgon po khe yar ngar kho tshe ldan skyabs sogs nas bla ma aer te ni no yon ho thog thu blo bzang 'jam dpal bstan 'dzin gyi gsol 'debs zhig dgos zhes bskul ngor rwa sgreng aa chi thu no mon han gyis sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3990</vol>
<tib>bla ma rgyang 'bod mdo sngags kyi don tshang ni "</tib>
<p>11a-12a</p>
<col>@012a * (ces sku tshe du mar bstan 'gro'i don chen sgrub pa'i smon lam gyi mthu las grub pa nges pa don gyi mkhas grub chen po lcang skya mchog gi sprul sku rin po che nas nged rang la sbyar ba'i bla ma rgyang 'bod mdo sngags kyi don tshang ba zhig dgos zhes rgyal khab chen po nas 'phrin yig gis bskul ma mdzad pa ltar gong smos kyi lam rnams thugs la 'khrungs pas grub zin bsgrub pa las ma 'das kyang bzhed pa don yod par bya ba'i phyir ^gong ma chen po'i lung gis zhwa ser bstan pa'i gsal byed aa chi thu no mon han du 'bod pa rig pa 'dzin pa sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang ye shes bstan pa rab rgyas kyis bzhi sde dga' ldan bsam gtan gling du sbyar ba dza yantu</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3990</vol>
<tib>bla ma'i bka' drin dran pa'i gsol 'debs byin rlabs char sprin 'gugs byed dad pa'i dri bzhon zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-5a</p>
<col>@005a * (ces bla ma'i bka' drin dran pa'i gsol 'debs byin rlabs char sprin 'gugs byed dad pa'i dri bzhon zhes bya ba 'di ni khal kha ga-yas ru nas gzung lugs rgya mtsho'i ded dpon mkhyen rab kyi dbang phyug tho yon bla ma chos mdzod bstan sgron mchog nas ^skyabs mgon rgyal sras rdo rje 'chang dang rwa sgreng rdo rje 'chang gnyis kyi bka' drin dran pa'i gsol 'dabs zhig dgos zhes chab shog gi lam nas lan mang du bskul ma mdzad par brten bla ma gzhan la'ang sbyar chog pa'i tshul du ^skyabs mgon rdo rje 'chang rnams gnyis kyi bka' 'bangs tha shal chos mdzad bla ma nyid kyi zla grogs ban chung wa g'indra pa tu siddhis sug bris bgyis pa 'dis kyang 'gro ba thams cad bshes gnyen dam pas rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur cig  mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3990</vol>
<tib>blo bzang dpal 'byor rgyal mtshan gyi gsol 'debs smon tshig ni "</tib>
<p>25a-25b</p>
<col>@025b (ces rje tsong kha pa chen po'i thugs sras ldan ma aon tan dpal gyi skye 'phreng sprul pa'i sku blo bzang dpal 'byor rgyal mtshan gyis gsol 'debs smon tshig 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes ldan ma lab dgon mdo sngags bshad sgrub 'phel rgyas gling nas rab 'byams pa ngag dbang bzod pas bskul ngor rwa sgreng aa chi thu no mon han gyis sbyar</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3990</vol>
<tib>bod kyi brda'i bye brag gsal bar byed pa ngag gi sgron ma</tib>

<col>@010a * ces pa 'di ni sku 'bum grwa rigs na'i man bying 'dren dge rkan ngag dbang bstan 'dzin gyis mdzad pa legs "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3990</vol>
<tib>brag bla ma'i mtshan sgra tshang ba'i rjes 'dzin gsol 'debs ni "</tib>
<p>26b-27a</p>
<col>@027a * (ces ngos dang lam brag bla ma'i mtshan grwa tshang ba'i rjes 'dzin gsol 'debs zhig dgos zhes mdo khams te shod smyung gnas bla ma byams pa rab brtan dang brka shis chos gling gis ri khrod pa dka' bcu grags pa bsam gtan dge tshul ma blo bzang chos 'dzin bcas nas bskul ngor rwa sgreng aa chi thu no mon han gyis se ra theg chen gling du sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3990</vol>
<tib>bslab bya man ngag gi gnad 'gag tshang zhing skye ba thams cad du 'bral med rjes 'dzin gyi gsol 'debs ni"</tib>
<p>18a-18b</p>
<col>@018b (ces aer te ni t'a wang gi shog nas rab 'byams pa shes rab grags pa 'di phyi gnyis la phan pa'i bslab bya man ngag gi gnad 'gag tshang zhing skye ba thams cad du 'bral med rjes 'dzin gyi gsol 'debs zhig dgos zhes bskul ngor rwa sgreng aa chi thu no mon han gyis sbyar</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3990</vol>
<tib>bslab bya snying gtam mchog thun dngos grub char 'bebs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>14b-18a</p>
<col>@017b (ces skabs gcig @018a * bka' drin mtshungs med ^rdo rje 'chang byams pa smon lam gyi sku'i yang srid sked tshang mchog gi sprul pa'i sku blo bzang 'jam dbyangs smon lam la snying gi bslab bya kha chem gyi tshul du rje bka' drin can de nyid kyis rjes su bzung zhing lhag pa'i lha mchog pad+ma yang gsang khros pa'i dbang lung sogs tshang ba thob cing grangs bsnyen dung la nye ba thon pa bla ma la sel med pa'i dag pa'i snang ba mang du shar ba'i las can snying gi bu bcu'i nang tshan mchog thob gnyis pa yin gshis ^gong ma'i lung gis zhwa ser bstan pa'i gsal byed aa chi thu no mon han du 'bod pa sh'akya'i dge slong rig pa 'dzin pa blo bzang ye shes bstan pa rab rgyas kyis se ra theg chen gling gi nang tshan mkhas grub bye ba'i bsti gnas byes grwa khang gi yang steng lhag pa'i lha mchog yang gsang gi sku brnyan ye shes sems dpa' dngos su bzhugs pa'i zhabs drung dang nye bar sbyar ba 'dis kyang dus mthar bstan pa rin po che mi nyams pa'i rgyur gyur cig</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3990</vol>
<tib>bya dka' bzhi sdebs nyan ngag mdzes rgyan gyi bslab bya</tib>
<p>1a-4a</p>
<col>@004a * bdag gi 'di yang ngom pa'i gnas lags te 'di bzhin spyad na 'di bas ngo mtshar che sa mtha' gnas pa'i rang slob ma ni pa bya btang rnam dpyod ldan pas bskul ba'i ngor btsun pa pa tu siddhis sdebs pa 'dis skal mnyam rnams la phan pa byin gyur cig  sarba mangga lam "</col>

<item>
