<vol>3990</vol>
<tib>bya khyung mkhan zur za phug pa blo bzang don 'grub kyi 'khrungs rabs gsol 'debs ni "</tib>
<p>27a-27a</p>
<col>@027a * (ces pa 'di ni bya khyung mkhan zur za phug pa blo bzang don 'grub kyi 'khrungs rab gsol 'debs zhig dgos zhes dpon po blo bzang bsam gtan gyis bskul ngor rwa sgreng aa chi thu no mon han gyis sbyar ba dza yantu</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3990</vol>
<tib>byams pa'i dam bca'i gzungs pa bzla tshul</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col>@003a * 'di yang ^pa tu siddhis rang gi nyams len du dgos par mthong nas dam pa'i man ngag bzhin du 'bol rtsoms su bris 'dis kyang 'gro kun byams mgon gyis rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur cig  "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3990</vol>
<tib>byang phyogs bstan pa'i gsal byed sbi lig thu no mon han gyi mtshan sgra tshang ba'i gsol 'debs ni "</tib>
<p>20b-20b</p>
<col>@020b (zhes pa'ang byang phyogs bstan pa'i gsal byed sbi lig thu no mon han gyi mtshan sgra tshang ba'i gsol 'debs zhig dgos zhes gang gi zhabs gras koo shri blo bzang nyi mas bskul ngor rwa sgreng aa chi thu no mon han gyis sbyar</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3990</vol>
<tib>chos mthun gyi bslab bya ni"</tib>
<p>12a-13b</p>
<col>@013b (ces sku tshe du mar rgyal ba'i dam chos 'dzin pa'i smon lam gyi mthu grub pa lcang skya mchog gi sprul sku rin po che nas chos mthun gyi bslab bya zhig dgos zhes rgyal khab chen po nas 'phrin yig gis bskas bskul ba ltar ^gong ma chen po'i lung gis zhwa ser bstan pa'i gsal byed aa chi thu no mon han du 'bod pa sh'akya'i dge slong rig pa 'dzin pa blo bzang ye shes bstan pa rab rgyas kyis bzhi sde dga' ldan bsam gtan gling du sbyar te phul ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3990</vol>
<tib>dam can chos kyi rgyal po phyi sgrub la brten pa'i drug cu pa'i gtor chen gyi dmigs rim bar chad kun sel zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-30a</p>
<col>@030a * (ces pa 'di btsun gzugs sh'a sa na dhi bam zhes bya bas dgon gnas 'di'i bstan rgyun la phan du re bas sbyar ba dge legs su gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3990</vol>
<tib>dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro tshul gyi gdams pa zab mo snyan brgyud khyad par gsum ldan zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-22b</p>
<col>@022b ces dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro tshul gyi gdams pa rgya cher bshad pa khyad par gsum ldan zhes bya ba 'di bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab dgongs 'grel dang bcas pa ji bzhin du 'byed pa la mkhas pa'i pandi ta chen po 'jam mgon bla ma blo bzang rgya mtsho'i zhal snga nas la sogs pa'i yongs 'dzin du ma'i zhabs kyi padmo spyi bos len pa yul gangs can gyi skyabs 'gro ba 'khon btsun dpal 'byor lhun grub kyis blo gsal zhing don du gnyer ba'i 'dun pa dang ldan pa ngag dbang chos rgyal gyis nan gyis bskul ba'i ngor rang dang gzhan la phan pa'i phyir ri sko bkra shis chos rdzod mi pham rnam par rgyal ba'i sde chen por bya lo hor zla lnga pa'i tshes bzang po la sbyar ba 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3990</vol>
<tib>dus gsum rgyal ba'i yum gcig dbyangs can lha mo la bstod pa dbyangs can dgyes pa skyed byed bstod sprin rgya mtsho zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-10a</p>
<col>@009b (ces pa 'di ni rnam dpyod kyis mngon par mtho ba'i grogs bzang 'ga' zhig gi thugs bzhed bskang ba'i rkyen byung bar rten ^blo bzang @010a * rgyal ba'i mkha' lding dbang pos rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi sku gsung thugs kyi nam mkha' la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bdag gshog gis 'dod dgur rol pa'i rjes su rgyud 'dzin chen po ^gung thang dad pa'i rgyal pos 'phags mchog 'jam dpal bkar po'i gsang gsum gyi lha lam yangs por gnan drid mi 'jog pa'i mkhyen rab kyi gshog bzang dal gyis bskyod pa la kha mig yar bltas kyi tshul du byi'u'i gshog rtsal gyis nam 'phang chod mi nus kyang nus tshad dang bstun pa'i 'phur lding gis rang gi don sgrub pa la 'gal ba med pas gzhan gyis 'phyas 'dags pa'i don med cing rang nyid kyang lhag pa'i lha mor ngag gi 'brel ba bzang po zhig 'jog tu re bas kun nas bslangs te sa mtha'i btsun gras wagindra pa tu siddhas ^ri bo dge rgyas dga' ldan bshad sgrub gling du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi bcu drug cha shas longs su rdzogs pa'i zhal bzang la rgyal phur 'dzom te dga' bas bsu ba byed pa'i 'grub sbyor gyi rin nor bstod pa gong ma gnyis kyi tshig zur ma brkus par don 'grel du bsdebs pa 'di'ang gzhung lugs rgya mtsho'i tshig don la gtugs pa med par 'jug pa'i ngag dang shes rab kyi snang ba rang gzhan gyi rgyud la 'jug pa'i rgyur gyur cig sarba dza yantu</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3990</vol>
<tib>gong gsal gsol 'debs ni"</tib>

<item>

<col>@003a * (ces bdag gzhan kun gyi rgyud la skyabs mgon thugs rje'i 'phrin las rgyun tshad med par 'jug pa'i rten 'brel du rgyun chags kyi sdebs sbyor kho nas rdzogs pa'i 'dod gsol 'di ni dpa' bo mkha' 'gro tshogs su 'du ba'i dus bzang gi nyin wa gindra pa tu siddhis bris pa dge legs 'phel bar gyur cig sarba mangga lam</col>

<item>

<tib>chos mngon pa'i mdzod 'grel slob dpon dbyig gnyen rang gis mdzad pa las gnas bdun pa ye shes bstan pa zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>

<vol>3991</vol>
<tib>chos mngon pa'i mdzod 'grel slob dpon dbyig gnyen rang gis mdzad pa las gnas brgyad snyoms 'jug bstan pa dang gnas dgu pa gang zag 'gag pa bstan pa zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-33a</p>
<col>@032b de ltar 'di ni phyogs tsam zhig rang gi mthu yis rnam 'phel ba'i dug lam yi phyhogs bzhin du shin tu mkhas pa rnams la bstan chos mngon pa'i mdzod las gang zag dgag pa bstan pa zhes bya ba mdzod kyi gnas dgu bste @033a * chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi bshad pa slob dpon sh'akya'i dge slong dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa 'di rdzogs so rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tr dang zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba ban de dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa ` spar 'di bkra shis chos 'phel grwa tshang gi par khang du bzhugs "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3991</vol>

</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3991</vol>
<tib>chos mngon pa'i mdzod 'grel slob dpon dbyig gnyen rang gis mdzad pa las gnas gsum pa 'jig rten bstan pa zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-55a</p>
<col>@055a * chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi bshad pa las 'jig rten bstan pa zhes bya ba mdzod kyi gnas gsum pa rdzogs so aom swa sti chos mngon 'gyur gnas khurye chos sde cher chos mngon gzhung 'di spar du bsgrubs chos sbyin 'dis chos mngon bshad sgrub 'phel zhing 'brel thogs sogs chos mngon lam bgrod kun mkhyen myur thob shog  "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3991</vol>
<tib>chos mngon pa'i mdzod 'grel slob dpon dbyig gnyen rang gis mdzad pa las gnas lnga pa phra rgyas bstan pa zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-33a</p>
<col>@033a *  chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi bshad pa las phra rgyas bstan pa zhes bya ba mdzod kyi gnas lnga pa'o aom swa sti chos mngon 'byung gnas khu re chos sde cher chos mngon gzhung 'di spar bsgrubs chos sbyin 'dis chos mngon bshad bsgrub 'phel zhing 'brel thogs sogs chos mngon lam bgrod kun mkhyen myur thob shog  "</col>

<item>

<p>1a-9a</p>
<col>@009a * (rang gi rtsa ba'i bla ma dang rgyal ba blo bzang grags pa'i dpal 'phags pa thugs rje chen po gsum gtso bor gyur ba'i skyabs gnas ma lus pa'i rnal 'byor man ngag gi gnad rnams tshig zin la thon pa'i cho ga nag 'gros su bkod pa 'di ni gtso cher mkhas grub sangs rgyas ye shes kyi man ngag la gzhi bzung dam pa rnams kyi gsung gis zur brgyan te dharma swa mi'i ming gis sgro btags pa byin pa wa gindra pa tu siddhis rang gi nyams len du bsgrigs pa'o 'dis kyang bdag sogs sems can thams cad 'phags pa thugs rje chen pos rjes su 'dzin par gyur cig </col>

<item>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3992</vol>
<tib>rgyal po'i gsol mchod dregs pa'i re ba skong byed zhes bya ba bzhugs so"</tib>
<p>1a-7a</p>
<col>@007a * (ces pa 'di ni blo gros kyi 'jug pa mchod du yangs pa'i dge slong dkon mchog tshul khrims kyis grong chog pa rnams kyi thugs bzhed bskong ba'i slad du bri dgos su bskul bar rten snyigs dus kyi mtha' la sleb pas rgyal po'i gnod pa bdo ba'i dus 'dir 'ga' zhig la phan pa'ang srid dam snyam pas rgyal po'i mdos gzhung sogs khu das thu ba rnams kyi ngan dang mi 'gal bar bsgrig pa po ni dharma swa mi wa gindra pa tu siddhi'i ming can no 'dis kyang 'gro ba rnam nga rgyal dang zhe sdang gis bskul ba'i gnod byed kyi 'char sgo sna tshor las thar bar gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3992</vol>
<tib>rje btsun mi la bzhad pa'i rdo rje'i gsung mgur smyo ma'i 'grel ba myo ba sangs byed</tib>
<p>1a-12a</p>
<col>@011b (zhes pa 'di ni dad stobs dad ldan pa hal ha ga-yas ru ho sho ching wang gi shog rje btsun chen po rnam thar la mos pa'i grwa pa blo bzang tshul khrims kyis yang yang bskul ba la brten nas grub pa'i dbang phyug de nyid kyi mtshan thos te dad pa lan gcig byed pas kyang skye ba bdun gyi bar du dan song du mi 'gro bar rje btsun rang nyid kyis zhal gyis bzhes pas gsung la bag chags 'jog thub na de bas kyang skal ba bzang po byung dam snyam pas 'grel ba zhig bri 'dod byung yang rmongs pa bdag lta bus grub pa'i dbang phyug gi dgongs pa can gyi brda tshig rdo rje'i gsung la gya tshom du kha tshon tshod pa gal rung bas bla ma rje btsun dbyer med pa la @012a * gsol ba btab cing dpyad pa na go lugs 'di bzhin shar ba ltar ^ skyabs mgon rje btsun dam pa'i bka' 'bangs tha shal sa mtha'i btsun pa wa gnindra pa tu siddhis grub pa'i 'khor bsgyur nag po spyod pa'i sprul pa'i zlos gar rim byon gyi gdan sa hu re chen mor sbyar ba 'dis kyang sgrub rgyud bstan pa'i snying po phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas par gyur cig  sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3992</vol>
<tib>rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod cing gsol ba 'debs pa'i rab tu byed pa autpal 'phreng ba zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-5b</p>
<col>@005a * (ces rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod cing gsol ba 'debs pa'i rab tu byed pa autpal 'phreng ba zhes bya ba 'di ni rab byung bcu bzhi pa'i gser 'phyang zhes pa me mo bya lo gsar tshes kyi nyin rig gnas rgya mtsho'i bang mdzod 'dzin pa rab 'byams pa ngag dbang thub bstan gyis mtshams khang nas snyan @005b tshig gi shis brjod gser gyi me tog 'thor ba dang bcas te bskul ba'i ngor lo 'di'i khongs su ^ skyabs mgon rje btsun dam pa mthong pa don ldan gyi zhal snga nas chen pos sa mtha'i yul khams 'dir ^ zhwa gser gyi bstan pa'i snang pa chen pos khyab par mdzad pa'i 'phrin las sgo 'byed kyi rten 'brel du 'ang bsams te ^ hu ral gyi mkhan ming 'dzin pa wa g'indra su ma ti siddhis ston pa thugs rje can gyis 'dzum zhal nas gser 'od btang ste ngan song gi rgyud sbyangs shing 'gro ba ma lus pa bsam gtan gyi bde ba mchog gis tshim par mdzad pa'i cho 'phrul dus bzang nyin legs par sbyar ba yi ge pa ni gzhung lugs kun la blo mig rnam par dag pa dge slong pra dzny'a sa ga ra'o 'dis kyang 'gro ba ma lus pa 'phags mas rjes su 'dzin par 'gyur zhing rgyal bstan rin po che dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>

<vol>3992</vol>
<tib>sman chog dang 'brel ba'i stong mchod bya tshul bzhugs "</tib>

<item>

<vol>3992</vol>
<tib>ston pa thub pa'i dbang po'i sngon byung gi skyes rabs dang mdzad bcu 'brel bar phyag mchod ji ltar bya ba'i rim pa</tib>

<col>@011a * (ces pa 'di ni dad brtson rnam dpyod dang ldan pa dge slong blo bzang rin chen gyis 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba ltar ^ wa gindra su ma ti pa tu siddhis bsdebs pa yi ge pa ni rnam dpyod yangs pa pra dzny'as ga ra'o 'dis kyang 'gro ba thams cad ston pa thub pa'i dbang pos rjes su 'dzin par gyur cig </col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3992</vol>
<tib>thub pa chen po'i zhi rgyas kyi sbyin sreg bya tshul sdig ltung mun 'joms ye shes mdor ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-7b</p>
<col>@007b (ces pa 'di ni ^ skyabs mgon rje btsun dam pa'i gdan sa khu re chen mo'i nang tshan aa mdo nas khams tshan du thub pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi rdul tshon bzhengs pa'i le lag tu 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes chos sbyin yangs pa slob dpon dge slong grags pa rnam rgyal dang dad ldan dge slong blo bzang rdo rje gnyis nas bskul ba ltar bla ming 'dzin pa wagindra pa tu siddhis bsgrigs pa yi ge pa ni blo mg dag pa shra ma na pra dznyas ga ra'o 'dis kyang 'jam mgon bstan pa'i rin po che  dar zhing rgyas par byed nus par gyur cig  sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3993</vol>
<tib>brtan bzhugs gsol 'debs 'dod pa'i re skong 'dod dgu yid bzhin 'jo ba'i bum bzang zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-5a</p>
<col>@005a * (ces pa 'di ni ^rgyal ba 'od snang mtha' yas zhing 'dir mi yi gar rol kun gzigs pan chen mchog gi sprul sku rin po che'i zhal dkyil mngon gyur thog mar byung 'phral mtshan bloo bzango thubo bstano choso kyio nyio mao dgeo legso rnamo rgyalo zhes gsol te bstan dang 'gro ba yongs kyi mchog dpal mgon dam par zhing 'dir bskal ba rgya mtsho'i bar du brtan bzhugs kyi gsol 'debs la brtson 'dun gyi yid kyi nyer len dang bcas te yod skabs pan chen mchog gi 'phrin las pa dza sag bla ma nas kyang nan tan chen pos bskul ngor ^sh'akya'i ring lugs 'dzin pa ngago dbango bloo bzango thubo bstano rgyao mtshoo 'jigso bralo dbango phyugo phyogso laso rnamo par rgyalo ba'i sde dpal bzang pos rab byung bco lnga pa sa byi hor zla dang po'i dkar phyogs dga' ba gsum par smras pa dge legs 'phel sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3993</vol>
<tib>bzang spyod stong phrag sogs su 'don thabs</tib>
<p>1a-2b</p>
<col>@002b (zhes pa 'di ni na tshod gzhon dus gzhis dgor rdo rje btan pa'i dbu mdzad zhig gi ngor bris pa'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3993</vol>
<tib>'dul ba mdo rtsa ba'i zin bris</tib>
<p>1a-106a</p>
<col>@106b rje thams cad mkhyen pas 'dul ba mdo rtsa ba'i t'ikka mdzad bzhed pa las zin bris su 'ol khar bkod pa'o yi ge pa ni ma gcig dpon po nam mkha' dpal lo bstan pa dang sems can la phan pa rgya chen po 'byung bar gyur cig  sarba mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3993</vol>
<tib>'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs rje'i thugs bzhed ltar bkod pa</tib>
<p>1a-3b</p>
<col>@003b 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs 'di bla ma rin po che'i thugs bzhed ltar grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis yi ger bkod 'dis bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas par gyur cig  aom swa sti phan bde'i 'byung gnas rgyal bstan yongs 'du'i ljon rab rgyas 'gro kun thar mchog 'bras bzang la spyod phyir bkra shis lhun grub chos grwa cher chos sbyin 'dzad med dal 'gro'i rgyun 'di spel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3993</vol>
<tib>rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga lag len du dril ba dge legs rgya mtsho'i char 'bebs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-28a</p>
<col>@027b ces rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga dge legs rgya mtsho'i char bebs zhes bya ba 'di snga mo nas dge slong blo bzang phun tshogs sogs ded rang gi zhabs 'bring ba du mas bskul zhing 'phral du chos kyi rje gsang sngags rab @028a * 'byams pa dpal ldan mchog sbyin pa la sogs pa rgyud pa dpon slob rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu yid ches shing khungs btsun pa'i rab gnas kyi cho ga legs par bsgrigs pa zhig dgos zhes nan gyis bskul ba la brten nas rgya bod kyi rab gnas kyi cho ga mang po'i don khong du chud par byas te 'thad cing legs pa'i cha thams cad rgyas 'bring bsdus pa'i tshul du chos smra ba blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis chos grwa chen po bkra shis lhun po'i gtsug lag khang du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge slong blo bzang phun tshogs kyis bgyis pa 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3993</vol>
<tib>rgyal ba mi 'khrugs pa'i zhing bkod</tib>
<p>1a-8a</p>
<col>@008a * (ces rgyal ba mi 'khrugs pa'i zhing gi yon tan mdor bsdus te brjod pa 'di ni gnas brtan rgyal mtshan dpal bzang gis bskul ba'i ngo bor sh'akya'i btsun pa bshad sgrub ming can gyis co ne'i dgon nyid du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni ngag dbang bkra shis so mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3993</vol>
<tib>sangs rgyas so lnga'i mngon rtogs dang lha sku'i phyag tshad</tib>
<p>1a-29a</p>
<col>@028b phyag tshad kyi dbye ba 'di ni snyigs dus kyi rgyal ba dpal ldan bla ma dam pa blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyi zhal snga nas kyis dpal ri bo dge ldan du gsang ba bla na med pa'i dkyil 'khor bslang ma rnams dang thub pa chen po'i sku jo bo'i sku @029a * tshad sogs yi dam zhi khro du ma bzhengs pa'i dus su rgyal ba'i sku gzugs kyi sgo nas kyang bstan pa dang sems can la phan par dgongs nas tshad yid gi rnam grangs du ma zhig las bde mchog sdom 'byung gi dka' 'grel rgya gar gyi grub chen rakshi tas mdzad pa'i le'u sum cu pa las phyag tshad kyi de nyid rgyas par gsungs pa las legs par gtan la phab cing gangs can gyi rig byed 'dzin pa rnams kyi gtsug rgyan sdom pa gsum la sogs pa'i lung rtogs kyi yon tan du mas thugs rgyud legs par gang ba khyad par bla ma de nyid kyi byin rlabs zhugs pas 'phrin las dang 'gro don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bshes gnyen mkhas pa'i dbang po bsod nams rgyal mtshan dang shes rab rgyal mtshan zhes yongs su grags pa gnyis kyis rje'i bka' bzhin du thig dang go rim rnams ma 'khrugs par ri mo dang 'bur du dong pa la gtan la phab cing dgongs pa yang dag par blangs pa rnams la 'dris shing legs par sbyangs pa dpal ldan bla ma tsong kha pa yab sras sogs bshes gnyen dam pa rnas kyi zhabs rdul spyi bor nod pa'i btsun pa manga la sh'i las phyag tshad kyi srid zhing dus 'khor 'grel chen dang bstun nang chan gyi dbye ba sdom 'byung dang mthun par rang bzo spengs he gtsang rong gi byams chen du yi ger bkod pa'o yi ge pa ni bla ma'i ming can bdag gis bris sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3993</vol>
<tib>sgrol ma mandal bzhi pa'i cho ga'i lag len dang man ngag gi gnad gsal bar bkod pa bdud rtsi'i bum bzang zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-15a</p>
<col>@014b (ces sgrol ma mandal bzhi pa'i @015a * cho ga'i lag len dang man ngag gi gnad gsal bar bkod pa bdud rtsi'i bum bzang zhes bya ba ni mkhyen pa dang brtse ba la sogs pa yon tan du mas thugs rgyud bltams shing ^ rgyal dbang 'jig rten gsum mgon mchog gi 'phrin las bsgrub pa la zla dang bral ba'i snying stobs can khu bo chen po aa chi thu mkhan po rje drung blo bzang phun tshogs kyis gong sa lha mi'i rnam 'dren mchog gi zhabs brtan la shin tu bsngags pa mandal bzhi pa'i cho ga'i lag len dang man ngag gi gnad rnams gsal bar bkod pa cha lag tshang ba 'du lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul zhing bal bod kyis mtshams su rnam 'dren rgyal ba'i dbang po'i zhabs brtan du ched dmigs kyis sgrub sde gsar btsugs khrims ldan gling gi dge 'dun rnams kyi tshogs 'don du 'dzugs rgyu sogs kun la phan che bar yang bsams te bla ma dam pa rnams kyi zhabs rdul spyi bo'i rgyan du 'dzin cing 'jam dbyangs gong ma bdag po chen po'i lung gis pandi tar bsngags pa rgyal khams pa dge slong ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis dge byed ces pa chu pho stag gi lo'i dbyug pa zla ba'i dkar tshes rgyal ba dang po'i nyin pho brang chen po po ta la'i gzims chung bde ba can du sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang thub pa'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs thams cad du 'phel zhig rgyas par gyur cig  ) "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3994</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mi 'khrugs pa lha dgu la brten pa'i smyung bar gnas pa'i cho ga sdig sgrib mun 'joms ngan song 'dren byed byin rlabs 'od kyi zhags pa zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-15a</p>
<col>@015a * (ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mi 'khrugs pa lha dgu la brten pa'i smyung bar gnas pa'i cho ga sdig sgrib mun 'joms ngan song 'dren byed byin rlabs 'od kyi zhags pa zhes bya ba 'di ni skyes pa'i rabs du mar rgyal bstan 'dzin pa'i smon lam gyi mthu legs par grub pa ail go sang aer te ni mkhan po no mon hang rin chen rdo rje nas bskul ma mdzad pa ltar bdag mdun gyi skor rje gung thang 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis gsung ltar bkod cing smyung gnas kyi cho ga gzhan las kyang cung zad kha bskangs te ^ btsun pa wa g'indra pa tu siddhis khu re chen mor bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni shes rab kyi mi gdang ldan pa shes rab rgya mtsho'o 'dis kyang rgyal bstan rin po che dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<tib>bris byang dang spar byang sna tshogs rjes gnang ba</tib>

<col>@002b (ces pa 'di ni dad stobs kyi dbang phyug aa has gung tshe dbang rdo rje nas ^ skyabs mgon rje btsun dam pa'i mchog sprul rin po che'i zhabs brtan dagn dge ldan bstan pa dar zhing rgyas pa'i [???] du dmigs te thog mtha' bar gsum gyi sbyin bdag mdzad mi [???] 'dri mi dge slong skal bzang chos 'phel dang dge slong rnam rgyal sogs dang zhu dag pa dge slong bsod nams bkra shis bcas kyis sna tshogs zhes pa chu bo rta lor ri bo dge rgyas dga' ldan bshad sgrub gling du ^ 'jam mgon rgya ba gnyis @003a * pa'i gsung rab legs bshad gser 'phreng spar du bzhengs tshe spar byang dgos tshul ltar dharma swa mi'i ming gis sgro btags pa'i ngag dbang mkhas grub kyis bris pa dge legs 'phel bkra shis dpal 'bar 'dzam gling rgyan du byon</col>

<item>

<vol>3994</vol>
<tib>bskal bzang rnam 'dren stong gi sku brnyan spar shin tu mdzes bskrun skabs zung ldan gyi snyan ngag bsngags brjod dbyangs su sgrogs pa</tib>

<item>

<tib>mkhas shing grub pa'i dbang phyug chen po pan chen bsod nams grags pa'i dpal rnam dpyod mchog gi sde'i rnam thar gsol 'debs dad pa'i rol mtsho rgyas byed ngag gi char sprin zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3994</vol>
<tib>slob ma la springs pa'i rnam bshad 'dod pa'i zug rngu sel bar byed pa'i snying gi thur ma zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-63b</p>
<col>@063a * (ces slob ma la springs pa'i tshig don mdor bsdus su 'grel pa snying gi thur ma zhes bya  ba 'di ni legs nyes 'byed pa'i blo gros kyi mig dang ldan pa lha btsun dge slong ngag dbang 'od zer gyis 'di lta bu zhig ces kyang bris shig pa'i au tshugs mthar bskyel gyi ngor dam pa du ma'i zhabs rdul spyi bos len pa'i sa mtha'i btsun chung wa g'indra pa tu siddhis skyabs mgon dam pa rim byon gyi gdan sa chen po ri bo dge rgyas dga' ldan bshad sgrub gling du sug bris su bgyis pa spyir na bdag lta bu'i yig 'jog bstan pa'i than ltas lta bur song bar ma zad gzhung dan 'ga' zhig gi khog pa zug pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba las 'os med na'ang mkhas pa'i bya ba 'chad rtsod rtsom gdum smon pa'i yul du byed nas dam pa'i rjes su zlos pa yin pas 'dis kyang tshangs spyod rnam par dag pas gzhi bzung ba'i 'jam mgon bsta pa dar zhing rgyas par gyur cig  ) `aom swa sti lha mi'i ston pa kun mkhyen zas gtsang sras lnga rig pan chen btsun pa zla ba'i zhabs rgyal ba gnyis pa blo bzang grags pa sogs thub dbang rgyud 'dzin bcas la snying nas 'dud bka' dang gdam pa ngag gangs ri'i sbor 'gyid zhing 'chad rdzod rtsom la dbang pa'i lus stobs rgyas rnam dag bslab gsum ral ba'i khur 'chang ba mkhas grub bstan 'dzin gdong lnga'i dbang por 'dud gang de'i legs bshad snying gi thur ma 'dis don gnyer 'dod pa'i snying rlung sel ba'i slad kho bo dngos po'i mthun rkyen legs sbyar te chos sbyin mi @063b zang bkod legs spar 'di bsgrubs 'dis mtshon rang gzhan rnam dkar bsdoms pa'i mthus phan bde'i gter gcig rgyal ba'i lung rtogs chos 'jam dpal snying po'i dgongs pa ji lta bar bshad dang sgrub pas rtag tu 'phel bar shog 'di la 'brel thogs gtso byas 'gro ba kun skye bar dal 'byor rten thob rab tu 'byung theg pa mchog gi bshes kyis rjes bzung ste thos bsam sgom pas rang rgyud sbyar bar shog lan grangs du mar rgyal bas bsngags pa yi rnam dag tshul khrims zhing sa gshin pa la ting 'dzin shes rab lo tog cher smin te rnam grol 'bras bu'i dpal la sbyor bar shog ma rig 'khrul 'khor snying gi zug rngu kun ye shes rno rgyun 'bab pa'i thur ma yis drung phyung sgrib gnyis dgra las rnam rgyal ba'i thub chen dpa' po'i go 'phang myur thob shog ces par byang smon tshig 'di nyid dam chos 'gyur med gling gi bla ming 'dzin pa bhi kshu aa yu sthi ta k'irtis bris pa dge "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3994</vol>
<tib>sngags 'chang dge 'dun seng ge dpal bzang po'i rnam par thar pa shel gyi me long zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-15b</p>
<col>@015b (ces pa 'di ni dad stobs kyi dbang phyug aa has ja sag rnam rgyal rdo rje nas rang gi bla ma sngags rams pa dge 'dun seng ge'i rtogs brjod tshigs bcad du sdebs pa zhig gis ces kyang dgos zhes au tshugs nan gyis mdzad pa'i ngo ldog mi nus par rang rtsom nyid kyi rnam thar nas ji ltar byung ba ltar ^ btsun pa wa g'indra pa tu siddhis tshigs bcad du sdebs pa 'dis kyang on mchod dgyes shing rnam par dka' ba'i mdzad 'phrin rgyas pa'i rgyur gyur cig </col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3996</vol>
<tib>bris byang dang spar byang sna tshogs rjes gnang ba</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col>@002b (ces pa 'di ni dad stobs kyi dbang phyug aa has gung tshe dbang rdo rje nas ^ skyabs mgon rje btsun dam pa'i mchog sprul rin po che'i zhabs brtan dagn dge ldan bstan pa dar zhing rgyas pa'i mkhyen du dmigs te thog mtha' bar gsum gyi sbyin bdag mdzad [???] ma 'phel  'dri mi dge slong skal bzang chos 'phel dang dge slong rnam rgyal sogs dang zhu dag pa dge slong bsod nams bkra shis bcas kyis sna tshogs zhes pa chu bo rta lor ri bo dge rgyas dga' ldan bshad sgrub gling du ^ 'jam mgon rgya ba gnyis @003a * pa'i gsung rab legs bshad gser 'phreng spar du bzhengs tshe spar byang dgos tshul ltar dharma swa mi'i ming gis sgro btags pa'i ngag dbang mkhas grub kyis bris pa dge legs 'phel bkra shis dpal 'bar 'dzam gling rgyan du byon</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3996</vol>
<tib>bu ston thams cad mkhyen pas mdzad pa'i gros 'debs snying gi thur ma zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa 'chal ba'i klung rgyun bzlog par byed pa'i legs bshad chu lon zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-18a</p>
<col>@018a * (ces bu ston thams cad mkhyen pas mdzad pa'i gros 'debs snying gi thur ma zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa 'chal ba'i klung rgyun bzlog par byed pa'i legs bshad chu lon zhes bya ba 'di ni snga sor gzhung lugs rab 'byams smra ba ngag dbang thub bstan gyis bskul zhing phyis su'ang dge ba'i bshes gnyen mdo sngags kyi mnga' bdag rab 'byams pa blo bzang bstan 'dzin gyis bskul ba la brten nas ^ mkhan ming 'dzin pa wa g'indra su ma ti pa tu siddhis khu re chen mor sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni rig gnas la rnam dpyod yangs pa shra ma na pra dzny'a sa ga ra'o 'dis kyang tshul khrims rnam dag gis gzhi bzung ba'i thub bstan rin po che dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3996</vol>
<tib>byang chub lam gyi rim pa la bde lam gyi man ngag bzhin du shar sgom bya tshul tshig bcad du bsdebs pa</tib>
<p>1a-33a</p>
<col>@032b (de ltar ji bzhin bskyed par @033a * blta ba'i gegs su gyur ba'ang yod pas bdag 'dra'i sdom tshig bstan pa'i thar ltas su song dgos kyis bri ma 'dod par 'phro lus pa las mkhyen pab kyi dbang phyug bla ma tshe ring gis blo gsar ba rnams la phan des che bas ces kyang rdzogs par bri dgos su gsungs par brten sa mtha'i snyoms las pa btsun gzugs wa g'indra pa tu siddhis rig gnas rgya mtsho'i bsti gnas hu re chen mor bris pa 'dis kyang 'jam mgon bstan pa dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3996</vol>
<tib>gsol 'debs blo bzang 'jam dpal ma</tib>
<p>4b-5a</p>
<col>@005a * ces nyer 'tshe zhi ba'i 'dod gsol 'di ni mchog gi sprul pa'i sku rin po che stong 'khor manydzu shri ngag dbang blo bzang thub bstan 'jigs med tshul khrims kyi sku mo'i bar chad nya bar zhi zhing gsan sbyong mthar phyin pa'i gsol 'debs zhig dgos zhes dgon sde dge gsol gling gi chos rje bla ma mdo sngags chos tshul mkhyen pa'i spyan ldan dge slong blo bzang 'jam dbyangs sogs zhabs gras thun mong nas bskul ba ltar ^ bla ming 'dzin pa pa tu siddhis bris pa mi mthun ga-yul las rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3996</vol>
<tib>'jam dbyangs gong ma bdag po chen po'i zhabs brtan tshigs bcad bkra shis dgu brtsegs ma zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>7a-8a</p>
<col>@008a * (ces 'jam dbyangs gong ma bdag po chen po srid gsal mi'i lha mchog nyid kyi zhabs brtan tshigs bcad bkra shis dgu brtsegs ma'i grangs mtshungs 'di ni gong ma'i bka' lung gis ail ku sang hu thog thur 'bod pa bstan 'dzin dam pa'i skyes mchog no yon no mong hang rin chen rdo rje nas gsar bskrun ddgon sde de nyid kyi zhal 'don du tshugs bzhed kyis bskul ba ltar mkhan po no mon han gyi ming 'dzin ban chung ngag dbang blo bzang mkhas grub kyis sug bris su bgyis nas phul ba lags</col>

<item>

<item>

<item>

<vol>3997</vol>
<tib>rab gnas bkra shis snye ma'i lhan thabs</tib>

<col>@015a * ces pa 'di ni yi dam rdo rje 'jigs byed la brten nas bkra shis snye ma ltar rab gnas 'bring po byed tshul ngag 'don dang phyag len byed tshul 'dul 'dzin pa'i rab gnas kyi yig cha che chung gnyis nas kha bskang ste rang dang skal pa mnyam pa dag la phan pa'i phyir gyi na ba ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan gyis bkod pa ste dgag bzhag sogs rgyas par gzhan du 'chad 'dod pas 'dir ma sbros shing rab gnas byed pa mchod yon thams cad kyi tshogs rlab po che sog pa'i don du yin pas bla ma dang yon bdag gnyis ka'i ngos nas byas lo tsam ma yin par bsod nams sog pa'i thabs su 'gyur ba cig bya 'tshal lo zhes gsol ba 'debs so "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3997</vol>
<tib>rnam 'grel gyi bsdus don thar lam byi de nyid gsal byed</tib>
<p>1a-103a</p>
<col>@103a * bstan bcos tshad ma rnam par 'grel pa'i bsdus don de nyid gsal byed ces bya ba 'di ni grub pa brnyes pa'i shing rta chen po slob dpon lha dbang blo'i bzhed pa gtso bor byas nas rigs pa smra ba dar ma rin chen gyis brog ri bo che rnam par rgyal ba'i gling du sbyar ba'o yi ge pa ni sdom brtson sde snod 'dzin pa rin chen chos rgyal lo 'dis kyang thub pa'i bstan pa rin po che sgo thams cad nas phyogs thams cad di dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  aom swa sti rgyal bstan pad tshal phan bde'i dri bsung can bshad sgrub 'dab rgyas rnam grol sprang rtsi'i bcud 'gro kun spyod phyir sku 'bum byams pa gling chos sde che nas chos sbyin char 'di spel sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3997</vol>
<tib>rnam 'grel gyi bsdus don thar lam byi de nyid gsal byed</tib>
<p>1a-103a</p>
<col>@103a * bstan bcos tshad ma rnam par 'grel pa'i bsdus don de nyid gsal byed ces bya ba 'di ni grub pa brnyes pa'i shing rta chen po slob dpon lha dbang blo'i bzhed pa gtso bor byas nas rigs pa smra ba dar ma rin chen gyis brog ri bo che rnam par rgyal ba'i gling du sbyar ba'o yi ge pa ni sdom brtson sde snod 'dzin pa rin chen chos rgyal lo 'dis kyang thub pa'i bstan pa rin po che sgo thams cad nas phyogs thams cad di dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  aom swa sti rgyal bstan pad tshal phan bde'i dri bsung can bshad sgrub 'dab rgyas rnam grol sprang rtsi'i bcud 'gro kun spyod phyir sku 'bum byams pa gling chos sde che nas chos sbyin char 'di spel sarba mangga lam</col>

<item>

<item>

<col>@006b (ces pa 'di ni khal kha ga-yon ru aus jing wang gi shog gam sa char lo star sman bla'i rdul tshon bzhengs pa'i srol bzang byung ba la nye bar mkho ba'i don du ga lnga ba'i blo mig yangs pa dge slong tshe ring rdo rje dang dbu mdzad blo bzang rdo rje gnyis nas bskul ma bgyis pa lngar wa g'i ntra pa tu siddhis ga-yar khral du bris pa 'di kyang 'jam mgon bstan pa dar zhing 'gro ba thams cad sman gyi bla mas rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur cig "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3998</vol>
<tib>dbu sems kyis kun rdzob tu yod tshul las brtsams pa'i rtsod lan dbu ma snang ba las byung ba rnams dang bsdus nas bshad pa'i kun rdzob tu yod tshul bcu gcig gsal bar byed pa'i tshig gi sgron me zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-25a</p>
<col>@025a * ces dbu sems kyis kun rdzob tu yod tshul las brtsams pa'i rtsod lan dbu ma snang ba las byung ba rnams dang bsdus nas bshad pa'i kun rdzob tu yod tshul bcu gcig gsal bar byed pa'i tshig gi sgron me zhes bya ba 'di ni mkhas mang 'dun sa mdzes rgyan gzhung lugs smra ba'i dbang phyug 'bras sgo nams pa mer gan dge bshes blo bzang yon tan nas 'di lta bu zhig dgos su gsungs pa ltar ^ mkhan thog bcu gnyis pa pa tu siddhis bris pa dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3998</vol>
<tib>dge sdig blang dor gyi rnam dbye brjed 'khyim pa lha yul du bgrod par byed pa'i nor bu'i them skas ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-13a</p>
<col>@013a * (ces dge sdig blang dor gyi rnam dbye brjod pa khyim pa lha yul du 'grod par byed pa'i nor bu'i them skas ces bya ba 'di ni dad stobs kyi dbang phyug mantra t'a wang chen po nas dge sdig blang dor bdag 'dra'i blo dang 'tshams pa zhig bri dgos kyi bskul ma mdzad pa ltar ^ rgyal ba'i gsung rab dang dam pa'i legs bshad rgya mtsho lta bu yod bzhin du bdag 'dras 'di'ang ba bri ba'i la pa bsten pa mi rigs kyang bskul ba po'i thugs bzhed bskang ba'i don du ^ rgyal ba'i gsung rab kyi dgongs pa ji lta ba bzhin du ^ wa g'indra pa tu siddhis bsgrigs pa yi ge pa ni rnam dpyod kyi gter du gyur ba dge slong pra dzny'a sa ga ra'o 'dis kyang 'gro ba rnams ngan song gi sgo 'khegs nas mtho ris dang thar pa'i go 'phang 'thob par gyur cig  mangga lam</col>
</item>

<col>@011b (zhes pa 'di ni dad stobs dad ldan pa hal ha ga-yas ru ho sho ching wang gi shog rje btsun chen po rnam thar la mos pa'i grwa pa blo bzang tshul khrims kyis yang yang bskul ba la brten nas grub pa'i dbang phyug de nyid kyi mtshan thos te dad pa lan gcig byed pas kyang skye ba bdun gyi bar du dan song du mi 'gro bar rje btsun rang nyid kyis zhal gyis bzhes pas gsung la bag chags 'jog thub na de bas kyang skal ba bzang po byung dam snyam pas 'grel ba zhig bri 'dod byung yang rmongs pa bdag lta bus grub pa'i dbang phyug gi dgongs pa can gyi brda tshig rdo rje'i gsung la gya tshom du kha tshon tshod pa gal rung bas bla ma rje btsun dbyer med pa la @012a * gsol ba btab cing dpyad pa na go lugs 'di bzhin shar ba ltar ^ skyabs mgon rje btsun dam pa'i bka' 'bangs tha shal sa mtha'i btsun pa wa gnindra pa tu siddhis grub pa'i 'khor bsgyur nag po spyod pa'i sprul pa'i zlos gar rim byon gyi gdan sa hu re chen mor sbyar ba 'dis kyang sgrub rgyud bstan pa'i snying po phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas par gyur cig  sarba mangga lam</col>

<tib>sman chog dang 'brel ba'i gshin po rjes 'dzin gyi cho ga nyam thag 'dren byed sdig sbyong 'od kyi zhags pa zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>3999</vol>
<tib>byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa</tib>
<p>1a-58a</p>
<col>@057a * byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa slob dpon sh'an ta de bas mdzad pa rdzogs so rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dzny'a de ba dang zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande dpal brtsegs kyis kha che'i dpe las zhus te gtan la phab pa las slad kyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po dharma shr'i bha dra dang zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande rin chen bzang po dang sh'akya blo gros kyis yul dbus kyi 'grel pa dang mthun par bcos shing bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o yang dus phyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ma ti ki rti dang zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis dag par bcos shing bsgyur te legs par gtan la phab pa'o aom sam bha ra sam bha ra bhi ma na sa ra mah'a dza ba h'um phat sw'a h'a bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i chos kyi tshig gcig gi don gang yin de ni chos thams cad kyi yang yin na 'on kyang @057b bdag ni rang gi las kyi nyes pas shes rab chung zhing blo zhan te de lta yin tu zin kyang gang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab glegs bam du byas pa bklag par bya ste chos kyi sgra de sems can gang rnams kyi rnal ma du grag par gyur ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs pa thob par gyur cig  sangs rgyas bstan pa'i snying po zhwa ser bstan 'dzin skyong spel la khur 'khyer spos kyi glang brgya phrag dka' yang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin gnam bskos bstan 'dzin lha dbang chos rgyal gyis byang chub spyod la 'jug pa'i dri med gsung chos sbyin rgya cher spel phyir par du bsgrubs dge 'dis mtshon pa'i rnam dkar dge ba'i mthus  'jam dpal snying po'i bstan pa dbyar rnga bzhin phyogs bcu kun tu bar med sgrog pa dang khyad par tshe 'das tshe ring bkra shis kyi sgrib gnyis sbyangs shing tshogs gnyis rab rdzogs nas rnam mkhyen go 'phang myur du thob par shog  go 'phang dam pa mngon du gyur nas kyang byang chub sems kyi lag pa ring brkyangs nas 'gro kun rnam mkhyen 'thob byed 'phags nor bdun 'dzad pa med par longs su spyod par shog  @058a * de ltar bskrun pa'i mthu las byung ba yis 'gro la bde stsol stobs ldan chos rgyal gyi chab srid mnga' thang dbyar gyi chu gter ltar rab tu 'phel zhing kun tu rgyas pa ru bskal brgya'i bar du gnas pa'i rgyu ru bsngo yon tan kun gyi gzhi gyur bla ma dang mchog mthun dngos grub stsol ba'i yi dam lha bgegs dpung ma lus 'joms mdzad srungs tshogs kyi bsam don myur du 'grub pa'i bkra shis shog  (spyod 'jug gi par byang) gsung rab kun gyi snying po'i chu klung 'bum nyams len gdams par rab 'khyil rgyal mtsho che byang chub spyod par 'jug pa'i gru rdzings par bskrun pa'i dge rtsa kunda ltar dkar bas lun rtogs rgyal ba'i bstan pa mi nyams shing bdag sogs 'gro kun rgyal sras spyod pa mchog  zung 'brel nyams len gnad rnams mthar phyin nas sangs rgyas go 'phang bde blag 'thob par shog  (ces pa 'di ni aer te ni thu she ye thu dar rgan nang so ye shes skal bzang gis khal kha phyogs su spyod 'jug gi par byang re dgos zhes bskul ba ltar sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang skal bzang rgya mtshos sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>
